T02TD2510.2E:1b-0: @1b # // de ltar chos kyi phyag rgya'i gtso bor gyur pa'i 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:1b-1: da ni las kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa'i 'jig rten gsum gyi [dd] 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:1b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:1b-3: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:1b-4: dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:1b-5: 'dir dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa nyid gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:1b-6: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD2510.2E:1b-7: yang zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos pas na yang zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:1b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni las kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:1b-9: 'di'i dam tshig ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid do //
T02TD2510.2E:1b-10: de las byung ba ni skyes pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:2a-0: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi thugs la gnas @2a * //
T02TD2510.2E:2a-1: pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba las byung ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:2a-2: des byin gyis brlabs pa ni brtan par byas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de skad ces bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD2510.2E:2a-3: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:2a-4: phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kar gnas pa'i rdo rje brtan par byed pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:2a-5: 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la gnas pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:2a-6: bdag nyid rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs pa ni bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:2a-7: aom badzra karma pra brta ni sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba 'di ni /
T02TD2510.2E:2a-8: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa nyid kyis rig pa thams cad kyi nang na mchog tu gyur pas na rig pa dam pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:2a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:2a-10: rdo rje bran mo rnams kyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar du bstan pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2510.2E:2b-0: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas bran mo rnams kyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar du bstan pa'i gzhung 'dis ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa @2b gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:2b-1: de nas bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bstan pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:2b-2: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:2b-3: 'jig rten gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang /
T02TD2510.2E:2b-4: dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis de las gsungs pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:2b-5: de nas phyag na rdo rjes zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:2b-6: slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:2b-7: de nas zhes bya ba ni skabs su bab pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:2b-8: phyag na rdo rje ni rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
T02TD2510.2E:2b-9: yang zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'khor lo la ltos pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:2b-10: rdo rje'i rigs thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:2b-11: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:2b-12: sngar bsnyen pa byas pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:2b-13: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:2b-14: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor dang /
T02TD2510.2E:2b-15: de las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:2b-16: de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i rig pa rnams re re zhing yang bzlas pa khri bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:2b-17: de ltar byas na sngon du bsnyen par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:2b-18: de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i ting de 'dzin gsum bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas zhag bdun bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:2b-19: de nas de'i rjes thogs nyid la dkyil 'khor bri ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:2b-20: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug gam /
T02TD2510.2E:2b-21: lo gcig gi bar du bsgoms la ji srid mngon sum du gyur la de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:2b-22: de nas de'i rjes pa dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:2b-23: de nas zhes bya ba ni rgyu de'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:3a-1: gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med na /
T02TD2510.2E:3a-2: des 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams rnams kyi 'dod pa'i don gyi dngos grub tu mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:3a-3: rab tu bshad par bya zhing rnam par dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:3a-4: las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
T02TD2510.2E:3a-5: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:3a-6: dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre //
T02TD2510.2E:3a-8: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2510.2E:3a-9: 'dir de'i tshul gyis las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di thams cad srad bus bre bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:3a-11: grva bzhi pa la byang phyogs sgo //
T02TD2510.2E:3a-12: phyi rol dkyil 'khor srad bus bre //
T02TD2510.2E:3a-13: de yi nang du der yang ni //
T02TD2510.2E:3a-14: de bzhin sgo ni shar phyogs gdod //
T02TD2510.2E:3a-16: dkyil 'khor mchog gi gnas su phyogs bzhi'i dbus kyi cha thams cad du sangs rgyas dbus na bzhugs par bya /
T02TD2510.2E:3a-18: sangs rgyas dbus na bzhugs pa rnams ni sangs rgyas dbus na bzhugs pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:3a-20: de la rdo rje h'um mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:3a-23: las kyi h'um mdzad nyid sangs rgyas su 'dod kyi /
T02TD2510.2E:3a-24: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:3a-25: gang gi phyir 'dir rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:3a-26: de dag gis ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:3a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i rang rang gi phyogs gnyis kar rim pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:3a-28: yang gi sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste rim pa nyid do //
T02TD2510.2E:3a-29: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:3a-30: khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:3a-31: khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gyi bar du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:3a-33: bshad ma thag pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor de'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:3a-34: dbus ni nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phyogs su'o //
T02TD2510.2E:3a-35: rdo rje rig pa dam pa chung ma dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:3a-36: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:3a-37: de yi lha mo go rims bzhin //
T02TD2510.2E:3a-38: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin du //
T02TD2510.2E:3b-0: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi go rims bzhin rdo rje gser la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis rim @3b pa bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:3b-1: ji lta bur gyur pa zhig bri bar bya zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:3b-2: rang gi phyag rgya phyag rgya 'dra //
T02TD2510.2E:3b-3: gar byed pa ni bri bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:3b-5: de la rdo rje gser dang /
T02TD2510.2E:3b-6: rdo rje gzhon nu ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:3b-7: rdo rje zhi ba mo dang /
T02TD2510.2E:3b-14: rdo rje zab mo rnams kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni de'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:3b-15: rdo rje chu srin ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:3b-16: rdo rje rul pa mo dang /
T02TD2510.2E:3b-22: rdo rje pho nya ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:3b-24: rdo rje sgo ba ma rnams kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni lan gyi phyag rgyar brjod do //
T02TD2510.2E:3b-26: lugs las ba zlog pa'i tshul gyis phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:3b-27: de la rdo rje gser gyi gar gyi mchod pa byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:3b-28: rdo rje chu srin gyi gar gyi mchod bas phyag rgya'i lan bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:3b-29: de bzhin du rdo rje za ba'i gar gyi mchod pa bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:3b-30: rdo rje sgo ba ma'i gar gyi mchod pas phyag rgya'i lan gyi bar du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:3b-31: de ltar rang gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.2E:3b-32: phyag rgya'i lan gyis gar byed ba'i tshus kyis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:3b-33: ci'i phyir de ltar bri bar bya zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:3b-34: sangs rgyas rdo rje can mchod phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:3b-37: rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis so //
T02TD2510.2E:3b-39: gar byed pa'i tshul du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:3b-40: de ltar rdo rje gar byed pa'i tshul gyis glog 'gyur ba lta bu mdun du bskor pa 'di ni rdo rje gar byed pa zhes grags so //
T02TD2510.2E:3b-41: grva dang sgo'i phyogs rnams su 'dug pa la sogs pa rim pa bzhin zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:3b-42: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi dang /
T02TD2510.2E:3b-43: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgor rdo rje glang sna ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:3b-45: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgor rdo rje dbang dang /
T02TD2510.2E:3b-46: rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje dag 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni rim pa bzhin zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:3b-52: dkar po'i kha dog gis thig skud so sor kha bsgyur la /
T02TD2510.2E:4a-0: @4a * // de nyid kyi rim pa bzhin bzhag la h'um tr'am hr'i: aa a'a zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa lnga'i sa bon gyi yi ge de rnams rang rang gi kha dog gi thig skud de rnams la rim pa bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bkod la bar snang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa rnams las rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer dang yang 'bar ba'i lta bas blta zhing bkug la lag na gnas pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i thig skud de rnams bkang la /
T02TD2510.2E:4a-1: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarbba dharmm'a sphar sphar aa nu pra bishta sarbba dharmm'a aa tya na ha aa nu pra bishta sarbba dharm'a /
T02TD2510.2E:4a-2: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um gri hna gri hna h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:4a-3: gri hn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:4a-5: bha ga w'an badzra h'um phat /
T02TD2510.2E:4a-6: ces bya bas bsgril bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:4a-8: gser la sogs pa'i snod du thig skud de bzhag la /
T02TD2510.2E:4a-10: bdug pa phul la rdo rje bsdams pas bzung la ;
T02TD2510.2E:4a-11: aom badzra s'u tra a'a karsha ya sarbba mandala h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:4a-12: zhes bya ba des sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:4a-13: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:4a-15: chos dang las kyi h'um mdzad kyang bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:4a-16: de nas rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis thig skud de blangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:4a-17: aom badzra s'u tra aa karsha ya sarbba mandala h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:4a-18: dang por re zhig tshangs pa'i thig gnyis gdab ste //
T02TD2510.2E:4a-19: de nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa /
T02TD2510.2E:4a-20: byang phyogs su sgo btod pa thig btab la de'i nang du cha drug tu phye ba las dkyil 'khor gnyis pa cha bzhi pa sgo shar du btod ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:4a-21: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de'i dbus su de'i phyed kyi tshad rdo rje rig pa dam ba'i gnas thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:4a-22: de nas srad bu bres pa der dag pa'i tshon gyis dgang bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:4a-23: tshon rtsi 'dri ba'i snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:4a-24: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur ches //
T02TD2510.2E:4a-25: cho ga bzhin du gzung bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:4a-26: dang po bris nas phyis ci bder //
T02TD2510.2E:4a-27: de la 'di ni tshon gyi snying po yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:4a-28: aom badzra r'a ka sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:4a-29: tshon rtsi 'dri ba ni tshon rtsi dkar po la yi ge aa las /
T02TD2510.2E:4a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs brnyan dkar po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-0: sdon po la yi ge h'um las de bzhin @4b gshegs pa mi bskyod pa'i gzugs brnyan sngon po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-1: ser po la yi ge hr'am las de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gzugs brnyan ser po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-2: dmar po la yi ge hr'i: las de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi gzugs brnyan dmar bo /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-3: ljang gu la yi ge aa las /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa'i gzugs brnyan ljang gu bskyed la /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-5: sngar bshad ba'i tshon rtsi byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-6: aom badzra r'a ka sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-7: zhes bya pa 'di re re zhing lan bdun bdun bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:4b-8: de la dang por sngon po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-12: de nas thams cad kyi nang du dkar pos dkyil 'khor gnyis tshon sna ldas bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:4b-13: de ltar 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-14: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la yang shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:4b-17: rdo rje rig pa dam pa rang gi chung ma dang bcas pa gar byed pa'i sbyor bas gnas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:4b-18: dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi shar lho'i mtshams kyi cha la sgeg mo /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-19: lho nub kyi mtshams su phreng ba ma /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-20: nub byang gi mtshams su glu ma /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-21: byang shar gyi mtshams su gar ma bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:4b-22: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i shar phyogs kyi lha'i snam bu'i dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba bri ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-23: de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-25: byang gi phyogs su yang bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:4b-26: de nas shar phyogs kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i byang gi cha la rdo rje gser dang /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-27: rdo rje gzhon nu ma gnyis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:4b-28: rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi lho phyogs kyi cha la rdo rje zhi ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-30: lho phyogs kyi rdo rje phyag rgya'i shar phyogs kyi cha la rdo rje bdud rtsi dang /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-32: rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi nub phyogs kyi cha la /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-35: / nub phyogs kyi rdo rje phyag rgya'i lho phyogs kyi cha la /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-36: rdo rje pho nya ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-38: rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi byang phyogs kyi cha la /
T02TD2510.2E:4b-41: byang phyogs kyi rdo rje nub phyogs kyi cha la /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-0: rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi shar @5a * //
T02TD2510.2E:5a-1: phyogs kyi cha la rdo rje rul pa mo dang /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-2: rdo rje chu srin mo bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5a-3: de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa me'i mtshams kyi cha la 'jigs ma /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-6: dbang ldan du dka' bzlog ma bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5a-7: dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje 'ju ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-9: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu'i shar phyogs kyi dbus kyi cha la rdo rje h'um mdzad /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-10: de'i byang phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-11: khro bo rdo rje rgyal po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5a-12: rdo rje h'um mdzad de nyid kyi lho phyogs kyi cha la khro bo rdo rje chags pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-13: khro bo rdo rje legs pa bri'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5a-14: dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi lho phyogs kyi cha la rin chen h'um mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-15: de'i shar phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje rin chen dang /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-16: khro bo rdo rje nyi ma'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5a-17: de nyid kyi nub phyogs kyi cha la khro bo rdo rje dpal dang /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-18: khro bo rdo rje bzhad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5a-19: nub phyogs kyi lha'i snam bu'i dbus kyi cha la chos kyi h'um mdzad /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-20: de'i g-yas phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje chos dang /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-21: khro bo rdo rje rnon po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5a-22: de nyid g-yon phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje rgyu dang /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-23: khro bo rdo rje srung ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5a-24: de'i byang phyogs kyi lha'i snam bu'i dbus kyi cha la las kyi h'um mdzad /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-25: de'i g-yas phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje las dang /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-26: khro bo rdo rje srung ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5a-27: de'i g-yon phyogs kyi cha la khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-28: khro bo rdo rje khu tshur bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5a-29: phyi'i dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi me'i mtshams kyi cha la /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-30: rdo rje bdug pa ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-31: 'jigs ma'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5a-32: bden bral du rdo rje me tog ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-33: lha mo dpal mo'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5a-34: rlung du rdo rje mar me dang /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-35: dbyangs can ma'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5a-36: dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi cha la rdo rje dri ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-37: dka' bzlog ma'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5a-38: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje sgo ba ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-39: rdo rje dbang mo dag bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5a-40: de la rdo rje h'um mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:5a-43: las kyi h'um mdzad ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po /
T02TD2510.2E:5b-0: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor las @5b bshad pa'i rig pa rnams kyis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5b-1: khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:5b-2: rdo rje dril bu'i mthar thug pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5b-3: sgeg mo la sogs pa ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam pa rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i sngags kyis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5b-4: rdo rje rig pa mchog la sogs pa nas rdo rje chu srin gyi mthar thug pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:5b-5: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i rig pa rnams kyis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5b-7: aom sarbba badzra ga mi ni sarbba ba kshe s'a dha ya gu hya badzri ni h'um zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:5b-8: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i ma mo thams cad kyi spyi'i rig pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:5b-10: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2510.2E:5b-11: khro bo ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2510.2E:5b-12: des me tog gi phreng ba blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:5b-13: rdo rje shugs kyis zhugs la /
T02TD2510.2E:5b-14: h'um bzhi brjod cing dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas lan bdun bskor ba byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:5b-15: lhag pa dang ma tshang ba'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:5b-16: rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad la me tog gi phreng ba phul nas gar byas te blangs la rang gi spyi bor bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5b-18: de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo gnyis ka dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5b-20: aom badzra autgha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha sh'i ghram sma ra badzra sa ma ya h'um phat /
T02TD2510.2E:5b-21: de nas bum pa gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:5b-22: slob dpon gyis dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug pa'i rang nyid 'jug pa'i cho ga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:5b-23: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'i tshul du rjes su spyad pas de nas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te ;
T02TD2510.2E:5b-24: dkyil 'khor rdo rjes bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5b-25: de nas bsdu ba byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:5b-26: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad la bstod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:5b-27: de nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:6a-0: @6a * // mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:6a-1: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i las byas nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:6a-2: de la 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas dgug pa'i las ni //
T02TD2510.2E:6a-3: de nyid dang por byas pa'i dgug pa la sogs pa las gang yin pa de byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:6a-5: ji skad bshad pa'i khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:6a-6: de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa'i 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:6a-7: lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas bcing ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:6a-8: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i khro po rdo rje 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas dbang du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:6a-9: de nas khro bo rdo rje gnod spyin gyis bgegs bskrad la /
T02TD2510.2E:6a-10: khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:6a-11: khro bo rdo rje go chas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:6a-12: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2510.2E:6a-13: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa thams cad snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs la /
T02TD2510.2E:6a-14: de nas chos dad las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgya btab ste /
T02TD2510.2E:6a-15: dbang bskur nas phyi rol gyi mchod pa dang rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:6a-16: rdo rje gser la sogs pa las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis las kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:6a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:6a-18: slob ma gzhug pa'i gnang ba nod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:6a-19: de nas snga ma bzhin du slob ma la phyag bzhi byed du bcug la /
T02TD2510.2E:6a-20: rdo rje h'um mdzad du byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2510.2E:6a-21: rdo rje h'um mdzad yongs su bzlas pa'i phyi rol na gnas pa'i chus dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:6a-22: rdo rje 'chang pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bcings te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:6a-23: de ltar dbang bskur nas slob dpon rang nyid rdo rje 'chad pa'i sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:6b-0: slob ma yang 'ching @6b du gzhug go //
T02TD2510.2E:6b-2: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra dh'a ra gri hna sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:6b-3: 'di skad du smros shig / khyod kyis lha'i rigs ma mthong ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:6b-4: las mi shes pa su la yang gsang pa'i las 'di ma smra shig ces bya ba las mi shes pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pas /
T02TD2510.2E:6b-5: las kyi dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba las mi shes pa zhes brjod do //
T02TD2510.2E:6b-6: 'dir 'chad par 'gyur pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i gsang ba de thams cad brjod par mi bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:6b-7: khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes bya ba ni gzir par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:6b-8: de nas yon gyi mchog blangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:6b-9: rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug ste /
T02TD2510.2E:6b-10: rdo rje slob dpon rang gi las kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:6b-11: slob dpon rang nyid kyis las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje 'dzin ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:6b-12: khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing slob ma la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:6b-13: slob ma 'di skad brjod du gzhug go //
T02TD2510.2E:6b-14: aom badzra dzirya zhes bya ba la sogs pa des 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:6b-16: bdag nyid kyis 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:6b-17: rdo rje shugs kyi snying po 'dis 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:6b-18: aom pra be sha badzra pra be sha badzra a'a be sha badzra aa dhi tishtha badzra h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:6b-19: gal te snga ma'i 'jug pas bya'o zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:6b-20: ma yin te dbab pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:6b-21: 'di nyid kyis babs nas 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:6b-22: de nas snga ma bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa rnams kyis dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:6b-26: phyag rgya dang ldan gyi phyag rgya rnams kyi gar gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni babs pa'i mthus ma brlabs pa'i slob ma rnams kyang rdo rje gser gyi phyag rgya 'ching ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:6b-27: de nas de bkrol na rdo rje chu srin gyi phyag rgya 'ching ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:6b-28: de bzhin du rdo rje bza' ba ma'i bar gyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:6b-29: de nas de bkrol la rdo rje sgo ba ma'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:6b-30: de ltar na de ni phyag rgya dang lan gyi phyag rgya rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:6b-31: de ltar byas par gyur na des ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na deng phyin chad ces bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:7a-1: las thams cad kyi rdo rje gser la sogs pa'i las byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:7a-2: gang rnams kyis byed par 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:7a-3: lus dang ngag dang lta ba dang yid dang /
T02TD2510.2E:7a-4: rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyis zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:7a-5: de la lus kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:7a-6: rdo rje rig pa dam pa la sogs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:7a-7: ngag gi phyag rgya ni de dag gi rig pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:7a-8: lta pa'i phyag rgya ni khro bo'i lta ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:7a-9: yid kyi phyag rgya ni sgom pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:7a-10: rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje 'bar ba la sogs pa nas //
T02TD2510.2E:7a-11: klu'i rdo rje klu'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:7a-12: der 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:7a-13: bsam pa nyid kyis byed pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:7a-14: 'di ni phan yon bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:7a-15: de nas yang gdod g-yogs pa bkrol te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:7a-16: de nas dus phyis gdong g-yogs bkrol par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:7a-17: bkrol nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi bar gyi dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:7a-18: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin to //
T02TD2510.2E:7a-19: de ltar gar bya zhing mchod pa byas na yang /
T02TD2510.2E:7a-20: de nas slob ma de la slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02TD2510.2E:7a-21: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs su zhugs kyis /
T02TD2510.2E:7a-22: ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi grub pa yang thob na /
T02TD2510.2E:7a-23: dngos grub gzhan lha smos kyang ci dgos te /
T02TD2510.2E:7a-24: khyod kyis las kyi dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra shig //
T02TD2510.2E:7a-25: dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
T02TD2510.2E:7a-26: de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02TD2510.2E:7a-27: khyod kyis lha'i rigs ma mthong ba dang las mi shes pa su la yang gsang pa'i las 'di ma smra shig khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:7a-28: de nas rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya kha thur dang /
T02TD2510.2E:7a-29: gyen du bstan pa bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:7a-30: slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02TD2510.2E:7a-31: 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig rdo rje yin gyis /
T02TD2510.2E:7a-32: gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:7a-33: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
T02TD2510.2E:7a-34: mna'i chu snying pos sngags la /
T02TD2510.2E:7a-35: slob ma de 'thung du gzhug go //
T02TD2510.2E:7a-36: de la mna'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:7b-0: rdo rje @7b sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-1: snying la yang dag zhugs par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-2: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-3: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-4: aom badzra au ta ka tha zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-5: de nas slob ma la 'di skad bsgo shig / deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje da yin gyis ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-6: khyod kyis da la brnyas pa ma byed cig / mi bde pa ma spangs pas dus byas nas dmyal par ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la /
T02TD2510.2E:7b-7: 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob la /
T02TD2510.2E:7b-8: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig ces smros shig ces bsgo'o //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-9: de nas de rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.2E:7b-10: badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis dbab pa bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-11: de nas me tog dor ro //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-13: aom pra t'i tstsha aa dhi tishtha badzra ho //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-14: de nas me tog gi phreng ba blangs la spyi bor bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-16: aom pra ti grihna satvam mi mam sa tva ma h'a ba la /
T02TD2510.2E:7b-17: de nas de bzhin du gdong g-yogs dgrol lo //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-19: aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyis //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-20: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-21: rdo rje'i mig ni bla med pa //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-22: thams cad mig ni deng 'byed shog / he badzra p'a shya //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-23: de nas sgo srung nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:7b-24: rig pa dam pa'i bar du dkyil 'khor bstan to //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-25: de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:7b-26: de snying gar bkrol du gzhug go //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-27: tishtha badzra dri dho me bh'a ba sh'a shva to me bha ba /
T02TD2510.2E:7b-28: hri da ya me aa dhi ti shtha sarbba si me pra ya tstsha h'um ha ha ha ha ho //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-29: de nas chu'i dbang bskur bar bya'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:7b-31: aom badzra aa bhi she ka aa bhi shinytsa badzra dha ra tri sa ma ya gra gra //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-32: de nas rdo rje dbyings su bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur la sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa la sogs pa'i snying pos rdo rje rig pa dam pa la sogs pa la byin la /
T02TD2510.2E:7b-33: ming gis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-34: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pas dbang bskur pa ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i las kyi cho ga bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:7b-35: de ltar slob dpon gyis las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:7b-36: slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:8a-1: 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams 'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor dang phyi'i rdo rje rigs kyi bzlas pa byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:8a-2: phyis las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bcing pa'am rdo rje chen po'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD2510.2E:8a-3: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor byas la bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes slobs shig ces gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:8a-4: gar gyi mchod pa ni gar gyi mchod pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:8a-5: 'dir phyag rgya bcings pa'i ye shes te slobs shig par bstan pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:8a-6: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyi //
T02TD2510.2E:8a-7: dam tshig phyag rgya gnyis byas te //
T02TD2510.2E:8a-9: de la sangs rgyas ni rdo rje h'um mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:8a-13: / rdo rje 'dzin ni khro bo rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:8a-15: rdo rje rgyal po nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:8a-16: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du 'dir gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:8a-17: sangs rgya do rje 'dzin pa rnams ni sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:8a-18: de dang por byas pa ma yin pa de ni sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:8a-19: de dag sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyis zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2510.2E:8a-20: dam tshig mchog ni gnyis su bya //
T02TD2510.2E:8a-21: zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i phyag rgyar gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:8a-22: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nas rdo rje dri'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i mthar thug pa'i dam tshig mchog ces brjod do //
T02TD2510.2E:8a-23: sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa gnyis su byas pas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di ru de dag gi mchod pa'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:8a-25: las kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:8a-27: rdo rje l'a sya la sogs mchod //
T02TD2510.2E:8a-28: rdo rje rig pa dam pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:8a-30: rdo rje'i sgra ni nges par gzung pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:8a-31: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs ni //
T02TD2510.2E:8a-32: gsang pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:8a-33: rdo rje rig pa dam pa ste //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-1: phyag rgya lhag ma rnams so //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-2: lha thams cad mchod pa byed pa yin no zhes bstan to //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-3: rig pa 'di rnams thams cad kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-4: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gser nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:8b-5: rdo rje chu srin gyi bar du gar gyis mchod par byed pa'i rig pa rnams yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-6: las kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-7: ji ltar mchod par bya zhe na //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-8: ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-10: slob ma'am gzhan yang rung ba rdo rje gser la sogs pa byed pa na /
T02TD2510.2E:8b-11: slob dpon gyis rdo rje chu srin bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-12: de bzhin du rdo rje za ba 'ching bar byed pa na slob dpon gyis rdo rje sgo ba mo bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:8b-13: ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-14: zhes bya ba ni sgra'i don yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-15: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyi //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-16: dam tshig mchog ni gnyis su bya //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-18: zhes bshad pa de ni mi shes te /
T02TD2510.2E:8b-19: ji ltar gnyis su byas nas mchod pa'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:8b-21: rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-22: phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus so //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-24: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i sngags brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:8b-25: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i gang bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-26: dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:8b-28: phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus pa de dag go //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-32: las kyi h'um mdzad rnams kyis 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi rig pa brjod cing dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-33: lan gyi phyag rgya dgrol par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-35: khro bo rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas na gang gi tshe slob ma'am //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-36: gzhan yang rung ba mchod pa byed par 'gyur pa de'i tshe slob dpon gyis khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:8b-37: las kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:8b-38: de ltar khro bo rdo rje bzhad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:8b-39: gang gi tshe 'ga' zhig gi las kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byed pa de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:9a-0: slob dpon gyis khro bo rdo rje chos kyi @9a * //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-1: dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:9a-2: las kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-3: gang gi tshe 'ga' zhig gis rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya gnyis su byas nas mchod pa byed pa de'i tshe slob dpon gyis las kyi h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-4: gang gi tshe rin chen h'um mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya byed pa de'i tshe slob dpon gyis chos kyi h'um mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:9a-5: las kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-6: gang gi tshe rdo rje gser gyi phyag rgya byed pa de'i tshe //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-7: rdo rje chu srin gyi phyag rgya bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-8: de bzhin du gang gi tshe 'ga' zhig rdo rje zab mo 'ching ba de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:9a-9: slob dpon gyis rdo rje sgo ba ma'i bar du phyag rgya bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-10: de ltar na lan gyi phyag rgya dgrol par bya ba yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-11: gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya 'di yis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-12: mchod pa'i rgyur gyur pas so //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-13: gtso bo thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-14: rdo rje 'dzin pa che sogs ni khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-15: rdo rje h'um mdzad nas khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi mchod pa byas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-16: de ltar gyur pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:9a-17: las grub par yang nges par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:9a-18: rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs ba'i las kyi dngos grub rnams nges par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-20: gang gi tshe 'ga' zhig rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:9a-21: gar byed par ston pa de'i tshe slob dpon gyis las kyi h'um mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:9a-22: de bzhin du gnyis su byas pa bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-23: de bzhin du gang gi tshe rin chen h'um mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas nas de bzhin du ston pa de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:9a-24: slob dpon gyis chos kyi h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya de bzhin du gnyis su byas la bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-25: de bzhin du gang gi tshe khro bo rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya gnyis su byas pa de'i tshe khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-26: khro bo rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya byed pa na khro bo rdo rje gnod spyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-27: khro bo rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya byed pa na khro bo rdo rje srung pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-28: rdo rje legs pa'i phyag rgya byed pa na rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9a-29: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya byed pa na /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-0: rdo rje @9b srung pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-1: rdo rje gzi brjid kyi phyag rgya byed pa na //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-2: rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-3: rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya byed pa na /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-4: rdo rje rnon po'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-5: rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya byed pa na //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-6: rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-7: rdo rje sgeg mo byed pa na /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-9: rdo rje phreng ba ma byed pa na /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-11: rdo rje bdug pa ma byed pa na /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-13: rdo rje me tog ma byed pa na //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-14: rdo rje mar me ma byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-15: de bzhin du gnyis su byas la bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-16: de ltar 'jig rten pa'i dam tshig gi khu tshur gar byas pa las byung bas /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-17: rdo rje gser gyi phyag rgya byed pa na /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-18: de nas rdo rje chu srin gyi phyag rgya bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-19: rdo rje gzhon nu ma'i phyag rgya byed pa na /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-20: de nas rdo rje rul pa ma'i phyag rgya bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-21: rdo rje zhi ba ma'i phyag rgya byed pa na /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-22: de nas rdo rje dus kyi phyag rgya bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-23: rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya byed pa na /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-24: de nas rdo rje kha'i phyag rgya bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-25: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya byed pa na /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-26: de nas 'khyor ma'i phyag rgya bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-27: rdo rje mdangs kyi phyag rgya byed pa na /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-28: rdo rje 'bar ma'i phyag rgya bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-29: rdo rje dbyig mchog ma'i phyag rgya byed pa na /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-30: mgyogs ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-31: rdo rje rked bcings ma'i phyag rgya byed pa na /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-32: rdo rje pho nya ma'i phyag rgya bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-33: rdo rje 'ju ma'i phyag rgya byed pa na ;
T02TD2510.2E:9b-34: rdo rje dbang mo'i phyag rgya bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-35: rdo rje za ba mo'i phyag rgya byed pa na /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-36: rdo rje sgo ba ma'i phyag rgya bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-37: 'jig rten pa'i dam tshig gi khu tshur gnyis su byas na /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-38: gar byas pa las byung pa'i phyag rgya bcings par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-39: khro bo rdo rje rig pa dam pa'i phyag rgya byed pa na /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-40: rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya gnyis kyis gar byed pa ni mchod pa'i phyag rgya yin gyi lan gyi phyag rgya ni med do //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-41: 'di dag ni gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-42: de la rdo rje h'um mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-46: rdo rje rigs pa mchog la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-47: rdo rje chu srin gyi mthar thug pa ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:9b-48: khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:9b-49: khro bo rdo rje dril bu ma'i mthar thug pa rnams ni /
T02TD2510.2E:10a-0: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por @10a * //
T02TD2510.2E:10a-1: bshad pa'i yi ge h'um ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:10a-2: yi ge tr'am ni rin chen h'um mdzad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:10a-3: yi ge hr'i: ni chos kyi h'um mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:10a-4: yi ge aa ni las kyi h'um mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:10a-5: h'um he tram tam hi hri /
T02TD2510.2E:10a-7: h'um gram ke bam tre a'a /
T02TD2510.2E:10a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi bar gyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:10a-13: pra hl'a da ni pha la ga mi h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:10a-16: zhes bya ba sgeg mo la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:10a-17: khro bo rdo rje dri chab ma'i bar gyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:10a-18: phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyi ni rang rig pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:10a-19: sngar bshad pa'i gar byed pa'i phyag rgya ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha thams cad kyi las kyi phyag rgya yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:10a-20: rdo rje mdzad la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:10a-21: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:10a-22: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams dang /
T02TD2510.2E:10a-23: rdo rje rig pa dam pa la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:10a-24: rdo rje chu srin la mthar thug gi bar du ma bha ma dang bcas pas gar byed pa /
T02TD2510.2E:10a-25: sbyor ba can ni 'dir phyag rgya chen po yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:10a-26: 'di'i mdog dang phyag rgya dang mtshan ma rnams kyi nges pa ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bstan zin pas de nyid du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:10a-27: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i cho ga lhag ma rnams kyang gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:10a-28: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2510.2E:10a-30: // / de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:10a-31: phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i ris thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu gzhag pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:10a-32: phyag na rdo rje ni rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
T02TD2510.2E:10a-33: rdo rje'i rigs de dag thams cad ni phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi don la yang dag par sbyor pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:10a-34: sems can kyang yin la de thams cad kyang yin pas na sems can de dag thams cad kyi don to //
T02TD2510.2E:10b-0: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyis @10b ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub de bsgom pa ni sems can gyi don to //
T02TD2510.2E:10b-1: khyod kyis de ltar yang dag par nges par sbyor zhing yongs su mi gtong pas /
T02TD2510.2E:10b-2: dus 'di nas nye par bzung ste snying po byang chub la mthar thug gi bar du sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:10b-3: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu gzhag ste zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:10b-4: phyir mi ldog pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa'i lam la gnas pa yin pa de'i phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:10b-5: 'khor ba'i lam la mi 'jug cing mi ldog pa des ni phyir mi ldog pa'i tha snyad du byed de phyir mi ldog par med cing mi ldog pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:10b-6: sa de la mngon par 'dus byas pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:10b-7: des na phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu gzhag pa /
T02TD2510.2E:10b-8: sems can lhag ma rnams kyi don bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba la /
T02TD2510.2E:10b-9: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhugs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:10b-10: mkhyen bzhin du zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:10b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba ma mkhyen du zin kyang sgyu ma rdo rje la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis lung bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba nyon cig ces bya ba de gang lags /
T02TD2510.2E:10b-12: nyan pa ni rang nyid nyams su len pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:10b-13: gzhan la gdams ngag ston pas na /
T02TD2510.2E:10b-14: bdag gsang ba thams cad 'dzin par dbang bskur na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis dbang bskur pa yin pas rgyu de'i phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:10b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba de gang lags //
T02TD2510.2E:10b-16: bka' stsol cig ces pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:10b-17: kun nas bdag gis rtogs par byed pas na dka'o //
T02TD2510.2E:10b-18: de nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:10b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba de'i rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang pa'i rdo rje ste /
T02TD2510.2E:10b-21: ma chags pa dang ma sdang pa dang ma rmongs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:10b-22: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i spyod pa bstan nas //
T02TD2510.2E:10b-23: sems can gyi don mdzad pas na gsang ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:11a-0: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad @11a * //
T02TD2510.2E:11a-2: /'di zhes bya ba ni blo la gnas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:11a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'di gsungs pa ni bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:11a-5: zhes bya ba ni gang dang gang gi gzugs kyis 'dul zhing lung dang rtogs pa la rab tu bzhag pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:11a-6: sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin ni //
T02TD2510.2E:11a-8: rang gi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i ngo bo ni rang bzhin te /
T02TD2510.2E:11a-9: de la rang gi bdag nyid ni rang bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:11a-11: 'dod chags spyod pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag gi 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags spang ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:11a-12: zhe sdang spyod pa gang yin pa de dag la khro bas khro ba spang ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:11a-13: gti mug la spyod pa gang yin pa de dag la khyab 'jug sgyu ma'i gzugs bstan pa la sogs pas 'dul bar byed pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:11a-15: de lta de ltar sems can don //
T02TD2510.2E:11a-16: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:11a-17: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i spyod pa bstan pa de dang des /
T02TD2510.2E:11a-18: de lta de ltar sems can gyi don byas pas /
T02TD2510.2E:11a-19: sems can mngon par 'dod pa'i don yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:11a-21: 'dod chags la sogs gtsang bas bya //
T02TD2510.2E:11a-23: thugs rje chen po gzhan gyi dbang gis ma chags pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:11a-24: ma sdang ba dang ma rmongs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:11a-25: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir ni /
T02TD2510.2E:11a-26: bde ba'i rnam par smin pa'i las de'i phyir dang /
T02TD2510.2E:11a-27: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'i phyir 'di ltar sems can yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir khyed kyis gsad par bya'o zhes gnang ba mdzad pa'i rgyu mtshan 'dis bsad pa ni brgyal bar byed pa nyid yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:11a-30: srog gcong ba'i kun nas slong ba'i sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:11a-31: thugs rje gzhan gyi dbang gis phan pa dang bde ba la nges par sbyor ba'i gsod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:11a-32: sems can thams cad phan phyir dang //
T02TD2510.2E:11a-33: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:11a-34: sangs rgyas rnams kyi don ni sangs rgyas don te /
T02TD2510.2E:11a-35: pha rol po longs spyod dang rgyags pas dregs pa'i phyug pa de las nyams par byas nas bstan pa la gnas par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-0: de'i don @11b la sbyor bas sangs rgyas kyi don du rab tu sbyor ba de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu la rab tu sbyor ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:11b-1: sangs rgyas kyi don du sbyor ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-2: pha rol nor rnams phrogs pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-4: ma byin par len pas kun nas bslang ba'i sdig pas rnal 'byor ba de la gos par mi 'gyur ro ;
T02TD2510.2E:11b-7: de la 'dod chags ni chos bdag med pa'i chags pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:11b-8: mi dmigs pa'i thugs rje chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-10: chos bdag med pa'i chags pa yis //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-11: mkhas pa rnams ni dga' bar byed //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-13: 'dra ba ni mtshungs pa ste bde ba gzhan na med pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-14: de lta bur gyur pa'i bde ba de rgyal ba rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la de phul bar bsgom pa'i stobs kyis mngon sum du byas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-15: sems can gyi phyir sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang dngos grub dam pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-16: gzhan gyi chung ma ni gzhan gyi bud med do //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-17: gzhan gyi bud med mchog tu gyur pa ni phyag rgya chen po dang dam tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya'i gzugs so //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-19: bsod nams thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rnyed par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-20: de la bsod nams zhes bya ba ni dag byed kyi bsod nams te gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dri ma 'khrud par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-21: de yang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-22: sems can kun la phan phyir dang //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-23: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-24: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-25: las rnams thams cad byas pa yis //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-29: sor rtog pa dang nan tan du byed pa'i brtson 'grus kyi rang bzhin rnam pa bzhi'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i las thams cad ni las thams cad do //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-30: thams cad kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang yid bde ba'i dngos grub byed pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:11b-31: byams pa'i zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-0: shin tu phul du byung bar 'gyur ba nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab pa'i bsod @12a * //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-1: nams bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid thob cing rnyed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-2: yang na srog bcad pa dang ma byin par len pa rnams ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs gzhan du gsungs pa ltar bshad par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-3: de la byang chub kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pas sems can du 'dzin pa bsad pa na sems can thams cad bsad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-4: 'dis bsad pa'i sems can rnams mi bskyod rdo rje'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams su rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-5: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sems can thams cad kyi rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags phrogs pas na /
T02TD2510.2E:12a-6: pha rol nor rnams phrogs pa ste //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-7: nyon mongs sems can nor zhes bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-9: nyon mongs 'jig rten khams rnams kyi //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-10: dbang byas khro bo cher sprul nas //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-11: blo ldan rdo rje mgon po yis //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-12: rtogs pa'i rgyal po 'di gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-13: sems can khro ba rab grub phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-14: dri ma med pa'i de nyid ni //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-15: snang byed dge ba 'di bshad las //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-16: bdag gis bsod nams gang bsags pa //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-17: de yis 'jig rten ma lus pa //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-18: rdo rje khro chen kun dga' che //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-19: snying po bsam mi khyab chen gtso //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-20: rdo rje h'um mdzad gtso gyur cig / de kho na nyid snang ba zhes bya ba las phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2510.2E:12a-22: // / de ltar khro bas khro ba spang ba'i phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-23: gnang ba nod pas de'i rjes su 'jug pa'i rdo rje'i rigs chen po dang phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs des 'dul ba'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:12a-24: dam tshig gi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:12a-25: da ni gti mug gi gnyen por gyur pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa'i padma'i rigs des 'dul ba'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:12a-26: de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
T02TD2510.2E:12a-27: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni /
T02TD2510.2E:12a-28: de ma thag pa ste dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:12a-29: 'dir dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
T02TD2510.2E:12a-30: rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs su rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2510.2E:12b-0: padma'i rigs kyi @12b bdag po rdo rje spyan dang /
T02TD2510.2E:12b-1: rdo rje spyan gnyis pa rdo rje sna tshogs sprul pas bsnan pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:12b-2: de ltar yang ji ltar shes she na /
T02TD2510.2E:12b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas /
T02TD2510.2E:12b-5: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa gal ba der mngon du phyogs te 'dug nas /
T02TD2510.2E:12b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rjes thogs la phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02TD2510.2E:12b-9: rdo rje sna tshogs su byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2510.2E:12b-10: de nas des byin gyis brlabs pas de thams cad tha dad par gyur to //
T02TD2510.2E:12b-11: thams cad kyi gzugs ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD2510.2E:12b-12: padma'i rigs sprul par mdzad do zhes de ma thag tu 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:12b-13: thams cad kyang yin la de bzhin gshegs pa yang de yin pa sa na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
T02TD2510.2E:12b-14: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:12b-18: don yod grub pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yang gcig tu 'dus te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:12b-19: sngar rdo rje'i rigs kyis 'dul ba'i phyir 'du bar mdzad nas rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab pa yin la /
T02TD2510.2E:12b-20: da ni 'chad par 'gyur ba la ltos pas yang gi sgra smos so //
T02TD2510.2E:12b-21: 'du zhing chogs par mdzad pa de ni gcig tu 'dus pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:12b-22: bcom ldan 'das ni bdud bzhi las rgyal ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:12b-23: phyag na rdo rje de nyid ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:12b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs can rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:12b-25: chos thams cad kyi bdag po ni chos kyang yin la thams cad kyang de yin pas chos thams cad de padma'i rigs kyi gzugs can gyi sangs rgyas la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:12b-26: de'i bdag po ni mnga' bdag ste /
T02TD2510.2E:12b-27: thams cad byed pas na chos kyi dbang phyug go //
T02TD2510.2E:13a-0: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis @13a * //
T02TD2510.2E:13a-1: rnam par dag pa'o zhes so sor rtog pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:13a-2: sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa la gzigs pas na spyan ras gzigs so //
T02TD2510.2E:13a-3: de la dbang po ni spyan ras gzigs kyi mnga' bdag yin pas na spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug go //
T02TD2510.2E:13a-4: 'dis zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba de blo la gnas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:13a-5: de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa des gsol ba btab pa ni don du gnyer ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:13a-7: rdo rje 'chang chen po de nyid spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i gzugs 'dzin pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi padma'i rigs sprul pa'i phyir mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas gsol ba 'debs pa yin gyis la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:13a-8: padmo zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:13a-9: sems dpa' ni padma'i sems dpa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:13a-10: padma chen zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i gzugs des thams cad du song bas na padma chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:13a-11: 'jig rten dbang po zhes pa ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis bzhugs pa de'i 'jig rten dbang po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:13a-12: dbang phyug che zhes bya ba ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba rnams la don yod par zhags pa'i gzugs kyis bzhugs pas na dbang phyug chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:13a-13: spyan ras gzigs dbang po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:13a-14: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes gzigs pa dang sems can la gzigs pa 'di la mnga' bas na de ni 'dir spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:13a-15: brtan pa'i mchog ces bya ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:13a-16: brtan pa ni 'jigs pa med pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:13a-17: de dag gi mchog ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin gyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa skrag pa dang rtag tu bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:13a-18: rdo rje chos zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2510.2E:13a-19: de'i chos ni gzugs sna tshogs bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:13a-20: sems can gyi don mdzad pas na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ste /
T02TD2510.2E:13a-21: rdo rje chos ni rdo rje chos so //
T02TD2510.2E:13a-22: yang na rdo rje dang chos ni rdo rje chos te /
T02TD2510.2E:13a-23: stong pa nyid ni gzugs so //
T02TD2510.2E:13a-24: gzugs nyid ni stong pa'o zhes gsungs te bdun no //
T02TD2510.2E:13b-0: chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba @13b ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes ni chos so //
T02TD2510.2E:13b-1: des 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po'i gzugs kyis rgyal po ltar gsal bar byed pas na chos kyi rgyal po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:13b-2: dag pa chen po zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyis nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i le shes kyi gzugs kyis thams cad du song ba'i phyir dang bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:13b-3: dag pa yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na dag pa chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:13b-4: sems dpa'i rgyal po ni padma'i rigs thams cad kyi lha sems dpa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i rgyal po ni sems dpa'i rgyal po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:13b-5: de dag gi spyi bor 'od dpag tu med pa'i gzugs kyis bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:13b-6: blo gros che zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi blo gros chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:13b-7: padma'i bdag nyid ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis padma nyid dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:13b-8: padma'i bdag nyid ni de'i rang bzhin du gyur pas na padma'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD2510.2E:13b-9: padma che zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i gzugs de nyid kyis thams cad du song ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:13b-10: padma yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na padma chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:13b-11: padma'i mgon po zhes bya ba ni padma'i rigs kyi padma de'i mgon po ni padma'i mgon po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:13b-12: des padma'i rigs la sogs pa dbang du byed pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:13b-14: padma las byung zhes bya ba ni padma'i rgyu las byung bas na padma las byung ngo //
T02TD2510.2E:13b-15: padma'i rigs thams cad rdo rje padma'i gzugs las byung ba'i phyir ro ;
T02TD2510.2E:13b-16: / pad bzang 'od ces bya ba ni padma'i rnam pa can gyi 'od zer 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:13b-17: de skad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas padmo lta bu'i 'od zer kha dog dang /
T02TD2510.2E:13b-19: rtags dang spyod lam rnam pa du ma 'byung ste /
T02TD2510.2E:13b-20: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i thugs kar zhugs so zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:13b-21: padma dag pa zhes bya ba ni padma yis dag pas na padma dag pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:13b-22: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dri ma thams cad spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:13b-23: rab dag byed ces bya ba ni shin tu dag par byed pa'i phyir nar bdag go //
T02TD2510.2E:14a-1: ting nge 'dzin des rang dang gzhan gyi bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khrul par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:14a-2: rdo rje padmo zhes bya ba ni rdo rje padma'i gzugs kyis so //
T02TD2510.2E:14a-3: pad mchog sku zhes ya ba ni padma bzang po ni padma mchog ste /
T02TD2510.2E:14a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya'i gzugs so //
T02TD2510.2E:14a-5: de'i sku mdog dkar dmar gyi sku mnga' ba ni pad mchog sku'o //
T02TD2510.2E:14a-6: padmo padmo zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa padma'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs pa gang yin pa de la padmo'i padma zhes phyis 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:14a-8: bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid dang //
T02TD2510.2E:14a-9: rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gnas //
T02TD2510.2E:14a-11: zad mi shes pa'i go 'phang thob //
T02TD2510.2E:14a-12: ces 'chad par 'gyur bas te gzugs su bya ba yin te mtshan bdun no //
T02TD2510.2E:14a-13: sna tshogs chen po zhas bya ba ni sna tshogs kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na /
T02TD2510.2E:14a-14: sna tshogs chen po ste thams cad kyi gzugs 'dzin pas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:14a-15: snang ba che zhes bya ba ni snang ba yang yin la chen pa yang de yin pas na snang ba che ste /
T02TD2510.2E:14a-16: padma nyi ma'i 'od kyis nam mkha' thams cad 'gengs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:14a-17: dgos pa chen po zhes bya ba ni dgos pa chen po 'di la mnga' bas na dgos pa che ste /
T02TD2510.2E:14a-18: sems can gyi don du des thams cad pa'i gzugs bstan nas nam mkha' thams cad 'gengs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:14a-19: de dang mtshungs zhes bya ba ni chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:14a-20: 'di'i dpe de dang mtshungs pas na che dang mtshungs pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:14a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa dang mtshungs zhes bya ba'i don to ;
T02TD2510.2E:14a-22: / sku dang gsung dang thugs rje ltar gyur pa nam mkha'i khams thams cad du rtag tu bzhugs pa'i gzugs dang mtshungs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:14a-23: brtan pa chen po zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo de nam mkha'i khams thams cad du khyab cing skrag pa med pas na brtan pa chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:14a-24: dpa' bo che zhes bya ba ni rang nyid dri ma med pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba'i gzugs kyis dmigs pa thams cad la spyod pa'i sems can skrag cing 'jigs par byed pas na dpa' bo che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-0: dpa' chen zhes bya ba ni dpa' ba ni gzi brjid de gzi brjid can rnams kyi nang na gzi brjid @14b che bas na dpa'i chen no //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-1: rdo rje nyi ma 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i gzugs kyis rgyal srid thams cad 'phrog par byed pas na dpa' bo che ba ste mtshan bdun no //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-2: sems can bsam pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi 'dod pa gang yin pa la bsam pa zhes bshad do //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-3: theg ba che zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi sems de nyid goms pa'i stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rang bzhin 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur ba de'i phyir theg pa chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-4: rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya ba ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni rnal 'byor che'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:14b-6: phyag rgya chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-7: de nyid chen po rjod byed cing //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-8: thams cad re re'ang bdag yin par //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-9: sgom pa sems pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-11: tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 'dul bar byed pas na mes po che'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:14b-12: / bde za zhes bya ba ni sha ma ni bde ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-13: de la spyod pas na za ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-14: yang na lha chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:14b-15: de'i gzugs ston pas na bde za'o //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-16: bde byed ces bya ba ni bde bar byed pas na bde byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-17: dag pa'i don zhes bya ba ni dag pa chos kyi dbyings de nyid 'di la mnga' bas na dag pa'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-18: sangs rgyas padmo zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas su 'byung ba ste /
T02TD2510.2E:14b-19: sangs rgyas kyang yin la padma yang yin pas na sangs rgyas padma ste mtshan brgyad do //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-22: de rnams rkyang kho na nyid ni chos kyi de nyid ngo //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-23: mi mnyam med pas zur bzhi mnyam //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad zin pa de'i don ni 'dir chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi don to //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-25: dam pa'i chos dam pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos yin pas na dam pa'i chos te padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor re //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-26: dag pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:14b-27: dkyil 'khor de nyid kyis 'dod chags la sogs sbong ba de'i phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-28: dag pa yang yin la chos kyang de yin pas na dag pa'i chos so //
T02TD2510.2E:14b-29: chos rab byed ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:15a-0: padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor de nyid padma'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin des skyed par @15a * //
T02TD2510.2E:15a-2: bzang po'i chos byed pa'i phyir chos rab byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:15a-3: chos chen po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:15a-4: padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor de nyid rgyud phyi ma phyi ma las bshad pa'i tshul gyis thams cad du song bas na chos kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na chos chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:15a-5: chos bzang mchog ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:15a-6: chos dge ba'i chos ni chos bzang po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:15a-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos de'i mchog ni chos bzang mchog ste dkyil 'khor nyid do //
T02TD2510.2E:15a-8: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rang bzhin du 'gro ba yin pa de'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:15a-9: chos kyi 'khor lo mtshan bdun no //
T02TD2510.2E:15a-10: sangs rgyas sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:15a-11: sangs rgyas kyi sems dpa' ni sems can no //
T02TD2510.2E:15a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i spyi bo na bzhugs pa des nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:15a-13: sems bzang mchog ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:15a-14: dag pa'i sems ni sems bzang ste /
T02TD2510.2E:15a-15: sangs rgyas padma la sogs pa de dag gi mchog tu gyur pas na sems bzang mchog ste padma'i rigs kyi bdag po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:15a-16: chos kyi sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:15a-17: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag las byung ba'i chos kyi sems ni sems dpa'i chos so //
T02TD2510.2E:15a-18: sems mchog 'dzin zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:15a-19: dge ba'i sems ni sems kyi mchog ste //
T02TD2510.2E:15a-20: sems can kun gyi sems gang yin //
T02TD2510.2E:15a-21: brtan phyir sems dpa' zhes brjod do //
T02TD2510.2E:15a-22: zhes gang la 'chad par 'gyur ba ni 'dir sems dpa' mchog 'dzin pa des na sems mchog 'dzin zhes bya ba ;
T02TD2510.2E:15a-23: sems dpa'i dam pa zhes bya ba bshad ma thag pa'i rdo rje dang mtshungs pa'i sems de nyid rdo rje'i gzugs can yin pas na sems dpa' dam pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:15a-24: sems mchog ces bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i sems dpa' dam pa de nyid legs par shes pas na sems mchog ces so //
T02TD2510.2E:15a-25: sems can sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:15a-26: rdo rje'i bdag nyid du bsgoms pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sems dpa'i rdo rjer gyur pa de nyid sems dpar gyis brlabs pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje sems dpar gyur pa'i sems ni sems can sems can sems dpa' zhes bya ste mtshan bdun no //
T02TD2510.2E:15b-0: spyan ras gzigs dbang @15b zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:15b-1: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i so sor rtog par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i phyir spyan ras gzigs so //
T02TD2510.2E:15b-2: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dzin pas na spyan ras gzigs dbang ngo //
T02TD2510.2E:15b-3: mgon po mchog ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:15b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi skyabs dang mgon byed pa de dag gi nang na mchog yin pas na mgon po mchog go //
T02TD2510.2E:15b-5: mgon po chen po zhes bya ba ni mgon po yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na mgon po chen po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:15b-6: thams cad kyi gzugs su bstan nas sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i phyir dang ;
T02TD2510.2E:15b-7: thams cad du 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:15b-8: rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba ni byed brag tu gzigs pa ni rnam par gzigs so //
T02TD2510.2E:15b-9: gang la yongs su bskyab pa'i don yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:15b-10: snang ba zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:15b-11: ye shes kyi snang bas so //
T02TD2510.2E:15b-12: sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten gyi gzugs kyis sems can gyi don byed pas ni snang ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:15b-13: 'jig rten don zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pas don du gnyer ba ni 'jig rten don to //
T02TD2510.2E:15b-14: 'jig rten mgon khyod ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:15b-15: ming gi sgo nas 'di skad btags pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:15b-17: 'jig rten yi ge zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:15b-18: 'jig rten pa'i yi ge ni 'jig rten yi ge ste ;
T02TD2510.2E:15b-19: mi zad pa'i phyir na yi ge zhes bya ba'i tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:15b-20: yi ge che zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:15b-21: mi zad pa'i phyir yi ge che ste /
T02TD2510.2E:15b-22: yi ge chen po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis thams cad du song ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:15b-23: yi ge mchog ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:15b-24: 'jig rten pa 'ga' zhig yi ge 'ga' zhig 'dod ba de dag gi nang na mchog yin pas na mdzes pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:15b-25: yi ge 'dra zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:15b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gzugs dang 'dra ba'i yi ge de la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02TD2510.2E:15b-27: yi ge'i yi ge zhes pa na /
T02TD2510.2E:15b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku ni yi ge'o //
T02TD2510.2E:15b-29: yi ge de dag gi yi ge ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus rtag tu gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:15b-30: thams cad spyan zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:15b-31: thams cad kyi spyan ni spyan lnga ste thams cad spyan zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:15b-32: 'khor lo yi ge zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:15b-33: gdul bya'i skye bo'i rgyud la rim gyis 'pho bas na 'khor lo ste /
T02TD2510.2E:15b-34: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:16a-1: bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo de nyid mi zad pas na yi ge ste /
T02TD2510.2E:16a-2: de'i rang bzhin nyid yi ge 'khor lo'i mtshan bdun no //
T02TD2510.2E:16a-3: phyag na padmo zhes bya ba ni phyag na padmo mnga' ba ni phyag na padma'o //
T02TD2510.2E:16a-4: phyag chen po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:16a-5: phyag chen po mnga' bas na phyag chen po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:16a-6: nam mkha'i khams kyang phyag gis khyab pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:16a-7: dbugs 'byin pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:16a-8: ngan song du song ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:16a-10: shi pa la sogs pa'i 'jigs pas skrag pa'i sems can rnams bsrung ba'i phyir na dbugs 'byin pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:16a-11: sbyin pa po zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:16a-12: sangs rgyas chos zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:16a-13: theg pa gsum ston pa'i chos kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos ni sangs rgyas chos so //
T02TD2510.2E:16a-14: sangs rgyas che zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:16a-15: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i gzugs kyis thams cad du song bas na /
T02TD2510.2E:16a-16: sangs rgyas kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na sangs rgyas chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:16a-17: sangs rgyas bdag nyid ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:16a-18: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rdul phra rab las bsgrub pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bdag nyid do //
T02TD2510.2E:16a-20: sangs rgyas gzugs zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:16a-21: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas su padma sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis bzhugs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas gzugs so //
T02TD2510.2E:16a-22: gzugs chen po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:16a-23: thams cad kyi gzugs kyis nam mkha'i khams spros pas na gzugs chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:16a-24: rdo rje'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:16a-25: thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i gzugs kyis bzhugs pa'i phyir rdo rje'i gzugs so //
T02TD2510.2E:16a-26: gzugs bzang 'chang zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:16a-27: gzugs bzang po lta bas chog mi shes pa mnga' bas na gzugs bzang 'chang ngo //
T02TD2510.2E:16a-28: chos kyi snang ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:16a-29: ma dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos rnams kyis snang bar byed pas na chos kyi snang ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:16a-30: gzi brjid mchog ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:16a-31: dge ba'i gzi brjid ji lta ji lta bu'i gzi brjid mchog de lta bu de la mnga' bas na gzi brjid mchog go //
T02TD2510.2E:16b-0: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje gzi brjid ni 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs kyis rgyal po chos thams cad kyi gzi brjid zil gyis gnon par bzhugs @16b pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:16b-1: gzugs de nyid kyis khams gsum pa ma lus pa'i sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten snang bar byed pas na /
T02TD2510.2E:16b-4: padmo'i dpal gyi mgon po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:16b-5: padma'i rigs skyed par byed pa'i padmo'i dpal de ni mgon po ste bdag po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:16b-6: mgon po mchog ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:16b-7: sems can rnams skyob pas na mgon po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:16b-8: sangs rgyas padma la sogs pa de dag gis 'gro ba rnams 'dul bar byed pas na mchog go //
T02TD2510.2E:16b-9: chos dpal mgon po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:16b-10: chos so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab ni chos so //
T02TD2510.2E:16b-11: dpal ni phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:16b-12: de'i mgon po ni gnyis su med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i ngo bo yin pa de'i phyir de las skyes pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:16b-13: mgon ldan pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:16b-14: mngon po rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02TD2510.2E:16b-15: des byin gyis brlabs pa'i stobs kyis padma'i rigs bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:16b-16: de'i phyir mgon po de la mnga' bas na mgon ldan pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:16b-17: tshangs pa'i mgon po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:16b-18: tshangs pa ni bsam gtan dang po bskyed pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:16b-19: stong gsum pa'i bdag bo tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis bdag po mdzad pas na tshangs pa'i mgon po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:16b-20: tshangs pa chen po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:16b-21: de nyid tshangs pa mgon po'i gzugs kyis tshangs pa thams cad kyi gzugs las mchog tu gyur pas na tshangs pa chan po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:16b-22: tshangs sras zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:16b-23: tshangs pas bskyed pa'i drang srong ni tshangs pa'i sras te /
T02TD2510.2E:16b-24: des 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams rnams 'dul bar byed pa'i gzugs de 'dzin pas na chongs pa'i sras te mtshan bdun yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:16b-25: snang ba zhes bya ba ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang bas phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i mun pa rnams sel ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:16b-26: sgren ma lta bu yin pas na sgron ma snang ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:16b-27: snang mchog ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:16b-28: gzugs de nyid kyis 'jig rten pa'i snang ba'i nang nas mchog tu gyur bas na snang ba mchog go //
T02TD2510.2E:16b-29: snang ba'i gtso bo zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:16b-30: bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa de spong ba'i gzugs kyis smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba rno ba'i phyir snang ba'i gtso bo'o //
T02TD2510.2E:16b-31: snang gsal zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-0: padma snang zhing gsal bas phyi rol gyi snang ba'i gsal @17a * //
T02TD2510.2E:17a-1: ba ches gsal bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:17a-2: shin tu snang ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-3: shin tu snang bas rab tu gsal bar byed pa padma'i snang ba'i gzugs de nyid kyis dngos po thams cad gsal bar byed pa'i phyir shin tu snang ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:17a-4: snang ba'i mgon po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-5: padma'i snang zhing gsal ba thams cad kyi bdag po yin pas na mgon po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:17a-6: snang ba che zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-7: padma snang zhing gsal bas nam mkha' khyab pas snang ba che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:17a-8: sangs rgyas snang khyod ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-9: bshad ma thag pa'i snang ba thams cad kyi nang nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas snang ba ste /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-11: sangs rgyas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-12: khyod dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhig par dbang bskur ba ni sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:17a-13: sangs rgyas mchog ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-14: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bos sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas rnams kyi mchog ni sangs rgyas mchog go //
T02TD2510.2E:17a-15: sangs rgyas sras po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las skyes pa na sangs rgyas sras so //
T02TD2510.2E:17a-17: mkhas chen po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-18: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rnal 'byor chen pos don thams cad yongs su mkhyen pa ni mkhas pa chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:17a-19: sangs rgyas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-20: nam mkha'i snying po rin po che'i cod pan gyi gzugs kyis dbang bskur ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-22: gtsug gi mchog ces bya ba ni padma'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi gzugs kyi spyi gtsug na /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa 'chang ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-24: gzhan yang rung ba rnams ni mchog ste /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-26: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-27: padma'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi gzugs de dag la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyi spyi bor bzhugs pas na sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khyod de /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-28: 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid la snang ba mtha' yas zhugs pa yang yin pas mtshan bdun yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:17a-29: sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-30: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan yin pas na sangs rgyas kyi spyan te /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-31: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2510.2E:17a-32: spyan chen po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17a-33: lha'i spyan yang de yin la /
T02TD2510.2E:17b-0: chen po yang de yin @17b pas na spyan chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-1: chos spyan zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17b-2: yul yongs su ma spangs par mkhyen nas chos ston pa gang yin pa de ni chos spyan no //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-3: gzigs pa chen po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17b-4: shes rab kyi spyan gyis ngo bo la gzigs pa chen po 'di la mnga' bas na gzigs pa chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-5: ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17b-6: ting nge 'dzin ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes su des pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-7: thams cad pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17b-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thams cad pa ni khyod do //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-9: rdo rje spyan zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17b-10: sha'i spyan gyi ngo bo ni rdo rje spyan te /
T02TD2510.2E:17b-11: rdo rje spyan des nye bar mtshon pa ni rdo rje spyan zhes bshad pa ste mtshan bdun yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-12: de ltar mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa'i phan yon gsungs pa ni bdag nyid kun gyis zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:17b-13: 'ga' zhig bshad ma thag pa 'dis bdag nyid kun gyis dngos po thams cad kyi sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-14: yon tan gyi rgyu mtshan gyi yon tan no //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-15: khyod kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rnams ni khyod kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa yang dag par brjod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-16: bstod dam ni bstod pa'i bsam pas bstod par 'dod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-17: sgom par byed pa ni don mngon du byed pa gang yin pa des kyang 'jig rten gyi dbang po dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-18: dpa' bo khyod la gsol btab pa //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-20: gus pa sngon du 'gro bas don du gnyer bas gsol ba 'de bas pa ni don gyi ched kar gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-21: dmigs pa thams cad las rnam par rgyal bas na dpa' bo'o //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-22: rang gi rigs ni bskyed nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-23: zhes bya ba ni padma'i rigs bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-24: chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-25: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang gi bdag nyid mchog tu gyur pa khyod kyis bshad du gsol zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsol ba 'debs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-26: thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-27: zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid gsum thub pa dang ldan pas na thub pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-28: thub pa rnams kyi nang na thub pa yin pas na thub pa chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:17b-29: de la lus thub pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:17b-30: lus kyi mi dge ba'i las kyi lam rnam pa gsum dang bral ba'o //
