T02TD2510.2E:34a-3: padma'i bdug pa ma ni sku mdog dkar dmar padma'i spos khang bsnams nas padma'i bdug pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tshim par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:34a-4: padma'i me tog ma ni sku mdog ser po /
T02TD2510.2E:34a-5: phyag g-yon pas padma'i me tog gi snod bsnams pa /
T02TD2510.2E:34a-6: phyag g-yas pas padma'i me tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:34a-7: padma'i mar me ma ni mdog dmar skya padma'i mar me'i sdong bus da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:34a-8: padma'i dri ma ni sna tshogs pa'i mdog can /
T02TD2510.2E:34a-9: phyag g-yon pas padma'i dri'i dung bsnams pa /
T02TD2510.2E:34a-10: phyag g-yas pas padma'i dris de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:34a-11: rta mgrin ni mdog dmar skya /
T02TD2510.2E:34a-12: padma'i lcags kyus de bzhin gshags pa thams cad 'gugs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:34a-13: zhal dang po'i mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa /
T02TD2510.2E:34a-14: de'i steng du rta'i gdong mgrin pa bstod pa mdog ljang gu'o //
T02TD2510.2E:34a-15: don yod pa'i zhags pa ni phyugs bdag gi gzugs can spyan gsum pa ;
T02TD2510.2E:34a-16: phyag bzhi pa g-yas kyi dang po na zhags pa /
T02TD2510.2E:34a-18: g-yon gyi dang po na dbyig pa /
T02TD2510.2E:34a-19: g-yon gyi gnyis pan padma bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:34a-20: padma'i lcags sgrog ni mdog dmar skya /
T02TD2510.2E:34a-21: padma'i lcags sgrog dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'ching bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:34a-22: padma 'bebs pa ni zhal drug pa /
T02TD2510.2E:34a-23: gzhon nu kun 'gyed kyi cha lugs can /
T02TD2510.2E:34a-24: mdog dmar po phyag g-yas kyi dang po na dril bu /
T02TD2510.2E:34a-27: g-yon gyi dang po na padma /
T02TD2510.2E:34a-28: gnyis pa na lcags sgrog / gsum pa na khyim bya bsnams pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:34a-29: de la rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:34a-31: bskal pa bzang po rnams ni rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:34a-32: lhag ma rnams ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i padma'i phreng ba'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:34b-1: ting nge 'dzin padma'i rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:34b-2: 'gro ba 'dul ba la sogs pa lhag ma rnams ni sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:34b-5: padma'i ting nge 'dzin ni zhi ba'i gzig dang po'o//
T02TD2510.2E:34b-6: lhag ma rnams rdo rje lta ba can no //
T02TD2510.2E:34b-7: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas dgongs ka'i dus su 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng blangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:34b-8: rdo rje shugs kyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par byas shing /
T02TD2510.2E:34b-9: aom h'um hr'i: ho: zhes kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:34b-10: yang dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lhag pa dang mtshang ba'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bltas la /
T02TD2510.2E:34b-11: rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing dkyil 'khor la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas rdo rje sems dpa' la phreng ba de phul te /
T02TD2510.2E:34b-12: rdo rje gar byas la blangs nas rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:34b-13: aom h'um hr'i: ho: zhes rgyun mi 'chad pa kho nar bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:34b-14: de nas yi ge h'um las bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:34b-15: de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:34b-16: rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas //
T02TD2510.2E:34b-17: rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi po //
T02TD2510.2E:34b-18: yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:34b-19: aom badzra autgha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:34b-20: de'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:34b-21: rdo rje mdzub mo gnyis legs par //
T02TD2510.2E:34b-22: sbyar la bkan te bsdams nas su //
T02TD2510.2E:34b-23: rab tu bros nas dbye ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:34b-24: sgo dbye ba yi mchog yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:34b-25: de nas rin po che'am sa las byas pa'i bum pa rtsa ba mi gnag pa gsus pa che ba /
T02TD2510.2E:34b-30: padma'i me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:34b-31: dri zhim po'i chus yongs su bkang ba /
T02TD2510.2E:34b-33: mgul pa ras dkar po bzang pos bcings pa /
T02TD2510.2E:34b-35: 'bras bu dri zhim pas kha brgyan pa /
T02TD2510.2E:34b-36: sbos chu dri zhim pas kun nas byugs te /
T02TD2510.2E:34b-37: me tog gi phreng ba btags pa ji lta ba bzhin du lhag par gnas pa byas la ;
T02TD2510.2E:34b-38: rdo rje chos mas padma'i me tog gi lcug ma yongs su bzung la /
T02TD2510.2E:34b-39: aom badzra au da ka h'um zhes bya bas bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:34b-40: bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i sngags kyang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02TD2510.2E:34b-41: bum pa de bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o//
T02TD2510.2E:35a-0: @35a * // gnyis pa la 'gro ba 'dul ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
T02TD2510.2E:35a-1: 'jug pa'i sgor mngon par phyogs par gzhag par bya zhing /
T02TD2510.2E:35a-2: chu des bdag nyid dang slob ma la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:35a-3: 'jug pa'i dus su rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:35a-4: slob ma yang 'ching du gzhug go //
T02TD2510.2E:35a-5: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i bum pa yang so so rang rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa /
T02TD2510.2E:35a-6: de rnams kyi rang rang gi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas la dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi khyams rnams su gzhag pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:35a-7: de rnams kyi phyi rol du bum pa gang ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:35a-8: ma rnyed par gyur na bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba la rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:35a-12: don yod dbang phyug rnams la rang rang gi sngags bzlas pa'i bum pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:35a-13: aom badzra dzhi zhes bya ba'i rigs kyi snying po 'dis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rigs kyi bum pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:35a-14: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i lha rnams la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:35a-15: aom badzra ratna mu ku ta h'um zhes bya bas sangs rgyas thor tshugs kyi rigs kyi bum pa la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:35a-16: aom dharmma padma hr'i: zhes bya bas padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bum pa la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:35a-17: aom sarbba mu khi h'um zhes bya bas padma don yod dbang phyug gi bum pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:35a-18: don yod dbang phyug gi rigs kyi lha rnams la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:35a-19: de nas bdag po lnga'i bum pa gang ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:35a-20: rigs bzhi'i bum pa gang ba bzhi dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:35a-21: byams pa la sogs pa'i bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi rig pa yongs su bzlas pa'i bum pa gang bar byas la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:35a-22: ma rnyed na bum pa rnams dang bum pa gang ba bcu las nyung ba dbul bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:35a-23: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:35a-24: ji skad bshad pa de dag byas pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:35a-25: de nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i zhes bya ba'i padma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad do zhes bya ba ni lha'i rnal 'byor nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:35a-26: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi bar du slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga'i bye brag rgyas par phye'o//
T02TD2510.2E:35b-0: @35b de la dang po kho nar zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:35b-1: dbab pa la sogs pa'i sngon du song ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:35b-2: padma'i slob dpon zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnal 'byor chen po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:35b-3: byin gyis brlabs pa'i slob dbon ni padma'i slob dpon no //
T02TD2510.2E:35b-4: rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs te zhes bya ba ni gdong g-yogs bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:35b-5: phyag bzhi byas te sdom pa bzung la /
T02TD2510.2E:35b-6: phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid la dbang bskur te /
T02TD2510.2E:35b-7: slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga bzhin du rdo rje chos ma bcings la 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:35b-8: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:35b-9: de las bshad pa'i tshul gyis dbab pa la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:35b-10: snying po 'dis las rnams bya'o zhes bya ba ni dbab pa dang me tog dor ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:35b-11: phreng ba bcing ba'i dbang dang /
T02TD2510.2E:35b-14: dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:35b-16: phyag rgya'i dbang gis cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:35b-19: ming gi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:35b-20: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi rjes thogs la /
T02TD2510.2E:35b-21: padma'i rigs kyi snying po rjes thogs la 'chad par 'gyur bar brjod pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:35b-22: aom padma spho ta aa dhi tishtha aa zhes phyogs gcig dper brjod pa tsam gyis de dag gi snying po rnams kyang bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:35b-23: snying po 'di dper brjod pa tsam gyis /
T02TD2510.2E:35b-24: de rnams kyi snying po'ang shes par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:35b-25: las rnams bya'o zhes bya ba bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:35b-26: aom padma spho ta aa dhi tishtha aa zhes bya ba ni dbab pa'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:35b-27: dkyil 'khor 'dir dbab pa'i snying po 'di dang /
T02TD2510.2E:35b-28: rdo rje padma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:35b-29: thal mo sbyar nas lan brgya'i bar du bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:35b-30: de nas rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mos /
T02TD2510.2E:35b-31: rdo rje padma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i gung mo lan brgya'i bar du dral zhing aa zhes brjod do //
T02TD2510.2E:36a-0: de nas de bzhin du bka' ma nos nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la bshad pa'i me tog dor ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga'i go rims thams cad rjes @36a * //
T02TD2510.2E:36a-2: ji lta ba bzhin du slob ma 'jug pa'i gnang ba mnos te /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-3: de nas yang dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur te zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa dbang bskur bar bshad pa de bzhin du 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgyas gang la 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-4: slob dpon gyis zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
T02TD2510.2E:36a-5: padmo'i dbyibs blangs nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-6: sangs rgyas kun gyi padmo'i dbang //
T02TD2510.2E:36a-7: de ring khyed la bskur bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:36a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab grub phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:36a-11: shing las byas pa'i padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa sdong bu dang bcas pa /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-12: lte ba'i dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa sor brgyad pa /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-13: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i nang du chud pa /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-14: 'og gi cha'i 'dab ma brgyad kha gyes pa /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-15: steng gi cha'i cung zad kha ma bye bar gyur pa'i padma'i dbyibs dang /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-16: padma'i dril bu dang bcas pa blangs te rang gi ming gi dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:36a-17: rang gi padmo'i ming nas brjod la zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-18: bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas nas lo ke shva ra padma ham zhes pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-19: gzhan gang yang rung ba ji ltar thob pa rang gi padma'i ming grags pas na brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:36a-20: padma'i lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-21: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i cho gas sprul pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-23: padmo'i sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02TD2510.2E:36a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-25: sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas sgo phye la /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-26: rta mgrin la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-30: padma'i gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad la /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-31: ra ba dang dra ba byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-32: padma'i khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas sgo bcad la /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-33: padma'i bsrung ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-34: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la phyag byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:36a-35: 'gro ba 'dul ba la mchod yon dang /
T02TD2510.2E:36b-1: sngags dang phyag rgyas so sor dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:36b-2: de nas chos kyi phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis sems dpa' chen po rnams bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas padma 'bebs pa'i bar du phyis 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin gyi /
T02TD2510.2E:36b-3: 'dir de'i chos kyi phyag rgyar mngon par 'dod pa'i yi ge bdag nyid ni 'di ma yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:36b-4: sgrub pa'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:36b-5: gang gi phyir dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dngos su sgrub par bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa de'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:36b-6: skabs 'dir mngon par 'dod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang ma yin la /
T02TD2510.2E:36b-7: 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgya la chos kyi phyag rgyas zhes brjod par mi bya'o zhes kyang brjod par mi nus te /
T02TD2510.2E:36b-9: rgyud phyi ma las padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi ka la yang chos kyi phyag rgyar brjod la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya rnams ni phyag rgya chen po zhes bya zhing /
T02TD2510.2E:36b-10: rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya rnams la ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya la /
T02TD2510.2E:36b-11: nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi ka la yang las kyi phyag rgya zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:36b-12: de nas dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:36b-13: ji ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang ;
T02TD2510.2E:36b-14: sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs pas //
T02TD2510.2E:36b-15: de ltar sems dpa' chen po bsgrub //
T02TD2510.2E:36b-16: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod cing zhes bya bas lha thams cad kyi rang gi rig pas dngos grub sgrub pa'i rgyur bshad pa de bzhin du 'dir yang dngos grub kyi don du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:36b-18: ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor bris la khrus byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:36b-19: de nas bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2510.2E:36b-20: ji lta ba bzhin du sgo dbye ba byas nas snga ma bzhin du 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor chen po dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis gos dkar mo dang 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rjes su mthun pa'i rgyan rnams la dri zhim pos byug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:36b-21: bdug pas bdugs te padma'i gnod sbyin gyi sngags kyis gos thams cad la yongs su bzlas la ze'u ka la sogs pa bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-0: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyis rgyan thams cad la mngon par @37a * //
T02TD2510.2E:37a-1: bsngags la bdag nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i ci rigs pa'i rgyan btags te /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-2: yang sngags gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i padma'i phreng ba'i cod pan la yongs su bzlas te /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-3: padma'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur bas bdag nyid la dbang bskur te /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-4: mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-5: dkyil 'khor thams cad blos mngon sum lta bur byas la phyag byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-6: mchod yon phul nas me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-7: padma dang dril bu bzung nas yang gdong g-yogs dang gos la padma'i gnod sbyin dang /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-8: rta mgrin la sogs pa sgo srung rnams kyi sngags yongs su bzlas la /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-10: me tog gi phreng ba btags la slob dpon gyis phyag bzhi bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:37a-11: de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-12: sdom pa gzung bar byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-13: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2510.2E:37a-14: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:37a-15: zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-16: dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02TD2510.2E:37a-19: de nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid la dbang bskur la rdo rje padma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te 'jug pa'i cho gas zhugs te /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-20: de nas rdo rje mna'i chu 'thungs la dbab pa'i cho gas dbab pa byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-21: aom padma spho ta aa dhi tishtha aa zhes bya ba brgya dang yang aa zhes bya ba lan brgya'i bar du bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:37a-22: de nas me tog dor la rang gi spyi bor bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-23: gdong g-yogs bkrol nas dkyil 'khor bltas la /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-24: dbab ba nye bar bsdu ba byas nas //
T02TD2510.2E:37a-25: slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'i cho gas bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-26: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-27: mig 'byed pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-28: tshigs bcad gnyis kyis rjes su gnang ba mnos nas /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-29: de nyid kyis ni padma gzung //
T02TD2510.2E:37a-30: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:37a-31: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher //
T02TD2510.2E:37a-32: de nas byin gyis brlabs te 'gro ba 'dul ba'i snying po bzlas la /
T02TD2510.2E:37a-33: dngos grub kyi padma'i brtul zhu gas blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:37b-0: bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i snying po dang phyag rgya @37b bzhi'i ye shes bslabs nas /
T02TD2510.2E:37b-2: lung bstan pa blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:37b-3: yang rang la byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:37b-8: ming gi dbang bskur bas rang nyid la bdag nyid kyis byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:37b-9: bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:37b-10: lo ke shva ra aa ham zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ming gang yang rung ba nas brjod de /
T02TD2510.2E:37b-11: padma dang dril bu 'dzin pa nyid kyis rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:37b-12: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su buddha h'um aa zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad kyi padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:37b-13: de nas badzra padma aa ham zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:37b-14: rdo rje de nyid ta dya th'a sarbba ta th'a ga ta satta th'a aa ham zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad kyi bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:37b-15: de bzhin du padma 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la padma 'bebs pa'i gnas su /
T02TD2510.2E:37b-21: sarbba padma ku la sa ma y'am /
T02TD2510.2E:37b-25: padma a'a be sha aa aa aa aa zhes bya bas padma 'bebs pa'i gnas su padma dril bu'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:37b-26: padma ghanda aa ham zhes bya bas nga rgyal bskyed la /
T02TD2510.2E:37b-27: padma a'a be sha aa ham zhes bya bas dril bu'i gzugs de padma 'bebs pa'i bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:37b-28: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad rdo rjes bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:37b-29: de nas sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas sgo phye la /
T02TD2510.2E:37b-30: bsdu ba byas te mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02TD2510.2E:37b-31: sgo thams cad nas rta mgrin gyi lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis las byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:37b-32: de bzhin du padma'i gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad la ra ba dang dra ba byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:37b-33: padma'i khu tshur gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bcad la /
T02TD2510.2E:37b-34: padma'i bsrung bas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:37b-35: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i snying pos dkyil 'khor ba'i lha thams cad la mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2510.2E:37b-36: aom pra wa ra satk'a ram pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2510.2E:37b-37: zhes bya ba'i rig pa 'dis zhabs bsil dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:38a-1: pa'i khu tshur gyis sor mo thams cad bskum la mdzub mo dang mthe bo gnyis bskum pa ltar byas nas me tog blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:38a-2: 'bul ba'i tshe sor mo de rnams brkyang bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:38a-3: lha thams cad kyi zhabs la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:38a-4: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:38a-5: shuddha h'um dri shya dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2510.2E:38a-8: aa ham buddha h'um zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod la rnam par snang mdzad bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:38a-9: de bzhin du bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:38a-10: aom sarbba sam sk'a ra pa ri shuddha dharmma te ga gnas mungga te ma h'a na ya ba ri b'a ri sv'a h'a /
T02TD2510.2E:38a-11: dri shya dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2510.2E:38a-13: sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02TD2510.2E:38a-14: aom sarbba sam sk'a ra pa ri shuddha dharmma te ga na sa mungga te ma h'a na ya ba ri bla re sv'a h'a /
T02TD2510.2E:38a-15: zhes brjod cing bskal pa bzang po rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:38a-16: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:38a-17: padma 'bebs pa'i bar gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'chad par 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:38a-18: byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po pa rnams kyi g-yon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur bkan la g-yas pa'i mdzub mo dang ma the bong gnyis kyis mthe'u chung nas brtsams te phye la /
T02TD2510.2E:38a-19: thal mo khong stong du byas pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:38a-20: de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bsgrubs nas /
T02TD2510.2E:38a-21: chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis kyang rgyas btab nas //
T02TD2510.2E:38a-22: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur la mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:38a-23: gos dang rgyan thams cad la gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD2510.2E:38a-24: bla re sna tshogs pa la yang padma gnod sbyin dang /
T02TD2510.2E:38a-26: yi ge aom mngon par bzlas te dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:38a-27: de nas me tog gi shing brgya'am bzhi'am me tog gi shing rnams la me tog gi rig pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:38a-28: de nas mar me'i rig pas mar me dang /
T02TD2510.2E:38a-30: bdug pa'i rig pas bdug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:38a-31: aa k'a ro mu kham zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i lha bshos kyi rig pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:38a-32: rol mo'i cha byad thams cad la rol me'i rig pa rnams dang /
T02TD2510.2E:38b-0: dar dpyangs dpyangs par @38b bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:38b-1: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:38b-3: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas spras pa /
T02TD2510.2E:38b-4: zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes par byas pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:38b-7: ba glang gi khyu shin tu brtags pa rnams kyang dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:38b-8: rta babs yid du 'ong ba dril bu la sogs pa dang bcas pa la yang /
T02TD2510.2E:38b-11: yi ge aom mngon par bzlas te dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:38b-12: de la mchod pa thams cad dbul ba'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:38b-13: badzra sva ra na kham de nas padmo'i sgeg mo /
T02TD2510.2E:38b-14: la sogs pa rnam pa brgyad kyis mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:38b-15: padma'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa bcu drug gi kyang dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2510.2E:38b-16: yi ge aom mngon par bzlas pa'i rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02TD2510.2E:38b-17: mchod pa'i yan lag thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad gang bar bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:38b-18: aom sarbba bitp'u ra p'ur su ra su ra a'a wa rta ya a'a wa rta ya ho: aom badzra spha ra na kham zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:38b-19: phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar ba bcings la yang mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:38b-20: slar yang padma'i sgeg mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhis dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:38b-21: phyag byas te sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das dngos grub thams cad kyi phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:38b-22: sems can thams cad kyi don mdzod cig ces sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:38b-23: de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas gsol ba btab nas /
T02TD2510.2E:38b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal te /
T02TD2510.2E:38b-25: slob ma gzhug pa'i gnang ba nod par byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:38b-26: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi //
T02TD2510.2E:38b-27: padma'i slob dpon dka' thub ches //
T02TD2510.2E:38b-28: sems can kun la sman slad du //
T02TD2510.2E:38b-29: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:38b-30: padma'i slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:38b-31: de nas padma'i slob ma rnams gzhug par bya zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyis las kyi dus phyis slob ma 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs su byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2510.2E:38b-32: de nas padma'i slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:39a-0: @39a * // de la dang por zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:39a-2: ji skad bshad pa'i padma'i slob ma'i slob ma rnams kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug la mna'i snying po byin la 'di skad ces bsgo bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:39a-3: deng khyod kyi ni snying gnas //
T02TD2510.2E:39a-4: padma'i sems dpa' nyid bzhugs te //
T02TD2510.2E:39a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pas mna' bsgag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:39a-6: gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:39a-7: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs sbas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:39a-8: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rjes su gzung bar gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:39a-9: gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa ni sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can no //
T02TD2510.2E:39a-10: de bzhin du gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yang gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa ste dam tshig mi shes pa la mi bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:39a-11: de nas snying po 'dis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:39a-12: ji skad du bshad pa'i gos kyi stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs dang /
T02TD2510.2E:39a-13: gdong g-yogs kyang bcings nas phyag bzhi byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:39a-14: phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la /
T02TD2510.2E:39a-15: rdo rje chos ma'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:39a-17: rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD2510.2E:39a-20: dam tshig ni dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub ste /
T02TD2510.2E:39a-21: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa las byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:39a-22: de nas zhes bya ba ni slob ma 'jug pa'i gnang ba nod pa'i dus phyis phyag rgya cing bar mi bya ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:39a-23: rim pa ni 'di bzhin du mi bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:39a-25: de nas las rnams ji lta ba bzhin byas nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:39a-26: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga ji skad bshad pa bzhin du slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:39a-27: padma'i dbyibs lag tu sbyin no zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje padma slob ma'i lag tu sbyin no //
T02TD2510.2E:39a-28: byin nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyang sbyin te /
T02TD2510.2E:39a-29: aom padma hasta badzra dharmm'a tram p'a la ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:39b-0: de la rdo rje @39b ni chos rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba'i zhes bya pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rtogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:39b-1: de'i chos ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs te de skyong ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:39b-2: yang dag pa'i dangs por 'dzin pa'i mngon par zhen pa mi byed par chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba thams cad la bsgom par gyis shig dang 'di ni padma yongs su mi gtong ba'i mtshan nyid kyis brtul zhugs so //
T02TD2510.2E:39b-6: ji ltar padma kha dog dmar po 'di khyod kyis zung shig //
T02TD2510.2E:39b-7: rigs kyi nyes pa'i 'dam la sogs chu yis mi gos pa bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:39b-8: thams cad dag pa ni sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje chos kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas chos bdag med pa'i chags pas gos pas byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:39b-9: bsgom pa ni goms par byas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:39b-10: de bzhin du gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma'i khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags kyi sdig pa'i chus gos par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:39b-11: de la chos nyid de yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:39b-13: thog ma med pa nas sgro 'dogs pa med pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:39b-15: lhag par gnas pa de bzhin du byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:39b-16: dbang bskur bar 'os pa'i slob mas bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su gzung ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:39b-17: dge sbyong dang dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su blangs pa /
T02TD2510.2E:39b-18: lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas slob dpon gyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:39b-20: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas ;
T02TD2510.2E:39b-21: / slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2510.2E:39b-22: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02TD2510.2E:39b-23: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2510.2E:39b-24: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02TD2510.2E:39b-25: sdom pa dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2510.2E:39b-26: de nas ji skad bshad pa'i gos kyi stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs bskon zhing gdong g-yogs kyang bcings la slob ma phyag bzhi byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2510.2E:39b-27: yang sgo bzhi nas phyag bzhi byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:39b-28: lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas slob dpon la yang phyag byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:39b-29: sngar bshad pa'i rim pa nyid kyis bshags pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:39b-30: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:40a-3: gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-4: thub pa nyi ma ma lus pa //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-5: sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-6: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-7: slob dpon dpang du gnas pa la ;
T02TD2510.2E:40a-8: / sangs rgyas rol mo las byung pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-9: mi ldog 'khor lo'i sbyor bar ldan //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-10: thar pa chen po grong khyer mchog //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-11: gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-12: gsang ba'i rigs mtho thams cad du //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-13: slob dpon chen par bdag 'jug mdzod //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-14: mi ldog 'khor lo'i dbang bskur bas //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-15: skal ba chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-16: mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab pa //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-17: dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-18: sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba /
T02TD2510.2E:40a-19: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-20: dbang bskur ba ni rmad po che //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-21: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-22: rtag tu bdag ni slob dpon 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-23: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-24: de nas slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:40a-25: che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-26: byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-27: dam tshig sdom dang gsang ba yis //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-29: de nas slob dpon gyis yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:40a-30: gsang ba chen po rigs dag pa //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-31: gsang ba chen por 'dzin pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-32: bdag nyid chen por khyod 'dod dam //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-33: des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-34: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-35: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-36: 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-37: dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-38: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-39: blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar gyis //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-40: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-41: shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-42: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-43: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-44: 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-45: sdom pa dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-46: rin chen rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-47: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02TD2510.2E:40a-48: zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-0: sbyin @40b pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-1: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-2: dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-4: dam tshig sdom pa yin par bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-5: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-6: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-7: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-8: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-9: de las gzhan pa bcu bzhi ni //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-10: phas pham par yang rab tu bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-11: spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:40b-12: rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad de //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-13: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-14: nyin re zhing ni bzla bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-15: gang tshe nyams gyur rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-17: khyod kyis srog chags bsad mi bya //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-18: ma byin par yang mi blang ngo //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-19: 'dod pa log par mi spyod cing //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-20: brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-21: phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:40b-22: chang ni rnam par spang bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-23: sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs par //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-24: bya ba ma yin thams cad spang //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-25: dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-26: rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-27: lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-28: ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-29: yid kyi rnam pa gsum rnams kyang /
T02TD2510.2E:40b-30: ci nus par ni rjes su skyong //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-31: theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-32: sems can don la rgyab phyogs min //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-33: 'khor ba dag ni yongs mi spang //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-34: rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-35: lha dang lha min gsang ba pa //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-36: khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-37: phyag rgya gzhon pa mtshon cha dang //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-38: mtshan ma bgom par mi bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-39: 'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-40: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bsrungs //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-41: des kyang 'di skad brjod bya ste //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-42: slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gson //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-43: gtso bos ji ltar ba k'a stsal pa //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-44: de dag bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-45: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-46: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-47: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-48: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-51: ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-52: gang zhig sdom pa mi 'dzin par byed pa de la ni /
T02TD2510.2E:40b-53: deng khyod ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod par mi bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:40b-54: slob dpon du rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:40b-55: dbang bskur ba yang mi bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:40b-56: de nas de ma thag tu /
T02TD2510.2E:41a-0: @41a * // aom sarbba yo ga tsitta autpa da ya mi zhes bya ba 'dis /
T02TD2510.2E:41a-1: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2510.2E:41a-2: dam pa bdag gis bskyed nas su //
T02TD2510.2E:41a-3: de yi snying gar snying pos ni //
T02TD2510.2E:41a-4: rdo rje rab tu gzhag par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:41a-5: su ra te sa ma ya satvam ho badzra siddhi ya th'a su kham /
T02TD2510.2E:41a-6: de nas de 'gro ba 'dul par byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2510.2E:41a-7: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang //
T02TD2510.2E:41a-8: rdo rje padma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzhis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2510.2E:41a-9: de nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te /
T02TD2510.2E:41a-10: dri dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod yon gyi mchog blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:41a-11: rdo rje brtul zhugs kyis dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:41a-12: de la dang po re zhig slob dpon gyis /
T02TD2510.2E:41a-13: aom badzra padma sa ma ya satvam zhes brjod cing rdo rje padma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rang nyid bcings la slob ma yang 'ching du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:41a-14: de nyid kyi gung mo'i sor mo gnyis kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la /
T02TD2510.2E:41a-15: aom padma sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di dang /
T02TD2510.2E:41a-16: rta mgrin gyi lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas shar phyogs kyi sgo nas bcug la dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:41a-17: lho phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du bcug la don yod zhags pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:41a-18: yang nub phyogs kyi sgor bcug la padma'i lcags sgrog gi las kyi phyag rgyas bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:41a-19: de nas yang byang phyogs kyi sgo nas bcug la padma 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas dbang du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:41a-20: yang shar phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:41a-21: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi padma'i rigs su zhugs kyis /
T02TD2510.2E:41a-22: ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub pa yang thob na /
T02TD2510.2E:41a-23: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T02TD2510.2E:41a-24: de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par byas /
T02TD2510.2E:41a-25: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cig / khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
T02TD2510.2E:41a-26: de nas slob dpon rang nyid kyis rdo rje padma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya kha thur du bstan pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:41a-27: gyen du bstan pa bcings la padma slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:41b-0: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje dam tshig yin @41b gyis ;
T02TD2510.2E:41b-1: gal te tshul 'di 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:41b-2: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang mna'i snying po 'di lan cig bzlas pa'i chus padma'i slob ma de 'thung du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:41b-3: de la mna'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:41b-4: padma'i sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD2510.2E:41b-5: snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzad //
T02TD2510.2E:41b-6: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD2510.2E:41b-7: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD2510.2E:41b-9: de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:41b-10: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyis phyag na padmo ba yin gyis /
T02TD2510.2E:41b-11: ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so //
T02TD2510.2E:41b-12: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig / mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re /
T02TD2510.2E:41b-13: de nas yang 'di skad du bsgo bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:41b-14: gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di su la yang ma smra shig / khyod mi bde ba ma sbangs par dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re /
T02TD2510.2E:41b-15: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis rlobs la /
T02TD2510.2E:41b-16: padma'i sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces smros shig ces bsgo'o //
T02TD2510.2E:41b-17: de nas myur du slob dpon gyis rdo rje padma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod du gzhug go //
T02TD2510.2E:41b-18: 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste //
T02TD2510.2E:41b-19: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
T02TD2510.2E:41b-20: rdo rje ye shes bla med ni //
T02TD2510.2E:41b-21: de ring nyid du 'bab par shog / badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes bya ba lan brgya'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:41b-22: de'i tshe khro bo'i khu tshur bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:41b-23: rdo rje padma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dral bar bya zhing /
T02TD2510.2E:41b-24: aom h'um hr'i: ho: aa aa aa aa /
T02TD2510.2E:41b-25: zhes lan brgya'i bar brjod na nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:41b-26: gang gi tshe de ltar babs pas padma /
T02TD2510.2E:41b-27: sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya 'ching ba de'i tshe slob dpon gyis padma khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:41b-28: gang gi tshe padma rgyal bo'i phyag rgya 'ching ba de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:41b-29: padma gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:41b-30: gang gi tshe padma chags pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:41b-31: padma srung ba'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:41b-32: gang gi tshe padma legs pa'i phyag rgya 'ching pa de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:41b-33: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:42a-0: @42a * // gang gi tshe padma khro gnyer gyi phyag rgya 'ching ba de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:42a-2: gang gi tshe padma nyi ma'i phyag rgya 'ching ba de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:42a-4: gang gi tshe padma rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya 'ching ba de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:42a-6: gang gi tshe padma bzhad pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:42a-7: padma sgrol ma'i phyag rgya bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:42a-8: de lta bus ni padma'i sangs rgyas dgongs pa mdzad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:42a-9: de nas babs pa de'i lce la yi ge h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:42a-10: badzra dzi hva zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2510.2E:42a-11: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i gar gyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.2E:42a-12: khro bo rdo rje bsrung ba'i gnas su bzhad pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:42a-13: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:42a-14: bru hi badzra de nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:42a-15: de nas phreng ba de pra t'i tstsha badzra ho: zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor chen por dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:42a-16: de nas aom pra ti gri hna stvam mi mam satva ma h'a b'a la zhes bya bas phreng ba de de'i mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:42a-18: padma'i sems dpa' deng khyod kyis //
T02TD2510.2E:42a-19: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //
T02TD2510.2E:42a-20: mig ni thams cad 'byid mdzad de //
T02TD2510.2E:42a-21: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
T02TD2510.2E:42a-22: he badzra p'a shya de nas rta mgrin nas brtsams te bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi bar du dkyil 'khor chen po bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:42a-23: de nas ti shtha badzra dri bho me bh'a ba /
T02TD2510.2E:42a-24: sh'a shva to me bha ba /
T02TD2510.2E:42a-25: hri da yam aa dhi tishtha sarbba siddhi mme pra ya tstsha h'um ha ha ha ha ho: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis dbab pa'i phyag rgya snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:42a-26: de nas gang la me tog babs pa'i lha de sku dam tshig gi phyag rgyas de sprul la /
T02TD2510.2E:42a-27: rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.2E:42a-28: rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i khyad par gyis slob ma byin gyis brlabs la rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:42a-29: de nas nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du kha shar phyogs kyi sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:42a-30: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du padma dang zla ba'i steng du bzhag la /
T02TD2510.2E:42a-31: mchod yon byin nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:42a-32: sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:42b-0: rang gi lha'i @42b bum pas dbang bskur zhing /
T02TD2510.2E:42b-1: de'i sngags kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:42b-2: phyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las padma'i khu tshur gyis chu blangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:42b-3: chu des dbang bskur ba dang 'thung du yang gzhug go //
T02TD2510.2E:42b-4: de'i sngags aom badzra aa bhi shi nytsa zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:42b-5: de nas yod cing 'byor bar gyur na sngar bshad pa'i cho gas gos dkar po'i stod g-yogs dang /
T02TD2510.2E:42b-8: de la phyi nas ze'u ka la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:42b-9: aom badzra dharmm'a sa ma ye badzra padmi ne h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:42b-10: zhes bya bas slob ma la chos kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:42b-12: rdo rje thal mo bsdams nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:42b-13: gung mo rdo rje mnyam sbyar ba //
T02TD2510.2E:42b-14: chos kyi rdo rje rab grags pa //
T02TD2510.2E:42b-15: de yis dbang bskur sbyin par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:42b-16: yi ge hr'i: las 'od dpag tu med pa bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:42b-17: 'di de'i spyi bor gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:42b-18: 'di ni chos kyi sku'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:42b-19: de nas ji skad bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje padma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:42b-20: padma'i dril bu dang bcas pa'i slob ma'i lag pa gnyis su byin nas /
T02TD2510.2E:42b-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02TD2510.2E:42b-22: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:42b-23: sangs rgyas kun du rab grub phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:42b-24: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
T02TD2510.2E:42b-25: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam /
T02TD2510.2E:42b-27: ti shtha badzra sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2510.2E:42b-28: de nas aom badzra satva n'a ma aa bhi shi nyts'a mi badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02TD2510.2E:42b-29: kye 'jig rten dbang phyug padma zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags 'dis ming gis dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:42b-30: slob ma rdo rje thal mo bskor ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:42b-31: slob dpon la phyag byed du bcug la /
T02TD2510.2E:42b-33: dbang bskur thams cad sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:42b-34: de nas dri la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:42b-35: padma'i sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams kyis slob ma la mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:42b-36: 'di ni sdom pa gzung ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:42b-37: sdom pa ma bzung ba rnams kyi thun mong gi dbang bskur ba yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:42b-38: slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa rnams kyis khyad par brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:42b-39: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor las khru gnyis tsam dor bar dbus ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad kyi khru bzhi pa sgo nub tu bltas pa /
T02TD2510.2E:42b-40: shar phyogs kyi sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'i dkyil 'khor tshon sna lngas bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-2: de'i steng du rdo rje padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-3: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du dkyil 'khor de yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-6: zla ba dar gyis g-yogs la /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-7: padma'i gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas te slob ma bzhag la /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-8: de'i steng du bla re bre ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-10: me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i gdugs dkar po rin po che'i tog can bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:43a-11: g-yon logs su gos dkar po sna tshogs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-12: ba dan sna tshogs pa btsugs la 'gro ba 'dul ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-13: yi ge aom yongs su bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:43a-14: de nas slob ma 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs su bskyed la /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-15: de phyag rgya chen po gnas pa la /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-16: slob ma'i lus la rnal 'byor chen po las bshad pa'i gnas rnams su dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-17: 'gro ba 'dul ba nas brtsams nas padma 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i khyad par thams cad bkod la /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-18: yang de nyid la yi ge ma las rnam par snang mdzad kyi cod pan dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-19: yi ge nga las brang du mi bskyod pa'i dpal be'u dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-20: yi ge nya las smin mtshams kyi mdzod spur rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-21: yi ge na las mchu gnyis kyi bar du 'od dpag tu med pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-22: yi ge na las spyi gtsug tu don yod grub pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-23: yi ge ya las snying gar padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-24: yi ge ra las dpral bar padmas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu gtsang ma zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-25: yi ge la las lkog ma'i phyogs su rdo rje padma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-26: yi ge wa las mgo bor sna tshogs padma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-27: aa a'a zhes bya bas rna ba g-yas g-yon du padma'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-29: ai a'i las mig g-yas g-yon gnyis su padma'i chags pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-31: au a'u zhes bya ba las 'gram pa gnyis su padma'i khro gnyer dang padma'i nyi ma /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-32: ri r'i zhes bya ba las rna rtsa gnyis su padma'i dpal dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43a-34: li l'i zhes bya ba las mchu gnyis la padma'i sgrol ma dang padma'i rnon bo /
T02TD2510.2E:43b-0: ae aee zhes bya @43b ba las sna bug gnyis la padma'i rgyu dang padma'i bsrung ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:43b-1: ao aoo zhes bya ba las na mtshong [?] gnyis su padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang padma'i bsrung ba /
T02TD2510.2E:43b-2: aam a'a: zhes bya bas ltag khung g-yas g-yon du padma'i gnod sbyin dang padma'i khu tshur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:43b-3: aom sha sha sa ha tsa tsha dza dzha las lte ba la rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang padma'i sgog mo dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43b-11: tri ka kha ga gha zhes bya ba las rgyab tu rig pa'i rgyal po rnams so //
T02TD2510.2E:43b-12: ta tha da dha zhes bya ba las dpung pa gnyis dang lhag pa gnyis la khro bo rnams so //
T02TD2510.2E:43b-13: ta tha da dha zhes bya ba las rtags dang mjug tshos gnyis dang rgyab tu tshogs kyi bdag po rnams so //
T02TD2510.2E:43b-14: pa pha pa bha zhes bya ba las brla gnyis dang rje ngar gnyis la pho nya rnams so //
T02TD2510.2E:43b-15: sha lam ku ka zhes bya ba las rkang pa'i long bu gnyis su g-yog po rnams so //
T02TD2510.2E:43b-16: ya h'um ra tra la hri wa aa zhes bya ba las long bu gnyis dang rkang pa gnyis la padma'i bdug pa ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43b-20: tsa tsha dza dzha nya zhes bya ba las lag pa g-yas pa la las byed lnga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:43b-21: ta tha da dha na zhes bya ba las lag pa g-yon pa la las byed ma lda'o //
T02TD2510.2E:43b-22: kram kri ya ra la wa ksha zhes bya ba las rkang pa g-yas pa la las byed ma bdun no //
T02TD2510.2E:43b-23: sha sha sa ha lam zhes bya ba las rkang pa g-yon pa la ming po gsum dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43b-24: sring mo bzhi dang bcas pa dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:43b-25: sngar yig 'bru rnams rim gyis bkod la ;
T02TD2510.2E:43b-26: phyis phyag rgya'i gzugs su bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:43b-27: de nas yi ge rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:43b-28: dngos grub thams cad rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:43b-29: rigs rigs su yang rgyas pa la mngon par dga' bas yig 'bru dgod pa'i cho ga bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:43b-30: de nas rdo rje chos mas slob ma'i snying gar byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2510.2E:43b-32: lkog ma dang spyi bor rdo rje dang padma 'ba' zhig dang /
T02TD2510.2E:43b-33: sna tshogs padma gsum gyis ji lta ba'i gnas su byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2510.2E:43b-34: dri la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:44a-0: gdan de la 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen pos bzhag @44a * //
T02TD2510.2E:44a-2: mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba'i dri la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02TD2510.2E:44a-3: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor la bshad pa'i sgeg mo la sogs pa la bskor ba'i rol mo'i phyag rgya rnams kyis mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:44a-4: dpal mchog dang po las gsungs pa'i rol mo brgya phrag snyed las dung dang /
T02TD2510.2E:44a-11: gling bu'i bye brag ji snyed pa rnams la byin gyis brlabs te dbul ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:44a-12: sgeg mo la sogs pa rol mo'i khyad par rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:44a-13: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa gdon par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:44a-14: de nas rta mgrin gyi bum pa gang pa'i dbang bskur ba nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:44a-15: rnam par snang mdzad kyi bar gyi bum pa gang ba dang 'gro ba 'dul ba'i bum pa gang bas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:44a-16: de nas bum pas dbang bskur ba'i phyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las padma khu tshur gyis chu blangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:44a-19: aom ha ya gri ba ma h'a padma aam ku sha a'a ka rsha ya sh'i ghram sarbba padma ku la padma sa ma yam padma aam ku sha dh'a ra h'um dza aom badzra aa bhi shnytsi zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du aom h'um hr'i: ho: badzra aa bhi shnytsi /
T02TD2510.2E:44a-20: zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:44a-21: de nas rdo rje rin chen dang /
T02TD2510.2E:44a-22: padma'i gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i gos dkar po dang rgyan gyi bye brag thams cad byin la dri la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:44a-23: sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2510.2E:44a-24: sngar bshad pa bzhin du chos kyi rdo rje bcings te //
T02TD2510.2E:44a-25: 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbang gis dbang bskur la /
T02TD2510.2E:44a-26: yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pha dang ldan pa'i padma'i phreng ba dang bcas pa'i rin po che'i cod pan gyi dar dbyangs kyi dbang gis dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:44a-27: aom dharmm'a sa ma ya badzra padme ni h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:44a-28: badzra ratna zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:44a-29: de nas rdo rje padma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:44a-30: padma'i dril bu blangs la mtshan ma'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:44a-31: bdag po'i dbang bskur ba na /
T02TD2510.2E:44a-32: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-0: de ring khyod la @44b bskur bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-1: zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du sbyin no //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-2: de nas aom padma m'a le aa bhi shinytsa lo ke shva ra te sva ra hr'i: zhes bya ba stong rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te /
T02TD2510.2E:44b-3: padma'i phreng ba de spyi bor bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-4: de nas ming gi dbang bskur byin la /
T02TD2510.2E:44b-5: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang padma'i sgeg me la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:44b-6: yi ge pras yang dag par byin gyis brlabs pa'i rin po che'i mig thur ram /
T02TD2510.2E:44b-7: gser la sogs pa'i thur ma thogs la mdun du 'dug ste /
T02TD2510.2E:44b-8: mig 'byed pa'i tshul du byas la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-9: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-10: 'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-11: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-12: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-13: aom badzra nee tra aa pa ha ra pa tra lam hri de nas aa badzra satva zhes bya bas me long la yongs su bzlas la chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-14: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-15: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-16: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-17: rgyu dang las las kun du byung //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-18: ngo bo nyid med gnas med par //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-19: de ltar chos 'di shes nas su //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-20: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-21: 'on kyang sangs rgyas rigs su skye //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-22: yi ge ho las mda' bskyed pa //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-23: gzhu dang lhan cig tu byin nas /
T02TD2510.2E:44b-25: 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags par gyis la /
T02TD2510.2E:44b-26: yi ge hos phyogs bzhi dang steng 'og tu mda' 'phen du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-27: me long la aa badzra satva zhes yongs su bzlas te bstan la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-28: rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-29: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-30: sangs rgyas kun ba dag rang nyid ni //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-31: bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-32: 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub kyi sems gang yin ba de ni 'di yin no zhes khong du chud par gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-33: badzra he tu mam zhes bya bas 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du de gzhag par bya ba dang //
T02TD2510.2E:44b-34: badzra bha sha ram zhes bya bas lag pa g-yas bar dud byin la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:45a-2: tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-3: de ring phan chad 'jig rten la //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-4: skyob pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-5: chos kyi dung ni bla med pa //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-6: ma lus kun du gang bar gyis //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-7: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-8: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-9: gsang sngags skyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-10: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-11: phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-12: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-13: kun du khyod la srung bar byed //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-14: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nga rgyal gyis //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-15: 'jig rten kun la thams cad du //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-16: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-17: ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul gyur pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-18: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-19: zhes gsang sngags kyi theg pa'i rjes su gnang ba byin nas /
T02TD2510.2E:45a-21: slar yang dkyil 'khor bri ba'i rjes su gnang ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-22: 'jig rten kun la thams cad du //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-23: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-27: de nas de nyid kyis padma gzung bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:45a-28: de nyid kyis ni bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-29: 'jig rten dbang phyug rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-30: 'dul bar byed pa'i thabs kyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-31: gar gyis rol pa rnam par dag /'dis chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:45a-32: ji ltar padma rab dmar ba //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-33: tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos bzhin//
T02TD2510.2E:45a-34: de bzhin khams gsum dag pas na //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-35: bag chags nyes pas gos mi 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-36: 'dis dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:45a-37: gang dang gang gi gzugs kyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-39: padma dag mchog sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-40: de dang de nyid kyis sbyang bya //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-41: de nas dngos grub kyi padma'i brtul zhugs sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-42: aom padma ha sta dharmma tam pa la ya des kyang 'di skad du /
T02TD2510.2E:45a-43: rdo rje chos nyid ji lta bu lags zhes dri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:45a-44: de la yang 'di skad du brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:45a-46: tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos bzhin//
T02TD2510.2E:45b-0: @45b thams cad dag par bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:45b-1: de bzhin sdig pas gos mi 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:45b-2: de la chos ni 'di yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:45b-3: de nas snying po byin la /
T02TD2510.2E:45b-4: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:45b-5: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor mngon du byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:45b-6: slob ma thams cad gzengs bstod pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:45b-8: aom 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan pa //
T02TD2510.2E:45b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2510.2E:45b-10: srid pa kun du grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:45b-11: srid pa'i ngan song rnams las bton //
T02TD2510.2E:45b-12: kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba /
T02TD2510.2E:45b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa sarya sa ma ya stvam bhu ra bhu ba sva: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te g-yon pa chos gos 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:45b-14: g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa'i tshul du byas pa 'di ni gzengs bstod pa'i phyag rgya yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:45b-15: cho ga lhag ma ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:45b-16: de ltar slob dpon gyi cho ga rgyas pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:45b-17: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:45b-18: de ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa'i slob dpon gyis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:45b-19: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:45b-20: de nas zhes bya ba ni gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dus phyis padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya dbang du bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:45b-21: de ma thag tu bstan par bya ba yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:45b-22: der nges pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo de bslab cing bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:45b-23: snying la padmo bris nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:45b-24: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la snying la rdo rje padma bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:45b-26: padmo bsgoms nas zhes bya ba smos so //
T02TD2510.2E:45b-27: de bris pa ci zhig bya zha na /
T02TD2510.2E:45b-28: padmo'i dpal yang dbang du byed pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:45b-29: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rang gi rig pa 'grub pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:45b-30: padma'i rigs dbang du byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:45b-32: bud med phal pa'ang smos ci dgos //
T02TD2510.2E:45b-34: au ma la sogs pa'i bud med mchog tu mdzes pa nges pa kho nar dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:46a-1: ba la sogs pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la phyis padma shr'i yam ba sha ma n'a ya ho:/
T02TD2510.2E:46a-2: zhes bya ba 'dis 'gro ba 'dul ba la sogs par bdag nyid bskyed la /
T02TD2510.2E:46a-4: snying po 'dis rdo rje padma bsgrubs la /
T02TD2510.2E:46a-5: nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas ji srid mngon sum du mthong bar gyur gyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:46a-6: de nas spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:46a-7: mthar mtshan thog thag bsgoms nas de 'jig rten dbang phyug dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:46a-8: bud med dbang du byed par 'dod na zla ba gcig bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:46a-9: de nas spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:46a-10: mthar mtshan thog thag bsgoms nas des padma'i dpal mo'i gzugs can nam /
T02TD2510.2E:46a-11: au ma la sogs pa gnod sbyin mo'i gzugs can rta mgrin la sogs pa rnams kyis dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:46a-15: de padma'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis bkang nas 'khyud par bsam shing /
T02TD2510.2E:46a-16: padma shr'i ya ba sha ma n'a ya ho: //
T02TD2510.2E:46a-17: che ge mo ba sha ma n'a ya ho: //
T02TD2510.2E:46a-18: zhes bzlas pas de dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:46a-19: dpral bar sangs rgyas gzugs bris te //
T02TD2510.2E:46a-20: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du rang gi lha'i gzugs byas la phyi nas bdag nyid aa bhi she ka pra yatstsha bam zhes brjod pas dpral ba'i phyogs su rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa bsams nas snga ma bzhin du rtag tu bsgoms nas /
T02TD2510.2E:46a-21: mthar mtshan thog thag bsgoms na /
T02TD2510.2E:46a-22: tho rangs kha rang gi lha'i dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur zhing rang gi dngos grub kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:46a-23: kha yi nang du lce steng du //
T02TD2510.2E:46a-24: sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms na //
T02TD2510.2E:46a-26: snga ma bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la rdo rje lcer byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2510.2E:46a-27: padma sva ra sva te sho dha ya h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:46a-28: zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa lce la bsams te snga ma bzhin du de'i snying po bzla ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:46a-30: mthar mtshan thog thag de thun bzhir bsgoms na 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:46a-31: gtsug tor dbus su padmo ni //
T02TD2510.2E:46a-32: snyoms par zhugs te bzhag nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:46b-0: @46b zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor de bzhin du byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:46b-1: aom padmo aurtha dhvam gram ba sham ku ru dza /
T02TD2510.2E:46b-3: padma'i gtsug tor zhal bzhi bskyed nas /
T02TD2510.2E:46b-4: ji srid mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du snying po bzlas shing bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:46b-5: de nas spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig byas na 'grub par 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa lta bu'i 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug gi lha lta bu'i gtsug tor gyis mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:46b-6: rtsig pa'am yang na nam mkha' rung //
T02TD2510.2E:46b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:46b-8: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:46b-9: aom sarbba dza gad ba shi ta dzny'a na padma aa bhi shinytsa aa zhes bya ba rdo rje padma brtsigs pa la sogs pa la sprul pa snying po 'di bzlas shing nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas /
T02TD2510.2E:46b-10: ji srid mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:46b-11: de nas spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:46b-12: mthar mtshan thog thag bsgoms na des de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:46b-13: sems can la padma spro bar bsgoms pas des rang gi rig pa snang bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.2E:46b-15: 'dis ni sems can thams cad kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:46b-16: dbang du byed pa dam pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:46b-18: nam mkha'am ni phyogs gzhan du //
T02TD2510.2E:46b-20: snga ma bzhin du lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:46b-21: aom dzny'a na padma tishtha ai dra shyam ku ru bam /
T02TD2510.2E:46b-22: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di brjod cing nam mkha' la sogs pa'i phyogs su rdo rje padma sprul la /
T02TD2510.2E:46b-23: snying po 'di nyid brjod cing nyin rer thun bzhi'i sbyor bas ji srid mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ba de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:46b-25: gang tshe mthong ba de tshe blangs //
T02TD2510.2E:46b-26: ci dga' bar ni snang mi 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:46b-28: rtsig pa'am yang na nam mkha' la //
T02TD2510.2E:46b-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:46b-30: aom sa ma dhi bi shva padma tishtha be shva ru pyam mi darsha ya bha ga bam /
T02TD2510.2E:46b-31: zhes bya ba yongs su zlos shing rtsig pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:46b-32: yang na nam mkha' la padma 'dab ma bzhi pa sprul la /
T02TD2510.2E:46b-34: ji srid sngar bshad pa bzhin du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:47a-0: @47a * // gang gi tshe mthong nas blangs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs su 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:47a-1: nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du //
T02TD2510.2E:47a-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te snga ma bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:47a-3: phyis aom sa ma dhi badzra padma tishtha au tishtha sh'i ghram hr'i:/
T02TD2510.2E:47a-4: zhes bya bas rdo rje padmo nam mkha' la'am /
T02TD2510.2E:47a-5: rtsig pa la sogs pa'i gnas su sprul la snying po 'di nyid zlos shing snga ma bzhin du bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.2E:47a-6: des mthong bar gyur pa dang blangs nas padma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:47a-7: dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du //
T02TD2510.2E:47a-8: spyan ras gzigs dbang bris nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:47a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir 'phags pa rta mgrin du gnas pa'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:47a-10: aom padma aam ku sha a'a karsha ya sarbba ma h'a satvam h'um dza:/
T02TD2510.2E:47a-11: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'bum bzlas pa byas nas phyis mtshan thog thag bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:47a-12: de nas dkyil 'khor ram ras la 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mdun du rta mgrin bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:47a-17: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bsgrubs la /
T02TD2510.2E:47a-18: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la dbang bskur te /
T02TD2510.2E:47a-19: mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:47a-20: de'am yang na gzhan gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa'i gzugs de'i mdun du /
T02TD2510.2E:47a-21: rta mgrin gyi las kyi phyag rgyas bcings na rang gi dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:47a-22: dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du //
T02TD2510.2E:47a-23: spyan ras gzigs dbang bri bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:47a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:47a-25: 'dir rje btsun don yod zhags pa ni sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug de'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:47a-26: aom aa mo gha p'a sha kro dha h'um ho: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'bum bzlas pa byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:47a-27: mthar mtshan thog thag bzlas te /
T02TD2510.2E:47a-28: de nas dkyil 'khor ram ras la bcom ldan 'das don yod zhags pa de nyid bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:47a-29: bcom ldan 'das rje btsun don yod zhags pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:47b-0: de'am sems can gzhan dkyil 'khor du bcug na rang gi dbang du byed par @47b 'gyur bas na /
T02TD2510.2E:47b-1: nges par zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis //
T02TD2510.2E:47b-4: dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du //
T02TD2510.2E:47b-5: spyan ras gzigs dbang bri bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:47b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:47b-7: 'dir padma lcags sgrog ni 'jig rten dbang phyug de'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:47b-8: aom padmo spho ta bam zhes bya ba'i snying po 'bum bzlas te /
T02TD2510.2E:47b-9: de nas snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:47b-10: de'am yang na bsgrub par bya ba gzhan padma lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya bcing bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:47b-11: dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du //
T02TD2510.2E:47b-12: spyan ras gzigs dbang bri de yi //
T02TD2510.2E:47b-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:47b-14: 'dir padma 'bebs pa ni 'jig rten dbang phyug de'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:47b-15: aom padma ghanda a'a be sha aa: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'bum bzlas te /
T02TD2510.2E:47b-16: mthar mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:47b-17: de nas phyis dkyil 'khor du padma 'bebs pa snga ma bzhin du bris la lha la sogs pa'i sems can dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:47b-19: bcings la padma 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya dang snying po 'dis snod la phab na thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:47b-20: bdag nyid nyid kyis bdag nyid nyid //
T02TD2510.2E:47b-21: padmo zhal bzhi sems dpar yang //
T02TD2510.2E:47b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:47b-23: padma 'dab ma bzhi dang ldan bzhin du padma don yod pa'i dbang phyug zhal bzhi'i sku mdog sngon po dang ser po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:47b-25: ljang gu sna tshogs par bsgoms te goms par byas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:47b-26: bdag nyid ces bya ba 'di nyid kyis rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:47b-27: bdag nyid nyid ces bya ba yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:47b-28: su zhig sgom pa yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:47b-29: bdag nyid nyid kyi zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:47b-30: mdun du yang de bsgom par bya ba ma yin no zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:47b-31: bdag nyid nyid ces bya ba smos so //
T02TD2510.2E:47b-33: don yod pa'i dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor byas la padma bi sha zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:47b-34: bdag nyid nyid kyis bdag nyid nyid padma don yod pa'i dbang phyug gi gzugs su ji srid bdag nyid mthong ba de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:47b-35: de nas ras ris la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs mtshan thog thag bsgoms na /
T02TD2510.2E:48a-1: don yod pa'i dbang phyug lta bu gzugs mang por 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:48a-2: rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gnas //
T02TD2510.2E:48a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni padma ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor byas la dharmma k'a ya padma zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:48a-5: ji srid mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:48a-6: de nas snga ma bzhin du mtshan thog thag bsgoms na ting nge 'dzin padma'i gzugs su 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:48a-7: spyan ras gzigs dbang thor tshugs dbus //
T02TD2510.2E:48a-8: bdag gi sangs rgyas gzugs su ni //
T02TD2510.2E:48a-9: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:48a-10: buddha aa bhi she ka zhes brjod cing spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ral pa'i thor tshugs kyi dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med par bdag nyid kyis bsgoms pa de dang snying po 'di nyid brjod cing nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas ji srid sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su bdag nyid mthong ba de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:48a-11: de nas mtshan thog thag bsgoms na tshe dpag tu med pa dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:48a-12: sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin gnas //
T02TD2510.2E:48a-13: sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin du //
T02TD2510.2E:48a-14: bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni //
T02TD2510.2E:48a-15: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:48a-16: phyis lo ke shva ra zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:48a-17: 'gro ba 'dul bar bdag nyid bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.2E:48a-18: de nyid brjod cing snga ma bzhin du bsgoms nas mthar mtshan thog thag byas na /
T02TD2510.2E:48a-20: de ltar ji lta ba'i mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab pa bstan nas ;
T02TD2510.2E:48a-21: da ni 'di las bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:48a-22: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas /
T02TD2510.2E:48a-23: bsgrub par bya ba dang phan yon bstan pas sgrub pa po spro ba bskyed par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:48a-24: de gnyis ka bstan pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:48a-25: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:48a-26: de nas zhes bya ba ni dngos grub kyi ye shes bstan pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:48a-27: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:48a-28: thams cad kyang yin la phyag rgya yang de yin pas na thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:48b-2: las rnams kyi der nges pa'i ye shes de bslab cing bstan par bya ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:48b-3: de la zhes bya ba smos pa ni rgyas par 'chad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:48b-4: re zhig ces smos pa ni rim pa la ltos pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:48b-5: dang por zhes bya ba ni thog mar ro //
T02TD2510.2E:48b-6: phyag rgya yang yin la chen po yang de yin pas /
T02TD2510.2E:48b-8: sku'i gsang ba'i ngo bo ye shes su gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:48b-9: ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni //
T02TD2510.2E:48b-10: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing //
T02TD2510.2E:48b-11: padmo la gnas sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2510.2E:48b-12: bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid bsgom //
T02TD2510.2E:48b-14: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing //
T02TD2510.2E:48b-15: zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas la ji ltar ri mo bri bar bstan pa de bzhin du de dag gis rjes su 'brang bar bya ba yin pa de'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:48b-16: ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni //
T02TD2510.2E:48b-17: padmo la ngas sems dpar ni //
T02TD2510.2E:48b-18: bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid bsgom //
T02TD2510.2E:48b-22: yang rdo rje thal mo dang /
T02TD2510.2E:48b-23: de nas rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:48b-24: de'i rjes la rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dral te /
T02TD2510.2E:48b-25: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbab par byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:48b-26: tishtha badzra zhes bya la sogs pas dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:48b-28: rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:48b-31: de nas sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya bcings la sdig pa dral lo //
T02TD2510.2E:48b-32: de nas skyil mo krung bcas te /
T02TD2510.2E:48b-33: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba rdo rje padmas mtshan pa'i steng du /
T02TD2510.2E:48b-34: aom h'um hr'i: ho: zhes bya ba yid kyis bris la 'di nyid rgyun du brjod cing chos bdag med pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:48b-35: de nas de nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par rang gi bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:48b-36: de'i steng du de nyid dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:48b-37: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de nyid la sngar bshad pa'i yi ge bzhi dang ldan pa las padma r'a ga'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:48b-38: de nyid kyi snying po zlos shing rdo rje las byung ba'i padma de'i dbus su snying po'i yi ge bkod la /
T02TD2510.2E:49a-0: badzra padma aa ham zhes padma'i nga rgyal bsgoms te badzra sa tva ham zhes yid kyis brjod @49a * //
T02TD2510.2E:49a-2: de padma'i sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i sbyor bas g-yon pa bsnyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor ba'i sems dpar bdag nyid bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:49a-3: yang badzra satva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:49a-4: rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid la /
T02TD2510.2E:49a-6: zhes brjod pas bdag nyid 'gro ba 'dul bar nges par byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:49a-7: ma h'a sa ma ya satva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:49a-8: de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:49a-9: sa ma ya ham zhes brjod do //
T02TD2510.2E:49a-10: de nyid dang sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes bya bas snying ga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:49a-13: spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:49a-15: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:49a-16: de bzhin du padma 'bebs pa'i mthar thug ge bar du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:49a-17: 'gro ba 'dul ba las bshad pa'i cho gas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la gnas pa'i padmar /
T02TD2510.2E:49a-23: sarbba ku la padma sa ma y'am /
T02TD2510.2E:49a-27: padma a'a be sha aa aa aa aa aa zhes yid kyis bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:49a-28: de nyid yid kyis brjod cing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:49a-29: / de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:49a-30: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa sngags de nyid dang bcas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:49a-31: padma 'bebs pa'i sngags de nyid dang bcas pas padma'i dril bur bskyed la /
T02TD2510.2E:49a-32: dril bu'i dbus su padma 'bebs pa'i sngags bsams la badzra ghanda ham zhes bya bas padma dril bu'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:49a-33: badzra satva zhes brjod pas padma'i dril bu de rdo rje sems dpar bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:49a-34: snga ma bzhin du badzra satva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:49a-35: de nas de la padma 'bebs pa'i sngags brjod pas rdo rje sems dpa' dang padma 'bebs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:49a-36: de nas ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa ham /
T02TD2510.2E:49a-37: de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste sa ma ya ham /
T02TD2510.2E:49a-38: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
T02TD2510.2E:49a-39: sa ma ya satvam aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes bya bas snying ga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:49b-1: spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:49b-2: de nas padma'i dril bu bzung la /
T02TD2510.2E:49b-4: de'i sngags kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:49b-5: mdun du 'gro ba 'dul ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bskyed de pa sgom pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:49b-6: bcing ba yang 'dis bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:49b-7: de nas mdun du ye shes sems dpa' ji lta ba bzhin du dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:49b-11: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bltas la yang rang gi lus la dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:49b-15: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:49b-16: rgyab tu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor phab la /
T02TD2510.2E:49b-17: sa ma ya stvam aa ham zhes bya bas rang gi sngags brjod cing de dang de'i rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:49b-18: de nas dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod cing yid kyis legs so zhes sbyor ba yis /
T02TD2510.2E:49b-19: rang gi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcug la /
T02TD2510.2E:49b-20: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:49b-21: de nas rang 'dod pa'i lha de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la /
T02TD2510.2E:49b-22: byin gyis rlob pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs te ;
T02TD2510.2E:49b-23: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur la /
T02TD2510.2E:49b-24: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gsang pa'i mchod pa bzhis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:49b-25: phyag byas te dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blang bar byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:49b-26: de nyid kyis ni padma gzung //
T02TD2510.2E:49b-27: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:49b-28: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
T02TD2510.2E:49b-29: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
T02TD2510.2E:49b-30: bsgom zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:49b-31: phyag rgya chen po thams cad kyi spyi'i bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:49b-32: de nas de dag gi las ni 'di dag yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:49b-33: padma 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi dngos grub kyi 'bras bu ni de'i las so //
T02TD2510.2E:49b-34: sangs rgyas phyag rgya che bcings na //
T02TD2510.2E:49b-35: tshe dpag med dang mnyam par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:49b-36: zhes bya ba smos pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:50a-0: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i sngags kyis rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya @50a * //
T02TD2510.2E:50a-2: gang gi tshe snga ma bzhin du byas pas 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe tshe dpag tu med pa dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:50a-3: rdo rje padmo bcings na ni //
T02TD2510.2E:50a-4: spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:50a-5: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems ma'i gnas kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni rdo rje padma'i yin la /
T02TD2510.2E:50a-6: de'i phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas padma'i gzugs so //
T02TD2510.2E:50a-7: gang gi tshe de bcings pas 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe sangs rgyas padma dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:50a-8: sangs rgyas dbang ni rdo rje rin chen ma'i gnas kyis te /
T02TD2510.2E:50a-9: padma khro gnyer gyi phyag rgya nyid de'i phyag rgya chen po yin la /
T02TD2510.2E:50a-10: de bcings nas gang gi tshe bsgoms nas 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe bde bar gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa des dbang bskur bas de bzhin gshegs pa dang padma khro gnyer dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:50a-12: ces bya ba ni rdo rje chos ma'i gnas te /
T02TD2510.2E:50a-13: padma'i sgrol ma'i phyag rgya chen po nyid de'i phyag rgya chen po yin te /
