T02TD2510.2E:50a-14: gang gi tshe de bsgoms pas 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:50a-15: de'i sgrub pa po la padma sgrol ma'i ting nge 'dzin ster ro //
T02TD2510.2E:50a-16: sna tshogs kyis ni sna tshogs mchog / ces bya ba ni rdo rje pas ma'i gnas kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po nyid yin pas de'i phyag rgya chen po de bcings nas /
T02TD2510.2E:50a-17: gang gis bsgoms pas 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:50a-18: des sgrub pa po la padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi gzugs sna tshogs kyi mchog de ster bar 'gyur ro ;
T02TD2510.2E:50a-20: zhes bya ba ni gzugs thams cad stan nas gdul bya'i 'gro ba rnams la sna tshogs pa'i gzugs 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po ster ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:50a-21: sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur te //
T02TD2510.2E:50a-22: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thor tshugs kyi phyag rgya chen po ni sangs rgyas rin chen te /
T02TD2510.2E:50a-23: de'i dngos grub kyi dbang bskur ba sgrub pa po la ster bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.2E:50a-24: thor tshugs sangs rgyas nyid ster ro //
T02TD2510.2E:50a-26: padma'i sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:50b-0: padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos @50b grub ster ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-1: padma'i khro bo dbang phyug dpal //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-2: zhes bya ba ni padma'i don yod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:50b-3: padma khro bo'i dbang phyug de nyid kyi phun sum tshogs pa ni dpal de 'dod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-4: ji ltar dpal de 'dod par bya ba yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:50b-5: rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gis //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-8: rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug ni rdo rje chos so //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-9: don yod grub pa'i gnas nas lha chen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa de'i phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa de ni rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug ste /
T02TD2510.2E:50b-10: rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mchog gi dngos grub dam pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:50b-11: padmo 'dod pa bya ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sgrub pa po la ster bas na /
T02TD2510.2E:50b-12: padma khro bo'i dbang phyug dpal ster ba yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-13: sangs rgyas dbang gi sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-15: padma'i sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya chen po ni padma'i dbang phyug ste /
T02TD2510.2E:50b-16: de'i dngos grub tu gyur pa'i sangs rgyas nyid ster ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-17: rdo rje padmo grub mchog sbyin //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-18: zhes bya ba ni padmo rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje padmo ste /
T02TD2510.2E:50b-19: de'i dngo grub tu gyur pa mchog tu dge ba'i padmo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub ster ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-20: 'dod pa'i dbang pos ra 'dod ldan ni padma chags pa'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:50b-21: padma chags pa nyid ster ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-22: padma legs pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni yang dag pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-23: legs sbyin pa ni padma legs pa'i ngo bo de ster ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-24: khro gnyer gyis ni khro zhing myur //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-25: zhes bya ba ni padma'i khro gnyer rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po ni khro gnyer ro //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-26: khro ba dang bcas pas sems can dang sems can ma yin pa gsod pa de zhi bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-27: padmo'i nyi ma ni padma'i gzi brjid kyi phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:50b-28: de chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i gzi brjid stsol ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-29: padma'i gzi brjid nyid ster ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-30: padmo'i zla ba ni padmo dpal gyi phyag rgya chen pos khyab pa de ni mdangs chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-31: bzhad pas rab tu bzhad pa thob //
T02TD2510.2E:50b-32: ces bya ba ni bzhad pa'i phyag rgya chen pos bzhad pas rab tu dga' zhing bzang ba'i bzhad pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:50b-33: padma bzhad pa'i ngo bo de ster ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-0: sgrol bas ni chos kyi padma'i phyag rgya chen po des dngos grub mchog rdo rje chos kyi ting nge 'dzin @51a * //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-2: padmo'i ral gri ni padma rnon po'i phyag rgya chen po des padma rnon po lta bu'i dngos grub dam pa skal pa bzang po'i shin tu srid pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-3: skal bzang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-4: srid ba shin tu grub pa yin //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-6: / mgrin sngon padma'i rgyu'i phyag rgya chen po de'i 'gugs pa chen pos padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'gugs zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-7: gos dkar ni padma gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-8: de'i dngos grub ni padma gsung gi dngos grub ster ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-9: padma gar gyi dbang phyug ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-10: de 'grub pa ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dngos grub ster ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-11: mi 'jigs pa ni padma srung ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-12: de grub par gyur pas rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa padma'i bsrung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-13: rab gtum gyis ni ma rungs 'dul //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-14: zhes bya ba ni padma'i gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya chen pos bdud thams cad 'joms pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-15: padma'i khu tshur ni padma'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya chen po rab tu legs par sgrub par byed pa ni rab sgrub byed de /
T02TD2510.2E:51a-16: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa sgrub par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-18: de ltar phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes 'bras bu dang bcas pa bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:51a-19: da ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:51a-20: de nas zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslabs pa de'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-21: padma'i rigs ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-22: de'i ye shes ni bslab pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-23: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje dbyings su bshad pa'i rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:51a-25: mthe bo dang mthe chung gnyis mnyam par bsgreng ba dang ;
T02TD2510.2E:51a-26: yi ge hr'i:'i sngags brjod pa dang bcas pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgyar bshad do //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-27: phyag rgya 'di ni chos dam tshig / ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chos so //
T02TD2510.2E:51a-28: de'i dam tshig ni rgyur gyur pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:51a-30: chos ni rab tu thob par byed /
T02TD2510.2E:51b-1: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos yin la /
T02TD2510.2E:51b-2: de phul du byung ba ster ba ni sangs rgyas chos ni rab thob byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:51b-4: gang gi tshe phyag rgya 'di bcings nas yi ge hr'i: brjod cing rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsgoms la ;
T02TD2510.2E:51b-5: de'i tshe de'i rnal 'byor pa phyag rgya 'dis sangs rgyas kyi chos thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:51b-6: rdo rje bsdams pa dam bcings nas //
T02TD2510.2E:51b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdzub mo dang gung mo dang srin lag bsnyams pa 'di rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya gnyis pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:51b-8: sangs rgyas padma nyid 'grub par byed pa'o//
T02TD2510.2E:51b-9: ji skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:51b-11: aom badzra padma aa ta ma hr'i: zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms nas /
T02TD2510.2E:51b-12: gang gi tshe rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms shing bzlas pa byed pa de'i tshe rnam par snang mdzad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:51b-13: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:51b-14: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la gung mo gnyis sems ma rdo rje ma ltar bsnyams pa 'di rdo rje sems ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:51b-15: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas kyi rdo rje padma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:51b-17: ces bya ba gang gi tshe phyag na rdo rjer bsgoms pa de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:51b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:51b-20: 'di ni rig pa dam pa yi //
T02TD2510.2E:51b-21: phyag rgya yin te rdo rje 'grub //
T02TD2510.2E:51b-23: de las gung mo rin chen 'dra //
T02TD2510.2E:51b-24: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rdo rje sems ma'i rig pa dam pa'i phyag rgya'i gung mo gnyis kyi tshul las rin po che'i dbyibs su byas pa ni ;
T02TD2510.2E:51b-25: rdo rje rin chen ma'i gnas dang /
T02TD2510.2E:51b-26: rdo rje snying po'i sangs rgyas la dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:51b-28: rdo rje snying po'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:51b-29: aom badzra ratna autta ma tra zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:51b-30: gang gi tshe rdo rje snying po bdag nyid bsgoms pa de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:51b-33: rdo rje rin chen rab grub byed //
T02TD2510.2E:51b-35: gung mo padma'i tshul du byas //
T02TD2510.2E:51b-36: padma'i dngos grub rab thob byed //
T02TD2510.2E:51b-38: rdo rje sems ma'i rdo rje rig pa dam pa'i phyag rgya'i gzugs las gung mo gnyis padma'i 'dab ma ltar byas pa ni rdo rje chos ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:52a-0: @52a * // padma'i padma rdo rje spyan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:52a-1: rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje spyan gyi rnal 'byor byas la 'di bcing ste /
T02TD2510.2E:52a-2: aom badzra bi totta ma hr'i: zhes bya ba bzlas shing /
T02TD2510.2E:52a-3: gang gi tshe rdo rje spyan bsgoms nas 'grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe padma'i dngos grub 'di rab tu thob par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:52a-4: rdo rje spyan ster bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:52a-5: rdo rje thal mo bsdams byas nas //
T02TD2510.2E:52a-6: rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:52a-8: rdo rje thal mo bcings pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:52a-9: rdo rje las ma'i gnas su sna tshogs padma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.2E:52a-10: rdo rje sna tshogs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:52a-11: rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i rdo rje snang tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:52a-13: aom badzra bi sha autta ma aa zhes bya ba bzlas la /
T02TD2510.2E:52a-14: gang gi tshe rdo rje sna tshogs su bdag nyid bsgoms na /
T02TD2510.2E:52a-15: de'i tshe grub par 'gyur ba gang yin pa des rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.2E:52a-16: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:52a-17: chos kyi rdo rje bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:52a-18: skad cig gis ni dam tshig 'grub //
T02TD2510.2E:52a-20: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
T02TD2510.2E:52a-21: gung mo bsnyams la rdo rjer bya //
T02TD2510.2E:52a-22: chos kyi rdo rje zhes grags pa //
T02TD2510.2E:52a-23: dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub byed pa//
T02TD2510.2E:52a-24: 'di dam du bcings pas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du zhugs na skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe 'grub cing rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:52a-26: gang gi tshe slob dpon gyis /
T02TD2510.2E:52a-27: aom badzra padma sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:52a-28: ji skad bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje chos ma 'di ji lta ba bzhin du bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:52a-29: aom padma sa ma ya h'um zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs par 'gyur ba de'i tshe skad cig ma de nyid la dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:52a-30: de bzhin du slob mas kyang zhugs pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:52a-31: kha cig ni dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyag rgya yin no zhes zer te /
T02TD2510.2E:52a-33: gang gi phyir rigs kyi dam tshig 'di dang rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'dis dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa nyid yin gyi sprul pa ni ma yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:52b-0: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor sprul par byed pa ma yin gyi phyag rgya chen po nyid kyis dkyil 'khor @52b sprul par gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:52b-1: rdo rje bsdams nas mdzub bsnyams pa //
T02TD2510.2E:52b-2: sangs rgyas dngos grub rab thob byed //
T02TD2510.2E:52b-4: rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis bsnyams la khab ltar byas pa 'di dang /
T02TD2510.2E:52b-5: buddha h'um zhes bya ba'i snying pos dkyil 'khor ram rang gi lus sam ras la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sbyan drangs nas bsgrub par byas na /
T02TD2510.2E:52b-6: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi dngos grub rab tu thob par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:52b-7: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //
T02TD2510.2E:52b-8: zhes pa la de ltar rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:52b-10: padma 'bebs pa'i bar ni sems dpa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:52b-11: sems dpa' de dag gi dam tshig 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ni sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:52b-12: khyad par ni gang dang gang gis phyag rgya 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya gsal bar ston pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:52b-13: rdo rje thal mo bsdams nas kyang ;
T02TD2510.2E:52b-14: / gung mo mnyam bsnyams de bzhin du //
T02TD2510.2E:52b-16: gung mo gnyis po de bsnyams par byas pa ni gung mo bsnyams pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:52b-17: gung mo gnyis bsnyams nas bsgreng ba gang yin pa de ni gung mo bsnyams nas phye ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:52b-19: mthe chung mthe bo phye ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:52b-20: zhes bya ba ni mthe'u chung dang mthe bo gnyis phye la phyi rol du brkyang nas /
T02TD2510.2E:52b-21: padma 'dab ma bzhi ba ltar byas pa gang yin pa de ni /
T02TD2510.2E:52b-22: mthe chung mthe bo phye ba ni sna tshogs padmar bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:52b-24: rdo rje thal mo las gung mo gnyis bsnyams la /
T02TD2510.2E:52b-25: mthe chung dang mthe bo so sor brkyang ba ni ;
T02TD2510.2E:52b-26: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam tshig phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:52b-27: de las mthe bo gnyis bsnol te //
T02TD2510.2E:52b-28: dbus kyi rdo rje spyi gtsug phud //
T02TD2510.2E:52b-29: mdzub gnyis rtse sprad bkug pa'i gzugs //
T02TD2510.2E:52b-30: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya nyid las mthe bo gnyis bsnol te mdzub mo gnyis bkug la /
T02TD2510.2E:52b-31: gung mo gnyis bsnyams te bsgreng ba'i rgyab tu btsugs te /
T02TD2510.2E:52b-32: gtsug phud sangs rgyas yin par bshad pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:52b-33: gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:52b-34: rdo rje bsdams pa dam bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:52b-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa dam por brtan par bsdams pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-1: bo gnyis bsnyams rtse btud nas /
T02TD2510.2E:53a-2: mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse mo sprad nas kha thur du bstan nas bkan te bzhag pa gang yin pa da ni ting nge 'dzin padma'o //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-3: thal mo padmor mnyam sbyar la //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-4: mdzub mo rdo rje bsnyams nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-5: mdzub mo gnyis bsnyams na brkyang bar bya'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:53a-6: / mthe bo ngos la sbyar ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-7: zhes bya ba ni mthe bo gnyis kyi kha phye ba de ni nges pa'i dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-8: rdo rje thal mo mnyam par spyar la mdzub mo gnyis bsnyams te /
T02TD2510.2E:53a-9: bsdams nas mthe bo gnyis kha phye ba ni padma don yod pa'i dbang phyug gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-10: rdo rje bsdams pa bsdams nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa brtan por bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:53a-12: legs par bkan te mthe bo gnyis padma'i 'dab ma ltar byas pa ni sangs rgyas padmo'o //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-13: mthe bo gnyis ni rdo rjer bsnyams //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar la g-yas pa'i mdzub mo ral gri ltar byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:53a-15: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:53a-16: mthe chung gnyis so sor phye la gung mo dang srin lag gnyis padma'i 'dab ma ltar byas pa ni padma'i rgyal po'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-17: thal mo mnyam par rab sbyar la //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thal mo mnyam par rab tu sbyar la g-yon pa'i mthe bo g-yas pa'i mthe pos bzung nas /
T02TD2510.2E:53a-19: de nas g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyur byas pas /
T02TD2510.2E:53a-20: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bzung nas /
T02TD2510.2E:53a-21: g-yon logs nas 'dren pa ltar byed pa ni padma chags pa'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-22: thal mo sbyar nas mnyam par bkan //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-23: legs pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-24: zhes bya ba ni thal mo sbyar nas mnyam par bkan la /
T02TD2510.2E:53a-25: mdzub mo dang mthe bo gnyis kyis legs so sbyin pa'i tshul du byed pa ni padmo lags pa'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-26: thal mo mnyam par rab sbyar la //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thal mo mnyam bar dam du sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs gsum pa bkug nas /
T02TD2510.2E:53a-28: mig lta bur byas la mthe'u chung gnyis phye la mdzod spu'i phyogs su gzhag pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:53a-29: padma'i khro gnyer rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-30: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-31: sor mo thams cad dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2510.2E:53a-32: snying gar rab tu brkyang ba ni//
T02TD2510.2E:53b-0: @53b padma nyi ma yin par bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:53b-1: rdo rje bsdams pa dam por byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:53b-2: sor mo thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du snying gar rab tu brkyang nas rab tu bskor ba ni padma nyi ma'o //
T02TD2510.2E:53b-3: thal mo rab tu dam sbyar la //
T02TD2510.2E:53b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mnyam pa'i thal mo'i mdzub mo gnyis rin po che 'dra bar byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:53b-5: dpung pa spyi bor rab tu brkyang ste /
T02TD2510.2E:53b-6: bzhag pa'i phyag rgya 'di ni padma'i zla ba'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:53b-7: rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor gzhag / kha dang bcas pas rab brkyang nas //
T02TD2510.2E:53b-8: nyid kyi kha nas dgod pa dang //
T02TD2510.2E:53b-9: kha ni mchu gcig nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:53b-10: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la spyi bor bzhag ste /
T02TD2510.2E:53b-11: sor mo'i rtse mo thams cad brkyang nas dgod pa'i tshul du byed pa ni padma bzhad pa'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:53b-13: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du ting nge 'dzin padma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:53b-14: mthe bo gnyis bsnyams te kha gyen du bstan nas bzhag pa ni padma sgrol ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:53b-15: padma sgrol ma'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2510.2E:53b-16: mdzub gnyis padma'i tshul du bcings //
T02TD2510.2E:53b-17: ral gri'i tshul du byas pa 'di //
T02TD2510.2E:53b-18: padmo ral gri'i phyag rgya yin //
T02TD2510.2E:53b-19: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i padma'i sgrol ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:53b-20: mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs gsum pa bkug la padma ral gri'i tshul du byas pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcod pa'i tshul du byed pa 'di ni padma rnon po'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:53b-21: mthe'u chud padma chen po bya //
T02TD2510.2E:53b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thal mo sbyar ba'i mthe'u chung gnyis padmar bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:53b-23: mthe bo gnyis dbyig pa ltar bsgreng la /
T02TD2510.2E:53b-24: mdzub mo g-yas pa dang g-yon pa bskum ste /
T02TD2510.2E:53b-25: gung mo dang srin lag gnyis cung zad brkyang la /
T02TD2510.2E:53b-26: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings pa ni padma khyab 'jug gi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:53b-27: rdo rje bsdams pa thal mo dam byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:53b-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje thal mo dam du bcings nas mthe bo g-yas pas rdo rje bsdams pa'i tshul du ci nus par bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:53b-29: g-yas pa'i aom gyi nang du gzhug / g-yon pa'i mdzub mthe ba bzlas pa bya //
T02TD2510.2E:53b-30: zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i mthe bo dang mdzub mo gnyis bzlas pa'i phreng ba 'dren pa'i tshul du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-0: sor kun chu skyes kha bye @54a * //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-2: zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'i sor mo rnams cung zad kha bye ba'i tshul du byed pa padma gsung ba'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-3: rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-5: g-yon dang g-yas nas de bzhin du 'gying ba dang bcas pas g-yas dang g-yon gyi logs su gar byed pas bskor nas phyis spyi bor 'jog pa ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug go //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-6: rdo rje thal mo dam byas la //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-7: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-8: de bzhin rtse kun kha bye ba //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-9: zhes bya ba ni sor mo thams cad brkyang nas yongs su bskor te padmor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:54a-10: padmo'i tshul gyis rdo rje thal mo bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-11: rdo rje thal mo las sor mo thams cad kha phye la padma ltar byas nas //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-12: phyis rdo rje thal mo bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:54a-13: snying ga'i phyogs su gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni padma'i bsrung ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-14: rdo rje thal mo dam byas la //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-15: gsang ba'i gnod sbyin tshul du ni //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-16: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo'i mdzub mo gnyis bskum la gung mo gnyis mthe bo gnyis mthe bo gnyis kyis mnan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:54a-17: zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs pa bzhin du yang khar bzhag la gsang ba'i gnod sbyin gyi tshul du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-18: gsang ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sbyor ba 'di dang ldan pas na gsang ba'i gnod sbyin gyi tshul du'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-19: thal mo sbyar te brkyang nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-20: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo brkyang la rang gi khar gzhag pa ni padma'i gnod sbyin zhes bya ba padma gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-21: rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-22: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam du bcings la ;
T02TD2510.2E:54a-23: gung mo gnyis ni phyir bkug ste //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-24: rang gi mthe bo rgyab mnan pa //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-25: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi khu tshur de'i phyag rgya'i gung mo gnyis bskum pas rang gi mthe bo gnyis kyi rgyab mnan pa 'di ni padma'i khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-26: rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul du ni //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-27: rdo rje thal mo las byung ba //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-28: mchod pa'i lha mo thams cad kyi //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-29: dam tshig mchog rnams bcings pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-30: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo las /
T02TD2510.2E:54a-31: snying gar mthe bo bsnyams la gzhag / rab tu brkyang ba phreng ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54a-32: thal mo sbyar ba kha nas dbyung //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-0: gar la thal sbyar spyi bor gzhag / rdo rje bcings pa thur @54b du blugs //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-1: rang gi thal sbyar gyen du gtor //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-2: ma the bo bcings ba rab tu bsdams //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-3: rab tu brkyang ba byugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-4: zhes bya ba 'di dag padma'i sgeg mo la sogs pa nas padma'i dri'i mthar thug pa rnam pa brgyad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-5: rdo rje bsdams pa dam bcas la //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-6: mdzub mo gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-7: bkug nas rtse mo sbyar ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-8: rta mgrin de ni yin par bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-9: ces bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mdzub mo gnyis rta'i gdong pa lta bur byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:54b-10: de'i rtse mo mdun du yang dang yang brkyang bskum ston pa ni rta mgrin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-11: padma'i thal mo mnyam sbyar la //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-12: mdzub gnyis mdud pa mdud ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-13: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun cung zad bkug nas lcags kyu'i tshul du bzung la mdud pa mdud pa ni don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-14: mtheb mdzub lcags sgrog 'dra bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-15: zhes bya ba ni thal mo cung zad kha 'byed pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bo gnyis lcags sgrog 'ching ba'i tshul du byed pa 'di ni padma lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-16: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-17: padmo thal mo mnyam sbyar la //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-18: srin lag mthe chung gnyis bar du //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-19: mthe bo gnyis bcug dam du btsir //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-20: zhes bya ba ni thal mo cung zad kha bye ba'i nang du rang gi ma the'u chung gnyis kyi bar du mthe bo gnyis bcug la btsir ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:54b-21: padma 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-22: byams pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni /
T02TD2510.2E:54b-23: ji ltar bris pa'i rjes su 'brang bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-24: dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang bshad zin to //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-25: de nas padmo'i rigs ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-26: chos zhes bya ba ni mtshon pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:54b-27: yi ge'i bdag nyid phyag rgya'i ye shes su 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-28: ye shes ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ljags la rdo rje dgong bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-31: rdo rje chos ma rnams kyi ljags la ni hr'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:54b-35: gtsug phud sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas padma dbang bskur ba'i padma'i rin po che ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:54b-36: padma'i khro gnyer rnams la shr'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-5: padma sgrol ma rnams la gi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-9: padma'i nges pa'i dbang phyug dang sna tshogs padma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:55a-10: padma gar gyi dbang phyug ma rnams la bi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-12: padma'i gnod sbyin la ni shdi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-25: ganda aa aa zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:55a-26: mthar yi ge hr'i dang bcas pas sgeg mo la sogs pa'i ljags la bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-27: byams pa la sogs pa rnams la ni rang gi rig pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-28: padma'i khu tshur gnyis byas la //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-29: las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-30: zhes bya ba ni padma'i khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi khu tshur gnyis su byas la las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:55a-31: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:55a-32: g-yon pa'i padma mdzub mo ni //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-33: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-34: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya che //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-35: sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-36: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-37: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i thal mo kha phye ba'i tshul du byed pa ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-38: bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yis //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-39: sangs rgyas padma dang rdo rje chos ma gnyis kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-40: lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-42: mda' 'phang ba yi tshul dang ni //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-44: legs so zhes pa snying gar gzhag / padma legs pa'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-47: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-48: padma'i khro gnyer rin chen dang /
T02TD2510.2E:55a-49: padma'i dbang bskur ma dang gnyis kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-50: snying gar nyi ma bstan par bya ;
T02TD2510.2E:55a-52: g-yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-54: de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:55a-56: yang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i thal mo phye ba ni padma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD2510.2E:55a-58: padma'i padmo dang gsum gyi yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-0: snying gar @55b g-yon pa'i ral gri mdung //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-2: mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-4: rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-6: rdo rje gar bskor bkrol ba yis //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-7: thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor gzhag / padma nges pa'i dbang phyug dang /
T02TD2510.2E:55b-8: padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /
T02TD2510.2E:55b-9: sna tshogs padma dang gsum gyi yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-13: khu tshur gyi nyis ni mnan pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-15: rdo rje bsgying pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-16: bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-17: phreng ba bcing dang kha nas dbyung //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-18: rdo rje gar ni bskur ba yin //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-19: padma bcing ba thur du blugs //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-21: mthe bo bsnyams te rab tu bsdams //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-22: rab tu brkyang nas byug pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-23: mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-24: mthe'u chung las te lcags kyu che //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-25: mkhrig ma mdud la mdzub gnyis mdud //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-26: rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te gnas //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-28: byams pa la sogs pa rnams kyi ni yi ge kri las rang gi snying gar sna tshogs padma bsams nas phyag rgya chen po 'ching ba'i tshul du byed pa nyid las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-30: de'i dam tshig ni padma'i rigs so //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-31: de'i rtog pa las byung bas na rtog pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-32: gzhan las ches shin tu khyad par du gyur pa'i gzugs thams cad ston pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2510.2E:55b-33: gsal bas na rgyal bo ste ;
T02TD2510.2E:55b-34: de'i phyir rtog pa'i rgyal po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-35: de ltar rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs pa ni rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi mthar thug pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:55b-36: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i bshad pa de kho na nyid snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
T02TD2510.2E:55b-38: // / de ltar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:55b-39: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:56a-0: da ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba'i sems @56a * //
T02TD2510.2E:56a-1: can gyi khams rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:56a-2: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:56a-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:56a-4: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:56a-5: dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:56a-6: 'dir dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
T02TD2510.2E:56a-7: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:56a-8: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po la ltos pas na yang zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:56a-9: bcom ldan 'das ni rnam par snang mdzad do ;
T02TD2510.2E:56a-10: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni /
T02TD2510.2E:56a-11: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa la mthar thug pa'i padma'i rigs so //
T02TD2510.2E:56a-12: dran pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos so //
T02TD2510.2E:56a-14: de'i dam tshig ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i padma'i rigs de'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'o //
T02TD2510.2E:56a-15: de las byung ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i thugs ka'i rdo rje padma las byung ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:56a-16: de skad du bshad pa des byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul par nus pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:56a-17: padma bzhin du sgrib pa rnams kyis gos pa med pa'i ming 'di skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rigs sprul par mdzad pa'i rjes thogs la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs pa ni rig pa dam pa bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:56a-18: de ltar phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02TD2510.2E:56a-25: nges pa'i dbang phyug rnams kyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:56a-26: rig pa dam pa gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:56a-27: des kyang padma dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i lha mo la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:56a-28: padma 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi gzungs rnams 'jig rten dbang phyug gi thugs ka'i padma las byung bas sems can gyi khams thams cad gzungs kyi ye shes kyi rnam par sbyangs nas slar log ste /
T02TD2510.2E:56b-0: rdo rje dbyings kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du padma dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i @56b gzungs rnams mchod rten la sogs pa'i gzungs kyi nang du chud nas bzhugs so zhes shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:56b-1: yang de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:56b-2: aom karma sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:56b-3: de nas bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:56b-4: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams ni dkyil 'khor der dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:56b-5: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:56b-6: de nas zhes bya ba ni skabs su bab pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:56b-7: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rang gi rigs ni padma'i rigs te dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:56b-9: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:56b-10: rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:56b-11: de la 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnal 'byor pas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:56b-12: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i snying po dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rang gi snying po rnams kyis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed cing go rims bzhin du bzhag la /
T02TD2510.2E:56b-13: gzungs kyi lha so so dang bdag nyid lhan cig gnyis su med par bsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:56b-14: gzungs kyi rig pa re re zhing yang bzlas pa khri bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:56b-15: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug ste ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:56b-16: dkyil 'khor de zhag bdun bsgom pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:56b-17: yang na gnas gzhan du bsgom par bya ba de lta bus ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyod par gyur pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:56b-18: de nas yang dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la /
T02TD2510.2E:57a-0: ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum pa bsgom pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bshad ma thag pa byas @57a * //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-2: de nas zhes bya ba ni rgyu de'i phyir gyi don to //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-3: gang gi phyir 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med na des 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams rjes su bzung bar mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu de'i phyir rab tu bshad par bya'o /
T02TD2510.2E:57a-4: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-6: de ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
T02TD2510.2E:57a-7: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-9: sprul pa'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni 'dir rdo rje dbyings te /
T02TD2510.2E:57a-10: de dang 'dra bas na rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-11: padma'i gsang ba zhes bshad pa'o//
T02TD2510.2E:57a-13: padma ni padma'i rigs rnams so //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-14: gsang ba ni padma'i gsang ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-15: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-16: zhes bya ba na 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbyings su de'i rig pa zlos shing bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-17: nam mkha'i phyogs nas mchod rten gyi gzugs kyis phab la bris pa'i mchod rten gyi gzugs dang gcig tu bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-18: de bzhin du phyag rgya gzhan la yang rang gi mtshan ma rnams phab nas gcig tu bsre bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-19: de'i dbus padma bzang po la //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-20: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-21: de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-22: zhes bya ba ni de'i phyogs bzhir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-23: dam tshig mchog rnams zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:57a-24: dam tshig de'i mchog ni dam tshig mchog ste /
T02TD2510.2E:57a-25: rigs thams cad bsdus pa na dam pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-26: gang gi phyir so so'i phyag rgya rnams kyis rigs thams cad la rgyas 'debs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-27: lhag ma bzhin zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:57a-28: ji ltar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du bris pa de bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-29: rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-30: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-31: sna tshogs gzugs mchog dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-32: zhes bya ba 'gro ba 'dul ba sna tshogs kyi gzugs can de gtso bo mchog gi dkyil 'khor ni sna tshogs gzugs mchog dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-33: de yi dbus su padma yi //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-34: bskor ba'i padmo bri bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:57a-36: de la dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su ni /
T02TD2510.2E:57a-37: dbus kyi cha'i padma la rdo rje padma de la tshad phra mo'i rdo rje padma der sprul pas yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:57b-0: de yi phyogs rnams thams cad @57b du ;
T02TD2510.2E:57b-1: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2510.2E:57b-3: lha thams cad kyi gnas rnams su kha khyer gsum pa'i khri la gnas pa'i padma bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:57b-4: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor de'i dbus kyi padma la rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su mchod rten dbu nub tu bstan pa 'od zer dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:57b-5: de'i shar phyogs kyi cha la rdo rje sems ma'i gnas su rdo rje rtse lnga pa dbu shar du bstan pa chos kyi rdo rje ma'o //
T02TD2510.2E:57b-6: lho phyogs su padmas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu dbu lho phyogs su bstan pa sangs rgyas dbang bskur ma'o //
T02TD2510.2E:57b-7: nub phyogs su rdo rje padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa mdog dmar skya dbu nub tu bstan pa padma'i padma dang dam tshig sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i ming gnyis dang ldan pa /
T02TD2510.2E:57b-8: byang phyogs su padma 'dab ma bzhi pa sna tshogs pa'i mdog can dbu byang du bstan pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:57b-9: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gnas su padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa mdog dmar skya sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje padma la de las gzhan pa'i padmas yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:57b-10: padma sangs rgyas kyi gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dbu shar du bltas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:57b-11: padmo rgyal po'i gnas su padma'i lcags kyu dang /
T02TD2510.2E:57b-15: padma chags pa'i gnas su padma'i mda' gzhu /
T02TD2510.2E:57b-16: padma legs pa'i gnas su padma dang bcas pa'i se gol gtogs pa'i khu chur gnyis so //
T02TD2510.2E:57b-17: gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi gnas su 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ral pa'i dbus su gnas pa'i rdo rje padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:57b-18: padma khro gnyer gyi gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu /
T02TD2510.2E:57b-19: padma nyi ma'i gnas su padma'i lte ba la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2510.2E:57b-20: padma'i rgyal mtshan gyi gnas su zla ba phyed pa la brten pa'i padmas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtse mo can gyi rgyal mtshan /
T02TD2510.2E:57b-21: padma bzhad pa'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis kyi bar du chud pa'i so'i phreng ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:57b-22: padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas su padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i padma'i rdo rje padma'o //
T02TD2510.2E:57b-23: padma sgrol ma'i gnas su rdo rje padma /
T02TD2510.2E:57b-24: padma rnon po'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i ral gri /
T02TD2510.2E:57b-25: padma rgyu'i gnas su padma'i lte ba la rdo rje 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:58a-0: @58a * // dung dang be con dang padma'o //
T02TD2510.2E:58a-1: padma gsung pa'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i lce /
T02TD2510.2E:58a-2: padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi gnas su sna tshogs padma 'dab ma bzhi pa /
T02TD2510.2E:58a-3: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi gnas su gar byed pa'i lag pa bzung ba'i sna tshogs padma /
T02TD2510.2E:58a-4: padma srung ba'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i go cha /
T02TD2510.2E:58a-5: padma gnod sbyin gyi gnas su mche ba gnyis kyi rtsa ba padmas mtshan pa /
T02TD2510.2E:58a-6: padma khu tshur gyi gnas su padma'i dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis bzung ba'i padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:58a-7: padma sgeg mo'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis /
T02TD2510.2E:58a-8: padma'i phreng ba'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba /
T02TD2510.2E:58a-9: padma glu ma'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i pi wang /
T02TD2510.2E:58a-10: padma gar ma'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang bcas pa'i lag pas gar skor ba /
T02TD2510.2E:58a-11: bdug pa ma'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i spos snod /
T02TD2510.2E:58a-12: me tog ma'i gnas su me tog gi za ma tog //
T02TD2510.2E:58a-13: mar me ma'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i mchod sdong /
T02TD2510.2E:58a-14: dri ma'i gnas su dri'i dung chos padmas mtshan pa /
T02TD2510.2E:58a-15: rta mgrin gyi gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i lcags kyu /
T02TD2510.2E:58a-16: don yod zhags pa'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i zhags pa /
T02TD2510.2E:58a-17: lcags sgrog gi gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog / padma 'bebs pa'i gnas su padmas mtshan pa'i dril bu /
T02TD2510.2E:58a-18: byams pa la sogs pa rnams ni dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i mtshan ma sngar bshad pa'i rigs pas khyams su bri bar bya'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:58a-19: / mtshan ma thams cad kyang 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang bcas pa shar dang /
T02TD2510.2E:58a-22: byang du mgo bltas pa go rims bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:58a-23: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:58a-24: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ji lta ba bzhin du sgo dbye ba byas la bum pa thams cad dang bum pa gang ba ji lta ba'i gnas su bzhag la /
T02TD2510.2E:58a-25: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rig pa rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du bzlas nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas /
T02TD2510.2E:58b-0: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor @58b las bshad pa'i rdo rje chos ma bcings la zhugs nas /
T02TD2510.2E:58b-1: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i padma brtul zhugs 'dzin pa'i bar du byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:58b-2: bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa yang byas nas dkyil 'khor rdo rjes bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:58b-3: de nas bsdu ba byas la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa'i rjes thogs nyid la /
T02TD2510.2E:58b-4: 'dir zhes bya ba ni padma rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du'o //
T02TD2510.2E:58b-5: dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2510.2E:58b-6: de la dgug pa ni padma'i rigs kyi gzungs rnams rang rang gi sgo dang nye bar rta mgrin gyi las kyi phyag rgyas dgug la gzhag pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:58b-7: sogs pa smos pa ni gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:58b-11: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:58b-12: dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:58b-14: gnang ba ma nos pa ni dgug pa la sogs pa dang por byas pa gang yin pa de ni dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:58b-15: bshad ma thag pa de byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:58b-16: padma'i slob ma ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste /
T02TD2510.2E:58b-17: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs su byin gyis brlab po //
T02TD2510.2E:58b-18: slob ma ni padma'i slob ma'o //
T02TD2510.2E:58b-19: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba'i snying po dang bcas pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas slob dpon gyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:58b-20: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i ji lta ba'i cho ga de dang gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rje chos ma bcings la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:58b-21: 'di skad du khyod kyis gsang ba 'di su la yang ma smra shig ces bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:58b-22: de nas phab nas 'di skad du khyod kyi rmi lam du ci snang zhes dris nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:58b-23: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje chu btung ba la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:58b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la /
T02TD2510.2E:58b-25: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig / ces bya ba'i cho gas snga ma bzhin du dbab par byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:58b-26: de nas phab la 'di skad du /
T02TD2510.2E:58b-27: rdo rje dam tshig gis khyod kyi rmi lam du ci zhig snang zhes dris pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:59a-2: nag po dang ljang gu rnams sna tshogs pa ci zhig snang zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:59a-3: ci lta ba bzhin du gdong g-yogs bkrol te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:59a-4: me tog gi phreng ba dor la /
T02TD2510.2E:59a-5: de nas de blangs te spyi bor bcings nas /
T02TD2510.2E:59a-6: de'i rjes la gdong g-yogs bkrol pa'i sngags kyis gdong g-yogs bcings pa bkrol lo zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:59a-7: ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:59a-8: yang de nas sor bzhi pa'i tshad kyi yu ba dang bcas pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi padma 'chad pas g-yogs te /
T02TD2510.2E:59a-9: slob ma la dbang bskur nas /
T02TD2510.2E:59a-10: ming gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pas kyang dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:59a-11: de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:59a-12: slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:59a-13: da ni padma'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes rnams ni padma'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa slob dpon rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:59a-14: de ltar rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang snod ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:59a-15: dngos grub kyang yin la dam pa yang yin pas na dngos grub dam pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:59a-19: padma'i don yod dbang phyug rnams kyi dngos grub de thob pa ni bsgrub pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:59a-20: der nges pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:59a-21: spyan ras gzigs dbang sems dpa' che //
T02TD2510.2E:59a-23: rigs kyi bdag po ci 'dra zhig bstan ce na /
T02TD2510.2E:59a-24: spyan ras gzigs dbang zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:59a-25: gzugs thams cad ston pa'i rang bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:59a-26: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni rang nyid do //
T02TD2510.2E:59a-27: rang nyid ni ngo bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:59a-28: bsgoms nas phyag rgya chen po yis //
T02TD2510.2E:59a-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam pa de lta bu'i phyag rgya chen po bsgoms pas mchog gi dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:59a-31: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho gas rang gi lha'i chog byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:59b-0: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i @59b rig pa rnams kyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:59b-1: de nas aom padma satva aa ham siddhya hi /
T02TD2510.2E:59b-2: zhes bya ba'i snying po dang thun pa zhi'i sbyor bas gang gi tsho rgyun mi 'chad par bsgoms par gyur pa de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:59b-3: de'i gzugs su bdag nyid mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:59b-4: de bas zla ba nyal mtshan thog thag bsgoms pas 'gro ba 'dul ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:59b-5: sangs rgyas dbang gi dam tshig ni //
T02TD2510.2E:59b-6: zhes bya ba ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug phud kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:59b-7: mnyam par gzhag pas brtan byas te //
T02TD2510.2E:59b-8: zhes bya ba la mnyam par gzhag pa ni g-yeng ba med pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:59b-9: bdag nyid nyid kyis sgom pa goms par byas nas mchog dam pa sangs rgyas gtsug phud kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:59b-10: de ltar rang 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor byas /
T02TD2510.2E:59b-11: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug phud kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:59b-12: gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi rig pa brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:59b-13: gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su bdag nyid bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:59b-14: aom buddha aa bhi she ka ham siddhya m'am zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:59b-15: gang gi tshe nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas rgyun mi 'chad par bsgoms par gyur pa de'i tshe gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su bdag nyid mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:59b-16: de nas snga ma bzhin du mtshan thog thag bsgom pa byas na des gtsug phud sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:59b-18: zhes bya ba la padmo'i padma ni padma'i ting nge 'dzin no //
T02TD2510.2E:59b-19: padma'i padmor sems dpa' chen por bdag nyid kyis bsgoms na padma'i padma'i dngos grub dam pa rnal 'byor pas thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:59b-20: snga ma bzhin du lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:59b-21: phyis padma rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rig pa brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:59b-22: padmo padma'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pas /
T02TD2510.2E:59b-25: aom dharmma sa ma dhi ra ham siddha ho zhes zlos shing padma'i ting nge 'dzin du bdag nyid bsgoms nas /
T02TD2510.2E:60a-0: gang gi tshe nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor @60a * //
T02TD2510.2E:60a-1: bas rgyun mi 'chad par bsgoms pa de'i tshe de'i ngo bor mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:60a-2: de nas snga ma bzhin du mtshan thog thag bsgoms na padma'i ting nge 'dzin dang 'dra bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:60a-3: rang byung gdon mi za ba'i zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:60a-4: gdon mi za ba'i dbang phyug ni mchog ste /
T02TD2510.2E:60a-5: padma don yod dbang phyug gi rang bzhin gyi las kyi phyag rgya de nyid ni rang byung ste /
T02TD2510.2E:60a-6: cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs nas rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:60a-7: myur zhing mgyogs par padma gdon mi za ba'i dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:60a-9: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:60a-10: phyis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i padma gdon mi za ba'i dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po bcings te de'i rig pa brjod par bya'o//
T02TD2510.2E:60a-11: aom aa mo gha sha ra padma ham siddhya ma mam /
T02TD2510.2E:60a-12: zhes bya ba zlos shing padma gdon mi za ba'i dbang phyug tu bdag nyid gang gi tshe thun bzhi'i sbyor bas snga ma bzhin du bsgoms par gyur pa /
T02TD2510.2E:60a-13: de'i tshe de dang mtshungs par bdag nyid mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:60a-14: snga ma bzhin du mtshan thog thag bsgoms na padma gdon mi za ba'i dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'grub por 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:60a-15: de ltar dngos grub dam pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub rnam pa bzhi bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:60a-16: da ni nor 'grub pa'i ye shes rnam pa bzhi gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:60a-17: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:60a-18: de la nor ni gser la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:60a-20: ye shes ni der nges pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:60a-21: kha'i nang du dbyig bcug ste /
T02TD2510.2E:60a-23: dbyig ni zong ri mo bris pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:60a-24: de khar bcug nas bdag nyid bdag nyid kyis bsgoms na ni /
T02TD2510.2E:60a-26: bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid du bsgoms pa'o//
T02TD2510.2E:60a-28: sna tshogs dbang phyug phyag rgya che //
T02TD2510.2E:60a-29: zhes bya ba 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:60a-30: gcig tu gyur pas stong du 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:60a-31: zhes bya ba ni de ltar bsgoms pas zong gcig po de dang de gzhal du med par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:60b-0: 'gro ba @60b 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:60b-1: phyis 'gro pa 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i de'i rig pa brjod cing bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.2E:60b-2: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas /
T02TD2510.2E:60b-3: aom padma ha ri bya pra dya h'um dza zhes bya ba zlos shing gang gi tshe nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas dbyig khar bcug nas bsgoms pa de'i tshe nor gyi gnang ba thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:60b-4: de nas mtshan thog thag bsgom par byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:60b-5: de nas phyis bsrung ba byas na //
T02TD2510.2E:60b-6: khyim gang du dbyig gi snod gzhag pa de mi zad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:60b-7: gser srang brgyad cha blangs nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:60b-8: zhes bya ba ni 'ol ma si'i sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi tshad dang ldan pa'i gser dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rab tu brtan por bzung nas /
T02TD2510.2E:60b-9: bdag nyid kyis bsgoms pa byas na ni /
T02TD2510.2E:60b-10: 'dod pa'i lha'i bdag nyid kyi gzugs gcig las de'i gzugs du mar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:60b-11: snga ma bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:60b-12: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa brjod cing gzungs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:60b-13: de nas aom padma su bar na pra de h'um dza zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:60b-14: gser zho gcig dam tshig gi phyag rgyas blangs te 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:60b-15: snga ma bzhin du ji srid da mtshan ma thob pa de srid kyi bar du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:60b-16: de nas zla ba nyal mtshan thog thag bsgoms na de bzhin du mi zad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:60b-17: mu tig 'brum bu khar bcug la //
T02TD2510.2E:60b-18: bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu //
T02TD2510.2E:60b-19: bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni //
T02TD2510.2E:60b-20: gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:60b-21: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:60b-22: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa brjod cing rang gi lha'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.2E:60b-23: aom padma mugta pra di h'um dza zhes brjod cing mu tig gi 'brum bu blangs te khar bcug nas ji srid mtshan ma thob par 'gyur ba de srid kyi bar du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:61a-0: de nas zla ba nya ba la mtshan thog thag bsgoms na de mi @61a * //
T02TD2510.2E:61a-2: las kyi phyag rgya lag gnyis kyis //
T02TD2510.2E:61a-3: rin chen thams cad blangs nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:61a-4: bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na yang //
T02TD2510.2E:61a-5: gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:61a-7: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:61a-8: phyis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa brjod cing rang gi lha'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:61a-9: aom padma sarbba ratna pra dha h'um dza zhes brjod cing ji skad bshad pa'i rin po che thams cad las kyi phyag rgya sa blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:61a-10: ji srid du mtshan ma thob par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:61a-11: de nas snga ma bzhin du mtshan thog thag bsgoms na de mi zad pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.2E:61a-12: 'dir rang gi lha'i kha dog ser po bsgom zhing dga' zhing mgu bar byas nas nor gyi dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:61a-13: de nas rjes su dga' bar bya ba'i ye shes ni dbang du bya ba'i phyir bsgom pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2510.2E:61a-14: sna tshogs dbang phyug phyag rgya che //
T02TD2510.2E:61a-15: zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas padma blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:61a-16: bsgrub par bya ba mdun du gnas pa rnal 'byor pa gang yin pa des rnal 'byor pa de mgu bar byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:61a-18: snga ma bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:61a-19: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rig pa brjod cing phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:61a-20: aom p'a ni shya ra ma h'a padma ho zhes snying po brjod cing padma dmar pos 'byed pa ltar byed cing de las gzhan pa 'gro ba 'dul ba sku mdog dmar po 'od zer dmar po 'phro bar ji srid mtshan ma thob par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:61a-21: de nas zla ba nya ba la mtshan thog thag bsgoms na dngos grub grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:61b-0: gang gi tshe gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa'i gzugs dbang du byed pa de'i tshe de'i mdun du rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis gnas par bdag nyid kyis bsams nas lag na gnas pa'i padma'i 'od zer 'bar bas bkang nas mdog dmar por byas la bkug la 'khyud pas rang gi rkang pa'i drung du lhung bar bsam par @61b bya'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:61b-1: / aom bi she sha karmma h'a padma ho:/
T02TD2510.2E:61b-2: che ge mo nyid ba shi ma n'a ya ho: zhes bya bas 'gro ba dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:61b-3: dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yis //
T02TD2510.2E:61b-4: padma dmar po dam bzung ste //
T02TD2510.2E:61b-5: zhes bya ba la padma de blangs nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyas de dmar por bzung la /
T02TD2510.2E:61b-6: bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni //
T02TD2510.2E:61b-7: bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:61b-9: snga ma bzhin du lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:61b-10: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:61b-11: de'i rig pa brjod cing phyi rol gyi rin po che padma de blangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:61b-12: aom sa ma ya padmo ham zhes zlos shing ji srid du mtshan ma thob par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du rang gi lha'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:61b-13: de nas snga ma bzhin du mtshan thog thag bzlas shing bsgrubs na padma 'od zer 'bar ba de dang /
T02TD2510.2E:61b-14: de nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba dbang du byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:61b-15: che ge mo nyid pa shi ma n'a ya ho /
T02TD2510.2E:61b-16: bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:61b-17: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:61b-18: padma blangs te ji lta ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:61b-19: padma de med kyang dam tshig dang chos dang las dang /
T02TD2510.2E:61b-20: phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor nyid kyis de mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:61b-21: rdo rje lta bas de ltar bltas //
T02TD2510.2E:61b-24: snga ma bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor la rig pa rnams brjod cing padma'i 'dab ma 'byed pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:61b-25: aom yo ga padmo ho: zhes bya ba brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:61b-26: ji srid du mtshan ma thob par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:61b-27: de nas de nyid kyis mtshan thog thag bsgom par byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:61b-28: de dang de nyid kyis las kyi dus su lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:61b-30: che ge mo nyid ba shi ma n'a ya ho: zhes zlos shing rdo rje lta bas bsgrub par bya ba bltas la rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis bsgrub par bya ba mdun du bzhag la /
T02TD2510.2E:62a-0: de nas padma'i 'od zer de nyid kyis bkang la 'khyud pas rang gi rkang pa'i drung du @62a * //
T02TD2510.2E:62a-1: lhung bar bsam pas bdag nyid nor dang bcas pa nges par dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:62a-2: las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:62a-3: zhes bya ba ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i las kyi phyag rgyas sna tshogs padma'i phyag rgya gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:62a-4: cho ga bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:62a-6: lag pa gnyis kyis bskor nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:62a-7: zhes bya ba ni las kyi phyag rgya bcings pa'i lag pa gnyis kyis padma bskor nas bsgrub par bya ba de dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:62a-8: bud med thams cad des mgur byed //
T02TD2510.2E:62a-9: ces bya ba ni 'gro pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor de nyid byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:62a-10: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gi las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:62a-11: de'i rig pa brjod cing yang aom karma padma ho:/
T02TD2510.2E:62a-12: zhes zlos shing las kyi phyag rgyas padma dmar po dmar por bzung la /
T02TD2510.2E:62a-13: thun bzhi'i sbyor bas ji srid mtshan ma'i 'od zer mthong ba la sogs par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:62a-14: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:62a-15: de nas las kyi dus su de nyid kyi lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:62a-16: yid kyis bsgrub par bya ba bud med kyi gzugs mdun du bzhag la las kyi phyag rgyas padma de blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:62a-17: padma'i 'od zer spros pas bsgrub par bya ba bkang la /
T02TD2510.2E:62a-18: padmas bskor na nges par dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:62a-20: che ge mo nyid ba sha ma na ya ho:/
T02TD2510.2E:62a-22: ma lus dbang po'i phyag rgya che ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:62a-24: goms par bya ba bdag rang nyid ni bdag rang nyid kyis khro bo bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:62a-25: gang gi mdun du de padma //
T02TD2510.2E:62a-27: zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen pos phyi rol gyi padma blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:62a-28: gang gi mdun du blos bzhag nas //
T02TD2510.2E:62a-29: de'i padma bcad na skad cig ma de nyid la mgo 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:62b-0: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnal @62b 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:62b-1: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ste /
T02TD2510.2E:62b-2: de'i rig pa brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:62b-3: de nas phyi rol gyi padma blangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:62b-4: aom ma h'a padma tstshe da m'a ra ya ho: phat /
T02TD2510.2E:62b-5: ces zlos shing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:62b-6: yang de nas mtshan thog thag bya ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:62b-7: las la sbyor ba'i dus su de nyid kyis rnal 'byor byas la phyi rol gyi padma dngos su blang ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:62b-8: yid kyis bsgrub par bya ba mdun du bzhag la bdag nyid khro bor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:62b-9: aom padma ma h'a tstshe da che ge mo m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02TD2510.2E:62b-10: ces zlos shing bsgrub par bya ba mgo bo nas drang ba'i bsam pas padma blangs te bcad na bsgrub par bya ba de mgo bo 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:62b-11: padma brten bzung yang dag par //
T02TD2510.2E:62b-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.2E:62b-13: aom sa ma ya padma spho ta n'a sha ya ratna phat /
T02TD2510.2E:62b-14: ces zlos shing snga ma bzhin du bsgom par byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:62b-15: bdag nyid kyis phyi rol gyi padma blangs la mthar mtshan thog thag bya ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:62b-16: de las la sbyor ba'i dus su 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba de nyid kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:62b-17: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:62b-18: khro bo dang ldan pas gang gi mdun du yid kyis bzhag la dam tshig gi phyag rgyas des phyi rol gyi padma 'dab ma bcu drug blangs la bsgrub par bya ba rtog pa'i bsam pas bshig na sa'i steng du ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:62b-19: aom sa ma ya che ge mo spho ta ya ratna phat /
T02TD2510.2E:62b-20: ces brjod cing gang gi ming nas smos pa de de 'jig par 'gyur ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:62b-21: yang na gzugs brnyan byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:62b-25: dbang du byas la de'i snying gar ming bri ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:62b-26: ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings pa las //
T02TD2510.2E:62b-27: zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin padma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:62b-28: bcings pa ni mngon sum du byas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:62b-29: padmo bsgrub pa ji bzhin du //
T02TD2510.2E:62b-30: zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yas g-yon gnyis kyis phyi rol gyi padma blangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:63a-1: gi ming nas smros shing padma de bcad na bsgrub par bya ba de 'jig cing dum bur 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:63a-3: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas ting nge 'dzin padma'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:63a-4: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:63a-6: yang aom dharmma padma tstshe da bi n'a sha ya hri da ya phat /
T02TD2510.2E:63a-8: phyi rol gyi padma lag pa g-yas g-yon gyis blangs la snga ma bzhin du zla ba gcig bsgoms na /
T02TD2510.2E:63a-9: mthar mtshan thog thag bya ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:63a-10: de'i las la sbyor ba'i dus su padma ting nge 'dzin de nyid rnal 'byor byas la padma de nyid blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:63a-11: bsgrub par bya ba'i mgo bo gcad pa'i bsam pas gcod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:63a-12: aom dharmma padma tstshe da che ge mo bi n'a sha ya hri da ya phat /
T02TD2510.2E:63a-13: ces brjod pas nges pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba'i mgo bo 'chad par 'gyur ro ;
T02TD2510.2E:63a-14: / las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:63a-15: zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:63a-16: des sna tshogs padma bzung ste /
T02TD2510.2E:63a-17: pad bzung cho ga ji lta bar //
T02TD2510.2E:63a-18: gang la khros pas rtogs bya ba //
T02TD2510.2E:63a-19: zhes bya ba ni de'i lha'i rnal 'byor byas pas so //
T02TD2510.2E:63a-21: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:63a-22: phyis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:63a-23: de'i rig pa brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:63a-24: de nas sna tshogs padma de nyid blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:63a-25: aom karmma padma spho ta ya /
T02TD2510.2E:63a-27: dzi bi tam aa dya kritta phat /
T02TD2510.2E:63a-28: ces brjod cing zla ba gcig snga ma bzhin du bsgoms la mthar mtshan thog thag bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:63a-29: de nas las kyi dus su snga ma bzhin du lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:63a-30: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi las kyi phyag rgya de bzhin du bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:63a-31: de nas sna tshogs padma de nyid blangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:63a-32: aom karma padma spho ta ya che ge mo spho ta ya dzi bi tam aadya che ge mo kritta phat /
T02TD2510.2E:63b-0: ces brjod cing padma des bsgrub par bya ba @63b rtog pa'i bsam pas bsnun pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:63b-1: bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan la des bsnun pa yin na de nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:63b-2: gsang ba ni lha rnams kyi rig pa dang bcas pa'i sbyor bas sgom pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:63b-3: de yi ye shes dbab pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:63b-4: padma la ni bud med bsam //
T02TD2510.2E:63b-6: bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rdo rje padma la 'gro ba 'dul ba'i lha mo bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:63b-7: rdo rje de'i steng du bdag nyid ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:63b-8: brtse ba ni longs spyod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:63b-9: rdo rje padma'i rtse mor 'gro ba 'dul ba'i lha mo'i gzugs dang snyoms par zhugs par bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:63b-10: sems rtse gcig pas bsgrubs na 'gro ba 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:63b-11: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:63b-12: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor snga ma bzhin du byas la phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:63b-13: bdag nyid 'gro ba 'dul bar bsam mo //
T02TD2510.2E:63b-14: de nas yi ge hr'i las rang gi gdan gyi steng du padma phra mos yongs su bskor ba'i rdo rje padma de yongs su gyur pa las 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:63b-15: de nas bsdu ba byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:63b-16: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i lha mo la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod nas /
T02TD2510.2E:63b-17: rta mgrin la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:63b-20: dbang du byas te dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bsgrubs la /
T02TD2510.2E:63b-21: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la ;
T02TD2510.2E:63b-22: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur la /
T02TD2510.2E:63b-23: padma'i sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la phyag byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:63b-24: aom badzra padma sam yo ga s'a dha ya hr'i zhes yongs su zlos shing bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mnyam par sbyor bas nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas ji srid mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:63b-25: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bsgoms na /
T02TD2510.2E:63b-26: de nas de mngon sum du mthong bar gsal ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:63b-27: de dang 'khyud pa dang mnyam par sbyor bar byed cing sgrub pa po'i lus kyi nang du zhugs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:64a-0: @64a * // phyis ni 'gro ba 'dul ba dang mtshungs par yang 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:64a-1: padma la ni bud med bsam //
T02TD2510.2E:64a-2: zhes bya ba ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ni gtsug phud sangs rgyas dang mtshungs pa'i gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:64a-3: de steng bdag nyid sangs rgyas bsgyur //
T02TD2510.2E:64a-8: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:64a-9: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:64a-10: bdag nyid gtsug phud sangs rgyas su bsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:64a-11: gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:64a-12: rang gi gdan gyi mdun du yi ge shr'i las ral pa'i dbus na padma chen po dang ldan pa sprul la de nyid las gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi lha mo'i gzugs su bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:64a-13: de nas snga ma bzhin du bsdu ba byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:64a-14: aom buddha ma ku ta sa na yo ga san ya shr'i zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:64a-15: snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma dang lhan cig tu gyur par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:64a-16: de nas mtshan thog thag bsgoms pas des de 'ongs nas de dang lhan cig mnyam par sbyor ba byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:64a-17: de lus kyi nang du zhugs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:64a-18: phyis gtsug phud sangs rgyas dang yang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:64a-19: padma la ni bud med bsam //
T02TD2510.2E:64a-20: zhes bya ba ni padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya la padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lha mor bsam mo //
T02TD2510.2E:64a-21: de steng padmor bdag bsgyur te //
T02TD2510.2E:64a-22: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid padma'i ting nge 'dzin de'i padma la ting nge 'dzin padma'i lha mo'i gzugs steng du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:64a-23: rtse zhing padmo padmo'i mchog / dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:64a-24: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid padma ting nge 'dzin gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs par bsgoms nas de lta bur gyur pa'i gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs par bsgoms pas dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:64b-0: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa @64b yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:64b-1: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin padma'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:64b-2: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:64b-3: bdag nyid padma'i ting nge 'dzin du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:64b-4: de nas yi ge de nyid las padma'i steng du padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rdo rje padma'i phyag rgya sprul la /
T02TD2510.2E:64b-6: padma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lha mo'i gzugs su bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:64b-7: de nas snga ma bzhin du bsdu ba la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:64b-8: bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mnyam par sbyor bas bsgoms la aom padma padma sam yo ga s'a dha ma ti /
T02TD2510.2E:64b-9: zhes brjod cing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas ji srid mngon sum du gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:64b-10: de nas mthar mtshan thog thag de nyid bsgoms pa dang byin nas des lhan cig tu sbyor bar byed cing de nyid lus la zhugs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:64b-11: phyis ting nge 'dzin padma nyid du yang 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:64b-12: padma la ni bud med bsam //
T02TD2510.2E:64b-13: zhes bya ba ni padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi sna tshogs padma 'dab ma bzhi pa la padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi lha mo bsam mo //
T02TD2510.2E:64b-14: de steng sna tshogs bdag gyur te //
T02TD2510.2E:64b-15: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das padma nges pa'i dbang phyug de'i padma'i steng du bdag nyid gyur te bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:64b-17: rtse zhing padmo mchog ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:64b-18: dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor bas so //
T02TD2510.2E:64b-19: sna tshogs dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:64b-20: zhes bya ba ni padma nges pa'i dbang phyug de la dngos grub sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:64b-22: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:64b-23: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:64b-24: bdag nyid padma nges pa'i dbang phyug tu bsgom mo //
T02TD2510.2E:64b-25: de nas de nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:64b-26: mdun du padma'i dbus su sna tshogs padma 'dab ma bzhi pa padma phra mo'i 'khor gyis bskor bar bsam mo //
T02TD2510.2E:65a-0: de nas hr'i: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di las padma nges pa'i dbang phyug de nyid kyi gzugs su @65a * //
T02TD2510.2E:65a-2: de nas snga ma bzhin du bsdu ba byas la bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig pa'i mnyam par sbyor bas /
T02TD2510.2E:65a-3: aom aa bi sha padma sam yo ga s'a dha ya hr'i: zhes zlos shing bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:65a-4: de nas snga ma bzhin du mtshan thog thag bsgoms nas de byin te /
T02TD2510.2E:65a-5: de dang lhan cig mnyam par sbyor ba byas na /
T02TD2510.2E:65a-6: de nyid lus la zhugs te /
T02TD2510.2E:65a-7: phyis 'di padma nges pa'i dbang phyug dang yang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:65a-8: de ltar dngos grub kyi ye shes bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:65a-9: da ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:65a-10: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bcings la ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:65a-11: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
T02TD2510.2E:65a-12: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
T02TD2510.2E:65a-13: dngos grub kyi ye shes bslabs pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:65a-14: ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:65a-15: mna'i snying po byin la padma'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba dang de'i phyag rgya chen po ni /
T02TD2510.2E:65a-16: gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po ste ;
T02TD2510.2E:65a-17: de'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:65a-18: sor mo'i rtse sprad padmor bya //
T02TD2510.2E:65a-19: zhes bya ba ni thal mo mnyam par sbyor ba'i sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mo padma kha bye ba ltar byas pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:65a-21: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta dharmma sa ma ye h'um zhes pa rig pa 'di zlos shing bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms na /
T02TD2510.2E:65a-22: rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:65a-23: rdo rje khro bo mdzub gnyis sprad //
T02TD2510.2E:65a-24: ces bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis brkyang la /
T02TD2510.2E:65a-25: rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la 'di nyid bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:65a-26: aom badzra sa ma ya h'um zhes zlos shing bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms na /
T02TD2510.2E:65a-27: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:65a-28: rtse gnyis nor bu zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:65a-29: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis nor bu ltar byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:65b-0: rdo rje dbyings las bshad @65b pa'i rdo rje snying po'i rnal 'byor byas la 'di nyid bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:65b-1: aom ma ni ratna sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:65b-2: bdag nyid rdo rje snying por bsgoms na rdo rje snying po dang 'dra bar 'gyur bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:65b-3: padmo ltar zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:65b-4: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun gdong sbyar la padma'i 'dab ma ltar byas pa 'di ni rdo rje spyan gyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:65b-5: rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i rdo rje chos kyi rnal 'byor byas la 'di bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:65b-6: aom padma sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba'i rig pa brjod cing bdag nyid rdo rje chos su bsgoms na rdo rje spyan dang 'dra bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:65b-7: rdo rje bsdams pa'ang de bzhin te //
T02TD2510.2E:65b-9: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdzub mo gnyis ji ltar grags pa'i rdo rje bsdams pa bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:65b-10: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje las kyi rnal 'byor byas la phyis phyag rgya 'di bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:65b-11: aom badzra karma sa ma ya h'um zhes zlos shing bdag nyid rdo rje las su bsgoms na /
T02TD2510.2E:65b-12: de rdo rje las dang 'dra bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:65b-13: rdo rje bcings pa bsdams nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:65b-14: gung mo gnyis ni myu gur bsgreng //
T02TD2510.2E:65b-15: mdzub mo srin lag gnyis bkug pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:65b-16: phyag rgya sh'akya thub par bstan //
T02TD2510.2E:65b-17: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa las /
T02TD2510.2E:65b-18: gung mo gnyis myu gu ltar bsgreng la /
T02TD2510.2E:65b-19: mdzub mo rdang srin lag gnyis padma ltar byas pa 'di ni sh'akya thub pa'i rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:65b-20: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:65b-21: chos kyi rdo rje snying gar gzhag / bsgyur te dpral bar gzhag pa dang //
T02TD2510.2E:65b-22: ting nge 'dzin tshul pang du gzhag / bsgyur nas spyi bor gzhag par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:65b-24: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
T02TD2510.2E:65b-25: gung mo gnyis ni mnyam sbyar ba //
T02TD2510.2E:65b-26: rdo rje chos zhes grags pa yi //
T02TD2510.2E:65b-27: dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:65b-28: 'di snying gar gzhag pa ni 'gro ba 'dul ba dang rdo rje sems ma'i gnas na gnas pa'i chos kyi rdo rje ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:65b-29: de nyid yongs su bsgyur nas dpral ba'i phyogs su gzhag pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:65b-30: bcom ldan 'das gtsug phud sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2510.2E:65b-31: rdo je rin chen ma'i gnas kyi sangs rgyas dbang bskur ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-2: padma ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas su padma ting nge 'dzin mar 'gyur la /
T02TD2510.2E:66a-3: rdo rje chos ma'i gnas su dam tshig sgrol mar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-4: de nyid bsgyur nas spyi bor gzhag pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-5: padma'i nges pa'i dbang phyug gi gnas su padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi gzungs mar 'gyur la /
T02TD2510.2E:66a-6: rdo rje las ma'i gnas su sna tshogs kyi sgor 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-7: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang bcings la //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-8: mchod rten padmo'i tshul du ni //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-9: gung mo gnyis ni bcings gyur na //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-10: sangs rgyas padmo yin par bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-12: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i ming can sh'akya thub pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:66a-13: gung mo gnyis padma ltar byas pa ni sangs rgyas padma'i gzungs kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-14: de las mthe bo rdo rje dang //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-15: mdzub gnyis ral gri lcags kyur bya //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-17: sangs rgyas padma'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya las mthe bong gnyis rdo rjer byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:66a-18: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba ni ral grir bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:66a-19: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyur byas pa ni padma rgyal po'i gzungs kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-20: de las mthe bo bsnol nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-21: mdzub mos mdzub mo rab bzung la //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-22: drangs na rab dga' yin par bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-23: ces bya ba ni padma rgyal po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya de nyid las /
T02TD2510.2E:66a-24: mthe bo gnyis rdo rje bcings pa'i tshul gyis bsnol la mdzub mo g-yas pa'i lcags kyus g-yon pa'i logs las mda' 'dren pa'i tshul du byed pa ni padma chags pa'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-25: legs so zhes pa'ang de bzhin te //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-26: zhes bya ba ni padma chags pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya las ;
T02TD2510.2E:66a-27: mdzub mo gnyis mthe bo gnyis kyis se gol gtogs pa'i tshul du byed pa ni padmo legs so zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-28: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-29: mthe ba gnyis mnyam ste bcug nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-30: mdzub gnyis rtse bkug rtse mo ni //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-31: dpral gzhag gung mo padmor bya //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-32: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bo gnyis bcug nas gung mo gnyis padma ltar byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:66a-33: mdzub mo gnyis myu gu ltar bsgreng nas tshigs gsum pa bkug ste /
T02TD2510.2E:66a-34: rtse mo gnyis dpral pa'i phyogs su gzhag pa ni padma khro gnyer gyi gzungs kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:66a-35: de nyid las ni snying gar yang //
T02TD2510.2E:66b-0: @66b nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang //
T02TD2510.2E:66b-2: padmo khro gnyer gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya las /
T02TD2510.2E:66b-3: snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa'i tshul du byed pa 'di ni padma nyi ma'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:66b-4: de nyid las ni rgyal mtshan bcings //
T02TD2510.2E:66b-6: padma nyi ma'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya nyid las dpung pa gnyis brkyang la spyi bor gzhag pa ni padma zla ba'i dpal gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:66b-7: ltag par rab tu brkyang par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:66b-9: de nyid mgo bo'i rgyab tu brkyang nas sor mo'i rtse mo rnams so sor gzhag pa ni zhal bcu gcig pa'i gzungs kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:66b-10: rdo rje bsdams pa dam bcas la /
