T02TD2510.2E:98b-13: de nas kha dog ji lta ba bzhin du rnyed pa'i gos 'dis ni gos gzhan ji ltar rnyed pa thams cad gzung bar bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gnang ba sbyin par ston to //
T02TD2510.2E:98b-14: snying po 'dis rang dang gzhan 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:98b-15: aom h'um pra be sha ma ni r'a dza ku lam /
T02TD2510.2E:98b-16: dam tshig gnyis su byas te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:98b-17: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis g-yas pa'i rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dral bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:98b-18: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:98b-19: don thams cad grub pa rab tu sbyin pa'i sngags 'dir theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes brjod do //
T02TD2510.2E:98b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du de brjod cing sgo srung nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:98b-21: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi bar du blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:98b-22: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la thug gi bar du dkyil 'khor chen po bstan par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:98b-23: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:98b-24: ci 'byor pas mchod par byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:98b-25: dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni de'i cho ga rgyas pa'i don bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:98b-26: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02TD2510.2E:98b-27: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por dam tshig dang /
T02TD2510.2E:98b-28: dbang bskur ba thob pa des dkyil 'khor bri bar 'dod na /
T02TD2510.2E:98b-29: dang por re zhig rim pa 'dis sngon du bsnyen pa byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:99a-1: mtshams la mal nas langs te /
T02TD2510.2E:99a-2: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas langs te /
T02TD2510.2E:99a-3: aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes bzlas pas /
T02TD2510.2E:99a-4: bdag nyid rdo rje gnod sbyin du sbrul la 'di nyid brjod cing gdong la sogs pa dag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:99a-5: yang 'di nyid brjod cing lha'i khang par dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:99a-6: bdag nyid bsgrub pa'i grogs pos g-yas nas bskor zhing rim gyis skyang nul bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:99a-7: de nas slob dpon khrus la mngon par zhen na khrus bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:99a-8: gal te rnam par rtog pa spyod pa yin pa de'i tshe chu'i khrus kyis cho ga bya ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:99a-9: chos bdag med pa la lhag par mos pa dang rang gi sngom pa bsrung ba rnams kyis nang gi bdag nyid can gyis khrus rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:99a-10: de la rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa de'i chu'i khrus kyi cho ga ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:99a-11: re zhig thog mar yi ge h'um las rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar bdag nyid bskyed la /
T02TD2510.2E:99a-12: aom dhu pi dhu pi ka ya h'u bi pra dz'a li ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2510.2E:99a-14: khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:99a-15: bdag nyid me ltar 'bar ba ma rungs pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba bzod par dka' bar byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:99a-16: rdo rje bsdams pa nang bcings nas //
T02TD2510.2E:99a-17: sor mo nang du 'bar byas la //
T02TD2510.2E:99a-18: mthe bo rdo rje bsgreng ba ni ;
T02TD2510.2E:99a-19: / khro bo ti r'inti rir bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:99a-20: rdo rje nyi ma'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:99a-21: de'i rjes la bdag nyid aom h'um zhes bdag nyid go cha'i phyag rgyas go cha bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:99a-22: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:99a-23: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis su byas pas snying gar mdud pa bcing ba'i tshul du bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:99a-24: de bzhin du mgrin pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:99a-31: de nas dbang bskur ba'i gnas su mdud pa'i tshul gyis dar dpyangs bcing ba'i tshul du byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:99a-32: sgeg pa dang bcas pas lag pa g-yas pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:99a-33: g-yon pa mtha' ma nas bkrol te /
T02TD2510.2E:99a-34: dar dpyangs 'phyang ba'i tshul du byed cing mthar mnyam pa'i thal mo dang badzra tu shya ho zhes bya bas mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:99a-35: de nas aom bhur dz'a la h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD2510.2E:99a-36: zhes bya bas sa blangs nas cha gsum du byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-0: rig pa 'di nyid mngon bar bzlas la khrus byed pa'i sa phyogs su @99b gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:99b-1: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-2: yi ge h'um gis chu dang chu'i gnas thams cad kyi bgegs thams cad bza' bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:99b-3: yang rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-4: 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi chu dang chu'i bgegs thams cad bza' bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:99b-5: yi ge aa las rdo rje thal mo'i mthe bo gnyis brkyang la /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-6: mdzub mo gnyis mche ba'i tshul du bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-7: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:99b-8: de nas aom bhur dz'a la h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-10: chu snyim pa gsum blangs la steng bcing ba'i phyir bsang gtor bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-11: rig pa 'di nyid zlos shing sngar bshad pa'i sa cha gsum las gcig blangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-12: rked pa'i phyogs bkru ba dang lag pa bkrus la nye reg bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:99b-13: de nas yi ge h'um brjod cing cha gnyis pa blangs la lus la khrus bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:99b-14: cha gsum pa dang bcas pa dang yan lag thams cad khrus byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-15: aom bhur dz'a la h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-16: zhes brjod cing nye reg byas nas rang gi mgo la rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang de'i sngags kyis chu blugs par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:99b-17: de nyid kyis bdas rang byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-18: langs la aom shi kha re ru ta phat /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-19: ces bzlas pa'i chus gos la sogs pa bsangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-20: badzra satva zhes brjod cing ji lta ba bzhin du bgos la /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-21: yid kyis chu'i gnas kyi bsrung ba bkrol la /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-22: rang gi lha'i nga rgyal gyis de'i sngags brjod cing lha'i khang pa dang nye bar rkang pa bkrus te /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-23: rig pa 'di nyid kyis nye reg bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-24: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur dang h'um phat ces bya bas lha'i khang ba'i bgegs bskrad pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-25: g-yas pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis lha'i khang pa bsrung ba byas te 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:99b-26: yang rdo rje rtse mo bzlas pa'i dri'i chu dang nor bu'i gnod sbyin bzlas pas stan dang lha'i khang pa bsangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-29: de nas yi ge hr'i: las lkog ma'i phyogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-30: lce'i padma'i 'dab mar h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bskyed la /
T02TD2510.2E:99b-31: badzra dzi hva zhes bya ba 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100a-0: lag pa gnyis su yang aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re bsams la de nyid kyi steng du tra gnyis las rdo rje rin po che gnyis bsam zhing sor mo'i rtse mo rnams rdo rje nor bu myu gu lta bus bgegs @100a * //
T02TD2510.2E:100a-1: gzhom pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100a-2: de la yi ge h'um las rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar bdag nyid bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:100a-3: aom ghi badzra sa ma ya h'um bam zhes zlos shing khro bo ti r'inti ri bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100a-4: rdo rje bsdams pa nang bcings la //
T02TD2510.2E:100a-5: yid kyis khros nas dgab bya ba //
T02TD2510.2E:100a-6: rdo rje mthe bong dam po ste ;
T02TD2510.2E:100a-7: / khro bo ti r'anti rir bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:100a-8: yi ge h'um gis ti r'anti ri bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:100a-9: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes brjod cing rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa'i mthe bong gnyis gzhi bas te /
T02TD2510.2E:100a-10: rdo rje khu tshur gyi steng du 'jog pa ni rdo rje ti rinti ri ste /
T02TD2510.2E:100a-12: phyogs bzhir rdo rje phreng ba bcing ba'i tshul gyis bskor te /
T02TD2510.2E:100a-13: dbral ba'i phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100a-14: snga ma bzhin du go cha bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:100a-15: mthar mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:100a-16: yang aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:100a-17: rdo rje skyil krung phyed du 'dug la g-yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bzhag nas /
T02TD2510.2E:100a-18: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gsor bas bgegs thams cad la bsnun par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100a-19: de nas h'um badzra aa na la /
T02TD2510.2E:100a-20: ha nad ha pa tsam tha bha nydza ra na h'um phat /
T02TD2510.2E:100a-21: ces bya bas sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje me'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:100a-22: bgegs thams cad bskrad pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:100a-25: 'tshod pa dang gsod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100a-26: yang rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo gnyis brkyang ste snyoms te bzhag la /
T02TD2510.2E:100a-27: badzra tri bandha sarbba bighn'an zhes brjod cing bgegs thams cad bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100a-28: rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang ba sa la bzhag la /
T02TD2510.2E:100a-29: aom badzra dri dho me bha ba raksha sarbbam sv'a h'a ;
T02TD2510.2E:100a-30: zhes bya ba dang mgo bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100a-31: rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan gyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.2E:100a-32: aom hu lu hu lu h'um phat /
T02TD2510.2E:100a-33: ces bya bas steng bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100a-34: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du bskor te /
T02TD2510.2E:100a-35: mgo bo'i steng du mdzub mo lcags kyu'i tshul du gzhag pa ni rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100a-36: sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.2E:100a-37: badzra yaksha h'um zhes bya ba dang bcas pas rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan gyis bcing ba'i 'og tu yang nam mkha' bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100a-38: rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas shar phyogs bcing bar ba ste /
T02TD2510.2E:100b-0: aom drum @100b bandha ham zhes bya ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:100b-1: drum zhes bya ba yongs su bzla'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100b-2: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du sbrel la mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar te bzlog nas spyi gtsug tu gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100b-3: yang rdo rje zhags pa de nyid bcing bar byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:100b-5: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mkhrig ma mdud pa byas pa 'di ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100b-6: rdo rje ba dan gyis nub phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:100b-7: aom badzra pa tam ke pa tam gi ni ra ta /
T02TD2510.2E:100b-8: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bo gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung du byas la mdzub mo gnyis mnyam par gzhibs te phye la mthe'u chud gnyis brkyang nas ba dan ltar bya ba ni rdo rje ba dan gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100b-9: byang phyogs su rdo rje nag mos bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:100b-10: hri badzra ka li ru ta ma ta /
T02TD2510.2E:100b-11: sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya snying gar bstan par byas pa ni rdo rje nag mo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100b-12: rdo rje rtse mos lto bcing bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:100b-13: sngar bshad pa nyid kyi sngags dang /
T02TD2510.2E:100b-14: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ri bo 'degs pa'i tshul du bya ba ni rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100b-15: rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor bcing bar byas la ra bar brtsig par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100b-16: h'um badzra karmma yang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi nang du rab byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:100b-18: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
T02TD2510.2E:100b-19: lag ngar rdo rje byas nas su //
T02TD2510.2E:100b-20: mthe'u chung lcags kyur bcing bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:100b-21: mdzub mo gnyis kyis bsdigs pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:100b-23: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100b-24: de nyid las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100b-26: badzra bandha bam zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bla re bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100b-27: de nas nor bu'i gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i dri'i chu'i snod lha'i khang pa'i sgor gzhag pa la bsang gtor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:100b-28: nor bu'i gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i dri'i chu nyid kyis mchod pa'i yan lag thams cad bsad pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:100b-29: sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i sngags kyis lan gsum mngon par bzlas la /
T02TD2510.2E:100b-30: me tog gi phyag rgya dang badzra pushpe h'um zhes lan gsum mngon par bzla bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:100b-31: aom badzra gandhe zhes dri'i phyag rgyas dri'o //
T02TD2510.2E:100b-32: aom badzra dh'u pe h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:100b-33: aa k'a ro mu kham sarbba dharmm'a n'am /
T02TD2510.2E:100b-34: a'adya nutpanna tv'a ta ces bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-0: @101a * // lha bshos la yongs su bzla'o //
T02TD2510.2E:101a-1: de'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-2: rdo rje bsdams pa las ral gri 'dren pa'i tshul du byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:101a-3: aom badzra a'a lo ke zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-4: mar me'i phyag rgyas mar me la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:101a-5: aom sarbba aartha si ddhi pra ta h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-6: dri chen ser po'i chu la me tog ser po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-7: zho dang til nag po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-8: ku sha dang 'bras bu la sogs pa dung chos la sogs pa'i snod du bcug la /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-9: rdo rje thal mo kha phye ba'i mtshan nyid can de'i phyag rgya lan gsum bzlas la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:101a-10: de nas nor bu'i rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po sprul la ;
T02TD2510.2E:101a-11: yod cing 'byor na mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-12: phyag bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-13: sdom pa gzung ba byas nas mnyam pa'i thal mo dang /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-14: yang rdo rje thal mo dang rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-15: de nas rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dral bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:101a-16: de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-17: badzra a'a be sha zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-18: aa zhes bya bas bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:101a-19: tishtha badzra dri dho me zhes bya ba la sogs pa dbab pa nye bar bsdu bar byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-21: rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-22: aom badzra sandhi bam zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:101a-23: sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa dral te /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-24: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-25: aom buddha ratna h'um zhes lan gsum brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-26: badzra mu: zhes bya bas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la bcug pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad der zhu bar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:101a-27: de ltar nor bu 'bebs pa'i bar gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-28: aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-30: aom badzra mu: zhes yongs su bzlas pas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba der phyag rgyas bcug pas /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-31: bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'bebs pa rang gi snying gar zhu par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:101a-32: de ltar lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub sems kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-33: skyil mo krung bcas la ting nge 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:101a-34: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la rdo rje rin po che bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:101a-35: rdo rje rin po che'i dbus su//
T02TD2510.2E:101b-0: @101b aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes bya ba yid kyis bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:101b-2: chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:101b-3: de nas snying po de nyid dang /
T02TD2510.2E:101b-11: aam aa: zhes bya ba dbyangs yig bcu drug dang bcas pas rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:101b-12: dbyangs yig bcu drug po 'di nyid ni nor bu'i mtshan ma la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:101b-13: nor bu'i khu tshur gyi mthar thug pa yin par 'dir shes bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:101b-14: de nas de'i steng du snying po de nyid dang /
T02TD2510.2E:101b-15: yi ge ka la sogs pa dang bcas pa la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis par bsam mo //
T02TD2510.2E:101b-16: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de nyid dang /
T02TD2510.2E:101b-17: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po dang bcas pas rdo rje rtse lnga par bsam mo //
T02TD2510.2E:101b-18: rdo rje de nyid rdo rje rin po cher byas la de'i dbus su /
T02TD2510.2E:101b-19: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes yid kyis bri sa la /
T02TD2510.2E:101b-20: badzra ratna ham zhes bya bas rdo rje rin po che'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:101b-21: de ltar bsams la rdo rje rin chen gyi bdag nyid gang yin pa bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:101b-23: dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi tshul gyis 'bras bu bsgrub pa yin no zhes nges pa bskyed la sems bskyed pa'i sbyor bas /
T02TD2510.2E:101b-24: rdo rje rin chen de rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:101b-25: badzra satva ham zhes zlos shing snyoms pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor zhing /
T02TD2510.2E:101b-27: aom badzra satva ham rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid /
T02TD2510.2E:101b-28: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes bzlas pas nam mkha'i snying po'i bdag nyid du bsams la ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:101b-29: de nas don thams cad grub pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la sa ma ya ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:101b-30: don thams cad grub pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis snying ga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:101b-32: lkog ma dang spyi bor byin gyis brlab bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:101b-33: sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva mam /
T02TD2510.2E:101b-34: de nas rin po ches mtshan pa'i dril bu lag pa g-yon pa'i rin po che khu tshur gyis blangs la lag pa g-yas pa'i rdo rje nor bu dang /
T02TD2510.2E:101b-35: bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:102a-0: de nas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i @102a * //
T02TD2510.2E:102a-1: sbyor bas snying gar zhugs la nor bu rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po sbrul par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:102a-2: rdo rje nor bu chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:102a-3: bdag nyid der ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs la me tog dor ba'i sngags kyis rang gi spyi bor me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:102a-4: de nas phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i sngags kyis phreng ba de spyi bor bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:102a-5: dngos grub kyi rin po che brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la //
T02TD2510.2E:102a-6: de nas dkyil 'khor de nam mkha'i dang mtshungs par bsam mo //
T02TD2510.2E:102a-7: yang bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:102a-8: rang gi lus la lha thams cad kyi gnas su sa ma ya aa zhes brjod pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:102a-9: gzhi'i lus kyi rang gi gnas su gnas te /
T02TD2510.2E:102a-10: gzhi'i lus la phyi rol gyi mdun du yang sa ma ya aa zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sbrul pa de'i steng du aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um aa zhes rdo rje rin po che phab la /
T02TD2510.2E:102a-11: de'i dbus su aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes bya ba yid kyis bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:102a-12: badzra ratna ham zhes bya bas rdo rje rin po che'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:102a-13: rdo rje rin po che de nyid badzra garbha ham zhes bya bas rdo rje snying por bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:102a-14: de la de nyid du rin po che lcags kyu dang /
T02TD2510.2E:102a-17: 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:102a-21: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta dri shya h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:102a-22: bcom ldan 'das rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bltas la /
T02TD2510.2E:102a-23: dza: h'um bam ho: sa gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:102a-24: rang gi lus las lus kyi gnas su gnas pa de nyid la bcug la sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod pas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phab ste /
T02TD2510.2E:102a-25: sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02TD2510.2E:102a-26: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes zlos shing /
T02TD2510.2E:102a-27: bcom ldan 'das la zhugs la bdag nyid dang lhan cig tha mi dad par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:102a-28: de bzhin du rin chen 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:102a-29: rang gi lus kyi gnas su yid kyis 'dug ste /
T02TD2510.2E:102a-30: rang gi lus las phyi rol gyi mdun du sa ma ya aa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor sbrul la /
T02TD2510.2E:102b-1: aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa: zhes bya bas rin po che'i dril bu bskyed de /
T02TD2510.2E:102b-2: de'i dbus su aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha zhes yid kyis bris la badzra ma ni ratna gha nde aa ham zhes bya bas rdo rje nor bu rin po che'i dril bu'i nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:102b-3: aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa: zhes zlos shing ma ni ratna a'a be sha h'um zhes bya bas de rin chen 'bebs pas bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:102b-4: de la de nyid du nor bu rin po che 'bebs pa dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:102b-7: dbang du byas la rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.2E:102b-8: aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa dri shya zhes bya bas bltas la /
T02TD2510.2E:102b-9: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas de nyid du dza: h'um bam ho: sa rang gi lus la bzhugs par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:102b-10: zhugs pa dang sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod pas /
T02TD2510.2E:102b-11: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la sa ma ya stvam aa ham aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa: zhes lan gsum brjod pas /
T02TD2510.2E:102b-12: bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che 'bebs pa dang bdag nyid lhan cig tha mi dad par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:102b-14: don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:102b-15: nor bu rin chen 'bebs pa la sogs pa'i mthar thug pa'i sku la rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:102b-19: don yod grub pa rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyor bas bcug la /
T02TD2510.2E:102b-20: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes yid kyis brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:102b-21: de nas rdo rje dbyings las sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rang rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas de sgrub po //
T02TD2510.2E:102b-22: de nas rnam par snang mdzad rin chen 'bebs pa'i bar gyi chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la /
T02TD2510.2E:102b-23: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2510.2E:102b-24: rdo rje nor bu rin po che bcings nas /
T02TD2510.2E:102b-25: don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa rin po che'i rigs kyi lha thams cad kyi snying gar byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:102b-26: yang rdo rje rin po che myu gu ma bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:102b-27: thams cad kyi dpral ba'i phyogs su byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:102b-28: rin po che padma las lkog ma'i phyogs dang /
T02TD2510.2E:102b-29: rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs mas spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:103a-0: de nas rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi @103a * //
T02TD2510.2E:103a-1: phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:103a-2: rin po che'i rigs thams cad la rdo rje rin po che'i myu gus dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:103a-3: de nas snga ma bzhin du go cha bgo ba dang phreng ba bcing ba byas nas mthar mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:103a-4: de nas rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'i rdo rje dang nor bu'i dril bu'i phyag rgyas bdag po'i dbang bskur la ming gi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:103a-5: dngos grub kyi rdo rje rin po che'i brtul zhugs kyang blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:103a-6: rin po che'i sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:103a-7: rin po che'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i mchod pa bcu drug gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:103a-8: de nyid kyis ni rin chen gzung //
T02TD2510.2E:103a-9: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:103a-10: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
T02TD2510.2E:103a-11: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas //
T02TD2510.2E:103a-12: de nas rang gi snying po len gsum bzlas la /
T02TD2510.2E:103a-13: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:103a-14: lha thams cad kyi sku dang /
T02TD2510.2E:103a-15: gsung dang thugs bdag yin no zhes bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:103a-16: de nas aom sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes zlos shing gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa'i chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin du bsam mo //
T02TD2510.2E:103a-17: aom sarbba sa mo& ham zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:103a-18: chos bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis lha thams cad bdag nyid dang lhan cig tha mi dad par nges par byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:103a-19: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i sku dang /
T02TD2510.2E:103a-20: gsung dang thugs rdo rje bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:103a-21: gzhung 'di tsam gyis rnal 'byor chen po rdzogs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:103a-22: da ni gnas kyi nges pa bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:103a-23: de la sngags pa'i rang gi snying ga na gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02TD2510.2E:103a-24: rigs kyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:103a-25: de'i mdun du nor bu'i mtshan ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:103a-26: g-yas phyogs su rin chen rgyal po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:103a-27: g-yon phyogs su rin chen chags pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:103a-28: rgyab tu rin chen legs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:103a-29: yang rnal 'byor pa'i dpral ba'i phyogs su rin chen lta ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:103a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur pa'i phreng ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:103a-31: mgo bo'i rgyab tu rin chen nyi ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:103a-32: phrag pa gnyis su rin chen dpal /
T02TD2510.2E:103a-33: so'i phreng ba gnyis la rin chen bzhad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:103a-34: lkog ma'i phyogs su rin chen padma 'dzin dang /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-0: @103b gtong pa ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:103b-1: nu ma gnyis kyi bar du rin chen rnon po /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-3: lce la rin chen gsung ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:103b-4: spyi bor rin chen char 'bebs dang /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-6: nam tshong gnyis su rin chen go cha /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-8: dkur nor bu'i khu tshur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:103b-9: nor bu'i mtshan ma'i g-yon phyogs su nor bu sgeg mo /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i rin po che phreng pa'i g-yon du rin chen phreng ba ma /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-11: gtod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-12: g-yon du rin chen glu ma /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-13: nor bu mchod pa'i g-yon du rin chen gar ma'o //
T02TD2510.2E:103b-14: yang rnal 'byor pa'i gsang ba'i gnas su rin chen bdug pa ma /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-15: mgo bor rin chen me tog ma /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-16: mig gnyis la rin chen mar me ma /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-17: nu ma dang brang dang snying gar rin chen byug pa ma /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-18: brlag g-yas pa la rin chen lcags kyu /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-19: brla g-yon pa la rin chen zhags pa /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-20: byin pa g-yas pa la rin chen lcags sgrog /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-21: byin pa g-yon pa la rin chen 'bebs pa rnams yang dag par bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:103b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yan lag thams cad la chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa bzhin du bzhugs so //
T02TD2510.2E:103b-23: nyin re bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:103b-24: de ltar rnal 'byor chen po byas nas thun bzhi'i sbyor bas thams cad kyi sngags 'bum bzlas la bsgrub par bya ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-25: yang na rang gi snying gar 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i tshul gyis don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-28: lo gcig gi bar du ji srid dkyil 'khor mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-29: yang na ji skad bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po bsgrubs nas /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-30: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-31: nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas te /
T02TD2510.2E:103b-32: mig ni g-yon dang g-yas pa nyid dag la //
T02TD2510.2E:103b-33: aa med ta dang ma las nyi zla dgod //
T02TD2510.2E:103b-34: h'um las mig 'bras bskal pa'i me lta bu //
T02TD2510.2E:103b-35: tshul du gnas pa rdo rje'i lta ba bya //
T02TD2510.2E:103b-36: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la yi ge h'um las 'bar ba'i rdo rje /
T02TD2510.2E:104a-0: rdo rje'i lte ba la yi ge'i sa bon dang bcas pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba 'khrug par bsam par @104a * //
T02TD2510.2E:104a-2: /'od zer 'bar bdes sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad thal bar byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:104a-3: de nas nam mkha'i phyogs su stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad dang mnyam pa'i zla ba'i mdog can gyi yi ge kham rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin 'o ma can gyi chu dang mtshungs pa'i bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun gyis bsregs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams bkrus nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du dpa' rlabs 'khrug pa'i phreng ba can gyi rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su yi ge ram bskal pa'i me dang mtshungs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:104a-4: yi ge ram des chu bskol bas rin po che chen po'i padma'i rgyal po dpag tshad bye ba du ma'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i gzugs yongs su gyur pa de rin po che padma mtha' yas pas yongs su bskor ba'i padma de'i rtsa ba'i yi ge pra gser gyi mdog can las gser gyi rus sbal tshad gzhal du med pa padma'i gzhir gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:104a-5: yang padma'i lte bar yi ge pra gser gyi mdog can dang /
T02TD2510.2E:104a-6: yi ge kham rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i phyogs nas 'ongs nas gnas par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:104a-7: de nas padma dang yi ge pra dang yi ge kham gcig tu gyur pa las h'um sum h'um zhes brjod pas ri'i rgyal po ri rab chen po zur bzhi pa rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can /
T02TD2510.2E:104a-8: rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan bar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:104a-9: de nas rdo rje bsdams pa sal reg par byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:104a-10: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:104a-11: de nas rin chen rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgya don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po sbrul la /
T02TD2510.2E:104a-12: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su aa sam ai zhes bya bas seng ge dang padma'i gdan la /
T02TD2510.2E:104a-13: h'um gga h'um zhes bya bas mi bskyod pa'i gnas su glang po che'i gdan dang /
T02TD2510.2E:104a-14: tra pam tra zhes bya bas rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rta'i gdan dang /
T02TD2510.2E:104a-15: hri mam hri zhes bya ba las 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su rma bya'i gdan dang /
T02TD2510.2E:104a-16: aam gga aa zhes bya bas don yod grub pa'i gnas su nam mkha' lding gi gdan te /
T02TD2510.2E:104a-17: de rnams la aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:104a-19: rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu las bshad pa'i tshogs mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'i rim gyis mngon par sangs rgyas nas ri rab kyi steng du babs te /
T02TD2510.2E:104b-0: de bzhin gshegs @104b pa thams cad kyi gdan la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor te gnas so //
T02TD2510.2E:104b-2: rdo rje rin chen gnyis dang /
T02TD2510.2E:104b-4: rdo rje las gnyis ji lta ba bzhin du bskyed nas /
T02TD2510.2E:104b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i dbus na bzhugs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dang por sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang po gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:104b-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas rin po che'i rigs kyi don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i phyir bdag nyid la gsol ba btab par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:104b-7: de nas don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:104b-8: gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:104b-9: aom badzra ratna h'um zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:104b-10: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por sbrul pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:104b-11: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:104b-12: de nas rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:104b-16: rdo rje sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:104b-17: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta a'a sha pa ri p'u ra na ma h'a ratna h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:104b-22: zhes bya ba'i rig pa dam pa lnga po de rnams kyis 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa 'di byin gyis brlab pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:104b-23: de nas 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po dang bdag nyid tha mi dad par 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i rang bzhin du nges par byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:104b-24: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje nor bu rin po che las don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gzugs yid kyis phyung la 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam sprin rgya mtsho thams cad du rin po che'i rigs dang ldan pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad rin po che'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du bskyed nas /
T02TD2510.2E:104b-25: slar log ste rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs te /
T02TD2510.2E:104b-26: lha thams cad kyi gzugs kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
T02TD2510.2E:104b-27: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02TD2510.2E:104b-28: rin chen thams cad bsdus pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:105a-3: aom buddha ratna h'um zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2510.2E:105a-4: aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa:/
T02TD2510.2E:105a-5: zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa rnams kyis rang gi snyid po 'di brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:105a-6: de dag rang gi gnas su gzhug par bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:105a-7: de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas bsdu ba byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:105a-8: de bzhin du rang la dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad pa 'di ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i las kyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:105a-9: de ltar ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgoms nas yang don thams cad grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas ;
T02TD2510.2E:105a-10: don thams cad grub pa'i gnas su 'dug ste bsdu ba bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:105a-11: de nas don kun sgrub byed pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:105a-12: phyag rgya chen po lhur bcings nas //
T02TD2510.2E:105a-13: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'dis //
T02TD2510.2E:105a-14: lan cig par du brjod par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:105a-15: de nas sgo rnams thams cad du //
T02TD2510.2E:105a-16: lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis nas //
T02TD2510.2E:105a-17: las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis //
T02TD2510.2E:105a-18: dam tshig mchog ni gzhug par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:105a-19: dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang //
T02TD2510.2E:105a-20: sangs rgyas rin chen la sogs pas //
T02TD2510.2E:105a-21: de ltar sems dpa' chen po bsgrub //
T02TD2510.2E:105a-22: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes rab brjod //
T02TD2510.2E:105a-24: snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:105a-28: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes bya bas /
T02TD2510.2E:105a-29: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2510.2E:105a-30: aom pra ba ra satk'a ra pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2510.2E:105a-31: zhes bya bas snga ma bzhin du zhabs bsil dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:105a-32: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:105a-33: aom buddha ratna h'um dri shya dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2510.2E:105a-36: aom buddha ratna zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:105a-37: de bzhin du rin chen 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:105a-38: aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa dri shya dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2510.2E:105b-0: aom ma ni ratna @105b a'a be sha aa zhes bya ba'i bar du lan gsum brjod pas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:105b-1: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis thams cad rgyas btab la dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya gnyis kyis ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur te /
T02TD2510.2E:105b-2: yang mchod yon dbul ba sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa rnam ba lnga la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la phyag byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:105b-3: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:105b-5: aom sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02TD2510.2E:105b-7: zhes zlos shing don rnam pa gsum bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:105b-8: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rang bzhin bdag nyid yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:105b-9: aom sarbba aa ratha si ddhi pra ta h'um zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:105b-10: dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni bdag nyid yin no zhes bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:105b-11: nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas ji srid dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gzugs su bdag nyid mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:105b-12: de nas dkyil 'khor gyis spyad ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:105b-13: sa yongs su gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:105b-14: de nas bdag nyid khrus bya zhing //
T02TD2510.2E:105b-15: lus dris byugs la ji snyed pa'i gos dang rgyan gang gas shing gdong dri zhim par byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:105b-16: dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug ste /
T02TD2510.2E:105b-17: rin po che'i rgyu'i phyag rgyas rang gi dkyil 'khor chen po sbrul la /
T02TD2510.2E:105b-19: phyag bya ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sdom pa gzung ba byas la snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po yang dag par bsgrubs te /
T02TD2510.2E:105b-20: khang bu brtsegs pa dang gdan rnams sprul la ;
T02TD2510.2E:105b-21: dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
T02TD2510.2E:105b-22: bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:105b-23: deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02TD2510.2E:105b-24: bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD2510.2E:105b-25: lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam pas //
T02TD2510.2E:105b-26: gyur par bdag ni the tshom med //
T02TD2510.2E:105b-27: byang chub sems dang sems gcig las //
T02TD2510.2E:105b-28: mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te //
T02TD2510.2E:105b-29: nor bu chen po'i rigs su ni //
T02TD2510.2E:105b-30: deng bdag skyes par the tshom med //
T02TD2510.2E:105b-31: deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste //
T02TD2510.2E:105b-32: bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med //
T02TD2510.2E:105b-33: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:105b-34: deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:106a-1: lag thams cad kyis phyag byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:106a-2: spos snod lag tu thogs te /
T02TD2510.2E:106a-3: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:106a-4: ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yis //
T02TD2510.2E:106a-5: sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2510.2E:106a-6: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T02TD2510.2E:106a-7: rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2510.2E:106a-8: deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te //
T02TD2510.2E:106a-9: dngos grub 'di ni rab tu stsol //
T02TD2510.2E:106a-13: las kyi rgyal po mchog bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:106a-14: de nas yang don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:106a-15: don thams cad grub pa de'i gnas na 'dug pa de'i snying po zlos pa la bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:106a-17: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'a da banda nam ka ro mi /
T02TD2510.2E:106a-18: zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:106a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams yongs su gad bar bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:106a-20: bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can //
T02TD2510.2E:106a-21: rdo rje snying po'ang bdag rang nyid //
T02TD2510.2E:106a-22: bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che //
T02TD2510.2E:106a-23: stobs chen rdo rje can bdag yin //
T02TD2510.2E:106a-24: bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal//
T02TD2510.2E:106a-25: rdo rje rin chen brtan bdag yin //
T02TD2510.2E:106a-26: bdag po rin chen chen po bdag / byin gyis brlabs pa mi 'dor ro //
T02TD2510.2E:106a-27: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:106a-28: re ba thams cad grub pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir nga rgyal brtan par byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:106a-29: ma dang ta las mig gnyis su nyi ma dang zla ba de bzhin du bskyed la /
T02TD2510.2E:106a-30: yi ge aa: las rkang mthil du sna tshogs rdo rje bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:106a-31: de nas don thams cad grub pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:106a-32: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um badzra au tishtha /
T02TD2510.2E:106a-33: zhes zlos shing dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bteg la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:106a-34: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ta h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:106a-35: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab pa byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:106a-36: de nyid kyi phyag rgyas bdag nyid kyi snying ga dang dpral ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:106a-38: spyi bor lan cig byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2510.2E:106a-39: yang bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:106a-40: phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs //
T02TD2510.2E:106a-41: kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:106b-0: rdo rje snying po zhes @106b brjod cing //
T02TD2510.2E:106b-1: bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor //
T02TD2510.2E:106b-2: sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje dra ba'i mthar thug pa'i bsrung ba'i cho gas thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-3: sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas sgo phye nas /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-4: gsang ba'i gzugs can gyi dkyil 'khor dgug par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-5: aom badzra mandala h'um dza: zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan pas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:106b-6: de'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-7: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung rdo rjer mdud nas /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-8: dkyil 'khor thams cad 'gugs par byed pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:106b-9: de nas ma h'a badzra tsakra aa dhi siddhi tishth'a h'um zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa des yang dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-10: rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgya nyid 'di'i phyag rgya yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:106b-11: de nas lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bos mthe'u chung gi rtse mo mnan la /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-12: sor mo lhag ma rnams brkyang la /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-13: rdo rje rtse gsum ltar byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-14: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa bzung ste /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-15: dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-16: grva bzhir g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung ba'i rdo rje des mtha' yas dang /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-19: gsus po che zhes bya ba'i phur bu bzhi bskyed la lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum par byas pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-20: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya ;
T02TD2510.2E:106b-22: k'i la ya k'i la ya /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-24: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya badzra dh'a ro a'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-25: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis brdung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:106b-26: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i phur bu'i sngags sam /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-27: yang na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje las bshad pa'i phur bu'i sngags kyis seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la mngon par bsngags te /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-28: ji ltar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi zur bzhir phur bu gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:106b-29: ham kro dha ya ti ta ti ta ti ta ma ta phat /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-30: ces bya ba 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje las bshad pa'i sngags yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:106b-31: de nas nor bu'i gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad la rab dang dra ba byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-32: nor bu khu tshur gyis sgo bcad la /
T02TD2510.2E:106b-33: nor bu'i bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:107a-0: nor bu'i gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pas gsang ba'i bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi sgor gzhag la snga ma bzhin du mchod pa @107a * //
T02TD2510.2E:107a-2: mchod yon lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad nor bu'i gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i dri chus byugs la /
T02TD2510.2E:107a-3: de yongs su bzlas pa'i dri nyid kyis lha thams cad kyi gnas su dkyil 'khor bya ba yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:107a-4: de nas nam mkha'i phyogs na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la yid kyis phab la /
T02TD2510.2E:107a-5: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags dri'i thig le la lan bdun bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:107a-6: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rin chen 'bebs pa dang bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa rnams nam mkha'i phyogs nas phab ste /
T02TD2510.2E:107a-7: rang rang gi sngags kyis gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:107a-8: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2510.2E:107a-9: aom sarbba sam sk'a ra pa ri shuddhe dharmma te ga ga na sa mung+ge ta sva bh'a ba bi shuddhe aa h'a n'a ya pa ri b'a re sv'a h'a /
T02TD2510.2E:107a-10: zhes bya ba bskal pa bzang po'i sngags yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:107a-11: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bzhag nas chu cung zad cig blugs pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la rdo rje me dang /
T02TD2510.2E:107a-13: don thams cad grub pa'i sngags re re zhing yang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02TD2510.2E:107a-14: sngags mngon par bzlas pa'i mchod yon gyis so sor mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2510.2E:107a-15: lha de rnams kyi gzugs dang ldan pa'i bum pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:107a-16: mchod pa thams cad phyag rgya dang bcas pas yang dag par mchod la rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rdo rje rin po che'i me tog ni lcug ma la re re zhing lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la bdug pas bdug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:107a-17: nyin zhag gnyis pa la thun gsum du snga ma bzhin du mngon par bzlas la /
T02TD2510.2E:107a-18: de nas lhag par gnas par byas pa'i bum pa de don thams cad grub pa'i mdun du gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:107a-19: ji lta ba bzhin du lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:107a-20: nyi ma shar ba'i dus su de nas dkyil 'khor de don thams cad grub pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis nam mkha'i phyogs su bzhag la thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:107a-21: de la dang por re zhig sngon po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:107b-0: dkar po dri zhim po bsgos pas srad bu so sor kha bsgyur la go rims de nyid kyis @107b bzhag nas /
T02TD2510.2E:107b-1: h'um tr'am h'i: a'am aa zhes bya ba rang gi sa bon las mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de rnams srad bu rnams la bkod de /
T02TD2510.2E:107b-2: d'ipta drishti aam ku sha dza: zhes bya ba mig gnyis la bkod la /
T02TD2510.2E:107b-3: rab tu g-yo zhing 'bar ba'i mig / mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:107b-4: zhes 'bar ba'i lta bas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa sprul zhing 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:107b-5: bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po thig gdab pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:107b-6: rdo rje'i thig bdag la stsol cig ces pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:107b-7: de nas rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pas btang ba'i srang bu 'bar ba'i lcags kyus bkug ste ;
T02TD2510.2E:107b-8: rang gi lag na gnas pa'i srad bu des gang bar byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:107b-9: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga t'a sarbba dharmm'a: par spa ra aa nu pra bishta sarbba dharmm'a: aa tyanta aa nu pra bishta sarbba dharmm'a: aom sarbba aartha siddha h'um zhes brjod cing bsgril bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:107b-10: bsgril nas mig g-yas dang g-yon du ta dang ma las nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la /
T02TD2510.2E:107b-11: badzra drishti ma ta zhes bya bas brtan par byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:107b-12: dris byugs pa'i gser la sogs pa'i snod du thig skud legs par bzhag la /
T02TD2510.2E:107b-13: dri dang me tog dang bdug spos kyis mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:107b-14: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tr'am m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes bya ba'i thig skud kyi sngags 'di dang rdo rje bsdams pas bzung ste brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:107b-15: de nas bdag po lnga dang sems dpa' bcu drug bzlas pa'i dris sa gzhi byugs la /
T02TD2510.2E:107b-16: phyi rol kun me tog gis mdzes par byas la bar snang la bzhugs pa'i rigs thams cad la mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2510.2E:107b-17: me tog la sogs pa dang sgeg mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:107b-19: mig g-yas dang g-yon du dza ser po bkod la /
T02TD2510.2E:107b-20: nyi ma dang zla ba ser po'i snang ba bskyed de /
T02TD2510.2E:107b-21: klu dang rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor brtag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:107b-22: de la re zhig sngar mngon par bzlas la kha dog dkar po dri zhim pas srang bu spangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:107b-23: de nas rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:107b-24: rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje rin po che las bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog nor bu mchong pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po'i sngags kyis yid la sprul la /
T02TD2510.2E:107b-25: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis thig skud blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:108a-0: dza zhes bya bas bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi lag tu srad bu de @108a * //
T02TD2510.2E:108a-2: phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom zhing shar phyogs su bltas te /
T02TD2510.2E:108a-3: slob dpon gyis tshangs pa'i thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108a-4: dza dza dza: zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:108a-5: bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis thig skud drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108a-6: yang slob dpon lho phyogs su 'dug ste /
T02TD2510.2E:108a-7: byang du bltas te tshangs pa'i thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108a-8: de nas yang me'i phyogs kyi char gnas te /
T02TD2510.2E:108a-9: byang du kha bltas la phyi'i dkyil 'khor shar du thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108a-10: rlung gi phyogs su gnas la lho'i phyogs su bltas te nub kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108a-12: shar du bltas te byang du thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108a-13: yang me'i phyogs su 'dug ste nub tu bltas te lho'i thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108a-14: de nas kha khyer dang lha'i snam bu'i thig kyang gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108a-15: yang me'i mtshams su gnas te rlung gi bar gyi mtshams kyi thig gdab pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:108a-16: yang bden bral gyi mtshams su gnas te /
T02TD2510.2E:108a-17: dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi bar gyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108a-19: sgo khyud kyi thig gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:108a-20: sgo ni dbus ma'i cha brgyad pa //
T02TD2510.2E:108a-21: kha khyer ni sgo'i thad ka spangs pa'i lha'i snam bu dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108a-22: kha khyer ni sgo'i phyed kyi tshad yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:108a-23: sgo 'gram gyi tshad de nyid sgo khyud kyi yang de yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:108a-24: rta babs ni sgo'i sum 'gyur du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108a-25: tshon sna lnga'i sa ni kha khyer gyi phyed kyi tshad du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108a-26: de ltar phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig btab nas /
T02TD2510.2E:108a-27: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:108a-28: phyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyed tshad la /
T02TD2510.2E:108a-29: nor bu'i ka ba brgyad dang yang dag par ldan pa //
T02TD2510.2E:108a-30: rin po che zur brgyad pa'i dbyibs la rin po che 'bar ba du mas mdzes pa /
T02TD2510.2E:108a-31: sgo spangs pa'i ri mo gnyis zlum por byas pa /
T02TD2510.2E:108a-32: ri mo gnyis kyi bar du lcug mas mdzes par byas pa zlum po bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108a-33: rin po che phreng ba'i 'od zer kha phyi rol du bltas pas snang bar byed pa /
T02TD2510.2E:108a-34: bdag po lnga'i gnas su rin po che'i ri mo zlum po lnga byas la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga lnga bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108a-35: phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re la yang rin po che chen po'i ri mo zlum pos bskor ba shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108b-0: @108b de la slob dpon lho phyogs su 'dug nas /
T02TD2510.2E:108b-1: shar phyogs kyi gdung dang ka ba gnyis kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108b-2: byang phyogs su 'dug la nub kyi gdung dang ka ba gnyis kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108b-3: nub tu 'dug la byang gi gdung dang ka ba gnyis kyi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108b-4: shar phyogs su 'dug la lho phyogs kyi gdung dang ka ba gnyis kyi thig gdab par bya la /
T02TD2510.2E:108b-5: 'di cha gsum pa mnyam pa'i thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108b-6: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje phur bu btab la /
T02TD2510.2E:108b-7: skud pa btags te ri mo zlum po gnyis kyi bar du rin po che lcug ma'i thig gis thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108b-8: de la thig gdab pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:108b-9: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108b-10: thig 'dabs pa'i dus su slob dpon dang /
T02TD2510.2E:108b-11: slob ma rnams rdo rje shugs kyis bteg ste /
T02TD2510.2E:108b-13: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sngags kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phur bu bton la /
T02TD2510.2E:108b-14: tshon sna lngas phur bu'i khung bu mnyam por byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:108b-15: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas nas mig g-yas pa dang g-yon par hr'i las nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed de /
T02TD2510.2E:108b-16: khro bo'i lta bas kun du bltas nas sgo rnams dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108b-17: de ltar dkyil 'khor thig btab la tshon dgye bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108b-18: de nas tshon rtsi bsgrub par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:108b-19: de la tshon dkar po la aom las rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs dang /
T02TD2510.2E:108b-20: sngon po la h'um las mi bskyod pa'i gzugs dang /
T02TD2510.2E:108b-21: ser po la tr'am las rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gzugs dang /
T02TD2510.2E:108b-22: dmar po la hr'i: las snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzugs dang /
T02TD2510.2E:108b-23: ljang gu la aa las don yod grub pa'i gzugs su bskyed de /
T02TD2510.2E:108b-24: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba 'dis phyag rgya dang ldan pas re re zhing yang lan bdun gyi bar du bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108b-25: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:108b-26: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las ni //
T02TD2510.2E:108b-27: mdzub mo'i rtse mo mnyam sbyar ba//
T02TD2510.2E:108b-28: byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad ni //
T02TD2510.2E:108b-29: 'bar pa'i lta bas dgug par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:108b-30: hi zhes bya bas mthar sbar bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:108b-32: dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:108b-33: g-yas nas bskor bas g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis tshon rtsi rim gyis dgye bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:109a-0: phyis ni ji ltar bde bar @109a * //
T02TD2510.2E:109a-7: kun gyi nang du dkar po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:109a-9: sngon po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin //
T02TD2510.2E:109a-10: gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa ste //
T02TD2510.2E:109a-11: padma r'a ga'i rang bzhin gzhan //
T02TD2510.2E:109a-13: / dkar po nad du shes bya ste //
T02TD2510.2E:109a-14: de ni tshon gyi rim par bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:109a-16: ji lta ba bzhin du phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor bris nas /
T02TD2510.2E:109a-17: de nas nang gi dkyil 'khor ri mo zlum po gnyis bskor ba'i nang du rin po che'i lcug ma bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:109a-18: phyi rol gyi ri mo dang nye bar kha phyir bltas pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i phreng ba 'bar ba dang bcas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:109a-19: de nas nor bu'i ka ba brgyad byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:109a-20: ka ba brgyad pa'i dbus su zur brgyad pa'i nor bu dang 'dra ba 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i nang gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:109a-21: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad padma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:109a-22: seng ge'i gdan la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i tshul gyis /
T02TD2510.2E:109a-23: aom buddha ratna h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:109a-24: snying po 'di nam mkha'i phyogs nas phab ste /
T02TD2510.2E:109a-25: gzugs brnyan dang gcig tu bsre bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:109a-26: de bzhin du thams cad kyang shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:109a-27: de'i phyogs rnams su padma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:109a-30: aom badzra ratna aam ku ra h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:109a-32: aom badzra ratna p'a sha h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:109a-33: zhes bya ba'i snying po rnams kyis phyag rgya bzhi bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:109a-34: de nas shar phyogs kyi rin po che re'u mig gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying po 'khor dang bcas pa /
T02TD2510.2E:109a-35: aom sarbba aartha si ddhi pra d'a h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:109a-36: aom badzra ma ni tsint'a a'a k'a sha garbha siddhya siddhya h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:109a-37: aom ratna aam ku sha a'a karsha ya /
T02TD2510.2E:109a-38: sarbba aartha aa na ya sh'i ghram sarbba ta th'a ga ta sa tya ma nu sma ra h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:109a-39: aom ma ni r'a ga ba shi ku ru sarbba aarth'a na ya a'a k'a sha garbha h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:109a-41: zhes bya pa'i snying po 'di rnams kyis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:109a-42: lho phyogs kyi nor bu'i re'u mig gi dbus su /
T02TD2510.2E:109a-43: rin chen phreng ba 'khor dang bcas pa rnams /
T02TD2510.2E:109a-45: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ratna m'a la h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-0: aom tsintr'a ma ni dhva dza sarbba a'a sh'a pa ra p'u ra ka a'a @109b k'a sha garbha h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-1: aom ratna aatta ha sa ha sa h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:109b-2: nub phyogs kyi nor bu'i re'u mig gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das rin chen padma 'khor dang bcas pa /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-4: aom tya ga sa ma dhi dznya na garbha h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-5: aom ratna ko sha l'a ya gra h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-6: aom ma ni tsa kra pra barta ya h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-8: zhes bya ba'i snying po bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:109b-9: byang phyogs kyi nor bu'i re'u mig gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rin chen char 'bebs 'khor dang bcas pa /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-10: aom ratn'a drishta barsh'a ya sarbba aartha sam ba di bha ga b'a na ma ni ha sta h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-11: aom ma ni p'u dza sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-12: aom ma ni bandha ka pa tsa h'um ;
T02TD2510.2E:109b-13: aom ma ni dam shtra ka r'a la ma h'a yaksha ha ra ha ra sarbba aarth'a na bhi sh'a pa ya h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-14: aom ma ni ratna bandha sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-15: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:109b-16: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams ni /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-20: aom ratna nri tya h'um zhes bya bas so //
T02TD2510.2E:109b-21: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi zur rnams su /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-22: rin chen bdug pa ma la sogs pa rnams /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-25: aom ratna a'a lo ki / aom ma ni gandhi zhes bya bas so //
T02TD2510.2E:109b-26: shar phyogs kyi sgo la sogs pa rnams su /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-27: rin chen lcags kyu la sogs pa /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-28: aom sarba ratna a'a k'a sha a'arya aa ru na /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-29: ma h'a satva bha ga b'antam a'a k'a sha ba ra pra tso da ya a'a karsha ya shr'i gham ho dza: aom sarbba ratna pra be sha sa ma yam /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-30: ma h'a ma ni r'a dza ku la ratna p'a sha h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-31: aom ma ni bandha h'um bam /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-32: aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha aa:/
T02TD2510.2E:109b-33: zhes bya ba'i snying po bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:109b-34: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams su byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' stong du bzhis ma tshang ba mnyam pa phyogs bzhir rig pas bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:109b-35: aom sarbba sam sk'a ra pa ri shuddhe dharmma te ga ga nas mung+ga te sva bh'a ba bi shuddhe ma n'a n'a ya pa ri b'a re sv'a h'a /
T02TD2510.2E:109b-36: zhes bya bas rdo rje snying po nas bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du gzugs brnyan thams cad zla ba dang padma'i gdan la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa gser gyi mdog can dga' zhing mgu ba ste /
T02TD2510.2E:110a-0: rdo rje nor bu la sogs pa kun nas 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying po sna tshogs pa rdo rje nor bu rin po cha'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba rgyan thams cad @110a * //
T02TD2510.2E:110a-1: kyis brgyan par byas pa'i sku rdo rje nor bu rin po che chen po'i mtshan ma bsnams pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110a-2: 'di dag la khyad par gyi dgag pa ni med do //
T02TD2510.2E:110a-3: de la rdo rje sems ma'i gnas su rdo rje nor bu'i rdo rje rtsa lnga pas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110a-4: rin chen rdo rje ma'i gnas su rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu ma'i rin po che'i phreng ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110a-5: rdo rje chos ma'i gnas su rin chen padma'i 'dab ma bcu drug pa padma'i gnas su yid bzhin nor bu /
T02TD2510.2E:110a-6: las kyi rdo rje ma'i gnas su rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs ma'i rin po che rgya gram gyi dbus su rdo rje nor bu chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110a-7: bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:110a-8: nor bu'i khu tshur gyis dril bu bsnams shing /
T02TD2510.2E:110a-9: de nyid kyis bsnyems pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:110a-10: phyag g-yas pa na rdo re nor bu dang bcas pa'i mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgyas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110a-12: g-yon pa'i rin po che'i khu tshur gyis dril bus bsnyems pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:110a-13: g-yas pas kha tv'am ga'i phyag rgyas nor bus mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa snying gar 'debs pa'i tshul gyis bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110a-14: rin chen rgyal po ni rdo rje nor bus mtshan pa'i rin po che'i lcags kyus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sdud par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110a-15: nor bu'i chags pa ni rin chen mnga' dang gzhus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'bigs par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110a-16: rin chen legs pa ni phyag gnyis kyi khu tshur legs par sbyin pa'i tshul gyis mnyes par byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110a-17: rin chen lta ba ni mig gnyis dang ldan pa'i rin po che'i gtsug tor dang bcas pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba mgo la bcing zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110a-18: rin chen phreng ba yang de bzhin du dbang bskur bar byed pa las /
T02TD2510.2E:110a-20: mig spangs pa'i nor bu'i phreng ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110a-21: nor bu nyi ma ni phyag g-yas na rin po ches mtshan pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams te /
T02TD2510.2E:110a-22: 'od kyis snang bar mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:110a-23: phyag g-yon gdan la brten cing bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110a-24: nor bu'i dpal gyi phyag g-yas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa /
T02TD2510.2E:110a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:110b-0: phyag g-yon pa gdan la brten nas bzhugs @110b pa'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:110b-1: / rin chen bzhad pa ni phyag g-yas kyis so'i phreng ba gnyis kyi rtse mo na nor bus mtshan pa'i rdo rje rin po che gnyis bsnams te /
T02TD2510.2E:110b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dzum zhing rin po che'i bzhad pa rmad du byung ba la nges par sbyong ba phyag g-yas pa gdan la brten nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110b-3: rin chen padma'i ting nge 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgyas padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa yid bzhin gyi nor bus mtshan pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110b-4: gtong ba ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi snying po ni padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa nor bus mtshan pa g-yon pa nor bu'i khu tshur bsnyems pa'i tshul dang /
T02TD2510.2E:110b-5: g-yas pa'i phyag gis rang gi thugs kar 'byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110b-6: rin chen rnon po ni g-yon pa'i rin po che'i khu tshur gyi nor bus mtshan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam thugs kar bsnams nas phyag g-yas pas nor bus mtshan pa'i ral gris de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs pa'i tshul can no //
T02TD2510.2E:110b-7: nor bu'i 'khor lo ni nor bus mtshan pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa phyag g-yas pa'i gung mo la bskor ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:110b-8: phyag g-yon pa gdan la brten cing bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110b-9: nor bu'i gsung ba ni phyag g-yas pas nor bus mtshan pa'i lce'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang chos bdag med pa'i gtam smra bar mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:110b-10: phyag g-yon gdan la brten nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110b-11: rin chen char 'bebs ni phyag g-yon pa rin po che'i khu tshur gyis nor bu rgya gram gyi dril bu bsnams shing bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i tshul dang /
T02TD2510.2E:110b-12: phyag g-yas pas rin po che char 'bebs pa'i tshul du mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110b-13: rin chen mchod pa ni rin chen char 'bebs bzhin du g-yon bsnyems pa'i tshul dang /
T02TD2510.2E:110b-14: phyag g-yas pa nor bus mtshan pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje rang gi thugs kar bstod pa'i tshul gyis bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110b-15: nor bu'i bsrung ba ni nor bus mtshan pa'i go cha bsnams te /
T02TD2510.2E:110b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la go bskon pa'i tshul du mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:110b-17: nor bu'i gnod sbyin ni sku mdog nag po zhal mche ba gtsigs pas 'jigs pa /
T02TD2510.2E:111a-0: khu tshur gnyis kyis nor bus mtshan pa'i mche ba gnyis kha'i 'gram du 'dzin cing bzhugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad @111a * //
T02TD2510.2E:111a-2: nor bu'i khu tshur ni dam tshig gi nor bu'i khu tshur gnyis kyi nang du nor bus mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa btsir zhing bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111a-3: rin chen sgeg mo ni rin po ches mtshan pa'i rdo rje gnyis bsnams pas rin po che 'gying ba'i tshul gyis g-yon nas g-yas su mgo bo 'dud pa'i tshul du byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111a-4: rin chen phreng ba ma ni rin chen phreng bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111a-5: rin chen glu ma ni rin po che'i pi wang brdung ba'i tshul du byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111a-6: rin chen gar ma ni rdo rje nor bus mtshan pa'i phyag gnyis gar mdzad cing bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111a-7: rin chen bdug pa ma ni rin po che'i spos snod bsnams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:111a-8: rin po che'i bdug pas de bzhin gshags pa thams cad tshim par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111a-9: rin po che'i me tog ni phyag g-yon gyis rin po che'i me tog gi snod thogs te /
T02TD2510.2E:111a-10: phyag g-yas pas rin po che'i me tog gi char 'bebs shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111a-11: rin po che'i mar me ma ni rin po che'i mchod sdong bsnams te /
T02TD2510.2E:111a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang bar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111a-13: rin po che'i byug pa ni phyag g-yon pas rin po che'i dung chos bsnams te /
T02TD2510.2E:111a-14: phyag g-yas kyis dri'i sprin gyis char 'bebs par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111a-15: rin po che'i lcags kyu ni lha'i bu skya rengs kyi gzugs can rin po che'i lcags kyus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs nas thar pa chen po'i grong khyer gyi sgo dang nye bar sdud par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111a-16: rin po che zhags pa ni rin po che'i zhags pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du 'jug par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111a-17: rin chen lcags sgrog ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'ching bar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111a-18: rin chen 'bebs pa ni rin po che'i dril bus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'bebs par mdzad pa'o//
T02TD2510.2E:111a-19: shar phyogs kyi lha'i snam bu'i nang du bskal ba bzang bo nor bus mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111a-20: lho phyogs su rin chen phreng ba bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111a-21: nub phyogs su rin chen padma bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111a-22: byang phyogs su nor bus mtshan par sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111b-1: phyi rol nye 'khor kun du dris byugs nas /
T02TD2510.2E:111b-3: don thams cad grub pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:111b-4: me tog gi phreng ba blangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:111b-5: rdo rje shugs kyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya zhing /
T02TD2510.2E:111b-6: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra d'a h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:111b-8: yang dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lhag pa dang ma tshad pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bltas la rdo rje rin po che'i dril bu dkrol zhing /
T02TD2510.2E:111b-9: dkyil 'khor lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa la phreng ba de phul te /
T02TD2510.2E:111b-10: rdo rje rin po che'i gar byas nas rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111b-11: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra d'a h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:111b-12: zhes kyang rgyun mi 'chad pa kho nar bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111b-14: rdo rje dril bu bskul bas //
T02TD2510.2E:111b-15: mkhas pas ma tshang yongs su bskong //
T02TD2510.2E:111b-16: lhag pa yang ni dor mdzad pas //
T02TD2510.2E:111b-19: de'i rjes la yi ge h'um las bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111b-20: de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:111b-21: rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas //
T02TD2510.2E:111b-22: rin chen sgo ni rnam bzhi po //
T02TD2510.2E:111b-23: yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:111b-24: aom badzra audgha tra ya sa ma ya pra be sha h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:111b-26: phyag rgya dang bcas pas bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:111b-27: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:111b-28: rdo rje mdzub sor gnyis legs pas //
T02TD2510.2E:111b-29: sbyar la bkan te bzlas nas su //
T02TD2510.2E:111b-30: rab tu khros nas dbye ba na //
T02TD2510.2E:111b-31: sgo 'byed pa yi mchog yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:111b-32: de nas rin po che 'am sa las byas pa'i bum pa rtsa ba mi gnag pa gsus pa che ba mgrin pa ring ba mchu 'phyang ba /
T02TD2510.2E:111b-33: rin po che thams cad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:111b-34: sman dang dri'i chus yongs su bkang ba rdo rje nor bus mtshan pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i nor bu'i steng du gzhag pa /
T02TD2510.2E:111b-35: mgul ba ras bzang pos bcings pa /
T02TD2510.2E:111b-36: 'dab ma dang 'bras bu dri zhim pas kha brgyan pa dris kun du byugs te /
T02TD2510.2E:111b-37: me tog gi phreng ba btags pa sngar bsnyen pa byas pa rdo rje nor bu chen po'i phyag rgyas rin po che'i me tog gi lcug ma bzung la /
T02TD2510.2E:111b-38: aom badzra au da ka h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:111b-39: zhes lan stong rtsa brgyad bzla ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:111b-40: bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i bum pa bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:112a-0: bum pa gnyis pa ni don thams cad grub pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad @112a * //
T02TD2510.2E:112a-1: bzlas la 'jug pa'i sgo mngon par phyogs par gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:112a-2: des 'jug pa'i dus su bdag dang slob ma dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:112a-3: rdo rje nor bu chen po'i phyag rgya bcing ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:112a-5: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i bum pa so so'i mtshan mas mtshan pa phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du dkyil 'khor kun la bskor te bzhag la /
T02TD2510.2E:112a-6: bum pa gang ba la yang de'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:112a-7: gal te med na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i snying po'i bum pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:112a-11: rin chen char 'bebs rnams kyi rang rang gi sngags kyis bum pa la bzlas nas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:112a-13: zhes bya ba rigs kyi snying po 'dis don thams cad grub pa'i bum pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas don thams cad grub pa'i rigs kyi lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:112a-15: zhes bya bas rin chen lta ba'i rigs kyi bum pa la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:112a-17: zhes bya bas rin chen padma'i rigs kyi bum pha la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:112a-19: zhes bya bas rin chen char 'bebs kyi bum pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
T02TD2510.2E:112a-20: rin chen char 'bebs kyi lha rnams la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:112a-21: de nas bdag po lnga'i bum pa gang ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:112a-22: rigs bzhis gang ba'i bum pa bzhis dbul ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:112a-23: byams pa la sogs pa rnams la gang ba'i bum pa gcig la de'i rig pa bzlas nas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:112a-24: gal te ma rnyed par gyur na bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:112a-25: de nas snga ma bzhin du khrus bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:112a-26: rnal 'byor chen po yang dag par bsgrubs la /
T02TD2510.2E:112a-27: don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs dang rjes su mthun pa'i rgyan gdags pa gos thams cad la dri dang bdug pas legs par bsgos nas rin chen gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas te /
T02TD2510.2E:112a-28: ze'u ka bcing ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:112a-29: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyis rgyan thams cad la mngon par bsngags la /
T02TD2510.2E:112a-30: ji ltar rjes su mthun pa'i slob dpon bdag nyid la rnam par brgyan te /
T02TD2510.2E:112a-31: yang cod pan la rin po che'i myu gu dang /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-0: dar dbyangs la rdo rje rin chen yongs su bzlas @112b te /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-1: cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyi dbang bskur bas /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-2: bdag nyid la dbang bskur nas /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-3: mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:112b-4: dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon sum lta bur bsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-5: phyag byas la mchod yon phul me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-6: rdo rje nor bu dang rin po che'i dril bu bzung ste /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-7: gdong g-yogs kyi gos la nor bu'i gnod sbyin dang sgo srung yongs su bzlas te /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-8: gdong g-yogs bcings la lag na me tog thogs nas /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-9: slob dpon gyis phyag bzhi bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:112b-10: de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-12: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2510.2E:112b-13: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:112b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:112b-15: de nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid la dbang bskur la /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-16: rdo rje nor bu chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-17: 'jug pa'i cho gas zhugs par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:112b-18: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la bdag nyid la dbab par byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-19: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis lag pa g-yas pa'i rdo rje nor bu chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya la /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-20: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mos yang dang yang dral bar bya zhing /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-21: aa aa zhes lan brgya bzla'o //
T02TD2510.2E:112b-22: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du me tog gi phreng ba dor la /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-23: rang gi spyi bor bcing ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-24: gdong g-yogs bkrol te dkyil 'khor bltas nas dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:112b-25: slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba'i cho gas dbang bskur bar byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-26: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-27: mig dbye ba la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-28: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis rjes su gnang ba nos te /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-29: de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje nor bu bzung nas /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-30: chos kyi rin po che'i dril bu dkrol te /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-31: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-32: don thams cad grub pa'i snying po zlos shing /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-33: dngos grub kyi rdo rje nor bu'i brtul zhugs blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-34: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-35: phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:112b-37: lung bstan pa yang blang ngo //
T02TD2510.2E:112b-38: yang bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:113a-0: bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur ba yang bdag nyid kyis byas la bdag nyid yang dag par @113a * //
T02TD2510.2E:113a-2: bsgom par byas nas don thams cad grub pa bdag yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa bdag nyid kyi ming gang yang rung ba nas brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:113a-4: rin po che'i dril bu gzung ba nyid kyis rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:113a-5: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su /
T02TD2510.2E:113a-6: aom buddha ratna h'um aa zhes bya bas /
T02TD2510.2E:113a-7: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje nor bus mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:113a-8: de nas badzra aa ham zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i nga rgyal du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:113a-9: rdo rje de nyid ya th'a sarbba ta th'a ga ta ta th'a aa ham zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad kyi bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:113a-10: de ltar rdo rje dril bu'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:113a-11: aom ma nirtna aa a'a be sha zhes bya bas /
T02TD2510.2E:113a-12: rin chen 'bebs pa'i gnas su rin chen 'bebs pa'i ngo bo rin po che dril bur bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:113a-13: ratna aa bi sha ghatsda aa ham zhes bya bas /
T02TD2510.2E:113a-14: rin po che dril bu'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:113a-15: rin po che dril bu de /
T02TD2510.2E:113a-16: ma ni ratna a'a be sha ham /
T02TD2510.2E:113a-17: zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin chen char 'bebs pa'i skur bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:113a-18: de ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad rdo rjes bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:113a-19: de nas sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo phye la /
T02TD2510.2E:113a-20: bsdu ba byas te mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
T02TD2510.2E:113a-21: sgo thams cad du rin chen lcags kyu la sogs pa phyag rgya rnams kyis las byas nas snga ma bzhin du rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad la /
T02TD2510.2E:113a-22: rab dang dra ba yang byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:113a-23: nor bu'i khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas sgo rnams bcad la nor bu'i srung bas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:113a-24: don thams cad grub pa'i snying po 'dis dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la mchod yon phul nas /
T02TD2510.2E:113a-25: snga ma bzhin du zhal bsil gyi phyag rgyas kyang zhal bsil dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:113a-26: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:113a-27: aom buddha ratna dri shya dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2510.2E:113a-29: sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02TD2510.2E:113a-30: aom buddha ratna h'um zhes lan gsum brjod cing rnam par snang mdzad bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:113a-31: de bzhin du nor bu rin chen 'bebs pa'i bar du dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:113a-32: aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha dri shya dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2510.2E:113b-0: @113b sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02TD2510.2E:113b-1: aom ma ni ratna a'a be sha a'a /
T02TD2510.2E:113b-2: zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:113b-3: nor bu rin chen 'bebs pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:113b-4: snga ma bzhin du bskal ba bzang po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bskal ba bzang po snga mas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:113b-5: de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya sa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:113b-6: bskal ba bzang po'i mthar thug pa bsgrubs nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab ste /
T02TD2510.2E:113b-7: rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dbang bskur la /
T02TD2510.2E:113b-8: rin po che'i myu gu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rin po che'i bskal pa bzang po la mthar thug pa thams cad dbang bskur te /
T02TD2510.2E:113b-9: mchod yon phul nas mchod pa'i khyad par thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:113b-10: de la dang por gos dang rgyan thams cad la nor bu'i gnod sbyin dang /
T02TD2510.2E:113b-11: don thams cad grub pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:113b-12: yi ge aom yongs su bzlas te ;
T02TD2510.2E:113b-13: lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:113b-15: bla re sna tshogs rnams dang /
T02TD2510.2E:113b-16: yang me tog gi shing brgya'am /
T02TD2510.2E:113b-17: me tog gi shing bzhi la /
T02TD2510.2E:113b-22: mar me la snga ma bzhin du sngags bzlas la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:113b-23: rol mo brdung ba'i sngags dang /
T02TD2510.2E:113b-24: phyag rgya rnams kyis rol mo thams cad sngar bshad pa bzhin dbul ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:113b-25: dar yang dpyad par bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:113b-26: phreng ba snga mas rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2510.2E:113b-27: dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras //
T02TD2510.2E:113b-28: zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes //
T02TD2510.2E:113b-29: rta babs yid du 'ong ba yi //
T02TD2510.2E:113b-30: dril bu la sogs bcang ba dang ;
T02TD2510.2E:113b-31: / rta dang glang po'i khyu rnams dang //
T02TD2510.2E:113b-32: shin tu brtags nas dbul bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:113b-34: don thams cad grub pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:113b-35: yi ge aom mngon par bzlas te /
T02TD2510.2E:113b-36: de la mchod pa thams cad dbul ba'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:113b-38: de nas rin po che sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams pa brgyad kyis mchod pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:113b-39: nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu drug gis dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod la /
