T02TD2510.2E:113b-40: yi ge aom las byung ba'i rin po che lnga bdun la sogs pas nam mkha' bkang la /
T02TD2510.2E:114a-0: aom sarbba bitp'u ra p'u ra su ra @114a * //
T02TD2510.2E:114a-1: su ra a'a barta a'a barta ho //
T02TD2510.2E:114a-2: zhes bya ba 'dis thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas mchod pa'i sprin thams cad dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:114a-3: yang rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhis yang dag par mchod la dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:114a-4: sems can thams cad kyi don mdzod cig ces gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:114a-5: de nas rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i cho gas yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la gsol ba btab ste /
T02TD2510.2E:114a-6: phyag 'tshal nas slob ma gzhug pa'i gnang ba nod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:114a-7: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis /
T02TD2510.2E:114a-8: rin chen slob dpon dka' thub ches //
T02TD2510.2E:114a-9: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:114a-10: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:114a-11: zhes bya ba ni rin po che slob dpon gyi cho ga rgyas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:114a-12: de'i rjes la slob dpon ma gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:114a-13: dang por re zhig ji lta ba bzhin du lhag par gnas pa byas la dbang bskur bar 'os pa bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su gzung ba'am dge spyod dam /
T02TD2510.2E:114a-14: dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su gzung ba'i slob ma lag na me tog thogs pa slob dpon la mngon par phyag nas 'dis skad brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:114a-15: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02TD2510.2E:114a-16: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2510.2E:114a-17: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02TD2510.2E:114a-18: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2510.2E:114a-19: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02TD2510.2E:114a-20: sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la gnang //
T02TD2510.2E:114a-21: de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i gos kyis dgong g-yogs bcing pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:114a-22: stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs bskon te /
T02TD2510.2E:114a-23: sgo bzhi nas slob ma phyag bzhi byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2510.2E:114a-24: phyag bzhi byas zin pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:114a-25: yang slob dpon la phyag byas la lag na me tog thogs pa'i thal mo snying gar sbyar te bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:114a-26: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2510.2E:114a-27: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang ;
T02TD2510.2E:114a-32: las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:114a-36: rig sngags kyi lha thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02TD2510.2E:114a-37: bdag rin po che ming 'di zhes bgyi bas /
T02TD2510.2E:114b-0: phyogs @114b bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:114b-5: las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:114b-9: rig sngags kyi lha thams cad kyi spyan sngar sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags pas so sor bshags par bgyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-10: phyogs bcu na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:114b-11: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2510.2E:114b-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02TD2510.2E:114b-15: yang dag par song ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:114b-16: yang dag par zhugs pa rnams sems can gyi tshogs thams cad kyi bsod nams thams cad la rgya cher yi rang bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-17: phyogs bcu'i sangs gyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi mdzad pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i phyir bskul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-18: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad la mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol bar 'tshal lo //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-19: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:114b-20: gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-21: thub pa nyi ma ma lus pa //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-22: sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-23: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-24: slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la /
T02TD2510.2E:114b-25: sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba'i //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-27: thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog / gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-28: gsang ba rigs mtho thams cad du //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-29: slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-30: mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-31: skal pa chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-32: mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-33: dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-34: sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-35: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-36: dbang bskur ba ni rmad po che //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-37: sems can kun gyi don bgyid cing //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-38: bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-39: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-40: de nas slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:114b-41: che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni //
T02TD2510.2E:114b-42: byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-0: @115a * // dam tshig sdom dang gsang ba yi //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-2: de nas slob dpon gyis kyang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:115a-3: gsang ba chen po rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-4: gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-5: bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-6: des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-7: sangs rgya chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-8: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-9: 'di ni sangs rgyas dag pa yi //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-10: dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-11: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-12: blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar gyis //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-13: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-14: shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-15: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-16: 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-17: sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-18: rin chen rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-19: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-20: zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-21: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin//
T02TD2510.2E:115a-22: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-23: dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-25: dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-26: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-27: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-28: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-29: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya ;
T02TD2510.2E:115a-30: / de las gzhan pa bcu bzhi 'di //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-31: phas pham bar ni rab tu bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-32: spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-33: rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad do //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-34: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-35: nyin re zhing ni bzla bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-37: kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-38: khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-39: ma byin par yang mi blangs ngo //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-40: 'dod pa log par mi spyad cing //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-41: brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-42: phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba nim //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-43: chang gi rnam par spang bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-44: sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs pa //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-45: bya ba ma yin thams cad spang //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-46: dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-47: rnal 'byor can nams bsnyen bkur bya //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-48: lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-49: dag gi rnam ba bzhi rnams dang //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-50: yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-51: ci nus par ni rjes su bskyang //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-52: theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-53: sems can don la rgyab phyogs min //
T02TD2510.2E:115a-54: 'khor ba pa dag yongs mi spong//
T02TD2510.2E:115b-0: @115b rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-1: lha dang lha yin gsang ba //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-2: khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-3: phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-4: mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya zhing //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-5: 'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-6: khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-7: des kyang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-8: slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gson //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-9: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal ba //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-10: de ltar bdag ni bgyi bar 'tshal //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-11: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-12: byang chub sems ni nges mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-13: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-14: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-15: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-16: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-17: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-18: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-19: bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-20: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-21: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-22: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-23: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-24: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-25: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-26: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-27: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-28: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba las /
T02TD2510.2E:115b-29: nyin re zhing yang dus drug tu //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-30: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-31: byang chub chen po las byung ba //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-32: padma'i rigs mchog dag pa la //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-33: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-34: dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-35: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-36: sngom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-37: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-38: mchod pa'i las kyang mi nus bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-39: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-40: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyi zhing //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-41: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-42: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-43: ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-44: ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-45: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-46: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-47: gang zhig sdom pa 'dzin par mi byed pa de la ni 'jug pa tsam zhig byed du gzhug gi / slob dpon du rjes su gnang ba dang dbang bskur bar yang mi bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-48: de nas aom sarbba yo gtsitta autp'a da y'a mi zhes bya ba 'dis /
T02TD2510.2E:115b-49: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2510.2E:115b-50: dam pa bdag gis bskyed nas su //
T02TD2510.2E:116a-2: rdo rje rab tu gzhag par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:116a-3: su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-4: badzra siddhi ya th'a su kham /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-5: de nas don thams cad grub pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-6: rdo rje nor bu chen po la sogs pa rnam pa bzhis de don thams cad grub par byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:116a-7: de phyi rol na gnas pa'i don thams cad grub pa'i bum pas dbang bskur la /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-8: dri dang me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de yon gyi mchog blangs nas /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-9: rdo rje shugs kyis dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:116a-10: de la dang por re zhig slob dpon rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-11: slob ma yang 'ching du 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:116a-13: aom badzra ma ni sa ma ya bam /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-14: de nas de nyid kyi mdzub mo gnyis kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-15: aom h'um pra bi sha ma ni dza dza ku lam zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:116a-16: de nas rin chen lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-17: yang lho phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du zhugs la /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-18: rin chen zhags pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-19: de nas nub phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du zhugs la /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-20: rin chen lcags sgrog gis bcing ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-21: de nas byang phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du zhugs la /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-22: rin chen zhags pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas dbang du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:116a-23: yang shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-24: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i rigs su zhugs kyi ngas ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du grub pa yang thob na /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-25: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te ;
T02TD2510.2E:116a-26: de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-27: phyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cig / khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-28: de nas rin chen slob dpon rang nyid kyis rin chen nor bu ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-29: kha thur du bstan pa dang gyen du bstan pa bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:116a-30: rin chen slob ma'i spyi bor gzhag ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:116a-31: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyi gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:116a-32: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
T02TD2510.2E:116b-0: mna'i snying po 'di lan cig bzlas pa'i chu rin po che'i slob @116b ma de 'thung du gzhug go //
T02TD2510.2E:116b-1: de la mna'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:116b-2: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD2510.2E:116b-3: snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzad //
T02TD2510.2E:116b-4: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD2510.2E:116b-5: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD2510.2E:116b-6: aom badzra au da ka tha /
T02TD2510.2E:116b-7: de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:116b-8: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyis phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis /
T02TD2510.2E:116b-9: ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so //
T02TD2510.2E:116b-10: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig / mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re /
T02TD2510.2E:116b-11: de nas yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:116b-12: 'di khyod kyis su la yang ma brjod cig / khyod tshe rabs thams cad du dbul bor gyur ta re /
T02TD2510.2E:116b-13: sdug bsngal las mi 'da' bar gyur ta re /
T02TD2510.2E:116b-14: sems can dmyal ba na yun ring du gnas par gyur ta re zhes bsgo'o //
T02TD2510.2E:116b-15: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig ces smros shig ces bsgo'o //
T02TD2510.2E:116b-16: de nas rin chen slob dpon gyis myur du rdo rje nor bu ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod du gzhug go //
T02TD2510.2E:116b-17: 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste //
T02TD2510.2E:116b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
T02TD2510.2E:116b-19: rdo rje ye shes bla med ni //
T02TD2510.2E:116b-20: de ring nyid du 'bab par shog //
T02TD2510.2E:116b-21: badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes lan brgya'i bar du bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:116b-22: de nas khro bo'i khu tshur bcings nas /
T02TD2510.2E:116b-23: aom sarbba aartha siddha pra d'a h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:116b-24: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dral bar bya zhing /
T02TD2510.2E:116b-25: aa aa: aa aa: zhes lan brgya'i bar du bzlas na /
T02TD2510.2E:116b-26: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:116b-27: de ltar babs par gyur nas gang gi tshe nor bus mtshan pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'ching ba de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:116b-28: slob dpon gyis nor bu khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:116b-29: gang gi tshe nor bu rgyal po'i phyag rgya 'ching ba de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:116b-30: slob dpon gyis nor bu gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:116b-31: gang gi tshe nor bu chags pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:116b-32: nor bu bsrung ba'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:116b-33: gang gi tshe nor bu legs pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:116b-34: nor bu mchod pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:117a-0: gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams @117a * //
T02TD2510.2E:117a-1: cad dbang bskur ba'i rin po che phreng ba 'ching ba de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:117a-2: nor bu gsung ba'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:117a-3: gang gi tshe nor bu nyi ma'i phyag rgya 'ching ba de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:117a-4: nor bu 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:117a-5: gang gi tshe nor bu dpal gyi phyag rgya 'ching ba de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:117a-6: nor bu rnon po'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:117a-7: gang gi tshe rin chen bzhad pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:117a-8: gtong ba ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:117a-9: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor thams cad la yang nye bar bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:117a-10: de nas babs ba de'i lce la yi ge h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:117a-11: rdo rje lcer byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2510.2E:117a-12: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i gar gyi rgyag phya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:117a-13: bru ti badzra zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:117a-14: de nas rdo rje tshig gis dri bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:117a-15: gter chen po gang na yod ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhes dri'o //
T02TD2510.2E:117a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos thams cad gsung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:117a-17: de nas phreng ba de pra t'i tstsha badzra ho /
T02TD2510.2E:117a-18: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis dkyil 'khor chen por dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:117a-19: de nas phreng ba de blangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:117a-20: aom pra ti grihna sva mi mam satva ma h'a ba la zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis de nyid kyi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:117a-22: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyis //
T02TD2510.2E:117a-23: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //
T02TD2510.2E:117a-24: mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de //
T02TD2510.2E:117a-25: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
T02TD2510.2E:117a-26: he badzra p'a shya zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis gdong g-yogs bcing ba de bzhin du bkrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:117a-27: de nas rin chen lcags kyu nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:117a-28: rnam par snang mdzad kyi bar du bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:117a-29: de nas rdo rje nor bu'i phyag rgya de nyid bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:117a-30: slob ma'i snying gar snying po 'dis dgrol du gzhug go //
T02TD2510.2E:117a-31: tishtha badzra dri dho me bha ba sha shva to me bha ba /
T02TD2510.2E:117a-32: hri da ya me aa dhi tishtha sarbba siddhimme pra yatstsha sarbba karmma su tsa me tsittam shre yam ku ru h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:117a-34: de nas gang la me tog babs pa'i lha de'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:117a-35: de'i gzugs su bskyed nas rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gnas bzhin byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2510.2E:117a-36: snying gar rdo rje rin po che dang /
T02TD2510.2E:117a-37: yang dpral bar rin po che'i myu gu /
T02TD2510.2E:117a-38: lkog ma'i phyogs su rdo rje padma /
T02TD2510.2E:117b-0: spyi gtsug tu rin chen char 'bebs mas @117b byin gyis brlabs par byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:117b-1: de nas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ngo //
T02TD2510.2E:117b-2: de'i rjes la phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du shar gyi sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:117b-3: yang na phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du padma dang zla ba'i gdan bris la de'i steng du bzhag nas mchod yon phul la mchod pa rnam ba lngas mchod de /
T02TD2510.2E:117b-4: rang gi lha'i dbang bskur zhing /
T02TD2510.2E:117b-6: phyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las rin po che'i khu tshur gyis chu blangs nas /
T02TD2510.2E:117b-7: dbang bskur zhing de 'thung du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:117b-8: de nas gal te yod cing 'byor na sngar bshad pa'i cho gas stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs bgo ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:117b-9: ze'u ka yang de la byin la ze'u ka la sogs pa 'ching du gzhug go //
T02TD2510.2E:117b-10: slob ma la rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:117b-11: de nas rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i rdo rje nor bu sor drug pa'i tshad tsam rin po che'i dril bu dang bcas pa slob ma'i lag par sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:117b-13: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02TD2510.2E:117b-14: de ring khyod la sbyin par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:117b-15: sangs rgyas kun du rab grub phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:117b-16: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
T02TD2510.2E:117b-17: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti tvam aa bhi shinytsa mi tishtha badzra sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2510.2E:117b-18: de nas badzra satva tvam aa bhishnytsa mi badzra na ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02TD2510.2E:117b-20: kye rdo rje don thams cad grub ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ming gi dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:117b-21: slob mas rdo rje thal mo bskor nas /
T02TD2510.2E:117b-22: rin po che slob dpon la phyag byas nas yon gyi mchod pa phul te /
T02TD2510.2E:117b-23: me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:117b-24: de nas dri chab la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:117b-25: sgeg mo la sogs pas mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:117b-26: sdom pa 'dzin par byed pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:117b-27: sdom pa mi 'dzin pa'i thun mong gi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:117b-28: sngon du slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa'i khyad par brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:117b-29: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor las khru gnyis tsam yongs su dor bar dbu ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad gru bzhi pa /
T02TD2510.2E:117b-31: shar gyi sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen sna lngas bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-0: de'i dbus su rdo rje nor bu sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pas bris la rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du dkyil @118a * //
T02TD2510.2E:118a-1: 'khor yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:118a-3: padma dang zla ba bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-4: gos kyis g-yogs pa la nor bu'i gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas te /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-6: de'i gdan gyi steng du bla re bre ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-7: g-yon logs su dar dpyangs dang me tog gi phreng bas brgyan par bya'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:118a-8: / gdugs dkar po rin po che'i tog can dang /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-9: g-yon du gos sna tshogs dang /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-11: ba dan sna tshogs pa bzung la /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-12: don thams cad grub pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-13: yi ge aom yongs su bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:118a-14: de nas slob mngon thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs su bskyed la ;
T02TD2510.2E:118a-15: de'i phyag rgya chen pos gzhag ste /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-16: slob ma'i lus kyi rnal 'byor chen po'i gnas su dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis rnam par snang mdzad dang don thams cad grub pa nas brtsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-17: nor bu rin po che 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:118a-18: rdo rje nor bu ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-19: rin chen myu gu ma dang ;
T02TD2510.2E:118a-20: rdo rje rin chen padma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-21: rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-22: dri la sogs pas yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:118a-23: gdan de la don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po gzhag ste /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-24: mchod yon phul la dri la sogs pas mchod pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-25: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa rnams dang /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-26: dpal mchog dang po las bshad pa'i rol mo'i phyag rgya rnam pa brgyas ji snyed pa'i dung dang rnga bo che la sogs pa'i rol mo'i khyad par rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs te dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:118a-27: rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-28: de nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa gdon par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:118a-29: de nas rin po che lcags kyus gang ba'i bum pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-30: rnam par snang mdzad kyis gang ba'i bum pa'i dbang bskur nas /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-31: phyis don thams cad grub pas gang ba'i bum pas dbang bskur bar bya'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:118a-32: / de nas snga ma ltar bum pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur nas /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-33: phyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las rin po che'i khu tshur gyis chu blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:118a-34: dbang bskur ba dang 'thung du gzhug pa yang bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:118a-35: aom sarbba ratna a'a karsha a'arya aa nu na ma h'a satva bha ga b'a ntam /
T02TD2510.2E:118b-0: aom a'arya a'a k'a sha garbha spho ta ya @118b a'a karsha ya sh'i ghram ho dza /
T02TD2510.2E:118b-1: aom badzra aa bhishnytsa zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2510.2E:118b-3: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra d'a h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:118b-4: aom badzra aa bhishinytsa zhes bya ba'i bar du bya ba yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:118b-5: de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:118b-6: slob ma dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gzhag ste /
T02TD2510.2E:118b-7: aom badzra ratna aa bhishnytsa ratna a'a dhi pa ti tre pa ba ta ta /
T02TD2510.2E:118b-8: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis lan stong gi bar du bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:118b-9: de nas gos ser po dang rgyan thams cad la nor bu'i gnod sbyin dang /
T02TD2510.2E:118b-10: rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen yongs su bzlas te de la sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:118b-12: rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams kyis mngon par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:118b-13: rdo rje rin chen ma'i myu gu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dbang bskur nas rin po che la sogs pa las byas pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02TD2510.2E:118b-14: dar dpyangs la rdo rje rin po che myu gu yongs su bzlas te dbang bskur bar bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:118b-15: des dbang bskur nas rdo rje rin po che dril bu dang bcas pa snga ma bzhin du byin nas ming gi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:118b-16: de nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:118b-17: rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:118b-18: yi ge pras byin gyis brlabs pa'i rin po che'i mig thur ram ;
T02TD2510.2E:118b-19: gser la sogs pa'i thur ma thogs te /
T02TD2510.2E:118b-20: mdun du 'dug la de'i mig 'byed pa ltar byed cing 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:118b-21: ji ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02TD2510.2E:118b-22: 'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar //
T02TD2510.2E:118b-23: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:118b-24: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02TD2510.2E:118b-25: aom badzra ni tra aa pa h'a ra p'a tra lam hr'i: zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:118b-26: de nas a'a badzra satva zhes bya ba me long la yongs su bzlas te bstan la chos kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:118b-27: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD2510.2E:118b-28: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD2510.2E:118b-29: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD2510.2E:118b-30: rgyu dang las las kun du byung //
T02TD2510.2E:118b-31: ngo bo nyid med gnas med par //
T02TD2510.2E:118b-32: de ltar chos 'di shes nas su //
T02TD2510.2E:118b-33: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02TD2510.2E:118b-34: 'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye //
T02TD2510.2E:118b-35: ho zhes bya bas mda' bskyed la gzhu dang bcas te byin nas 'di slad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-0: 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par gyis shig @119a * //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-2: yi ge hos phyogs bzhi dang /
T02TD2510.2E:119a-4: 'og tu mdas 'phen pa'i tshul du byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-5: yang me long blangs la a'a: badzra satva zhes yongs su zlos shing 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-7: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med ;
T02TD2510.2E:119a-8: / sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid ni //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-9: bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-10: gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi /
T02TD2510.2E:119a-11: bdag po byang chub kyi sems 'di yin par shes par gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-12: de nas badzra he tu mam /
T02TD2510.2E:119a-13: zhes bya bas 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du bzhag la badzra bh'a sha ram zhes bya bas lag pa g-yas mu dung byin nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-14: deng nas brtsams te byang chub sems bskyed pa tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig / de ring phan chad 'jig rten la //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-15: skyob ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-16: chos kyi dung ni bla med pa //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-17: ma lus kun du gang bar gyis //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-18: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-19: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-20: gsang sngags spyad pa tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrog / de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-21: phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-22: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-23: kun du khyod la srung bar byed //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-24: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nga rgyal gyis /
T02TD2510.2E:119a-25: 'jig rten kun la thams cad du //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-26: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-28: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-29: zhes bya bas gsang sngags kyi theg pa 'chad pa'i rjes su gnang ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-30: yang don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:119a-31: 'jig rten kun la thams cad du //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-32: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:119a-34: nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-35: zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor bri ba'i rjes su gnang ba sbyin no //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-36: de nas yi ge tr'am las rdo rje rin po che de 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying por bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:119a-37: nyi ma 'di ni dam pa ste //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-38: kun gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa yin /
T02TD2510.2E:119a-39: nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-40: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:119a-41: zhes bya ba 'dis de kho na nyid sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-0: de nas @119b yi ge aa las rin po che dril bu bcom ldan 'das don thams cad 'das don thams cad grub par bsams la //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-1: bsam pa thams cad grub rnams kyis //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-2: bsam pa grub pa dam pa yin //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-3: de yang 'dod pa rab grub phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-4: 'dod dang thar pa bde ba che //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-5: zhes bya bas chod kyi dril bu dkrol ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-6: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2510.2E:119b-7: mi mkho ba yang sbyin bya zhing //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-8: 'dod dang bde ba thams cad kyis //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-9: bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams kyi //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-10: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-11: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-12: snying po bzlas par yang bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-14: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-15: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-16: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-17: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-18: zhes gsungs pa brlabs nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje rin po che'i brtul zhugs sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:119b-19: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-20: phyag na rdo rje lag na 'dug /
T02TD2510.2E:119b-21: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-22: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-23: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha ae sha tva dha ra y'a mi badzra satva hi hi hi hi h'um zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-24: de nas chog 'dis snying po 'di sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:119b-25: de la dang por lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la phyag bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:119b-26: rdo rje slob dpon la yang phyag byas yon gyi mchog phul te /
T02TD2510.2E:119b-27: slob dpon la snying po la sogs pa blang ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:119b-28: lan gsum gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-29: de de ltar slob ma lag na me tog thogs shing yan lag 'dud pas snying po la sogs pa don du gnyer ba shes nas slob dpon gyis yid kyi snying po la sogs pa'i don du lha la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-31: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra d'a h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:119b-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa zlos shing /
T02TD2510.2E:119b-33: dri dang me tog la sogs pa la lan brgya mngon par bsngags nas 'di rang gis zung shig ces brjod la mngon par bsngags pa'i me tog de slob ma'i lag tu sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:119b-34: de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:119b-35: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das dang bcom ldan 'das ma'i snod du gyur pa lags te /
T02TD2510.2E:119b-36: bcom ldan 'das dang bcom ldan 'das ma 'di la bdag gis stsal lags so /
T02TD2510.2E:120a-0: @120a * // khyed 'di dang nye bar mdzod cig / khyed bcom ldan 'das ma 'di dang nye bar mdzod cig / de nas slob mas aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra d'a h'um zhes bya ba gsungs pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das dang bcom ldan 'das ma bdag gis gzung lags so //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-1: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das dang bcom ldan 'das ma'i snod du gyur pa bdag lags so //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-2: khyed bdag dang nye bar mdzod cig / bcom ldan 'das ma khyed bdag dang nye bar mdzod cig ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-3: 'dir slob dpon dang slob mas lan gsum brjod dgos par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-4: de nas me tog de rang gi spyi bor gzhag ste /
T02TD2510.2E:120a-5: snga ma bzhin du ji ltar thob pa'i snying po la sogs pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-6: snying po la sogs pa'i yi ge mang na grog la gi wang gis yi ge bris la lan gsum bzlas te sngar bshad pa nyid kyi tshul du sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-7: byin nas yon gyi mchog dbul ba de bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:120a-8: de la yon gyi mchog ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:120a-9: thams cad grub 'dod bla ma la //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-10: sna tshogs dam pas yon phul te //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-11: gang yang gtong bar mi phod pa //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-12: de dang de ni dam pa bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-13: cung zad yid 'ong gang dang gang //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-14: shin tu khyad par gyur de nyid //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-15: mi zad de nyid 'dod pa yis //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-16: de dang de ni bla mar dbul //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-17: yang na mngon par 'dod pa'i rdzas //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-18: chung yang phan pa mchog yin pas //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-19: yang na de yi las bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-20: gal te bzang po yod na yang //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-21: ma byin ngan pa'i yon bdag dang //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-22: slob dpon la ni smod pa ste //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-23: rtag tu sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-24: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bsgrub pa'i yon tan bstan nas ni /
T02TD2510.2E:120a-25: de bzhin gshegs bsgrub pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:120a-26: bu mo shin tu brgyan pa'am //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-27: chung ma'am de bzhin yid 'ong ma //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-28: sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi yon //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-29: phul nas yon gyis blu bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa sgrub pa'i yon tan bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:120a-32: rdo rje rigs bsgrub pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:120a-33: phyugs chen rang nyid phul nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-34: slar yang rin gyis blu bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-35: rdo rje 'dzin dang mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-36: yon gyi mchog tu bsngags pa yin //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-38: da ni padma'i rigs sgrub pa pos //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-39: mu tig phreng ba bcang ba dang //
T02TD2510.2E:120a-40: gos zung shin tu dkar ba'am //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-0: rta dkar @120b ba'am rta dag ni //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-1: padma'i yon gyi mchog yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-3: rin po che'i rigs bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-4: rgyal srid dang ni nor rnams ni //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-5: gos dang rgyan rnams bsags pa dang //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-6: de bzhin mchod pa thams cad nyid //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-7: rdo rje nyi ma'i yon yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-9: rta mchog sgrub par byed pas na //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-10: rta rnams shin tu brgyan pa dang //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-11: glang po legs par brtags pa dang //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-12: shing rta rin chen gyis bkang ba //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-13: rta mchog gi ni yon du 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-15: de ltar snying po la sogs pa byin nas rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:120b-16: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor mngon du byas la phyag rgya bcings te slob ma thams cad lung bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-17: aom 'dir ni ngas khyod lung bstan bya //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-19: srid pa kun du grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-20: srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton ;
T02TD2510.2E:120b-21: / kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa siddhi sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba sv'a h'a /
T02TD2510.2E:120b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:120b-23: g-yon pa chos gos 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa'i tshul du byas la 'di ni gzengs bstod pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:120b-24: cho ga lhag ma ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pas shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-25: de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:120b-26: da ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon gyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:120b-27: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:120b-28: de nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:120b-29: de'i phyir 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-30: ci yod pa dang ci 'byor pa'i mi rnams kyi longs spyod cha bcur bgos nas mchod pa bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-31: mchod pa de byas nas dgos pa thams cad ni don thams cad la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-32: bsgrub par bya ba ni phyis 'chad par 'gyur bas so //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-33: de nas zhes bya ba ni skabs su bab pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-34: 'di zhes bya ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:120b-35: ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:121a-0: gter nges pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyar @121a * //
T02TD2510.2E:121a-2: rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya che //
T02TD2510.2E:121a-3: zhes bya ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang de'i rigs nor bu'i mtshan ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni /
T02TD2510.2E:121a-4: rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas zhes bya ba yin pas zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba ste /
T02TD2510.2E:121a-5: de bcings pa nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:121a-6: shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:121a-7: rab tu mnyam par gzhag pa ste //
T02TD2510.2E:121a-8: rnam par g-yeng ba med pa'i sems //
T02TD2510.2E:121a-9: gter brkos nas ni gang dag na //
T02TD2510.2E:121a-11: phyogs gang dang gang na gter yod par re ba'i phyogs der brkos na /
T02TD2510.2E:121a-12: nges par gter yod pa de mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:121a-14: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas don thams cad grub pa'i rnal 'byor ram /
T02TD2510.2E:121a-15: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:121a-16: de'i phyag rgya chen po dang nor bu'i mtshan ma la sogs pa de dang de'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings nas /
T02TD2510.2E:121a-17: aom ma h'a ma ni ratna aa bhi sha h'um zhes bya bas bdag nyid gser gyi mdog can gyi nam mkha'i snying por bsgoms nas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la tra las /
T02TD2510.2E:121a-18: rdo rje nor bu bskyed de /
T02TD2510.2E:121a-19: de'i dbus su yi ge 'di rnams gser gyi mdog can yid kyis bris la snying po zlos shing nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig gam /
T02TD2510.2E:121a-21: lo gcig tu rang nyid bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.2E:121a-23: des gang na gter yod par re ba der sngar bshad pa'i cho gas bdag dang gnas bsrung ba byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:121a-24: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.2E:121a-25: rang gi lta spyan drangs nas mchod pa thams cad kyis ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:121a-26: zhing dang zhing skyong rnams snga ma bzhin du rin po che lcags sgrog gis bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:121a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyi bden pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:121a-28: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i bden pa gang yin pa des gter bdag gis mthong ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:121a-29: dngos grub rab tu stsal du gsol /
T02TD2510.2E:121a-30: zhes bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs bdar bas gang gi tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:121a-31: bcom ldan 'das bsgoms par gyur pa de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-0: de nas brkos na nges pa kho @121b nar rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:121b-1: dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings la //
T02TD2510.2E:121b-4: de'i rigs ni snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-5: de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i phreng ba la sogs pa rin po che'i rigs rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-7: gang na gter rnams yod gyur pa //
T02TD2510.2E:121b-8: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:121b-9: der ni phyag rgya bcings nas ni /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-10: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa bsgrub par byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-11: gter gyi gnas su snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-12: der dam tshig gi phyag rgya btsir na dam tshig gi phyag rgya de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis aa mra la sogs pa yongs su smin pa'i 'bras bu kha phye ba bzhin du gter gyi char 'bab pa thams cad blang bar bsams na /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-13: nges pa nyid du gter rang gi steng du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:121b-14: de'i tshe sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-15: aom ma ni ratna pra ta dha ra sha ya /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-16: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:121b-17: rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin du //
T02TD2510.2E:121b-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du rin chen padma'am /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-19: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-20: aom ma ni ratna sam dhi bhu hi /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-21: rin chen padma'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-22: de'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-23: bdag nyid gser gyi mdog can du bskyed la /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-24: rang gi lce la snying po 'di yid kyis bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-25: snga ma bzhin du bsgom pa dang bzlas pa byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-26: de nas bsgrub pa yang de bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:121b-27: de nas gter gyi gnas su song la snga ma bzhin du cho ga rjes su spyad de bsgoms na /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-28: gang gi tshe byin gyis brlabs pa'i bar du byas na rang gi lces thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:121b-29: las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:121b-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du rin chen char 'bebs dang /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-31: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-32: aom ratna aa bhi sha darsha ya zhes snying po brjod cing ;
T02TD2510.2E:121b-33: rin chen char 'bebs kyi las kyi phyag rgya'am /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-34: de'i rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-35: bdag nyid rin chen char 'bebs kyi gzugs sam /
T02TD2510.2E:121b-36: de'i rigs kyi lha'i gzugs su bskyed la /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-0: rang gi snying gar rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs kyi phyag rgya'i dbus su snying po 'di yid kyis bris @122a * //
T02TD2510.2E:122a-2: snga ma bzhin du bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-3: de nas de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:122a-4: de nas re ba'i gnas su sngar bshad pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-5: ji srid du bsgoms pa de'i tshe dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:122a-6: de nas brkos na gdon mi za bar gter rnyed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:122a-7: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:122a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-9: snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-10: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-11: de nas don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po'am /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-12: de'i rigs nor bu'i mtshan ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-13: aom ma h'a ma ni ratna ka ya darsha ya ratna zhes bya ba'i snying po brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-14: nam mkha'i snying po dang nor bu'i mtshan ma la sogs pa'i gzugs su gser gyi mdog can du bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-15: thugs ka'i rdo rje nor bu'i snying po bkod la zlos shing snga ma bzhin du rnam par bsgoms la mtshan thog thag bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:122a-16: de nas gter gyi gnas su song la snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-17: de ji srid du bsgom pa de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-18: rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje rin po che'i 'od zer byung nas lus la 'khor bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:122a-19: de nas rin chen gter yod par //
T02TD2510.2E:122a-20: dam tshig gis ni shes par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:122a-21: zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i 'od zer gyis bskor ba'i tshe na'o //
T02TD2510.2E:122a-22: dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:122a-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rin chen lta ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-24: de'i rigs kyi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la phyis de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-25: a'a k'a sha garbha ma ni ratna spu ta spu ta ma tra ni bi dhi: zhes bya ba'i snying po zlos shing rin chen lta ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-26: de'i rigs kyi gzugs su bdag nyid bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-27: de nyid kyi snying po zlos shing snga ma bzhin du bsgoms la yang dag par bsgrubs te /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-28: gter gyi gnas su song la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-29: ji srid du bsgoms pa de srid du rang gi snying ga'i rin po che las 'od zer byung bas phyag rgya la khyab par bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:122a-30: de nas rin po che chen po'i gter yod par ni shes par bya zhas bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:122a-31: ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:122a-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das rin chen padma'am /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-33: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:122a-34: aom ma ni ratna dzny'a na sa yam br'u hi /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-0: @122b zhes bya bas lce la bsams nas snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs la /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-1: gter gyi gnas su song ste cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-2: de ji srid du bsgoms pa de'i tshe 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:122b-3: de nas rang gi lces gang na gter yod ces smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:122b-4: las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:122b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-7: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-8: aom pu ra sa ma ya bandha darsha ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-9: zhes bya ba'i snying po brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-10: rin chen char 'bebs sam de'i rigs kyi snying po 'di dang las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-11: rang gi snying gar rin chen char 'bebs kyi phyag rgya bsams la snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs te /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-12: gter gyi gnas su song nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-13: ji srid du bsgoms pa de srid du lag pa gnyis las ye shes babs nas las kyi phyag rgya bcings pa bkrol la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-14: babs nas dam tshig bcings gyur pa ;
T02TD2510.2E:122b-15: / de na gter ni yod par bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:122b-17: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni //
T02TD2510.2E:122b-18: de bzhin gang du de 'gyur ba //
T02TD2510.2E:122b-19: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-20: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-21: phyis de dang de'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-22: rang gi snying gar rdo rje rin po che de'i dbus su yi ge tra bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:122b-23: aom ni dhi dzny'a na a'a bi sha zhes bya ba yid kyis bris te /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-24: snga ma bzhin du bsgrub pa byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-25: ji srid du bsgoms pa de'i tshe gter mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:122b-26: de nas brkos nas blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:122b-27: gang du gter yod der yang ni //
T02TD2510.2E:122b-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du rin chen lta ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-29: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-30: de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang de'i rigs kyi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-31: snying ga'i rdo rje rin po che'i dbus su /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-32: aom ratna sa ma ya mu tsa ni dhi bandha /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-33: zhes bya ba yid kyis bris te snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs la gter gyi gnas su dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:122b-34: ji srid du bsgoms pa de srid du dam tshig gi phyag rgya rang grol bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:122b-35: de nas gter yod pa yin no zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:122b-36: ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:123a-2: zhes bya ba ni rin po che padma'am de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-3: aom dharmma ratna pru hi ni ha na ma zhes bya ba sa lce la bkod la snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs te /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-4: gter yod pa'i gnas su song nas /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-5: ji srid du bsgoms pa re gyur pa de srid du 'bab par 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-6: dar ni nges par gter yod par //
T02TD2510.2E:123a-7: ye shes bskyed de shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:123a-8: gang dang gang na re ba yong //
T02TD2510.2E:123a-9: las kyi phyag rgya cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2510.2E:123a-10: zhes bya ba ni rin chen char 'bebs pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-11: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-12: rang gi snying gar rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs dang de'i steng du /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-13: aom sarbba karmma ni spho ta ya darsha ya /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-14: ni dhri bhandha aom kshi pa /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-15: zhes bya ba yid kyis bris te /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-16: snga ma bzhin du bsgrub pa byas la rin chen char 'bebs dang /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-17: de'i rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-18: gang du 'jig rten pa phal che bas thams cad gter re ba rgyur pa der yod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:123a-19: der ji srid bsgoms pa de srid phyag rgya gnyis su gyur pa der gter yod par shes par 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-20: der bcings de ni gnyis 'gyur na //
T02TD2510.2E:123a-21: gter ni yod par shes par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:123a-23: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:123a-24: gter rnams kun du btsal nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:123a-26: snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-27: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor bya ba la phyis de'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-28: rin chen nor bu la sogs pa de'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-29: rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje nor bu'i dbus su /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-30: aom ma h'a ratna pa ri ksha bi shu ddhi ya bi sha / zhas bya ba yid kyis bris te /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-31: snga ma bzhin du bsgrub pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-32: gang la re bar gyur pa de na gter yod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:123a-33: de la ji srid du bsgoms pa de'i babs par gyur pa de'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-34: de na gter ni yod par bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:123a-36: dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:123a-37: gter rnams kun du btsal nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:123a-38: zhes bya ba ni rin chen lta ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-39: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-40: de dang de'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-41: rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje nor bu rin po che'i dbus su /
T02TD2510.2E:123a-42: aom ratna sa ma ya tre dha darsha ya zhes yid kyis bris nas snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs te /
T02TD2510.2E:123b-0: gter gyi gnas su ji srid @123b du bsgoms pa de'i tshe phyag rgya dgrol bar mi nus par 'gyur ba de na gter yod par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:123b-1: ting nge 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:123b-2: de rnams kun nas btsal nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:123b-3: zhes bya ba ni rin chen padma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:123b-4: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:123b-5: phyis ratna pa ri ksha dzny'a na a'a be sha /
T02TD2510.2E:123b-6: zhes bya ba lta ba la yid kyis bris te /
T02TD2510.2E:123b-7: snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs nas ji srid bsgoms pa de'i tshe gter rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:123b-8: las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:123b-9: gter rnams kun du btsal du nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:123b-10: zhes bya ba la rin chen char 'bebs sam /
T02TD2510.2E:123b-11: rin chen mchod pa la sogs pa de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la rin chen char 'bebs sam de'i rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:123b-12: rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje nor bu rin chen char 'bebs bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:123b-14: aom ma ni karmma bhra ma ya zhes bya ba ni yid kyis bris la snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs na /
T02TD2510.2E:123b-15: gnas gang du gter yod pa yin no zhes /
T02TD2510.2E:123b-16: 'jig rten phal cher re bar 'gyur ba der /
T02TD2510.2E:123b-17: ji srid bsgoms pa de'i tshe las kyi phyag rgya 'khor bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:123b-18: de nas de na gter yod par shes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:123b-19: de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gter gyi lha dang mnyam par sbyor bas /
T02TD2510.2E:123b-20: bsgom pa gsang ba'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:123b-21: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la //
T02TD2510.2E:123b-22: gter rnams kun du tshol byed cing //
T02TD2510.2E:123b-23: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:123b-24: nor bu'i mtshan ma la sogs pa de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:123b-25: de nas rang gi snying gar rdo rje nor bu bsams la de'i dbus su aom ma ni yo ga a'a be sha / zhes bya ba yid kyis bris te /
T02TD2510.2E:123b-26: don thams cad grub pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:123b-27: de'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la snga ma bzhin du bsgrub pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:123b-28: gter gyi gnas su cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la gter gyi lha dang lha mo'i gzugs su rnam par bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:123b-29: ji srid du ltan cig mnyam par sbyor bas bsgoms pa de srid babs par gyur nas mngon sum mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:123b-30: dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:123b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rin chen lta ba 'am /
T02TD2510.2E:124a-0: @124a * // de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la rin chen lta ba dang de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:124a-1: rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje rin po che la /
T02TD2510.2E:124a-2: aom sa ma ya san yo ga dri dho me bha ba zhes bya ba yid kyis bris te /
T02TD2510.2E:124a-3: snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs la gter gyi gnas su cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:124a-4: ji srid du gter gyi lha dang lhan cig tu bsgoms pa de mngon sum lta bur 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:124a-5: de ltar bsgoms nas phyag rgya gang du bstan par gyur pa na gter gyi lha mthong ba'i tshul gyis gter yod pa'i phyogs der ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:124a-6: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la //
T02TD2510.2E:124a-7: gter rnams kun du tshol byed cing //
T02TD2510.2E:124a-8: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rin chen padma'am de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:124a-9: aom ni di dzny'a na a'a be sha m'a ma yo ga / zhes lce la yid kyis bris te /
T02TD2510.2E:124a-10: snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs pa byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:124a-11: gter yod pa'i gnas su song nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:124a-12: ji srid du gter gyi lha dang mnyam par sbyor bar bsgoms pa de srid du gter mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:124a-13: dbang po gnyis kyi ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD2510.2E:124a-14: las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:124a-15: zhes bya ba la rin chen char 'bebs pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:124a-16: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:124a-17: rdo rje nor bu char 'bebs rang gi snying gar bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:124a-19: aom sarbba karmma spho ta sa ma yo ga zhes bya ba yid kyis bris la snga ma bzhin du bsgrub te /
T02TD2510.2E:124a-21: de'i rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:124a-22: phyis gter gyi gnas su song la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:124a-23: gter gyi lha dang lhan cig mnyam par sbyor bas ji srid du bsgoms pa de'i tshe phyag rgya gnyis su 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.2E:124a-24: rang grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:124a-25: de nas gter gyi lha grub par gyur pa des gter ston pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:124a-26: de ltar dngos grub kyi ye shes bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:124b-0: da ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i phyag rgya bzhi po rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin @124b du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la bsgrubs te /
T02TD2510.2E:124b-1: mdun du lha spyan drangs nas rang gi phyag rgya bzhi po rnams kyis rgyas btab la bsgrub pa na /
T02TD2510.2E:124b-2: sgrub pa po spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2510.2E:124b-3: phyag rgya'i 'bras bu bstan par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:124b-4: de nas nor bu'i rigs chen po'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes bslab po zhes bya ba gsungs la /
T02TD2510.2E:124b-5: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
T02TD2510.2E:124b-6: dngos grub kyi ye shes bstan pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:124b-7: chen po yang yin la nor bu'i rigs kyang yin pas na /
T02TD2510.2E:124b-8: nor bu'i rigs chen po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:124b-9: don yod par grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:124b-10: de la thams cad ni phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02TD2510.2E:124b-12: dam tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya rnams so //
T02TD2510.2E:124b-13: de rnams kyi ye shes su nges pa de bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:124b-14: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings pa ni 'di yin te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:124b-15: phyag rgya chen po bcings pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:124b-16: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:124b-17: ji lta ba yi ri mo bzhin //
T02TD2510.2E:124b-19: 'dri mkhan gyis ji lta ba'i ri mo'i rjes su 'brangs nas ji lta ba bzhin bri ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:124b-21: ji ltar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:124b-22: nor bu rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i sku'i gsang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i cho gar gsungs pa de'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
T02TD2510.2E:124b-23: bdag nyid kyang sku'i gsang ba'i rang bzhin rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor na gnas pa bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.2E:124b-24: yang dang yang du mngon du bya ba yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:124b-25: de gang gi yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:124b-26: phyag rgya chen po zhes smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:124b-29: don gyi mchog kun grub par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:124b-31: don yang yin la kun kyang yin pas na don gyi mchog kun te /
T02TD2510.2E:124b-32: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rin chen 'bebs pa'i rang bzhin gyi mthar thug pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:124b-33: de'i mchog gi dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po mngon sum du byas nas de rtogs par bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:124b-35: rdo rje nor bu myu gu dang /
T02TD2510.2E:125a-2: rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs kyi phyag rgya chen po ni /
T02TD2510.2E:125a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:125a-5: gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po dang nor bu'i mchod pa rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po nyid kyis shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:125a-6: de nas zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi 'bras bu gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:125a-7: sangs rgyas phyag rgya sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD2510.2E:125a-8: ces bya ba la rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po ni sangs rgyas phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:125a-9: de sangs rgyas nyid 'grub pa ster ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:125a-10: dngos grub zab mo 'di la mnga' bas na rab grub po //
T02TD2510.2E:125a-11: gang gi phyag rgya yin zhe na //
T02TD2510.2E:125a-13: don thams cad grub pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:125a-14: nor bu'i mtshan ma dag gi phyag rgya chen po de rnams rab tu 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go ;
T02TD2510.2E:125a-16: rin chen rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:125a-17: des phyogs bcu kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa spyan 'dres par byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:125a-18: nor bu dga' ba ni nor bu chags pa chen po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:125a-19: nor bu'i chags pas rjes su dga' bar byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa sems can gyi khams la rjes su dga' bar byed pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:125a-20: sgrub pa po'i bka' bzhin byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:125a-21: nor bu legs pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni nor bu'i mgu ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:125a-22: shin tu mgu bar byed pas na rab tu mgu ba phul du byung ba byed ces bya ba'i byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:125a-23: nor bu lta ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni nor bu'i lta ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:125a-24: nor 'phrog ba ni dbang bskur ba la sogs pa bkug nas /
T02TD2510.2E:125a-25: rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i nor bu'i phreng ba ste /
T02TD2510.2E:125a-26: de'i phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa de ni nor bu'i dbang bskur ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:125a-27: sgrub pa po la dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:125a-28: nor bu'i nyi ma'i phyag rgya chen po ni nor bu'i nyi ma ste gzi brjid bzang po mnga' bas na gzi brjid mchog go //
T02TD2510.2E:125b-0: nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi me'i 'od zer de 'gyed pas na gzi brjid mchog ster bas @125b te ;
T02TD2510.2E:125b-1: nor bu'i nyi ma nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:125b-2: nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya chen po ni yid bzhin nor bu ste de ci dgar ster ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:125b-3: des ci dgar sbyin pa ni gang dang gang gis mngon par 'dod pa'i bsgrub par bya ba de dang de nyid yongs su rdzags par byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:125b-4: rin chen bzhad ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni rin chen bzhad ba ste /
T02TD2510.2E:125b-5: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don 'phrog cing sgrub par byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:125b-6: rin chen padma'i phyag rgya chen po ni rin chen mchog ste /
T02TD2510.2E:125b-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos de mtshan nyid kyi chos de ster ba'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:125b-8: / gtong ba ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi snying po'i phyag rgya chen po ni gtong ba mchog ste /
T02TD2510.2E:125b-9: zag pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnyed pa dam pa 'thob pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:125b-10: rin chen rnon po'i phyag rgya chen po ni rin chen ral gri ste /
T02TD2510.2E:125b-11: shes rab kyi ye shes chen po'i mdzod ster ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:125b-12: nor bu 'khor lo'i phyag rgya chen po ni nor bu'i 'khor lo ste /
T02TD2510.2E:125b-13: de'i bdag po ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chen po nor bu'i 'khor lo de ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:125b-14: rin chen gsung ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni smra ba stsal ba'i dngos grub ste spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub nor bu'i gsung ba nyid thob pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / rin chen char 'bebs kyi phyag rgya chen po ni rin po che char 'bebs te /
T02TD2510.2E:125b-15: de nor bu chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i char nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:125b-16: nor bu mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni nor bu chen po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:125b-17: de shin tu legs par mchod pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:125b-18: nor bu bsrung ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni rin chen go cha brtan par byed pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:125b-19: phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus ni nor bu'i bsrung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:125b-20: nor bu gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya chen po ni nor bu'i mche ba gzung ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:125b-21: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'joms pas na de'i nor 'phrog pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:125b-22: nor bu'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya chen po ni khu tshur des nor bu'i dngos grub thob pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:125b-23: de mngon sum du byas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:126a-0: @126a * // de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'ang zhes bya ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:126a-1: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni ye shes su 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:126a-2: rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2510.2E:126a-3: sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur thob //
T02TD2510.2E:126a-4: ces bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni rdo rje rin chen gyi bdag nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad la dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab ste /
T02TD2510.2E:126a-5: de'i mtshan nyid ni rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bong gnyis bsnyams la mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa'i rtse mo sprad pa ni rdo rje rin chen te /
T02TD2510.2E:126a-6: rdo rje rin chen de nyid 'ching ba'i sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:126a-7: aom badzra ratna h'um zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbang bskur ba sbyin no ;
T02TD2510.2E:126a-8: / rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i rnal 'byor byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:126a-9: phyis phyag rgya 'di bcings nas bdag nyid 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying por bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.2E:126a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba rdo rje rin chen 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:126a-12: rdo rje nor bu che bcings nas //
T02TD2510.2E:126a-13: rdo rje rin chen mgu bar 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:126a-14: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:126a-15: mdzub mo rgyab tu bskums nas /
T02TD2510.2E:126a-16: rdo rje mthe bong dang sbyar ba 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:126a-17: 'di bcings la aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa sha pa ri p'u ra ni ma h'a ratna h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:126a-18: zhes gsungs te bya ba gang gi tshe rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas la bzlas pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba de'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:126a-21: bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes thob ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:126a-22: rdo rje gnyis las nor bu byas //
T02TD2510.2E:126a-23: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis nor bur bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:126b-0: rdo rje 'dzin @126b las nor thob bo //
T02TD2510.2E:126b-1: zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:126b-3: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:126b-4: dam tshig gi phyag rgya gang yin pa 'di bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:126b-5: aom badzra h'um tr'am zhes snying po zlos shing /
T02TD2510.2E:126b-6: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid du bsgoms nas mtshan ma thob pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:126b-7: mtshan thog thag zlos shing bcom ldan 'das mdun du bzhag la bsgoms pa de'i tshe rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:126b-8: de nyid mthe bong rdo rje yis //
T02TD2510.2E:126b-9: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'i mthe bo gnyis myu gu ltar byas pa ni nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:126b-10: nor bu sbyin pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i snying po'i dngos grub kyi 'bras bu'o //
T02TD2510.2E:126b-11: snying gar bzhag ces bya ba ni yid kyis mngon par 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:126b-12: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i nam mkha'i snying po'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:126b-13: phyis phyag rgya de bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:126b-15: zhes brjod cing bsgoms pas nam mkha'i snying po 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:126b-16: mdzub gnyis padma'i nor bu bcings //
T02TD2510.2E:126b-17: rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng nas phan tshun lto sbyar te /
T02TD2510.2E:126b-18: rgyab cung zang bskums nas rin po che bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:126b-22: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spyan sgrub pa po rang la dngos grub ster bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:126b-24: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje spyan gyi rnal 'byor byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:126b-25: phyis de'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:126b-26: padma hr'i: zhes zlos shing rdo rje spyan bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.2E:126b-27: gang gi tshe mtshan ma thob nas dngos grub tu gyur pa de'i tshe rdo rje spyan nyid dang 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:126b-28: rdo rje la nor sna tshogs kyi //
T02TD2510.2E:126b-29: zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:126b-30: rdo rje nor bu che bcings la //
T02TD2510.2E:126b-31: gar byas spyi gtsug dbus gzhag ste //
T02TD2510.2E:126b-32: mchod pa'i cho ga thams cad kyis //
T02TD2510.2E:126b-33: kun la rin chen mchod par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-0: zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje las kyi @127a * //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-2: nor bu mchod pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-3: ci zhig sbyin par byed ce na /
T02TD2510.2E:127a-4: nor bu chen po rgyal mtshan sbyin //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-6: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-8: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje las kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:127a-9: phyis de'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:127a-10: aom bi shva ratna h'um zhes zlos shing gang gi mtshan ma thob par gyur nas 'grub bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe sna tshogs su 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-11: rdo rje dbyings mdzub nor mchog gis//
T02TD2510.2E:127a-12: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i de'i nor gyi mchog ni rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-13: des sangs rgyas rin chen de nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-14: aom buddha ratna h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po ni phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-15: mdzub mo bsnyams te rgyab bkug la //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-16: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis myu gu ltar byas nas rgyab bskums te /
T02TD2510.2E:127a-17: rin po che'i mthe bong gnyis myu gu ltar byas pa /
T02TD2510.2E:127a-18: de las mthe bong rdor je bcings par 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.2E:127a-19: rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya las //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-20: 'di ni rdo rje nor bur gsungs //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-21: zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-22: gang la 'byung ba yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:127a-23: rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya las //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-25: rdo rje bsdams pa gnyis dam du byas pa 'di ni rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-26: da ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:127a-27: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i rdo rje nor bu chen po dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di ni sems ma rdo rje ma'i gnas rdo rje nor bu'i phyag rgya'i nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-28: 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-29: rdo rje nor bu chen po thob //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-30: ces bya ba ni nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:127a-31: rtog pa thob po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-32: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni /
T02TD2510.2E:127a-33: mdzub gnyis rin chen 'drar bcings pa //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-34: gung mo myu gu bsgreng bas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:127a-35: zhes bya ba ni gung mo myu gu ltar bsgreng ba 'di ni /
T02TD2510.2E:127a-36: rdo rje rin chen myu gu dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:127b-0: 'di @127b ni bcings ma thag tu yang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa dge ba'i mtshan nyid kyis dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur pa de rnyed par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:127b-1: de nas gung mo srin lag dang //
T02TD2510.2E:127b-2: mthe chung rnams ni padmor byas //
T02TD2510.2E:127b-3: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin po che myu gu'i phyag rgya nyid la gung mo dang /
T02TD2510.2E:127b-4: srin lag dang mthe'u chung rnams sor mo phan tshun gdong sbyar te /
T02TD2510.2E:127b-5: padma kha bye ba bzhin du byas pa 'di ni rdo rje rin chen padma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:127b-6: 'di ni gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi snying po 'grub pas /
T02TD2510.2E:127b-7: kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag gis ting nge 'dzin gyi nor bu sgrub pa po la sbyin par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:127b-8: mdzub mo mthe bo mthe'u chung rnams //
T02TD2510.2E:127b-9: rdo rje rin chen tshul du bya //
T02TD2510.2E:127b-10: zhes bya ba ni thal mo sbyar la /
T02TD2510.2E:127b-11: srin lag gnyis myu gu lta bu dang /
T02TD2510.2E:127b-12: gung mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug nas /
T02TD2510.2E:127b-13: sen mo gnyis phan tshun sbyar ba 'di ni rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:127b-14: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
T02TD2510.2E:127b-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa dam por byas nas mdzub mo gnyis nor bu 'dra bar byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:127b-16: mthe bo gnyis brkyang ste kha phye nas snying gar gzhag pa 'di ni /
T02TD2510.2E:127b-17: don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i don thams cad grub pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:127b-18: rdo rje bsams pas bsdams nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:127b-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gung mo gnyis myu gu ltar byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:127b-20: rgyab bskum pa'i tshul gyis rin po cher byas pa 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas kyi rdo rje nor bu mtshan ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:127b-21: las ci zhig byed ce na /
T02TD2510.2E:127b-22: nor bu rin chen rab sbyin no //
T02TD2510.2E:127b-24: de nyid las zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:127b-25: bshad ma thag pa'i nor bu mtshan ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du byas pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:127b-26: rin chen rgyal po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:127b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi don kun 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya'o//
T02TD2510.2E:127b-29: nor bu rin chen lcags kyur bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:127b-30: ces bya ba smos te bstan pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:127b-31: de nyid las zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:127b-32: bshad ma thag pa'i rin chen rgyal po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya las so //
T02TD2510.2E:127b-33: bsgyur nas kyang zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i phyogs nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:128a-0: mdzub mos mdzub mo bzung nas @128a * //
T02TD2510.2E:128a-2: zhes bya ba ni g-yas pa'i mdzub mos g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bzung ste /
T02TD2510.2E:128a-3: mda' 'phang pa'i tshul du byas la drangs shing 'then nas /
T02TD2510.2E:128a-4: dgrol bar sems can gyi khams dga' bar byed cing dbang du byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:128a-6: nor bu rgyal po'i phyag rgya las /
T02TD2510.2E:128a-7: g-yas pa'i mdzub mos g-yon logs nas 'dren pa'i tshul du byed pa ni nor bu chags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:128a-8: de nyid las mdzub mthe ba gnyis sbyar ba legs so zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni nor bu chags pa'i phyag rgya nyid las /
T02TD2510.2E:128a-9: mdzub mo dang mthe bo gnyis se go'i brdabs pa'i tshul du byed pa ni nor bu legs pa'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:128a-10: de las mtheb gnyis sbyar ba yis //
T02TD2510.2E:128a-11: mdzub gnyis rtse mor bkab de bzhin //
T02TD2510.2E:128a-12: mthe bo gnyis ni dbus sbyar la //
T02TD2510.2E:128a-13: mdzub gnyis ngos dang sbyar ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:128a-14: zhes bya ba ni rin chen legs pa'i phyag rgya nyid las /
T02TD2510.2E:128a-15: mdzub mo gnyis bskums nas tshigs gsum pa phan tshun sbyar la /
T02TD2510.2E:128a-16: mthe bo gnyis bsgrengs nas bkab la cung zad kha phye ste /
T02TD2510.2E:128a-17: mthe bong gi gdong lta ba'i tshul du 'dzin par byed pa 'di ni nor bu'i lta ba ste /
T02TD2510.2E:128a-18: nor bu lta ba'i phyag rgya 'bar ba'i lta ba dbang bskur ba la sogs pa byas pas 'jig rten pa rnams kyis lta ba'i don rnams 'phrog par byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:128a-19: don kun grub pa'i phreng ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:128a-20: zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba ste /
T02TD2510.2E:128a-21: 'dir don thams cad grub pa de'i phreng ba ni dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:128a-22: des las gang zhig byed ce na //
T02TD2510.2E:128a-23: rang gi dbang ni rab sbyin 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:128a-25: dge ba'i dbang bskur ba ni rang gi dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:128a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba de bkug nas sbyin par bya ba ni rang gi dbang rab tu sbyin par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:128a-27: don thams cad grub pa'i phreng ba 'di gang zhig yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:128a-28: de nyid snyid gar mthe bo gnyis //
T02TD2510.2E:128a-29: bsgreng ste ngos kyis sbyar ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:128a-30: zhes bya ba la rin chen lta ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya snying ga'i phyogs su mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe bo gnyis phan tshun kha sbyar la bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:128a-31: phyis snying ga'i phyogs su gzhag pa las /
T02TD2510.2E:128b-0: dbang bskur ba'i gnas su @128b 'jog pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:128b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:128b-2: nor bu nyi ma'i snying gar gzhag / gzi brjid chen po rab sbyin 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:128b-3: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis snying gar bskor bas nam mkha'i khams khyab par nyi ma'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu ster ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:128b-4: gzi brjid chen po rab tu sbyin pa 'di ni nor bu nyi ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:128b-5: srin lag bsnyams te bsgreng nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:128b-6: phyi ste spyi bor gzhag bya ba //
T02TD2510.2E:128b-7: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskug ba'i phyag rgya de nyid spyi bor bzhag la srin lag gnyis bsnyams te myu gu ltar byas nas phye ba 'di ni nor bu'i dpal gyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:128b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis myu gu ltar byas nas phyir ste spyi bor gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:128b-10: rdo rje nor bu chen po zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:128b-11: re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa //
T02TD2510.2E:128b-12: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya 'di'i 'bras bu gsungs pa yin no ;
T02TD2510.2E:128b-13: / de nyid las ni 'gying byed cing //
T02TD2510.2E:128b-14: kha 'gram dgod par bskor ba de //
T02TD2510.2E:128b-15: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i dpal gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid 'gying bar byed cing dgod pa'i tshul du bsgor nas khar 'jog pa 'di ni rin chen bzhad pa'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:128b-16: rin chen cher dgod ces bya ba ni phyag rgya'i ming bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:128b-18: bzhad pas don rnams thams cad thob //
T02TD2510.2E:128b-20: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sbyin pa'i don thob par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:128b-21: kun rtse nor bu'i padma ni //
T02TD2510.2E:128b-23: zhes bya ba ni sor mo'i rtse mo thams cad bsnyems la tshigs gsum pa cung zad cig bkug pa ni nor bu'i padma lta bu yin pa'i phyir shes rab kyi nor ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor bas 'gugs par byed pa 'di ni rin chen padma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-1: thams cad nor bu'i padma lta bur byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:129a-2: mdun du kha thur du bstan la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-3: de las mtha' las grol ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-4: sbyin pa chen po rab sbyin byed //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-5: rin chen padma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid las mthe'u chung nas brtsams te /
