T02TD2510.2E:129a-6: dal bus dgrol ba'i tshul gyis sor mo thams cad bkrol ba ni gtong ba ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi snying po'o /
T02TD2510.2E:129a-7: sbyin pa chen po rab sbyin byed //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-9: mthe bong gnyis ni nang du dgug / ces bya ba la sogs pa ni rin chen padma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid las /
T02TD2510.2E:129a-10: mthe bong nang du bcug la mdzub mo gnyis nor bu lta bur byas nas ral gri 'dzin pa'i tshul du byed pa 'di ni nor bu ral gri zhes bya ba rin chen rnon po'i'o /
T02TD2510.2E:129a-11: las ci zhig byed ce na /
T02TD2510.2E:129a-12: nor 'phrog pa zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:129a-13: shes rab dang ye shes la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-16: sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pa'i mthus rnam par rnon pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-17: rdo rje bsdams te 'khor lo bya //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-18: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po ster bar byed pa'i rdo rje rab tu sbyin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-19: de nyid thal mo'i tshul du byas //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-20: kha nas 'dren par byas pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-22: nor bu 'khor lo'i dam tshig gi phyag rya nyid las /
T02TD2510.2E:129a-23: nor bu'i thal mo sbyar te /
T02TD2510.2E:129a-24: kha nas 'dren pa'i tshul du byed pa ni nor bsrung ba'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-25: de nyid bcings ba ni rin chen gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor pas de bcings pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-26: ngag yin te nor bu gsung ba'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-27: rang gi bkas ni rang gi tshig de nor bu gsung ba'i bka'o //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-28: nga rgyal gyi nor gsung bas 'phrog cing 'gugs par byed pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:129a-29: rang gi rig pas byed ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-30: rdo rje nor bu che bcings la //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-32: mdzub mo bsnyams te rgyab bkug pa /
T02TD2510.2E:129a-33: mthe bong rdo rje bcings pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-34: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-35: rdo rje nor bu che zhes bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-36: de bcings la sor mo lhag ma rnams gyen du brkyang nas /
T02TD2510.2E:129a-37: nor bu lta bu'i tshul gyis bskyod pa de bzhin du sor mo thams cad kyang bskyod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:129a-39: sor mo thams cad bsgreng nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-0: zhes @129b bya ba 'di ni rin chen char 'bebs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-1: rdo rje nor bu che bcings la //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-2: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-3: gar byas gtsug phug dbus pa bzhag nas //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-4: zhes bya ba ni gar byed cing spyi gtsug gi phyogs kyi phyogs su mchod pas yang dag par mchod par byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-5: kun la cho ga bzhin bcings nas //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-6: rin chen kun gyis de mchod 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-7: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje nor bu chen por byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:129b-8: sor mo lhag ma brkyang gdong sbyar nas /
T02TD2510.2E:129b-9: nor bu'i tshul du btags pa'i nor bu chen po cho ga bzhin du yang dag par mchod pa de rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD2510.2E:129b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rin po che'i nor bu dngos grub thob par byed pa'i phyir mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-12: rin chen char 'bebs nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings nas /
T02TD2510.2E:129b-13: gar byas te spyi gtsug gi dbus su gzhag pa 'di ni nor bu mchod pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o//
T02TD2510.2E:129b-14: don kun grub pa'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-15: mgrin pa'i phyogs su 'khyud par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-16: nor bu bcing ba zhes bya ste //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-17: bsrung ba yi ni cho gar grags //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-18: zhes bya ba ni nor bu bsrung ba'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-20: rdo rje bsdams pa la mdzub mo gnyis nor bur byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:129b-21: mthe bo gnyis brkyang ste kha phye la /
T02TD2510.2E:129b-22: rang gi mgrin pa'i phyogs su 'khyud pa ltar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-23: de nyid don kun grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-24: gnod sbyin tshul du khar gzhag go //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-25: zhes bya ba ni nor bu bsrung ba'i phyag rgya nyid las mtho bong gnyis brkyang nas khar gzhag pa ni nor bu mche ba zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi don 'phrog pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:129b-26: nor bu'i gnod sbyin la sogs pa don thams cad 'gugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-27: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-28: mdzub bkug mthe bo gnyis kyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-29: zhes bya ba ni mdzub mo gnyis dang rang gi mthe bong gnyis gdong sbyar nas legs par mnan te btsir ba ni nor bu'i khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-30: dam tshig rnams kyi mchod mchog rnams //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-31: zhes bya ba ni sgeg mo la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-33: rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul du ni //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-34: ji bzhin nor bu ldan pa yi //
T02TD2510.2E:129b-35: 'dir ni dam tshig mchog tu brtags //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ji @130a * //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-2: nor bu'i rigs kyi sbyor ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-3: gung mo nor bu'i tshul bya bar //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-5: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i sgeg mo la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgyar brtag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-7: nor bu'i mtshan ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:130a-8: mthe bong bsnyams la snying gar gzhag / rab tu brkyang bas phreng ba ma'i //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-9: thal mo sbyar ba kha nas dbyung //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-10: gar la thal sbyar spyi bor gzhag / rdo rje bcing ba thur du blugs //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-11: rang gi thal sbyar gyen du gtor //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-12: mthe bong bsnyams te rab tu bsdams //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-13: rab tu bskyang nas byug pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-14: zhes bya ba ni nor bu sgeg mo la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:130a-15: nor bu'i dri chab ma la mthar thug pa'i bar gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-16: 'dir rang gi thal mi ni thal mo sbyar ba rin po che'i thal mor gzung bar bya'o / lcags kyu bcing sogs tshul du ni /
T02TD2510.2E:130a-17: las rnams thams cad rab grub byed //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-18: ces bya ba ni nor bu mtshan ma'i phyag rgya de nyid bcings nas /
T02TD2510.2E:130a-19: mdzub mo gcig tu bkug pa dang //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-20: mthe bong gnyis na mdud pa dor //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-21: mthe bong mdzub mo gdu bur bcing //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-22: rdo rje bcing ba mdzub mor bsdams //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-23: zhes bya ba ni sgo srung rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-24: de nas nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin no zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgyar nges pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:130a-25: yi ge tra ni rdo rje snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:130a-27: rdo rje nor bu rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o//
T02TD2510.2E:130a-28: grva ni rin chen rgyal po'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-29: tri ni nor bu chags pa'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-30: hri ni nor bu legs pa'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-31: yi ge shri ni rin chen lta ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:130a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:130a-33: rdo rje rin po che myu gu ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-34: ai ni rin chen gzi brjid kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-35: ra ni nor bu dpal gyi'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:130a-36: / ha ni nor bu bzhad pa'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-37: hri ni rin chen padma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:130a-38: gtong ba ting nge 'dzin ye shes snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:130a-39: rdo rje rin chen padma rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-40: dhi ni rin chen rnon po'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130a-42: b'a ni nor bu gsung ba'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130b-0: rin chen chen char 'bebs pa dang nor bu'i @130b mchod pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:130b-1: rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130b-2: ha ni nor bu bsrung ba'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130b-3: ya ni nor bu gnod sbyin gyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130b-4: aa ni nor bu khu tshur gyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130b-5: yi ge h'um rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130b-6: rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams kyi ni /
T02TD2510.2E:130b-7: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa nyid kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130b-8: rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa rnams la khyad par ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:130b-9: yi ge tram mthar sbyar ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130b-10: rin chen phyag rgya gnyis byas las //
T02TD2510.2E:130b-11: las kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:130b-12: zhes bya ba ni nor bu khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya de 'dir rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis su byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:130b-13: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:130b-14: rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.2E:130b-15: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i tshul gyis byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:130b-17: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni //
T02TD2510.2E:130b-18: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya ;
T02TD2510.2E:130b-19: / byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2510.2E:130b-20: sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130b-21: rnam par snang mdzad kyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130b-22: bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yi ni /
T02TD2510.2E:130b-23: nor bu'i mtshan ma dang rdo rje rin chen ma rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130b-24: lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:130b-28: legs so sbyin pa snying gar gzhag pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:130b-30: dbang bskur ba ni nor bu gnyis ni don thams cad grub pa dang rin chen lta ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:130b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:130b-32: rdo rje rin chen myu gu ma'i'o//
T02TD2510.2E:130b-33: snying gar nyi ma bstan par bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:130b-35: g-yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs pa ni rin chen dpal gyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130b-36: de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:130b-38: g-yas pa yis ni g-yon pa dbye ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:130b-40: gtong ba ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:130b-42: snying gar g-yon pa ral gri 'dud ni rin chen rnon po'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130b-43: mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba ni nor bu 'khor lo bskor ba'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:130b-44: rin chen gnyis ka kha nas dbyung ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:130b-46: rin chen gar bskor bkrol ba yis //
T02TD2510.2E:130b-47: thal mo 'gram ba spyi bor gzhag /
T02TD2510.2E:131a-2: rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:131a-3: go cha ni nor bu bsrung ba'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:131a-4: mthe chung mche ba ni nor bu'i gnod sbyin gyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:131a-5: khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:131a-7: rin chen po spyings pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:131a-8: bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:131a-10: phreng ba bcings dang ni rin chen phreng ba ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:131a-11: kha nas dbyung ni rin chen glu ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:131a-12: gar la thal sbyar spyi bor gzhag pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:131a-14: rin chen khu tshur thur du blugs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:131a-16: thal mo sbyar ba gyen du gtor //
T02TD2510.2E:131a-18: mthe bong bsnyams te rab tu bsdams pa ni rin chen mar me ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:131a-19: rab tu brkyang nas byug pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:131a-20: rin chen po dri chab ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:131a-21: mdzub mo lcag skyu bcing ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:131a-22: mthe'u chung las te lcags kyu che //
T02TD2510.2E:131a-24: mkhrig ma mdud pa ni rin chen zhags pa'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:131a-25: mdzub gnyis mdud pa ni rin chen lcags sgrog gi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:131a-26: rgyab gnyis kyang ni mnyam ste mnan ni rin chen 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:131a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni mtshan nyid can gyi las ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las so //
T02TD2510.2E:131a-29: nor bu'i rigs de nyid kyi rtogs pa chen po ni rtog pa las byung ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:131a-30: de ston par byed pa'i tshig gi tshogs la yang rtog pa chen po zhes bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:131a-31: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i las kyi rtog pa thams cad zil gyis mnan nas mdzes shing 'bar bar byed pas na /
T02TD2510.2E:131a-32: rgyal po ste de'i phyir rtog pa'i rgyal po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:131a-33: de bas na don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi don mthar thug pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:131a-34: 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i 'grel pa /
T02TD2510.2E:131a-35: de kho na nyid snang bar byed pa las don thams cad grub par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2510.2E:131b-0: // / de ltar phyag rgya chen po gtso bor gyur pa'i nor @131b bu'i rigs chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:131b-1: da ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur ba'i nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:131b-2: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:131b-3: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:131b-4: dang por sbyor ba'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:131b-5: 'dir dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dang por sbyor ba nyid yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:131b-6: yang gi sgra ni zlos pa'i don te don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la ltos pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:131b-7: bcom ldan 'das ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD2510.2E:131b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por rtogs pa rnam par snang mdzad nas rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs kyi mthar thug pa'o//
T02TD2510.2E:131b-9: de'i gzungs ni de'i rigs te /
T02TD2510.2E:131b-10: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs ma'i mthar thug pa gnyis su med pa'i dran pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:131b-11: shes rab yang dag par ldan pa'i sems so //
T02TD2510.2E:131b-12: de dag gi dam tshig ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi nor bu'i rigs chen po'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2510.2E:131b-13: de las byung ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i thugs ka'i rdo rje rin po che gang las byung ba de la de skad ces bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:131b-14: des byin gyis brlabs pa ni brtan par byas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:131b-15: gang dang gang gis don gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin ming de skad ces bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi phyag rgya 'chad par 'gyur ba 'di dag gis gsungs shing bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:131b-16: nor bu'i rigs chen po rang gi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs ka'i rdo rje nor bu'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:131b-17: rang gi rigs las byung ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i rgyu rang gi rigs yang dag par byung ba ni 'dir phyag na rdo rje'i rig pa lags so //
T02TD2510.2E:131b-18: de bzhin du rdo rje snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:132a-2: rdo rje sna tshogs rnams kyis rang gi phyag rgya gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:132a-5: rin chen char 'bebs rnams gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:132a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i thugs ka'i rdo rje rin po che las rang gi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad sprul pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sngar bgad pa'i tshul gyis dbul bar bya'o zhes shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:132a-7: de la de nas yang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:132a-8: aom sarbba aa bhi sheka p'u dza sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba ni mthar thug pa'i gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:132a-9: de nas bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:132a-10: don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams ni dkyil 'khor der dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:132a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:132a-12: de nas zhes bya ba ni skabs su bab pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:132a-13: rang gi rigs ni nor bu rin po che'i rigs so //
T02TD2510.2E:132a-14: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs pa bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:132a-15: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:132a-16: sngon du bsnyen pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:132a-18: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas don thams cad grub pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
T02TD2510.2E:132a-19: de las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:132b-0: don thams cad grub pa'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i snying po'i cho gas nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ji lta ba bzhin du sprul nas gzugs thams cad la yang re re zhing @132b bzlas brjod khri khri bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:132b-1: phyis nor bu rin po che'i gzugs kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor zhag bdun bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:132b-2: de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o /
T02TD2510.2E:132b-3: de nas ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don te /
T02TD2510.2E:132b-4: gang gi phyir nor bu'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med na /
T02TD2510.2E:132b-5: des 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams kyi don 'grub par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir rab tu bshad par bya ba ste /
T02TD2510.2E:132b-6: phyag rgya'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam par mchog tu gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:132b-7: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la ;
T02TD2510.2E:132b-8: / zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i nor bu'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor la ni 'dir rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:132b-9: rin chen gsang ba zhes bshad do //
T02TD2510.2E:132b-10: zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i rigs te /
T02TD2510.2E:132b-11: rin po che'i gsang ba ni 'dir sems kyi gsang ba ste /
T02TD2510.2E:132b-12: 'di ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i don te zhes bshad pa ni grags pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:132b-13: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du dkyil 'khor 'di thams cad srad bu bre bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:132b-14: de yi dbus su tshul bzhin du //
T02TD2510.2E:132b-15: sangs rgyas phyag rgya bri bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:132b-16: zhes bya ba ni thig btab ma thag pa'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas aom tram zhes bya ba brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:132b-17: nam mkha'i phyogs nas phab ste gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni tshul bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:132b-18: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD2510.2E:132b-19: phyag rgya ni sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:132b-20: rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:132b-21: khri la gnas pa'i nor bu'i gtso //
T02TD2510.2E:132b-22: rdo rje dbyings kyi mdun du bri //
T02TD2510.2E:132b-23: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa 'di nyid kyis skyes pa'i gzugs su bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:132b-24: sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya ni 'dir mchod rten gyi gzugs can ma yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:132b-25: de la khri ni rig pa'i gdan yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:132b-26: de la gnas pa ni khri la bzhugs pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:132b-27: mdun drang por byas nas shar phyogs rdo rje sems ma'i gnas su bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:132b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyi lhor rdo rje rin chen ma'i gnas su nor bu'i phreng ba /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-0: nub phyogs rdo rje chos ma'i gnas @133a * //
T02TD2510.2E:133a-1: su padma'i steng du nor bu /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-2: byang phyogs rdo rje las ma'i gnas su nor bus yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:133a-3: rdo rje rin chen dbus su ni //
T02TD2510.2E:133a-4: rdo rje nor bu chen po bri //
T02TD2510.2E:133a-5: zhes bya ba la nor bu dbyibs rtsi bas brgyad pa'i dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu bri'o /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-8: phyag rgya thams cad kyi gnas su kha khyer gsum pa'i rig pa'i khri de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:133a-9: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas su aom ma ni sa ma ya h'um zhes brjod cing rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu mgo shar du bltas pa 'bar ba dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:133a-10: rdo rje rin chen po ma'i gnas su nor bu rin po che'i phreng ba /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-11: aom ma ni ratna aa bhi she ka m'a la h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis bri ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-12: chos kyi rdo rje ma'i gnas su padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i dbus su yid bzhin gyi nor bu /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-13: aom ma ni ratna padme h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-15: las kyi rdo rje ma'i gnas su yid bzhin gyi nor bu de nor bu shin tu tshang phra mos bskor ba /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-16: aom ma ni ratna pra be sha sa ma ya h'um zhes bya bas bri'o //
T02TD2510.2E:133a-17: don thams cad 'grub pa'i gnas su rdo rje nor bu rtsibs brgyad pa'i dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-18: aom sarbba aartha siddhi pra ti ma h'a badzra ratna sa ma ya ma ni sarbba aartha ne s'a dha ya dha ra ni h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-19: nor bu mtshan ma'i gnas su nor bus mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-20: aom ma ni ratna a'a karsha h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-21: rin chen rgyal po'i gnas su nor bus mtshan pa'i lcags kyu /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-22: aom ma ni ratna sa ma ya aam ku sha / a'a karsha ya ma ni ku lam dza /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-23: nor bu chags pa'i gnas su rin po tshe'i mda' gzhu /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-24: aom ma ni r'a ga sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-25: nor bu legs pa'i gnas su mkhrig ma'i mthar thug pa'i nor bu dang bcas pa'i khu tshur gnyis kyis legs so zhes byed pa /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-26: aom ma ni s'a dhu h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-27: rin chen lta ba'i gnas su mig gnyis kyi dbus su yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang ldan pa /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-28: aom ma ni ratna ne tra aa na ya ba shi ku ru sarbba aartha sam bha ram shr'i ghram dri shya aam ku sha h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba'i gnas su yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phreng ba /
T02TD2510.2E:133a-30: aom ratna m'a le aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-0: nor bu nyi ma'i gnas su @133b nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar nor bus mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:133b-1: aom ma ni ratna s'u rya tsal ya sarbba ma h'a te dza ni h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-2: nor bu dpal gyi gnas su rin po che'i yu ba can gyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan zla ba phyed pa dang bcas pa /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-3: aom ma ni tsa ra dha dza aa gre h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-4: nor bu bzhad pa'i gnas su so 'phreng ba gnyis kyi mtha' ru rdo rjes mtshan pa /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-5: aom ma ni h'a se h'a sa h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-6: nor bu padma'i gnas su padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa yid bzhin nor bu can /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-7: aom ma ni sa la dhe padma ni h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-8: gtong ba ting nge 'dzin ye shes snying po'i gnas su padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu can /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-9: aom ma ni ratna tya ga sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-10: rin chen rnon po'i gnas su nor bus mtshan pa'i ral gri /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-11: aom ma ni sa ma ya kosha h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-12: nor bu 'khor lo'i gnas su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i lte bar nor bu dang ldan pa /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-13: aom ma ni sa ma ya tsakri h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-14: nor bu srung ba'i gnas su nor bus mtshan pa'i lce /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-15: aom ma ni bh'a sha aa gre h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-16: nor bu rin chen char 'bebs kyi gnas su yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che char 'bebs pas nor bu shin tu phra mo de rnams kyis de bskor ba /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-17: aom ratna brishta sv'a dha ya ma h'a ma ni h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-18: nor bu mchod pa'i gnas su nor bus mtshan pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-19: aom p'u dza sa ma ye nrem tya aa /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-20: nor bu bsrung ba'i gnas su nor bus mtshan pa'i go cha /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-21: aom ma ni sa ma ya raksha h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-22: nor bu gnod sbyin gyi gnas su nor bus mtshan pa'i mche ba gnyis /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-23: aom badzra ma ni ratna damshta k'a ra le h'a ra h'a ra h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-24: nor bu khu chur gyi gnas su nor bus mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-25: dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis nor bu yongs su 'dzin pa /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-26: aom ma ni sa ma ya mushti h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-27: rin chen sgeg mo'i gnas su nor bus mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-28: rin chen phreng ba ma'i gnas su nor bu'i phreng nor bu glu ma'i gnas su nor bu'i mtshan ma can gyi pi wang /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-29: nor bu gar ma'i gnas su mkhrig ma'i mthar thug pa'i lag pa gnyis nor bus mtshan pa'i gar byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:133b-30: rin chen bdug pa ma'i gnas su nor bus mtshan pa'i spos khang ma bdug pa'i za ma tog dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:133b-31: rin chen me tog ma'i gnas su rin po che'i me tog gis kun du bkang ba'i lo ma'i snod /
T02TD2510.2E:133b-32: rin chen mar me'i gnas su nor bus mtshan pa'i mar me'i mchod sdong /
T02TD2510.2E:134a-0: rin chen dri chab ma'i gnas su nor @134a * //
T02TD2510.2E:134a-1: bus mtshan pa'i dri'i dung chos //
T02TD2510.2E:134a-2: rin chen lcags kyu'i gnas su nor bus mtshan pa'i lcags kyu /
T02TD2510.2E:134a-3: rin chen zhags pa ma'i gnas su rin po ches mtshan pa'i zhags pa /
T02TD2510.2E:134a-4: rin chen lcags sgrog gi gnas su nor bus mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog rin chen 'bebs pa'i gnas su nor bus mtshan pa'i dril bu /
T02TD2510.2E:134a-5: byams pa la sogs pa rnams ni ji lta ba'i khyams kyi gnas rnams su sngar bshad pa'i mtshan ma bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:134a-6: de la rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rin po che 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa rnams ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i snying po bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:134a-7: byams pa la sogs pa rnams kyang sngar bshad pa'i rang gi rig pas bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:134a-8: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:134a-9: 'dir nor bu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2510.2E:134a-10: las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas zhes bya ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas slob dpon gyis rang gi cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:134a-11: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du bkug la bcug ste /
T02TD2510.2E:134a-12: bcings la dbang du byas nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis cho ga bzhin du gzugs thams cad rab tu bsgrubs nas /
T02TD2510.2E:134a-13: chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab ste /
T02TD2510.2E:134a-14: rdo rje rin po che'i myu gus dbang bskur la /
T02TD2510.2E:134a-15: mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2510.2E:134a-16: nor bu'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgyas don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i nor bu'i slob ma 'jug pa'i cho gas bcug la /
T02TD2510.2E:134a-17: 'di skad bsgo bar bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:134a-18: de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la chu'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:134a-20: cod pan gyis dbang bskur bas bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:134a-21: sor bzhi pa'i tshad kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i nor bu dang /
T02TD2510.2E:134a-22: rin po che'i dril bu dang /
T02TD2510.2E:134a-23: ming gi dbang bskur ba byin la /
T02TD2510.2E:134a-24: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga thams cad byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:134a-25: de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:134a-26: slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:134b-0: da ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la slob @134b dpon gyis don thams cad grub pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes rnams bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir rang gi nor bu'i dam tshig gi ye shes bskyed par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:134b-1: nor bu'i dam tshig gi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nor bu'i dam tshig gi ye shes so //
T02TD2510.2E:134b-2: de bskyed par bya ba ni rdo rje rin po che la sogs pa bsgom par nges pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2510.2E:134b-3: thos pa dang bsam pa'i rang bzhin can slob ma'i rgyud la bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:134b-4: rdo rje rin chen ting nge 'dzin gyis //
T02TD2510.2E:134b-5: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
T02TD2510.2E:134b-6: mkha' la rang bzhin bri bar bya ;
T02TD2510.2E:134b-7: / zhes bya ba ni sems kyis kun brtags pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:134b-10: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la bshad pa'i don thams cad grub pa'i rnal 'byor ram /
T02TD2510.2E:134b-11: de'i rigs kyi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:134b-12: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i don thams cad grub pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'am /
T02TD2510.2E:134b-13: nor bu mtshan ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:134b-14: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i ma h'a ratna aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD2510.2E:134b-15: zhes brjod pa'i snying po 'dis nam mkha'i phyogs su rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen por bskyed la /
T02TD2510.2E:134b-16: ming brjod cing nyin re bzhin du thun bzhi sbyor bas bsgoms pas ni ji srid rgyun mi 'chad par thun bzhi mngon sum lta bur mthong ba de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:134b-17: de nas mtshan thog thag bsgoms nas rdo rje rin chen de mngon sum du gyur pas de 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:134b-18: de nas phyag rgya chen po bzung nas dpral bar bzhag na rang dbang can gyi rgyal por 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:134b-19: rdo rje rin chen bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:134b-20: rdo rje rin chen mkha' la bri //
T02TD2510.2E:134b-22: dam tshig mchog ni bcings pa la //
T02TD2510.2E:134b-23: zhes bya ba sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:134b-24: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rin chen lta ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:134b-25: de'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:134b-26: des de bcings nas dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gzhag go //
T02TD2510.2E:134b-27: nges par rgyal po nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:134b-28: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rin chen lta ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:135a-0: @135a * // de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:135a-1: phyis gzungs kyi bar rin chen bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:135a-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa don thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:135a-3: sa ma ya ratna aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD2510.2E:135a-5: rdo rje dril bu rin po che'i dbang bskur ba bsam mo//
T02TD2510.2E:135a-6: de nas snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:135a-7: des dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzung ste /
T02TD2510.2E:135a-8: dpral ba'i gnas su bzhag nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:135a-9: nges par rgyal srid thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:135a-11: rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD2510.2E:135a-12: rdo rje rin chen mkha' la bri //
T02TD2510.2E:135a-13: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du chos kyi rin chen gyi ting nge 'dzin bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:135a-15: de'i rigs gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi snying po la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ni chos kyi rin chen gyi ting nge 'dzin te /
T02TD2510.2E:135a-16: de'i ting nge 'dzin bskyed la ye shes rin po chos dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag na rang dbang can gyi rgyal por rang nyid byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:135a-18: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i nor bu padma'am /
T02TD2510.2E:135a-19: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:135a-20: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i de'i phyag rgya chen po'am /
T02TD2510.2E:135a-21: de'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:135a-22: dharmma ratna aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD2510.2E:135a-24: nam mkha' la rdo rje rin po che sprul la snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:135a-25: rang gis dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag na rgyal por 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:135a-26: las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:135a-27: mkha' la rdo rje rin chen bri //
T02TD2510.2E:135a-28: zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:135a-29: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rin chen char 'bebs sam //
T02TD2510.2E:135a-30: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:135a-31: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa de'am /
T02TD2510.2E:135a-32: de'i rigs nor bu mchod pa la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:135a-33: karmma ratna aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD2510.2E:135a-34: zhes brjod cing nam mkha' la rdo rje rin chen sprul la snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:135a-35: rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su de bzhag na /
T02TD2510.2E:135a-36: rang nyid kyis grub pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:135a-37: phyag rgya chen po snying gar ni //
T02TD2510.2E:135a-38: rdo rje rin chen bsgom par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:135b-0: zhes bya @135b ba la rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag rgya chen po'i rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:135b-1: de ltar rdo rje rin chen rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la yid kyis bris nas phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:135b-2: bsgom pas ci zhig byed par 'gyur zhe na //
T02TD2510.2E:135b-3: bsgoms na mngon par dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2510.2E:135b-4: mchog tu rmad du byung ba thob //
T02TD2510.2E:135b-7: dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:135b-8: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:135b-9: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa de'am /
T02TD2510.2E:135b-10: de'i rigs kyi nor bu'i mtshan ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:135b-11: aom badzra ratna hri da ya aa bhi shinytsa ho /
T02TD2510.2E:135b-12: zhes brjod cing rang gi snying ga'i zla bar rdo rje rin po che sprul la snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs na don thams cad grub pa'i dbang bskur ba la sogs pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:135b-13: rab mnyam gzhag pas rdo rje yi //
T02TD2510.2E:135b-14: dpral bar rin chen bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:135b-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i snga ma bzhin du rin chen lta ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:135b-16: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:135b-17: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa de'am /
T02TD2510.2E:135b-18: de'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:135b-19: de nas rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:135b-20: aom badzra ratna aa bhi she ka ta zhes bya ba snying po 'di brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:135b-21: dbang bskur ba'i gnas su rdo rje rin chen sprul la snga ma bzhin du bsgrub te /
T02TD2510.2E:135b-22: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro ;
T02TD2510.2E:135b-23: / rdo rje rin chen ting nge 'dzin gyis //
T02TD2510.2E:135b-24: lce la rdo rje bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:135b-25: zhes bya ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa bzhin du rin chen padma'am /
T02TD2510.2E:135b-26: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:135b-27: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:135b-28: aom ratna au sha aa dhi tishtha m'am zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis lce la rdo rje rin po che sbrul la /
T02TD2510.2E:135b-29: snga ma bzhin du bsgrub pa byas na chos kyi rgyal po thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:135b-30: rab mnyam gzhag pa rdo rje yi //
T02TD2510.2E:135b-31: rdo rje gtsug tor bsgoms na ni //
T02TD2510.2E:136a-0: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil @136a * //
T02TD2510.2E:136a-1: 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rin chen char 'bebs dang /
T02TD2510.2E:136a-2: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:136a-3: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa de'am de'i rigs nor bu'i mchod pa la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:136a-4: aom ratna aushn'i sha aa bhi tishtha m'am /
T02TD2510.2E:136a-6: spyi gtsug gi gnas su rdo rje rin po che sprul la rnam par bsgoms te snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs na las legs par byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:136a-7: phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD2510.2E:136a-8: bsgoms na rdo rje rin chen las //
T02TD2510.2E:136a-9: ras la sogs par bris nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:136a-10: zhes bya ba la snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i don thams cad grub pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:136a-11: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:136a-12: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa de'am /
T02TD2510.2E:136a-13: nor bu'i mtshan ma la sogs pa de'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:136a-14: ras sam rtsig pa la sogs pa la rdo rje rin chen bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:136a-15: aom badzra bimpa ya dhi sha pa pad bimpa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis rdo rje rin chen dang bdag nyid tha mi dad par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:136a-16: de nas snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs na rgyal por sgrub pa po de 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:136a-17: rdo rje rin chen bla na med ;
T02TD2510.2E:136a-18: / ras la sogs par bris nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:136a-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ras sam rtsig pa'am spang leb la rdo rje rin chen bris te /
T02TD2510.2E:136a-20: snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rin chen spyan dang /
T02TD2510.2E:136a-21: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:136a-22: phyi phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa de'am /
T02TD2510.2E:136a-23: de'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:136a-24: des ras sam rtsig pa la bris la rdo rje rin chen dang bdag nyid tha mi dad par bsam mo //
T02TD2510.2E:136a-25: de nas yang badzra ratna bimba pra tishtha /
T02TD2510.2E:136a-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje gzugs su bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:136a-27: de nas snga ma bzhin du byas te bsgrubs na gzugs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyi bdag po rdo rje snying por 'gyur ro /
T02TD2510.2E:136a-28: rdo rje rin chen bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD2510.2E:136a-29: ras la sogs la bris nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:136b-0: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de @136b bzhin du ras la sogs pa la rdo rje rin chen bris la don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das rin chen padma'am /
T02TD2510.2E:136b-1: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:136b-2: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa de'am /
T02TD2510.2E:136b-3: de'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:136b-4: de ras la sogs pa la bris nas /
T02TD2510.2E:136b-6: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis rdo rje rin chen dang bdag nyid lhan cig tha mi dad par byas pas de'i rigs kyi gzugs su bdag nyid grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:136b-7: de nas snga ma bzhin du thams cad byas la bsgrub pa byas na des par chos kyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:136b-8: ras la sogs la rdo rje yis //
T02TD2510.2E:136b-9: rin chen bris nas lha rnams kyis //
T02TD2510.2E:136b-10: zhes bya ba la de bzhin du ras la sogs pa la rdo rje rin chen bris te /
T02TD2510.2E:136b-11: snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rin chen char 'bebs sam /
T02TD2510.2E:136b-12: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:136b-13: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa de'am /
T02TD2510.2E:136b-14: de'i rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:136b-15: badzra ratna bimpa ku ru zhes zlos shing /
T02TD2510.2E:136b-16: des ras la bris nas rdo rje rin chen dang lhan cig bdag nyid tha mi dad pas rin chen char 'bebs sam /
T02TD2510.2E:136b-17: de'i rigs nor bu'i mchod pa'i rang bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:136b-18: de nas snga ma bzhin du bsgrub pa byas na rin chen char 'bebs ma de'i rigs kyi ngo bo'i las kyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:136b-19: gser ram yang na dngul yang rung //
T02TD2510.2E:136b-20: rdo rje rin chen bcang gyur tam //
T02TD2510.2E:136b-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bzo bo mkhas pas gser la sogs pa las byas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:136b-22: de nas snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i don thams cad grub pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:136b-23: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i don thams cad grub pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:136b-24: de'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings pa de dang /
T02TD2510.2E:136b-25: aom badzra ratna hri da ya ma bh'a ra ni h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:136b-26: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis rin po che de blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:136b-27: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la rin po che de de bzhin du bsams nas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:136b-28: de nas snga ma bzhin du bsgrub pa byas na don thams cad grub pa sa dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-1: dbang bskur bas bcom ldan 'das dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:137a-2: rdo rje rin chen bla na med //
T02TD2510.2E:137a-3: gser ram rin chen gzhan las bya //
T02TD2510.2E:137a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de bzhin du gser la sogs pa las byas pa'i rdo rje rin po che byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-5: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rin chen lta ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-6: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-7: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa de'am /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-8: de'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-9: de dang aom badzra ratna aa bhi she ka ma h'a sarbba pra dha zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis rin po che blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:137a-10: de nas phyag rgya de nyid dpral ba'i bar du 'jog cing dbang bskur ba'i gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-11: bsgoms na de nas snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs na nor chen po'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:137a-12: gser ram rin chen gzhan dag gis //
T02TD2510.2E:137a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rin chen padma'am /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-14: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-15: phyis de'am de'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-16: aom badzra ratna wa ts'a ya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-17: zhes bya bas ni rin po che bskyed de /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-18: rang gi khar bcug nas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:137a-19: de nas snga ma bzhin du bsgrub pa byas te bsgoms na tshig la dbang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:137a-20: gser ram rin chen gzhan dag gis //
T02TD2510.2E:137a-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de bzhin du bzo bo mkhas pas rdo rje rin po che byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-22: de nas snga ma bzhin du rin chen char 'bebs sam /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-23: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-24: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa de'am /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-25: de'i rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-26: aom badzra ratna garbha ma h'a karmma pa te /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-27: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis phyag rgya de bskyed la las kyi phyag rgyas gzugs te /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-28: gtsug tor gyi dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsams nas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:137a-29: de nas snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs na las rnams kun gyi bdag po rin chen char 'bebs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:137a-30: de'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:137a-31: de nas zhes bya ba ni dngos grub kyi ye shes bstan pa'i dus phyis so //
T02TD2510.2E:137b-0: nor bu'i @137b rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams ni gzungs kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:137b-1: gsang ba'i ye shes la yang dag par bskor ba'i bsgom par nges pa de bslab cing bstan pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:137b-2: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:137b-3: rdo rje nor bu che bcings la //
T02TD2510.2E:137b-4: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sems ma rdo rje ma'i gnas kyi rdo rje nor bu chen mo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya de 'dir bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:137b-5: des nor bu bud med kyi bu gar de bzhin du zhugs te /
T02TD2510.2E:137b-6: rdo rje nor bu chen mo yis //
T02TD2510.2E:137b-7: nor bu de ni de'i nor bu ste /
T02TD2510.2E:137b-8: sgrub pa po'i mtshan ma'i nor bu de'i rig pa'i lha mo'i mtshan mar yid kyis gzhug cing phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:137b-10: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i don thams cad grub pa'i rnal 'byor ram /
T02TD2510.2E:137b-11: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:137b-12: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa de'am /
T02TD2510.2E:137b-13: de'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:137b-14: de nas stan gcig la rang gi gzugs sbrul la bsdu ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:137b-15: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab ste /
T02TD2510.2E:137b-16: rdo rje rin po che myu gus dbang bskur ba'i rin po che sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas phyag byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:137b-17: rdo rje rin po che dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2510.2E:137b-18: aom ma h'a siddha: zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2510.2E:137b-19: de nas lhan cig tu mnyam par sbyor ba bsgoms nas ji srid nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas mngon sum lta bur mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:137b-20: de nas mtshan thog thag bsgom pa na de'i rjes la de 'ongs ba dang lhan cig mnyam par sbyor ba byas nas de'i lus la zhugs par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:137b-21: yang de nas don thams cad grub pa de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:137b-22: dam tshig mchog ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02TD2510.2E:137b-23: nor bu ni rang gi mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2510.2E:137b-26: bcu pas bzhag la zhes su brjod //
T02TD2510.2E:137b-29: bud med bu gar zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:137b-30: rang gi rig pa'i lha mo'i mtshan mar ro //
T02TD2510.2E:137b-31: dam tshig mchog ni rang gi dam tshig phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:137b-32: bcing ba ni lhan cig tu gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:138a-0: dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ba ni dbang bskur @138a * //
T02TD2510.2E:138a-2: thams cad ni rin chen lta ba'i rigs la sogs pa thams cad do //
T02TD2510.2E:138a-4: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rin chen lta ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:138a-5: de'i rigs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:138a-6: de nas gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das rin chen spyan nas de'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas phyis stan gcig la rang gi gzugs sprul la bsdu ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:138a-7: aom ma h'a sa ma ya aa bhi she ka siddhi: zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02TD2510.2E:138a-8: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:138a-9: de dang lhan cig tu mnyam par sbyor bas de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:138a-10: de nas mtshan thog thag byas pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:138a-11: de'i rjes la de 'ongs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:138a-12: de dang lhan cig mnyam par sbyor ba byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:138a-14: de nas rin chen spyan la sogs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:138a-15: rdo rje nor bu che bcings la //
T02TD2510.2E:138a-16: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:138a-17: chos kyi phyag rgya bsgom zhes bya ba ni rin chen padma'am /
T02TD2510.2E:138a-18: de'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgoms pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:138a-19: de'i nor bu zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan ma'o //
T02TD2510.2E:138a-20: de ni bud med bu gar bcug / ces bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:138a-21: bla na med pa'i dngos grub 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:138a-22: zhes bya ba ni rin chen padma'am /
T02TD2510.2E:138a-23: de'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:138a-24: bla na med pa'i dngos grub 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:138a-27: de bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das rin chen padma'am /
T02TD2510.2E:138a-28: de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:138a-29: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa de'am /
T02TD2510.2E:138a-30: de'i rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:138a-31: gdan gcig la rang gi gzugs sbrul nas snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:138a-32: rdo rje nor bu chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:138a-33: aom dharmma siddhi: zhes zlos shing /
T02TD2510.2E:138a-34: rang gi gzugs dang lhan cig mnyam par sbyor ba bsgom mo //
T02TD2510.2E:138b-0: @138b de nas de bzhin du mtshan thog thag bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:138b-1: de'i rjes la de 'ongs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:138b-2: de dang lhan cig tu mnyam par sbyor ba byas nas de'i lus la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:138b-3: de nas de rin po che padma la sogs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro /
T02TD2510.2E:138b-4: las kyi phyag rgya'i nor bu ni las kyi phyag rgya'i nor bu ste /
T02TD2510.2E:138b-6: de'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:138b-7: nor bu ni ji skad bshad pa'i nor bu'i mtshan ma de bcings pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:138b-8: bud med bu gar rin chen char 'bebs kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcings pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:138b-9: de'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcings na dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:138b-10: las kun ni rin chen char 'bebs la sogs pa'i las thams cad kyi mtshan ma bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:138b-12: snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rin chen char 'bebs dang de'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:138b-13: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad ba'i rin chen char 'bebs dang /
T02TD2510.2E:138b-14: de'i rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:138b-15: stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang mnyam pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rang gi gzugs sbrul la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:138b-16: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:138b-17: aom karmma siddhi: zhes zlos shing lhan cig mnyam par sbyor bar bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:138b-19: de'i rjes la lha mo de dang mnyam par sbyor ba byas nas de'i lus la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:138b-20: de nas sgrub pa po de rin chen char 'bebs la sogs ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:138b-21: rig pa'i bud med thams cad kyi bdag po dang 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:138b-22: de ltar nor bu'i ye shes bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:138b-23: da ni don thams cad grub pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:138b-24: sgrub pa dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i gzungs rnams spyan drangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:138b-25: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab po zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:138b-26: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:139a-0: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de ma thag @139a * //
T02TD2510.2E:139a-1: pa ste dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:139a-2: dkyil 'khor 'dir zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya chen po bcings pa 'byung ste /
T02TD2510.2E:139a-3: sku ston par byed pa'i phyag rgya rnams 'ching ba'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go ;
T02TD2510.2E:139a-4: / rin chen rdo rje myu gu bcing //
T02TD2510.2E:139a-5: gung mo srin lag mthe chung rnams //
T02TD2510.2E:139a-6: sor mo brkyang ba byas nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:139a-7: spyi bor bzhag pa grub mchog sbyin //
T02TD2510.2E:139a-8: zhes bya ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje rin po che myu gu'i gung mo dang /
T02TD2510.2E:139a-10: mthe'u chung rnams so sor brkyang ste /
T02TD2510.2E:139a-11: spyi bor gzhag pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:139a-13: aom badzra ratna dh'u pe h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:139a-14: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas la phyis phyag rgya bcing ba dang rig pa 'dis rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgrubs na rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:139a-15: rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:139a-16: mdzub mo gnyis mdud mthe ba gnyis dang //
T02TD2510.2E:139a-17: srin lag rdo rje bsgyur nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:139a-18: mdzod sbur bzhag pa dbang bskur thob //
T02TD2510.2E:139a-19: ces bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun lcags sgrog tu sbrel la /
T02TD2510.2E:139a-20: mthe bo dang srin lag gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar byas nas yongs su bsgyur te mdzod spur gzhag pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:139a-21: rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la 'di nyid bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:139a-22: aom aa bhi she ka ma le aa bhi shinytsa sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:139a-23: zhes zlos shing rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms nas bsgrubs na de nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dra bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:139a-24: rdo rje rin chen tshul byas la //
T02TD2510.2E:139a-25: de nyid yongs su bsgyur nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:139a-26: mdzub mo gnyis rtse gdong sbrad pa //
T02TD2510.2E:139a-27: 'di ni dbang bskur thams cad byed//
T02TD2510.2E:139a-28: ces bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya nyid las rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:139a-29: mdzod spur gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje snying po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-0: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje snying po'i rnal @139b 'byor byas la 'di nyid bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:139b-1: aom badzra ratna aa bhishe ka h'um zhes brjod cing snga ma bzhin du rdo rje snying por bdag nyid bsgoms nas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-2: de nas rdo rje snying po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-3: de nyid mtheb gnyis mdzub gnyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-4: chos kyi rdo rje'i tshul du yang //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-5: bcings nas dpral bar bzhag nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-6: chos spyan gyi ni dbang bskur sbyin //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-7: zhes bya ba la bshad ma thag pa nyid kyi rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya las mthe bo dang mdzub mo gnyis padmar byas pa dpral bar gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje spyan gyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-8: rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rdo rje spyan gyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:139b-10: aom badzra dharma aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes brjod cing bdag nyid rdo rje spyan du bsgoms nas snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-11: de nas rdo rje spyan dang 'dra bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-12: rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-13: rdo rje dbyings skyes dam tshig kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-14: bsgyur bas dpral ba nyid du yang ;
T02TD2510.2E:139b-15: / bzhag na dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-16: zhes bya ba ni sems ma rdo rje ma bstan par byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:139b-17: gung mo gnyis bsgreng ba ni rgyab tu mdzub mo gnyis bskum la rdo rje'i rnam pa ltar gzhag pa 'di ni las kyi rdo rje ste sna tshogs kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-18: rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rdo rje sna tshogs kyi rnal 'byor byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:139b-20: aom sarbba aa bhi she ka p'u dza sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:139b-21: zhes zlos shing bdag nyid rdo rje sna tshogs su bsgoms la snga ma bzhin du bsgrub po //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-22: de nas rdo rje sna tshogs dang 'dra bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-23: rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-24: rdo rje dbyings skyes dam tshig kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-25: bcings nas rin chen gnas dag gi / dpral bar bzhag na dbang bskur 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-26: zhes bya ba la rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen ma bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:139b-27: dpral ba'i phyogs su gzhag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po gnyis ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-29: aom tr'am zhes bya ba 'dis dkyil 'khor du bcom ldan 'das la rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-30: mtheb gnyis phan tshun bsnol nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-31: mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-32: nor bu 'dra bar dgug pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:139b-33: rdo rje nor bu chen po thob //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-0: ces bya ba ni lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bong @140a * //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-1: gnyis phan tshun bsnol nas mdzub mo gnyis nor bur byas pa ni sems ma rdo rje ma'i gnas kyi nor bur byas pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.2E:140a-2: dpral ba'i gnas su bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje rin chen ma'i gnas kyi nor bu phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-3: rdo rje bsdams ba byas nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-4: gung mo nor bu 'drar byas la //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-5: mdzub mo srin lag gnyis padmo //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-7: ces bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis nor bur byas la mdzub mo dang srin lag gnyis so sor padma ltar byas pa ni chos kyi rdo rje ma'i gnas kyi nor bu rin chen padma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-8: gung mo gnyis ni nor bu bcing //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-9: sor mo thams cad bsgreng ba rnams //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-10: nor bu nyid du bsgoms na ni //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-12: zhes bya ba ni lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te /
T02TD2510.2E:140a-13: gung mo gnyis rin po cher byas nas sor mo lhag ma rnams brkyang ba'i phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag ste /
T02TD2510.2E:140a-14: sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mo rin po che'i gzugs su bsgoms pa 'di ni rdo rje las ma'i gnas kyi rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-15: rdo rje rin chen tshul bcings nas //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-16: gung mo mthe bo sbyar ba dang //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-17: srin lag mthe chung ba snyam pa rnams //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-18: khar bzhag lce steng nor rab ster ;
T02TD2510.2E:140a-19: / zhes bya ba ni lag pa gnyis brkyang nas gung mo gnyis dang mthe bong gnyis rin po che ltar byas la //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-20: srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ste /
T02TD2510.2E:140a-21: lce bzhin du khar gzhag pa 'di ni don thams cad grub pa'i gnas kyi don kun grub pa rab tu ster ba ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-22: de las mdzub gnyis rdo rjer bya //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-23: zhes bya ba ni kun grub par rab tu ster ba'i phyag rgya nyid las mdzub mo gnyis myu gu ltar byas nas snying gar gzhag pa ni nor bu mtshan ma'i gnas kyi nor bu rin chen 'dren ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-24: de gnyis de bzhin lcags kyur bya //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-25: zhes bya ba ni nor bu rin chen 'dren pa'i phyag rgya nyid las mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu ltar byas pa 'di ni rin chen rgyal po'i gnas kyi rin chen dam tshig lcags kyu ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:140a-26: mdzub mos mdzub mo drang bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:140b-0: zhes bya ba ni don kun grub pa ster ba'i phyag rgya nyid las g-yas pas g-yon pa'i mdzub mo 'dren pa'i phyag rgya nyid @140b las mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu lta bu'i tshul du byed pa 'di ni nor bu chags pa'i gnas kyi nor bu chags pa'i dam tshig ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:140b-1: de nyi mgo la rab sbyin pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:140b-2: zhes bya ba ni nor bu chags pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid kyis mdzub mo dang mthe bo gnyis lags so sbyin pa'i tshul du byed pa 'di ni nor bu legs pa'i ngas kyi nor bu legs pa ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:140b-3: gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bcing //
T02TD2510.2E:140b-4: mdzub gnyis ngos la bkug pa yi //
T02TD2510.2E:140b-5: zhes bya ba ni lag pa gnyis brkyang la gung mo gnyis nor bur byas nas mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu ltar byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:140b-6: mthe bong gi rtse mo la sbyar nas bzhag pa 'di ni rin chen lta ba'i gnas su rdo rje nor bu rin chen spyan ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:140b-7: srin lag ngos gnyis mdud pa la //
T02TD2510.2E:140b-8: mthe bong gnyis ni bkab pa ste //
T02TD2510.2E:140b-9: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje nor bu rin chen spyan gyi phyag rgya nyid las srin lag gnyis nang du bcug nas phan tshun mdud la mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyur byas pa mthe bo gnyis kyis bkab ste /
T02TD2510.2E:140b-10: dpral ba'i gnas su 'jog pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba'i gnas su rdo rje rin chen phreng ba ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:140b-11: de nyid rdo rje nyi ma bskor //
T02TD2510.2E:140b-12: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya nyid snying gar nyi ma'i tshul gyis bskor ba 'di ni nor bu nyi ma'i gnas kyi nor bu rin chen nyi ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:140b-13: dpung pa spyi bor brkyang bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:140b-14: zhes bya ba ni rin chen phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya nyid las dpung pa brkyang nas spyi bor gzhag pa 'di ni nor bu dang las kyi gnas su nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi nor bu zla ba'i rgyal mtshan mchog ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:140b-15: bzhad pa'i tshul du zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya nyid las bzhad pa'i tshul du yongs su bskor ba ni nor bu rin chen bzhad pa'i gnas su nor bu rin chen bzhad pa ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:140b-16: rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:140b-17: mdzub mo srin lag gyen du bsgreng //
T02TD2510.2E:140b-19: gung mo gnyis ni nor bur byas //
T02TD2510.2E:140b-20: rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag gnyis padma 'dra bar byas la gung mo gnyis nor bur byas pa 'di ni rin chen padma'i gnas su nor bu ting nge 'dzin padma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:141a-2: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i ting nge 'dzin padma'i phyag rgya nyid la'ang tha ma sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshul du byed pa 'di ni gtong ba ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi snying po'i gnas kyi nor bu rin chen gtong ba'i dam tshig ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:141a-3: rdo rje ral gri sbyar ba dang //
T02TD2510.2E:141a-4: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i ting nge 'dzin padma'i phyag rgya nyid las ral gris gcod pa'i tshul du byed pa 'di ni rin chen rnon po'i gnas su rin chen dam tshig ral gri ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:141a-5: rdo rje 'khor lo'i tshul du bya //
T02TD2510.2E:141a-6: zhes bya ba ni nor bu ting nge 'dzin padma'i phyag rgya nyid las mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin bskor ba 'di ni nor bu 'khor lo ma'i gnas su nor bu dam tshig gi 'khor lo ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:141a-7: de nyid kha nas dbyung bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:141a-8: zhes bya ba ni nor bu ting nge 'dzin padma'i phyag rgya nyid las tshig 'byin pa'i tshul gyis kha gyen du 'dren pa ni nor bu gsung ba'i gnas kyi nor bu gsung mchog ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:141a-9: rdo rje rin chen myu gur bcing //
T02TD2510.2E:141a-10: sor mo thams cad brkyang ba dang //
T02TD2510.2E:141a-11: de dag spyi bor bzhag pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:141a-12: rin chen char gyi char 'bebs so //
T02TD2510.2E:141a-13: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems ma bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:141a-14: rdo rje rin chen gyi mthe bong dang /
T02TD2510.2E:141a-15: mdzub mo gnyis kha sbyar ba 'di ni rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu ste /
T02TD2510.2E:141a-16: de bcings pa las mthe bong dang /
T02TD2510.2E:141a-19: mthe'u chung rnams brkyang ba'i phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag la sor mo'i rtse mo nor bu'i gzugs su bsgoms nas rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i lha mo bsams pa 'di ni rin chen char 'bebs kyi gnas su rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:141a-20: de nyid 'khor lo'i tshul du ni //
T02TD2510.2E:141a-21: zhes bya ba ni rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya nyid mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du gar gyi tshul bstan pa 'di ni nor bu mchod pa'i gnas su nor bu mchod pa'i dam tshig ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:141a-22: snying gar rin chen gnyis byas pa //
T02TD2510.2E:141a-23: zhes bya ba ni rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya nyid kha gnyis su byas pa 'di ni nor bu cho ga ma'i gnas su nor bu dam tshig bsrung ba ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:141a-24: nor bu 'dzin rtse mche ba yin //
T02TD2510.2E:141a-25: zhes bya ba 'di ni rin chen char 'bebs ma'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis bskum la mche ba bzhin du khar 'jog pa 'di ni nor bu gnod sbyin gyi gnas su nor bu mche ba gtsigs ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:141b-0: dbus su mnyam pa @141b khu tshur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:141b-1: zhes bya ba ni rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya'i dbus su mdzub mo gnyis dang /
T02TD2510.2E:141b-2: rang gi mthe bo gnyis kha sbyar bar byas pa 'di ni nor bu'i khu tshur gyi gnas su nor bu dam tshig khu tshur 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:141b-3: rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa rnams ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid 'dir phyag rgya chen por 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:141b-4: de nas zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po las bshad pa'i rjes thogs nyid la dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes te /
T02TD2510.2E:141b-5: dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'ching ba'i mtshan nyid nges par bslab cing bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:141b-6: phyag rgya chen po de dag nyid //
T02TD2510.2E:141b-7: snyim sbyar byas te bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:141b-8: zhes bya ba la thal mo sbyar la mthe bo gnyis dang gung mo gnyis brkyang mdzub mo gnyis bkug nas rin po che lta bur byas pa'i phyag rgya dpral bar gzhag pa 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:141b-9: thal mo sbyar ba mthe bo gnyis bsnol la mdzub mo gnyis nor bur byas pa 'di ni rdo rje nor bu chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang 'di yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:141b-10: snyim pa sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe bo gnyis kyi gdong sbyar nas gung mo gnyis nor bu 'dra bar byas pa phyag rgya dpral bar gzhag pa 'di ni rin chen phreng ba ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:141b-11: snyim pa sbyar la gung mo nor bur byas nas mdzub mo dang srin lag brkyang ste padma 'dra bar byas pa 'di ni nor bu'i rin chen padma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:141b-12: snyim pa sbyar la gung mo gnyis rin po che 'dra bar byas nas sor mo lhag ma brkyang ba'i phyag rgya spyi gtsug tu bzhag la sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mo nor bu'i gzugs su bsgom pa 'di ni rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:141b-13: snyim pa sbyar la gung mo gnyis dang mthe bo gnyis rin po che ltar byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:141b-14: srin lag gnyis dang mthe chung gnyis brkyang ste /
T02TD2510.2E:141b-15: lce bzhin du khar gzhag pa 'di ni don kun grub par rab sbyin ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:141b-16: don kun grub par rab sbyin ma'i phyag rgya nyid las mdzub mo gnyis myu gu ltar byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:141b-17: snying gar gzhag pa 'di ni nor bu rin chen 'gugs ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:141b-18: nor bu rin chen 'gugs pa ma'i phyag rgya nyid las mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyur byas pa 'di ni rin chen dam tshig lcags kyu ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142a-1: kun grub par rab tu ster ma'i phyag rgya las g-yas pa'i mdzub mos g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bzung ste 'phen pa'i tshul du byed pa 'di ni nor bu chags pa'i dam tshig ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142a-2: nor bu chags pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya las mdzub mo dang mthe bo legs so sbyin pa'i tshul du byed pa 'di ni nor bu legs pa ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142a-3: snyim pa sbyar la gung mo gnyis nor bur byas nas mthe bo'i logs su byas nas gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje nor bu rin chen lta ba'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142a-4: rdo rje nor bu rin chen lta ba'i phyag rgya nyid las srin lag dang /
T02TD2510.2E:142a-5: mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug nas phan tshun nang du kha sbyar te bcings la mdzub mo'i lcags kyu gnyis mthe bo gnyis kyis bkan te dpral bar gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje rin chen phreng ba ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142a-6: rdo rje rin chen phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya nyid snying gar nyi ma'i tshul gyis bskor ba ni nor bu nyi ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142a-7: rdo rje nor bu phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya nyid las dpung pa brkyang nas spyi bor gzhag pa 'di ni nor bu zla ba rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142a-8: nor bu rin chen phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya nyid bzhad pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor ba 'di ni nor bu bzhad pa ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142a-9: snyim pa sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag gnyis padmar byas la gung mo gnyis rin po cher byed pa 'di ni nor bu ting nge 'dzin padma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142a-10: nor bu ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya nyid las mthe'u chung sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshul du byed pa 'di ni gtong ba dam tshig ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142a-11: nor bu ting nge 'dzin padma'i phyag rgya nyid las ral gris gcod pa'i tshul du sbyor ba 'di ni nor bu dam tshig gi ral gri ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142a-12: nor bu ting nge 'dzin padma'i phyag rgya nyid mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du bskor ba 'di ni nor bu dam tshig gi 'khor lo ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142a-13: nor bu'i ting nge 'dzin padma'i phyag rgya nyid tshig 'byin pa'i tshul gyis kha nas 'dren par byed pa /
T02TD2510.2E:142a-14: 'di ni nor bu gsung ba mchog ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142a-15: snyim pa sbyar la gung mo gnyis myu gu ltar brtan par byas la mthe bo gnyis gshibs te /
T02TD2510.2E:142a-16: mdzub mo'i rtse mo dang sbyar nas rin po cher byas la mthe bo dang gung mo dang /
T02TD2510.2E:142a-18: mthe'u chung gi sor mo rnams brkyang ste sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mo nor bu'i gzugs su bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:142b-0: rin po che char 'bebs ma'i lha mo bsgom pa 'di ni rin chen @142b char rgyun ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142b-1: rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya nyid mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du gar gyi spyor bas ston pa ni nor bu mchod pa'i dam tshig ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142b-2: rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya nyid gnyis su byas nas snying gar 'dzin pa ni nor bu dam tshig bsrung ba ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142b-3: rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis bskum ste mtshe ba bzhin du khar 'jog pa 'di ni nor bu mche ba gtsigs pa ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142b-4: rin chen char rgyun ma'i phyag rgya'i dbus su mdzub mo gnyis dang rang gi mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mor sbyar bar byas pa 'di ni nor bu dam tshig gi khu tshur gyi gzungs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142b-5: rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rin chen 'debs pa'i gzungs kyi mthar thug pa rnams ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142b-6: mdor bsdus gsang ba'i gsang ba ste //
T02TD2510.2E:142b-7: dngos grub bzhi 'gyur sbyin par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:142b-8: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gsang ba ste /
T02TD2510.2E:142b-9: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni gsang ba'i gsang ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:142b-10: mdor bsdus nas phyi rol gyi bya ba la mi ltos pa bsgom pa gtso bor gyur pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02TD2510.2E:142b-11: sgrub pa po mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster bas na dngos grub ster ba'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:142b-12: / gal te phyag rgya gzhan zla ba bzhis dngos grub ster na 'di ni zla ba gcig gis 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:142b-13: gzhan zhag bzhis 'grub na 'di zhag gcig gis 'grub pa ces bya ba de'i phyir dngos grub bzhi 'gyur spyin par byed de /
T02TD2510.2E:142b-14: gsang ba'i gsang pa dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so //
T02TD2510.2E:142b-15: de ltar rdo rje gsang ba bzhin //
T02TD2510.2E:142b-16: dus kun du ni sbyor mi bya //
T02TD2510.2E:142b-17: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya las byung ba'i las kyi phyag rgya dus kun du bcing bar mi bya ba de bzhin du 'dir yang gsang ba'i gsang ba khu tshur las byung ba'i las kyi phyag rgya dus thams cad du bcing bar mi bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:142b-18: gsang ba'i gsang ba dam tshig gi phyag rgya mi bcing ngo //
T02TD2510.2E:142b-19: dgag pa des dam tshig gi phyag rgya med na dam tshig gi phyag rgya des lha bsgrub par mi bya'o zhes sngar bstan zin to //
T02TD2510.2E:142b-20: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-1: mdzad kyi lcags kyu la chos kyi phyag rgyar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-2: tre ni don kun grub pa sbyin pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:143a-3: nor bu rin chen 'gugs ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:143a-4: nor bu dam tshig gi gzungs kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-5: ghe ni nor bu'i dam tshig gi rin chen lcags kyu ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-6: hre ni nor bu chags pa'i dam tshig ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-7: sve ni nor bu legs pa ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-8: kye ni rdo rje nor bu rin chen spyan dang /
T02TD2510.2E:143a-9: rdo rje rin chen phreng ba ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:143a-10: nor bu rin chen phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i gzungs rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-11: kham ni nor bu rin chen nyi ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-12: dhre ni nor bu zla ba rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-13: hye ni nor bu bzhad pa ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-14: dree ni nor bu rin chen padma mo dang /
T02TD2510.2E:143a-15: nor bu rin chen gtong ba'i dam tshig ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:143a-16: nor bu ting nge 'dzin padma rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-17: byee ni nor bu dam tshig ral gri ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-18: kee ni nor bu dam tshig 'khor lo ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-19: bee ni nor bu gsung ba mchog ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-20: kru ni nor bu rin chen char 'bebs ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:143a-21: mchod pa chen mo'i dam tshig ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:143a-22: nor bu rin chen char gyi rgyun ma rnams so //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-23: ree ni nor bu dam tshig bsrung ba'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-24: y+ya ni nor bu mche ba gtsigs ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-25: m'i ni nor bu dam tshig khu tshur gyi gzungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:143a-26: lce rnams la bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-27: rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-28: gsang ba gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-30: gsang ba gsang ba'i khu tshur ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-31: nor bu'i dam tshig gi gzungs kyi phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:143a-32: dam tshig gi phyag rgya de rnams khu tshur gnyis su byin nas las kun byed pa ste las kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i don to ;
T02TD2510.2E:143a-34: nor bu'i dam tshig gi khu tshur gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya chen po gnyis su byas nas rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rin chen 'bebs pa'i gzungs kyi mthar thug pa rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-35: gzhan yang nor bu'i dam tshig gi khu tshur gyi gzungs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rin chen 'bebs pa'i gzungs kyi mthar thug pa rnams rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143a-36: de nas 'dir rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor bas /
T02TD2510.2E:143b-0: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo @143b ni ;
T02TD2510.2E:143b-1: / g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-2: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya che //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-3: sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-4: bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yis ni nor bu rin chen 'dren pa dang nor bu dam tshig gi gzungs kyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-5: lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa ni nor bu rin chen dam tshig gi lcags kyu'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-6: mda' 'phang ba'i tshul ni nor bu chags pa'i dam tshig ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-7: legs so sbyin pa snying gar gzhag pa ni nor bu legs pa ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-8: dbang bskur ba'i rin chen gnyis ni don yod grub pa rab tu ster ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:143b-9: rdo rje nor bu rin po che'i spyan ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:143b-10: rdo rje rin chen phreng ba ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:143b-11: nor bu rin chen phreng ba ma rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-12: snying gar nyi ma bstan pa ni nor bu rin chen nyi ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-13: g-yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs ni nor bu zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-14: de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya ba ni nor bu bzhad pa ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-15: g-yas pa'i ni g-yon pa dbye ba ni nor bu ting nge 'dzin padma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:143b-16: nor bu rin chen gtong ba'i dam tshig ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:143b-17: nor bu rin chen padma rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-18: snying gar g-yon pa ral gri mdud ni nor bu dam tshig ma'i ral gri ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-19: mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba ni nor bu dam tshig gi 'khor lo ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-20: nor bu gnyis ka kha nas dbyung ba ni nor bu gsung ba'i mchog ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-21: rdo rje gar bskor bkrol ba yis //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-22: thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor gzhag pa ni rin chen char 'bebs ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:143b-23: mchod pa chen po dam tshig ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:143b-24: nor bu rin chen char 'bebs kyi dam tshig ma rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-25: go cha ni nor bu dam tshig bsrung ma'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-26: mthe chung mche ba ni rdo rje nor bu mche ba gtsigs pa ma'i'o khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o ni nor bu dam tshig gi khu tshur gyi gzungs kyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-27: rin chen 'gying ba'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-28: bsam pa g-yon pas mdud par bya ba ni rin chen sgeg mo'i gzungs kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-29: phreng ba bcing dang ni rin chen phreng ba'i gzungs kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-30: kha nas dbyung ba ni rin chen glu ma'i gzungs kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-31: rin chen gar ni bskor ba yin ni rin chen gar ma'i gzungs kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-32: rin chen khu tshur tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-33: bdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyin //
T02TD2510.2E:143b-34: sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:144a-2: / mdzub mo'i lcags kyu bcing ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:144a-3: mthe chung las te lcags kyu che //
T02TD2510.2E:144a-4: mkhrig ma mdud la mdzub gnyis mdud //
T02TD2510.2E:144a-5: rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan //
T02TD2510.2E:144a-6: rin po che ni nor bu'i rigs so //
T02TD2510.2E:144a-7: gsang ba'i phyag rgya ni gzungs kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:144a-8: de'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i bye brag rgyas pa de rdzogs pa ni mthar thug pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:144a-9: nor bu'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2510.2E:144a-11: // / de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa nor bu'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor des 'dul ba'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:144a-12: da ni chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa'i nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba'i sems can gyi don gyi phyir de nas yang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:144a-13: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:144a-14: dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:144a-15: 'dir dang bor sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dang por sbyor ba lta bu nyid yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:144a-16: yang zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos pas yang zhes bya ba smos so //
T02TD2510.2E:144a-17: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD2510.2E:144a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba ni nor bu rin po che'i rigs so //
T02TD2510.2E:144a-19: de'i ye shes ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:144a-20: rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba //
T02TD2510.2E:144a-21: gdod nas dag pa mkha' dang mtshungs //
T02TD2510.2E:144a-22: byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med //
T02TD2510.2E:144a-25: de'i dam tshig ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi nor bu rin chen gyi nang du gtogs pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2510.2E:144a-26: de las byung ba'i 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs ka'i rdo rje nor bu rin po che gang yin pa de las byung ba de la de skad ces bya'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:144b-0: / des byin gyis brlabs pa ni dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i bya ba gang gis de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi bdag nyid kyi rigs dam pa 'di zhes bya ba blo la gnas pa gsungs @144b shing bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:144b-1: de nas phyag na rdo rjes don thams cad grub pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2510.2E:144b-2: rdo rje snying pos rin chen lta ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2510.2E:144b-3: rdo rje spyan gyis rin chen padma'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2510.2E:144b-4: rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rin chen char 'bebs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i phyir rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di rnams gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:144b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pas rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje rin po che las chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul nas /
T02TD2510.2E:144b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snga ma bzhin yin no zhes shes par bya'o //
