T02TD2510.2E:193a-17: zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid bskul bas mnyes par gyur pas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad rang nyid kyis bcings pas na de kho na nyid bskul ba'i dus su ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:193a-18: de nas phyis bsgrub pa bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:193a-19: de'i rjes la de kho na nyid bskul ba'i dus phyis de'i 'og tu ma bsgrubs par yang de kho na nyid bskul bar gyur to //
T02TD2510.2E:193a-21: sa ma ya stvam brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:193a-22: thog ma kho na phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la phyis sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:193a-23: de skad du yang de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud chen po stong phrag brgya pa las sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod pas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya thams cad bcing par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:193a-24: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcings pa'i spyi'i snying po bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:193a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi bye brag gi snying po ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:193a-26: su ra ta stvam zhes brjod na zhes bya ba ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings las byung ba zag pa med pa'i bde ba yang yid bde ba'i rang bzhin rgyun mi 'chad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ye shes ni bdag yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:193a-28: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
T02TD2510.2E:193b-0: dbang phyug chen po @193b lhag pa'i lha //
T02TD2510.2E:193b-1: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02TD2510.2E:193b-2: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD2510.2E:193b-4: brjod na zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD2510.2E:193b-5: phyag rgya kun ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad de /
T02TD2510.2E:193b-6: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams so //
T02TD2510.2E:193b-7: ma bsgrubs par yang zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:193b-8: su ra ta stvam zhes bya ba'i snying pos ma bsgrubs na yang nyid kyis bcing bas brtan par 'gyur zhes bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:193b-10: de nyid bskul bas bdag nyid che'i //
T02TD2510.2E:193b-12: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i'o //
T02TD2510.2E:193b-13: dam tshig kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na dam tshig chen po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:193b-14: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:193b-15: de kho na nyid ni rab tu dga' ba nyid dang /
T02TD2510.2E:193b-16: kun tu bzang po nyid do //
T02TD2510.2E:193b-18: dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid smras pa /
T02TD2510.2E:193b-19: rab dga' kun du bzang po'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:193b-21: h'um zhes bya ba gcig tsam gyis //
T02TD2510.2E:193b-22: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya yi ge h'um brjod pas slob dpon rang nyid kyis bcings pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:193b-23: slob ma la gdams ngag byin nas h'um zhes brjod cing phyag rgya 'ching du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:193b-24: padma'i rigs las sarbba shuddha zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:193b-25: slob dpon bdag nyid kyis phyag rgya chen po bcings pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:193b-26: slob ma la gdams ngag byin nas 'ching du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:193b-27: de ltar byas pas ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:193b-28: bud med chags la sogs ldan la //
T02TD2510.2E:193b-29: thams cad du ni grol mi 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:193b-34: las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni bud med do //
T02TD2510.2E:193b-35: de rnams dang mnyam par sbyor zhing rnal 'byor pas 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rnams la phyag rgya bcings pa lhag par mos pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:193b-36: sogs pa smos pas ni stong pa nyid bcu drug dang /
T02TD2510.2E:193b-37: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu drug dang /
T02TD2510.2E:193b-38: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu dang /
T02TD2510.2E:193b-39: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi sku'i ngo bo gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don du bud med dang por byas pa gang yin pa 'di ni bud med la chags pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:194a-0: @194a * // ldan pa ni shin tu rnal 'byor gyi rang bzhin chos kyi sku'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2510.2E:194a-1: de ni rnam par grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:194a-2: de nyid la sems rtse gcig pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas shin tu rnal 'byor gyi ngo bo la nye bar gnas so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:194a-3: nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD2510.2E:194a-4: aom zhes brjod pas phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba 'grub par 'gyur te ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i khams gsum pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:194a-5: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de mchog tu gyur pas na dam pa'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:194a-6: / rang byung ba nyid ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so //
T02TD2510.2E:194a-7: mchod pa thams cad grub cing rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:194a-8: rigs thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad do //
T02TD2510.2E:194a-9: dam tshig ni de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub ste /
T02TD2510.2E:194a-10: de nyid kyi phyag rgya des sems can gyi khams la rgyas 'debs pa de'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:194a-11: bshad ma thag pa ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs la rgyud ces bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:194a-12: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:194a-13: da ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la ras ris la sogs pa rnams la yang rang gi lha spyan drangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:194a-14: zung du 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor sgom par byed cing rang gi lha rjes su dran pas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa thams cad nyis 'gyur gyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'dis bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:194a-15: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:194a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyis dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:194a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:194a-18: don yod par grub pa'i mthar thug pa lnga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:194a-19: rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:194a-23: de dag gi dngos grub ni rdzogs pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:194a-24: de'i phyag rgya ni bsgom pa yid kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:194a-25: sangs rgyas phyag rgya bcings nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:194a-26: zhes bya ba la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:194b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa @194b dran byed cing //
T02TD2510.2E:194b-1: zhes bya ba ni rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du bdag nyid kyis bsgoms na /
T02TD2510.2E:194b-3: ci zhig byas na 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:194b-4: bsgrubs nas zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:194b-5: de sngar bshad pa'i bsgom pa'i sbyor bas myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:194b-6: ci zhig bsgrubs nas she na /
T02TD2510.2E:194b-7: sangs rgyas byang chub brtan pa yang //
T02TD2510.2E:194b-9: mi brtan pa'i dngos po tsam gcod par zad kyi /
T02TD2510.2E:194b-10: rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub la sogs pa bsgrubs kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:194b-11: mi 'gyur ba'i dngos pos sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:194b-12: de'i phyir gdon mi za ba'i ngo bo nyid du 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.2E:194b-13: nges par skyes pa'i sgrub pa pos dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur zhes bstan pa yin no zhes rdo rje sems dpa' la mnga' ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:194b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dam tshig dang /
T02TD2510.2E:194b-17: phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:194b-18: de bcings pa ni sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:194b-19: yang dang yang mngon du bas nas mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' yongs su bsgoms pas shin tu myur bar dngos grub tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:194b-21: zung 'jug gi rnal 'byor gyis myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:194b-23: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:194b-24: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:194b-25: ras la sogs pa la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi lha rnams bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.2E:194b-26: bsdu ba la sogs pa'i cho gas rab tu bzhag ste /
T02TD2510.2E:194b-27: mchod pa thams cad kyis cho ga bzhin du yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:194b-28: phyag rgya bzhi byas nas bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:194b-29: des rnal 'byor gcig la ltos nas myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes thams cad du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:194b-30: rdo rje'i rigs ni rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:195a-1: las kyi phyag rgya rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:195a-2: gang gi ting nge 'dzin byas nas she na /
T02TD2510.2E:195a-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:195a-4: rang gi khro bo bsgoms pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:195a-5: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T02TD2510.2E:195a-6: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin des rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:195a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sngar bshad pa'i chogs rang gi khro bo bsdu ba la sogs pa'i chogs mdun du rab tu bzhag la rang gi lha'i rang bzhin gyis rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:195a-8: nyis rim du ni dngos grub thob //
T02TD2510.2E:195a-9: ces bya ba ni gang gi tshe bdag nyid kyis rnal 'byor gcig bsgoms pa na lo gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ba de zung gi rnal 'byor gyis zla ba drug gis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:195a-10: chos kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:195a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas rang nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor byas la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de ;
T02TD2510.2E:195a-12: snga ma bzhin du bsdu ba la sogs pa'i cho gas 'jig rten dbang phyug mdun gyi ras ris la sogs pa la bkod de /
T02TD2510.2E:195a-13: de'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:195a-14: de nyid mdun du bdag gis bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:195a-15: de mngon du byas na dngos grub nyis 'gyur du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:195a-16: nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi ni las kyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:195a-17: de bcing ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:195a-18: rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD2510.2E:195a-19: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha bsgom pa de ni rdo rje snying po'i ting nge 'dzin yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:195a-21: ji lta ba ni zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:195a-22: rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni /
T02TD2510.2E:195a-24: snga ma bzhin du bsdu ba la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying po'i mdun du bzhag la bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:195a-25: de ltar zung gi rnal 'byor rgyas pa la dga' ba'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:195a-26: rang gi lha rjes su dran pa'i bsgrub pa bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:195a-27: da ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rang gi lha'i phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi po ni rang gi lha'i nga rgyal gyis snying po brjod cing bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i nges pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:195b-0: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs thams @195b cad kyi dngos grub sgrub pa'i rgyud gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-2: de dag ni dngos grub thams cad phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:195b-5: las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi dngos grub po //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-6: de bsgrub pa ni bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-7: bdag nyid dam tshig mdun du yang //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-8: sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bsgom //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-9: zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:195b-10: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:195b-11: ji lta ba bzhin du bsdu ba la sogs pa mdun du bzhag la rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:195b-13: bdag nyid dam mdun du bzhag na de bzhin gshegs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-14: de nas de ma thag tu 'grub //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-15: ces bya ba ni gang gi tshe de ltar bsgoms nas mtshan ma thob par gyur pa de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:195b-16: sngar bshad pa'i cho gas mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-17: de nas mtshan thog thag bsgoms nas de'i rjes la bdag nyid dam mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum lta bur mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-18: de nas skad cig de nyid la de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-19: 'dod pas bdag ces bsgoms nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-21: / phyag rgya thams cad bsgrubs na ni //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-22: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi po bsgrubs pas kyang 'dod pa'i bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems chen po bdag yin no zhes rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-23: rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-24: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i tshig gis brjod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-25: de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:195b-26: bzlas pa'i snying po med na phyag rgya'i dngos grub tu mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-27: dngos grub kun gyi mchog grub bo //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-28: zhes bya ba ni dngos grub kyang yin la thams cad kyang de yin pas na dngos grub thams cad de phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i ngo bo'i dngos grub thams cad do //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-29: de 'di rnams kyi mchog tu bsgrub pas na dam pa'i bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-30: bdag nyid kyis ni rdo rje'i dbyibs //
T02TD2510.2E:195b-31: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dag gi dbyibs ni rdo rje'i dbyibs te /
T02TD2510.2E:196a-0: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs @196a * //
T02TD2510.2E:196a-1: pa rdo rje rigs kyi ngo bo'i bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid rnams te /
T02TD2510.2E:196a-2: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bo bsgoms pas yang nas yang mngon du byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:196a-4: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2510.2E:196a-11: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:196a-12: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:196a-13: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa de'i nga rgyal gyis bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:196a-14: rang gi snying po brjod cing nyin re bzhin thun bzhi'i sbyong bas ji srid bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs su nyin re bzhin mngon sum lta bur bdag nyid kyis mngon sum lta bur mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:196a-15: de nas mtshan thog thag bsgoms nas mngon sum lta bur mthong nas de'i rjes la skad cig de nyid la rdo rje h'um mdzad du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:196a-16: padma'i dbyibs su bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:196a-17: zhes bya ba padma'i dbyibs ni 'gro ba 'dul ba la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:196a-18: padma 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa padma'i rigs kyi gzugs so //
T02TD2510.2E:196a-19: bdag nyid kyis ni 'gro ba 'dul ba la sogs pa'i gzugs su bsgoms pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:196a-21: bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:196a-22: bdag nyid la bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:196a-23: gang bsgom par bya zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:196a-24: thams cad nges pa'i ngo bo'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi dngos grub bo //
T02TD2510.2E:196a-27: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:196a-28: snga ma bzhin du 'gro ba 'dul ba la sogs pa'i padma'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:196a-29: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:196a-30: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bcings nas /
T02TD2510.2E:196a-31: rang gi sngags brjod cing 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:196a-33: bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni //
T02TD2510.2E:196b-0: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas snga ma bzhin du nor bu'i rigs las bshad pa'i cho gas rang gi @196b lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:196b-1: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:196b-2: don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:196b-3: don thams cad grub pa'i sngags brjod cing don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa'i gzugs nyid nor bu chen po'i 'od zer 'bar bar bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:196b-4: ci zhig bsgom zhing zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:196b-5: nor bu chen po'i rigs bshad pa //
T02TD2510.2E:196b-6: mchod pa chen po'i rang bzhin grub //
T02TD2510.2E:196b-7: phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi dngos grub ste nor bu chen po'i rigs bshad cing grags pa ni bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:196b-8: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya dang sngags zlos shing rang gi lha bsgoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i rgyud bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:196b-9: da ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i sgrub pa pos dang pos byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas bzlas pa dang bsgom pa bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:196b-10: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas thog mar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa rgyud gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:196b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la rigs kyang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs so //
T02TD2510.2E:196b-12: de dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa ni snying ga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:196b-15: spyi bo ste rang gi rigs kyi phyag rgya bskyed nas sgrub pa po rgyud la ston par byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:196b-16: de la phyag rgya rdo rje dbyings kyi dpang phyug la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
T02TD2510.2E:196b-17: byin gyis brlabs pa'i dngos grub ni bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:196b-18: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs shing bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:196b-19: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sgrub pa po'i rgyud la byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2510.2E:196b-20: ji skad bshad pa bstan par byas pa de'i dngos grub ni bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:196b-21: rdo rje dbyings dang phyag rgya ni rdo rje dbyings kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du bstan pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:196b-22: mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis snying ga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:197a-0: spyi bo'i gnas su aom badzra dh'a tvi shva ri h'um badzri ni aa dhi tishtha mam zhes brjod cing dya ni gyis brlab @197a * //
T02TD2510.2E:197a-3: snga ma bzhin du sems so sor rtog pa las brtsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:197a-4: ya tha sarbba ta sta aa ham zhes bya bas rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:197a-5: rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid du rnam par bsgoms la de nas yid kyis legs so'i sbyor bas dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod cing lus la sangs rgyas kun gzhug go //
T02TD2510.2E:197a-6: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrubs la /
T02TD2510.2E:197a-8: las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab ste /
T02TD2510.2E:197a-9: rang gi snying gar sems ma rdo rje ma'i rdo rje bskyed la dpral bar rdo rje rin chen ma'i rin po che dang /
T02TD2510.2E:197a-10: lkog mar rdo rje chos ma'i padma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:197a-11: spyi bor rdo rje las ma'i sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:197a-12: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te snying ga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:197a-15: spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:197a-16: de ltar byas pas ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:197a-17: bzhag nas sangs rgyas byin gyis brlab pa'o zhes bya bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:197a-18: sems ma rdo rje brtan byas nas //
T02TD2510.2E:197a-19: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo myu gu ltar byas pa'i sems ma rdo rje brtan par byas pa bcings pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2510.2E:197a-21: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD2510.2E:197a-22: zhes bya ba ni rang gi snying gar zla bar rdo rje bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don te /
T02TD2510.2E:197a-23: de ltar sems dpa' rdo rje bcings nas snying ga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:197a-25: de bzhin du lkog ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:197a-26: spyi bor gzhag ste byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:197a-27: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams la byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:197a-28: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la ye shes sems dpa' bcug la /
T02TD2510.2E:197a-29: yid kyis legs so zhes sbyor bas /
T02TD2510.2E:197a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa bcug la /
T02TD2510.2E:197a-31: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis rab tu bsgrubs te /
T02TD2510.2E:197a-34: phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis thams cad rgyas btab la satva badzri ni aa dhi tishtha mi zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:197a-38: spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:197b-0: de'i rjes la rdo rje rin chen mas @197b dpral ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:197b-1: rdo rje chos mas lkog ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:197b-2: rdo rje las mas spyi gtsug tu byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:197b-3: rdo rje h'um mdzad phyag rgyas ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:197b-7: spyi bor rdo rje'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:197b-9: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i rdo rje rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:197b-10: ye shes sems dpa' bcug nas /
T02TD2510.2E:197b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lus la bcug la /
T02TD2510.2E:197b-12: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bsgrubs te /
T02TD2510.2E:197b-15: phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la /
T02TD2510.2E:197b-16: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:197b-20: spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:197b-21: yang na rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje'i phyag rgyas snying ga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:197b-22: rdo rje rin chen ma'i phyag rgyas dpral ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:197b-23: rdo rje chos ma'i phyag rgyas lkog ma dang /
T02TD2510.2E:197b-24: rdo rje las ma'i phyag rgyas spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:197b-25: rdo rje padmo dam byas la //
T02TD2510.2E:197b-27: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
T02TD2510.2E:197b-28: gung mo padmo rdo rjer sbyar ;
T02TD2510.2E:197b-29: / rdo rje padma zhes grags te //
T02TD2510.2E:197b-30: dngos grub thams cad ster byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:197b-33: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor gyis so //
T02TD2510.2E:197b-34: snying ga mdzod spu mgrin spyi bo //
T02TD2510.2E:197b-36: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te ;
T02TD2510.2E:197b-37: snga ma bzhin du 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i tshul gyis padma'i rigs kyi rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:197b-38: ye shes sems dpa' bcug nas /
T02TD2510.2E:197b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams lus la bcug ste /
T02TD2510.2E:197b-40: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bsgrubs nas /
T02TD2510.2E:197b-42: las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab ste /
T02TD2510.2E:197b-43: ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis rdo rje padma'i phyag rgya snying ga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:197b-46: spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:197b-47: aom dharmm'a sa ma ye badzra padme ni h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:198a-0: rin chen rdo rje ma'i gnas @198a * //
T02TD2510.2E:198a-1: su bshad pa'i dpral bar rin chen padma'i phyag rgya h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:198a-2: aom buddha aa bhi she ka sa ma ye /
T02TD2510.2E:198a-4: rdo rje chos ma'i gnas su bshad pa'i lkog mar padma'i padma /
T02TD2510.2E:198a-5: aom tra ra sa ma ye h'um dhi aa dhi tishtha mam /
T02TD2510.2E:198a-6: las kyi rdo rje ma'i gnas su bshad pa'i spyi bor sna tshogs padma'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:198a-7: aom bhi sha mu khe kro dha aa dhi tishtha mam /
T02TD2510.2E:198a-8: rdo rje nor bu che bcings zhes bya ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du sems ma'i rdo rje ma'i gnas su bshad pa'i rdo rje nor bu chen mo de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ngo //
T02TD2510.2E:198a-9: rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyi //
T02TD2510.2E:198a-10: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi lha'i rnal 'byor byas pa'i snying ga'i zla ba la rdo rje rin po che yod pa la dmigs pa'i sems ni rdo rje snying po'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2510.2E:198a-13: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:198a-14: ye shes sems dpa' lus la bcug nas /
T02TD2510.2E:198a-15: yid kyis legs so'i sbyor bas de bzhin gshegs pa rang gi lus la bcug nas /
T02TD2510.2E:198a-16: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis thams cad bsgrubs te /
T02TD2510.2E:198a-19: phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:198a-20: aom badzra ma ni sa ma ye zhes de skad du brjod cing rdo rje nor bu chen mo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas snying gar rdo rje rin po che bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:198a-21: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:198a-22: rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis kyi rgyab bskums te rdo rje mthe bo gnyis dang sprad pa 'di ni rdo rje nor bu chen mo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:198a-23: 'di dang aom badzra ma ni h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:198a-24: aa dhi tishtha mam zhes bya bas snying ga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:198a-27: spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:198a-28: de'i rjes la mdzod spu'i phyogs su rdo rje rin chen gyi myu gu snying gar rdo rje rin chen /
T02TD2510.2E:198a-29: lkog mar rdo rje rin chen padma /
T02TD2510.2E:198a-30: spyi bor rdo rje rin chen char 'bebs mas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:198a-31: gang gi phyir rigs kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bzhis rigs su byin gyis rlob par bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa de bas na the tshom mi bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:198a-32: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rgyud bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:198b-0: da ni dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las zhes bya ba gsungs @198b te ;
T02TD2510.2E:198b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs rnams kyis dbang bskur ba ni rin po che'i cod pan la sogs pa bskyed pa na phyag rgya des cod pan bskyed pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do //
T02TD2510.2E:198b-2: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rin chen rdo rje bcings pa dpral ba'i phyogs su bzhag ste bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:198b-3: dpral ba'i steng du rdo rje rin po che rab tu gzhag par bshad pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:198b-4: rgyal ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyis //
T02TD2510.2E:198b-5: dbang bskur bar ni der 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:198b-6: zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:198b-7: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dbang bskur ba bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:198b-8: da ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:198b-9: rdo rje dbyings dbang la sogs pa //
T02TD2510.2E:198b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:198b-11: de la rdo rje dbyings kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:198b-12: aom badzra dh'a tvi shva ri h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:198b-13: badzra ni aa bhi shinyts'a mi zhes bya bas spyi gtsug tu bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:198b-14: rdo rje thugs bcings la badzra badzri ni h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:198b-15: zhes bya bas dpral ba'i steng du mi bskyod pa bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:198b-18: zhes bya bas rna ba g-yas pa'i steng du rin chen 'byung ldan bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:198b-19: rdo rje mtshon cha bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:198b-21: zhes bya bas spyi bo'i rgyab tu 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:198b-22: rdo rje kun ma bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:198b-23: rna ba g-yon pa'i steng du bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa /
T02TD2510.2E:198b-25: zhes bya ba 'dis bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:198b-26: de ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyis /
T02TD2510.2E:198b-27: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams spyi gtsug nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:198b-28: phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas kyi phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:198b-29: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang bskur bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:198b-30: da ni rdo rje rigs kyi dbang bskur ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:198b-31: rdo rje dbang gi phreng ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:199a-0: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba ni phreng bas mtshan pa'i cod pan bskyed pa'i phyag rgyas rdo rje'i dbang gi phreng ba ni sngar bshad @199a * //
T02TD2510.2E:199a-1: pa'i rdo rje ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgyas bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:199a-3: aom badzra dzva aa na l'arka h'um zhes bya ba 'di dang /
T02TD2510.2E:199a-4: rdo rje ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2510.2E:199a-5: rdo rje rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dbang du byas nas rdo rje dbang gi phreng ba de bya'o//
T02TD2510.2E:199a-6: ni zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba ste /
T02TD2510.2E:199a-7: de ni zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya bcing ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:199a-8: dpral bar bzhag na yang zhes bya ba ni dpral bar bcing ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:199a-9: bcings nas dpral bar bzhag pas ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:199a-10: phreng ba'i dbang bskur de yis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:199a-11: rdo rje rnams kyis de dbang bskur //
T02TD2510.2E:199a-13: des sngags pa'i dpral ba'i steng du bcings te bzhag na /
T02TD2510.2E:199a-14: rdo rje phreng ba'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje 'dzin mas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis sgrub pa po la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:199a-15: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba yang byas na /
T02TD2510.2E:199a-16: rdo rje'i rigs thams cad la rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes bshad pa'i rgyud las bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:199a-17: de ltar rdo rje'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:199a-18: da ni padma'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:199a-19: chos kyi rdo rje bcings nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:199a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:199a-21: de la chos kyi rdo rje ni rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis myu gu ltar byas pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bstan pa'i chos kyi rdo rje ma bcings nas kyang /
T02TD2510.2E:199a-22: mgo bor bzhag ste dbang bsgur zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:199a-23: de la dpral ba'i steng du de rab tu bzhag nas cod pan gyi dbus su gtso bo sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa aom gyis bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:199a-24: aom dharmma sa ma ye badzra padma ni h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:199a-25: aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:199a-27: sangs rgyas kyis ni 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug de ni dbang bskur ro zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:199a-28: 'jig rten dbang phyug ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:199a-29: da ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:199a-30: rdo rje rin chen myu gur bcings //
T02TD2510.2E:199a-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:199a-32: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen ma'i gnas kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni rdo rje rin chen myu gu'o //
T02TD2510.2E:199b-0: de'i mtshan @199b nyid ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:199b-1: rdo rje rin chen bcings la gung mo gnyis myu gu ltar byas pa ni rdo rje rin chen myu gu'o //
T02TD2510.2E:199b-2: de bcings nas dpral bar bzhag ste zhes bya ba ni dpral ba'i steng du /
T02TD2510.2E:199b-3: aom badzra ratna aa gu ru h'um /
T02TD2510.2E:199b-4: aa bhi shinytsa mi zhes brjod cing gzhan pa ni rnal 'byor pas rab tu gzhag pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:199b-5: de dpral bar rab tu bzhag pas ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:199b-6: dpral bar bzhag ste dbang bskur zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:199b-7: rdo rje rin po che'i gzugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:199b-8: khyad par ci lta bu zhig ce na /
T02TD2510.2E:199b-9: mchod pa yis zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:199b-10: nor bu'i rigs kyi bdag por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:199b-11: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni /
T02TD2510.2E:199b-12: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:199b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la rigs kyang de yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs te /
T02TD2510.2E:199b-14: de dag gi ting nge 'dzin ni rang gi lha'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:199b-15: de'i dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:199b-16: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:199b-17: rgyal ba kun gyi rnam pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:199b-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:199b-19: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02TD2510.2E:199b-20: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni rnam pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:199b-21: rnam pa de rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:199b-25: don yod par grub pa rnams ni rgyal ba kun no //
T02TD2510.2E:199b-26: phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:199b-30: mnyam par bzhag pas bcings zhes bya ba ni sems yid rtse gcig pas so //
T02TD2510.2E:199b-31: myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:199b-33: sngags kyi rig pa bzlas nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:199b-35: dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:199b-36: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:199b-37: gzungs dang las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sngags kyi nang nas 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang du byas pa'i rig pa brjod pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:200a-0: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal @200a * //
T02TD2510.2E:200a-2: ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2510.2E:200a-3: phyag rgya bzhi byas nas rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:200a-4: de'i ngo bor bdag nyid rnam par bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:200a-5: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i snying po po'am /
T02TD2510.2E:200a-6: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags bzla par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:200a-7: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:200a-8: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig pa yang bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:200a-9: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:200a-10: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas rang la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:200a-11: dum bu thams cad las bshad pa'i snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:200a-14: rig pa rnams zlos pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sprul par byed pa ni byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa de dag so sor mi bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:200a-15: ting nge 'dzin gyi rdo rje chos kyis kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:200a-16: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje yang yin la chos kyang de yin pas rdo rje chos te /
T02TD2510.2E:200a-17: rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i ting nge 'dzin des de la dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:200a-18: sems dpar byin rlabs tshul gyis ni ;
T02TD2510.2E:200a-19: / zhes bya ba ni sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa'i snying ga'i zla ba de la byin gyis brlabs pa pa ni dngos por 'dzin pa nye bar spangs pa mtshon pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:200a-20: stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje yongs su gzung ngo //
T02TD2510.2E:200a-21: de bsgom pa'i tshul ni de bsgom pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:200a-22: sems dpar byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin de ltar gyur pas des cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:200a-23: snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams //
T02TD2510.2E:200a-25: de la snying po ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i snying po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:200a-26: phyag rgya ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa rnams so //
T02TD2510.2E:200a-27: sngags ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:200a-28: rig pa ni las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:200a-30: ting nge 'dzin dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig sngags pa zlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:200b-0: sangs rgyas kyi ting @200b nge 'dzin rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid kyis gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:200b-2: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas rang la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:200b-3: rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'greng ba bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:200b-4: lte ba'i dbus su gzugs brnyan gyi sbyor ba byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:200b-5: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i snying po'am /
T02TD2510.2E:200b-6: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi rig pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:200b-7: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sngags sam /
T02TD2510.2E:200b-8: yang na las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi rig pa'i yi ge'i phreng ba mgo gyen du bstan pa bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:200b-9: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rang gi phyag rgya bcings la ;
T02TD2510.2E:200b-10: sems dpa' rdo rje mngon sum lta bur bsgoms nas bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:200b-11: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:200b-12: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:200b-13: rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu las bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:200b-14: da ni rdo rje rigs kyi ting 'dzin ni //
T02TD2510.2E:200b-15: 'dod chags las ni khyod byung ste //
T02TD2510.2E:200b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:200b-17: de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid kyi thugs rje chen po ni 'dod chags so //
T02TD2510.2E:200b-18: de'i phyir de ltar gyur pa'i mi dmigs pa la thugs rje chen po'i 'dod chags las yang dag par byung ba'i khro bo ste /
T02TD2510.2E:200b-19: 'dod chags las byung ba'i khro bo gang yin pa de bdag yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:200b-20: khyed gang yin pa de bdag yin no zhes de ltar chu dang 'o ma bzhin gcig tu gyur phar mos par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:200b-21: de ltar bsgoms par gyur pa des ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:200b-22: snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams //
T02TD2510.2E:200b-24: rdo rje'i rigs las bshad pa rnams so //
T02TD2510.2E:200b-25: myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:200b-26: de bsgrubs na zhes bya ba tshig lhag ma'o //
T02TD2510.2E:200b-27: de ltar rdo rje rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:200b-28: da ni padma'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin ni /
T02TD2510.2E:200b-29: byams pa 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:201a-2: de la phyogs bcu'i sems can gyi khams thams cad padma'i rigs kyi ngo bos phan pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:201a-3: bde ba bsdus pa'i phan pa'i rigs kyi ngo bor bsgrubs nas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:201a-4: byams pas 'gengs pa'i tshul can te /
T02TD2510.2E:201a-5: padma'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2510.2E:201a-6: de ltar byas pas 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:201a-7: snying po la sogs bsgrubs na yang //
T02TD2510.2E:201a-9: padma'i rigs las bshad pa'i snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:201a-13: bsgrub pa ni nan tan byed pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:201a-14: sgrub pa po yi ting nge 'dzin 'di yis //
T02TD2510.2E:201a-15: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:201a-16: de ci'i phyir 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rigs ni padma'i rigs te /
T02TD2510.2E:201a-21: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po la dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:201a-22: da ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin la nam mkha' kun gyi ting nge 'dzin ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:201a-23: nam mkha' yang de yin la kun kyang de yin pas na nam mkha' kun te /
T02TD2510.2E:201a-24: nor bu'i rigs de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni nam mkha' kun gyi ting nge 'dzin te /
T02TD2510.2E:201a-25: yang dang yang mngon du byas nas bsgoms na yang ngo //
T02TD2510.2E:201a-27: rab mnyam gzhag ces bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:201a-28: g-yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis yid gzhan du ma gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:201a-29: nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas de ltar bsgoms na /
T02TD2510.2E:201a-30: snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:201a-32: kun 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bya ba smos te ;
T02TD2510.2E:201a-34: snga ma bzhin du thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas nor bu'i rigs kyi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:201a-35: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:201a-36: rang gi snying ga'i zla bar rdo rje rin chen tram las bskyed nas /
T02TD2510.2E:201a-37: de la bzlas pa'i yi ge rnam par bkod de ;
T02TD2510.2E:201a-38: phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:201a-39: de nyid brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:201a-40: sems can gyi khams thams cad la nor bu'i rigs kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la /
T02TD2510.2E:201a-41: nor bu'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du bsgrubs te bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:201b-0: de ltar rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma @201b rnams kyi rig pa'i yi ge bsgom pa ni thams cad la yang shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:201b-1: de ltar rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:201b-2: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:201b-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:201b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la rigs kyang yin pas na /
T02TD2510.2E:201b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs te /
T02TD2510.2E:201b-6: ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:201b-7: de dag mchod pa'i rnal 'byor gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni mchod pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:201b-8: de rnams grub pa ni mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub ste /
T02TD2510.2E:201b-9: phyag rgya chen po la sogs sgrub po //
T02TD2510.2E:201b-10: mnyam par gzhag pa dang por ni //
T02TD2510.2E:201b-11: bdug pa la sogs mchod byas la //
T02TD2510.2E:201b-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor pa dpa' bo gcig pur bdag nyid byas nas phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:201b-13: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:201b-14: ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rang gi lus la bcug pa phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas byin gyis brlab pa dang dbang bskur la /
T02TD2510.2E:201b-15: de nas de dag gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:201b-16: gar las byung ba 'dug pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnam pa bzhis bdag la mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:201b-17: de nas snga ma bzhin du bdug pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang phyag bzhi bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:201b-18: de nas yi ge aa las rgyal ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcings te mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom mo //
T02TD2510.2E:201b-19: bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:201b-20: zhes bya ba ni slob ma'i dbang du byas nas mchod pa'i cho ga shes par bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:201b-21: bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor tsam dang /
T02TD2510.2E:201b-22: mdun gyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang du byas nas kyang mchod pa'i cho ga thams cad shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:201b-23: slob dpon rnal 'byor chen po dang ldan pa rnams rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor las bshad pa'i mchod pa thams cad rigs thams cad la yang shes par bya ba yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:201b-24: gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam bzhi yis ;
T02TD2510.2E:201b-25: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhi ni sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhi yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:201b-26: gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhi po 'di rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba ste de brjod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:201b-27: aom rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas na //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-2: rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-3: rdo rje las rnams byed par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-5: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pas gar byed cing sgeg mo la sogs pa'i snying po 'di yang brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-6: de ltar sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhis bdag nyid yang dag par mchod nas las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu drug gis bdag nyid mchod par byas nas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:202a-7: bdag dbul ba'i zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:202a-8: 'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bsdu ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-9: bdag dbul ba la sogs pa yang //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-11: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:202a-12: da ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchod pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-13: khro bo rdo rje mchod chen po //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:202a-15: khro bo rdo rje ni rdo rje'i rigs so //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-16: de'i mchod pa chen po ni sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i gsang ba rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-17: khro bo'i gsang ba rjod byed cing //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-18: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du rdo rje'i glu brjod cing rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis su byas nas yang dang yang du gar byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:202a-19: khro bo'i rdo rje khu tshur gnyis su byas pa las rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi bcings nas /
T02TD2510.2E:202a-20: aom badzra l'a sya r'a ga ya h'um phat ces bya ba la sogs sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhi'i snying po brjod cing khro bo'i gsang ba yang brjod nas /
T02TD2510.2E:202a-21: khro bo'i khu tshur gyis gar byed cing brjod pas so //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-23: rdo rje khu tshur rab byas nas //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-25: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdzub mo gnyis sdigs mdzub tu byas te ;
T02TD2510.2E:202a-26: bskyed pa ni khro bo'i khu tshur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-27: de byas nas mchod pa'i dngos grub myur du rnal 'byor pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-29: myur du bdag gi rigs sgrub po //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-30: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-31: da ni padma'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub ni /
T02TD2510.2E:202a-32: mdo sde zab mo rgya che ba'i //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:202a-34: de la zab pa ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-35: rgya che ba ni nam mkha'i khams khyab pa'i gzugs du ma ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:202a-36: mdor bstan pas na mdo sde ste /
T02TD2510.2E:202b-0: de'i don mdor bstan pa brjod pa'i stobs kyis sems la nges pa bskyed @202b pa'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:202b-1: / padma'i sgeg mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mdor bsdus pa ston pa'i mdo sde brjod pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:202b-2: padma'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu drug gis kyang mdor bsdus pa brjod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:202b-3: zab pa yang yin la rgya che ba yang de yin pas na mdo sde ste /
T02TD2510.2E:202b-4: mdo sde zab cing rgya che ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:202b-5: de dag gi rgyud 'bum pa la sogs pa rgya cher bstan pa de las mdor bsdus nas brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:202b-6: rab tu ston pa'i mchod pa de de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa padma'i rigs thams cad la dbul zhing rab tu mchod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:202b-7: dbul ba de gang yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:202b-8: yid dang ngag gis phul nas ni ;
T02TD2510.2E:202b-10: yid kyi thabs dang shes rab kyi gzugs kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad mtha' yas pa bkang ba'i glu dang /
T02TD2510.2E:202b-11: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i snying po phul bas //
T02TD2510.2E:202b-12: dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:202b-15: snga ma bzhin du 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i sbyor bas rang gi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:202b-16: ye shes sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang gi lus la bcug la /
T02TD2510.2E:202b-17: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:202b-18: padma'i sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa gar las byung ba rnams kyis bdag nyid mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:202b-19: padma'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa bcu drug gis las kyi phyag rgya de rnam dang /
T02TD2510.2E:202b-20: thams cad shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyis thams cad du khyab par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:202b-21: de ltar padma'i rigs kyi mchod pa bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:202b-22: da ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa ni ;
T02TD2510.2E:202b-23: / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan rnams kyis //
T02TD2510.2E:202b-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:202b-29: 'phan de rnams kyis mchod na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:202b-30: gdugs la sogs pa ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:202b-34: rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa'i gzugs de rnams kyis mchod na rnal 'byor pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:202b-35: mchod pa gang yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:202b-36: sbyin pa thams cad sbyin na ni //
T02TD2510.2E:203a-1: kyis sbyin pa ma lus pa sbyin na 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:203a-3: nor bu'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:203a-4: ngon thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa bzhi dang /
T02TD2510.2E:203a-5: nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu drug dang /
T02TD2510.2E:203a-6: nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa thams cad kyis bdag nyid mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:203a-9: ba dang rnams kyis mchod pa re re zhing yang phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:203a-10: rgyal ba'i mchod pa rnams sbrul la de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pas sems can thams cad kyi khams thams cad la nor bu'i rigs su bskyed la /
T02TD2510.2E:203a-11: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa sbyin pas mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:203a-12: da ni rang la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i phan yon ni /
T02TD2510.2E:203a-13: rang la byin gyis brlab sogs ldan //
T02TD2510.2E:203a-14: rdo rje sems dpar mnyam par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:203a-16: rang la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas grub par ma gyur kyang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:203a-17: rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad dad 'dra bar rigs nges par gnas par gyur nas /
T02TD2510.2E:203a-18: rnal 'byor pa mngon par byang chub pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:203a-19: cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi yis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:203a-20: rdo rje sna tshogs 'grub byed cing //
T02TD2510.2E:203a-21: zhes bya ba ni cho 'phrul gyi phan yon bstan pas byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhis bshad pas phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:203a-24: las kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gyi lha'i gzugs kyi rnal 'byor par bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pas sna tshogs rdo rjer bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:203a-25: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:203a-27: ting nge 'dzin dang mchod pa bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:203a-28: da ni sngar bshad pa'i tshum [*tshums?] gyis mngon par shes pa sgrub par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs par rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pas /
T02TD2510.2E:203b-0: @203b mtshan thog thag yang bzlas shing bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:203b-1: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-3: de dag gi mngon par shes pa ni lnga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-4: de'i ye shes ni khong du chud pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-5: de'i dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa grub pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-6: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-7: lus la sangs rgyas ting 'dzin ni //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-8: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sems rtse gcig pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-9: na zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-10: sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa kho nar sems rtse gcig pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-11: mdzes par gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa ni bde gshegs nyid mngon par shes te /
T02TD2510.2E:203b-12: mdzes par gshegs pa 'di ni bde bar gshegs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-13: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i sems rtse gcig pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-15: 'di la rab tu rtogs na ni //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-16: sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub thob //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-18: de'i sangs rgyas ni mngon par shes pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-19: rab tu rtogs par gyur pa de ni rab tu rtogs par gyur pa nyid de /
T02TD2510.2E:203b-20: de'i phyir rab tu rtogs pa nyid kyis de rnams kyi de kho na nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-22: sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rtogs pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-23: mngon sum lta bur mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-24: bdag nyid kyang ni mi shes shing //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-27: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:203b-28: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:203b-29: gang gi tshe mtshan ma thob par gyur pa de'i tshe mngon par shes pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-30: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-31: lus kun de bzhin gshegs rnams dang //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-32: byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsgoms la //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-33: de bzhin lus la byung mthong na //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-34: zhes bya ba ji srid du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs su mngon sum lta bur mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:203b-35: de lta bus mngon par shes pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:204a-0: de nas snga ma bzhin du mtshan thog thag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag @204a * //
T02TD2510.2E:204a-1: nyid du bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur na phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:204a-2: de ltar de bzhin 'grub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa thob pa'i sgrub pa bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:204a-3: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa bskyed nas /
T02TD2510.2E:204a-4: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:204a-5: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:204a-6: 'phrul gyi mig sogs mngon shes ni //
T02TD2510.2E:204a-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lha'i mig dang /
T02TD2510.2E:204a-9: gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:204a-10: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi yul mngon par shes pa lnga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:204a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis ji srid du grub par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:204a-12: de nas phyis dkyil 'khor bris la mtshan thog thag bsgoms na rdo rje 'chad chen phor 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:204a-14: mngon shes ldar ni bdag gyur nas //
T02TD2510.2E:204a-15: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:204a-17: de bzhin du rdo rje rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis khro bo'i mngon par shes pa bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:204a-18: de nas mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa'i dkyil 'khor bris te /
T02TD2510.2E:204a-19: mtshan thog thag rang gi lha'i khro bo bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:204a-20: de'i rjes la rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:204a-22: mngon shes ldar ni bdag gyur nas //
T02TD2510.2E:204a-23: dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:204a-25: 'dod chags mngon shes bskyed nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:204a-26: zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags ni padma'i rigs te /
T02TD2510.2E:204a-27: de'i mngon par shes pa lnga ni snga ma bzhin no//
T02TD2510.2E:204a-28: de bskyed pa ni mtshan thog thag sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:204a-30: dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:204a-31: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas mngon sum du byed pa'i mtshan nyid dngos grub thob par 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.2E:204b-2: mchod pa ni nor bu'i rigs so //
T02TD2510.2E:204b-3: de'i mngon shes ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:204b-4: de bskyed pa ni sngar bshad pa nyid kyi cho gas mngon sum du byas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:204b-5: mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms na ni //
T02TD2510.2E:204b-6: zhes bya ba la nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:204b-7: rang gi lha'i mtshan thog thag bsgom mo //
T02TD2510.2E:204b-8: mngon shes lngar yang bdag gyur nas //
T02TD2510.2E:204b-9: zhes bya ba ni mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:204b-10: dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:204b-11: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rang bzhin gyi don thams cad grub pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi dam pa nyid du de 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:204b-12: de ltar mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:204b-13: da ni sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i dus su yang byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:204b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni /
T02TD2510.2E:204b-15: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:204b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la rigs kyang yin pas te /
T02TD2510.2E:204b-17: ji skad du bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rjes su dran pas rdo rje la sogs pa'i nges pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes so //
T02TD2510.2E:204b-18: de'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa sgrub pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:204b-19: de ston par byed pa ni rgyud de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:204b-20: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02TD2510.2E:204b-21: zhes bya ba ni zla ba rdo rje'i rnam par rtse gcig pas na rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2510.2E:204b-22: de la gnas pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:204b-23: sbyor ba gang gis rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas she na /
T02TD2510.2E:204b-24: bdag gis sangs rgyas dran byed cing //
T02TD2510.2E:205a-0: bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgom pa pos sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byed cing @205a * //
T02TD2510.2E:205a-2: / sangs rgyas byang chub ces bya ba ni snying ga'i zla ba'i rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas byang chub bo //
T02TD2510.2E:205a-3: de nyid kyi ye shes ni don nges pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:205a-4: gang gis don shes pa 'dis cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:205a-5: ye shes 'di bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba smos so //
T02TD2510.2E:205a-6: de'i phyir sngar bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgrub pa pos rgyud phyi ma la sogs pa'i dngos grub sgrub par 'dod na /
T02TD2510.2E:205a-7: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:205a-8: rdo rje'i dbus su rig pa'i yi ge bkod la /
T02TD2510.2E:205a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa sgom zhing bzlas pa brjod na rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:205a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' ting 'dzin gnas //
T02TD2510.2E:205a-11: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:205a-12: phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing //
T02TD2510.2E:205a-13: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:205a-14: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa de'i snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:205a-18: phyag rgya bzhi po rnams dang /
T02TD2510.2E:205a-19: de'i phyag rgya chen bo yang dang yang mngon du byed cing bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:205a-20: byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di //
T02TD2510.2E:205a-21: zhes bya ba ni sems dpa'i rdo rje 'di dang bcas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bsgom pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub chen po 'di'o //
T02TD2510.2E:205a-22: de nyid kyi ye shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:205a-24: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas kyang rgyud phyi ma las bshad pa'i dngos grub sgrub par 'dod na rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:205a-26: chos dang las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bcings la rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bskyed de /
T02TD2510.2E:205a-27: rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus su bzlas pa'i yi ge rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:205a-28: de nyid brjod cing sems dpa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:205b-0: khro bo'i rgyal po ting 'dzin @205b gnas ;
T02TD2510.2E:205b-2: 'dod chags las ni khyod byung ste //
T02TD2510.2E:205b-3: bdag ni khro bo'i yid bsgoms na //
T02TD2510.2E:205b-4: zhes bya ba ni khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T02TD2510.2E:205b-5: snying gar zla ba la rdo rje 'bar ba bsgom zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:205b-6: lag bas dam tshig mchog bcings la //
T02TD2510.2E:205b-7: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgyal dam tshig mchog ces bshad do //
T02TD2510.2E:205b-8: re zhig lag pas bcings pa gang yin pa 'di ni sgrub pa po'i lag pas dam tshig mchog bcings pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:205b-9: byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di //
T02TD2510.2E:205b-10: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:205b-12: snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas rang la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:205b-13: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:205b-14: rang gi snying ga'i zla bar h'um las rdo rje 'bar ba bsam par bya'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:205b-15: / de'i dbus su bzlas pa'i snying po bkod de /
T02TD2510.2E:205b-16: de nyid brjod cing sems dpa'i nga rgyal bskyed la mngon du byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:205b-17: de la dmigs te phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:205b-18: 'jig rten dbang phyug ting 'dzin gnas ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi snying ga'i zla bar rdo rje padma'i rnam par sems rtse gcig par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:205b-19: de bzhin chos kyi phyag rgyar bzlas //
T02TD2510.2E:205b-20: zhes bya ba ni padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya thams cad la chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2510.2E:205b-21: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:205b-22: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:205b-23: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:205b-24: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bcings nas /
T02TD2510.2E:205b-25: rang gi lha'i snying gar zla ba la yi ge hri las rdo re padma /
T02TD2510.2E:205b-26: de'i dbus su snying po bkod de /
T02TD2510.2E:205b-27: de nyid brjod cing padma la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:205b-28: rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02TD2510.2E:205b-29: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje snying po'i snying gar zla ba'i nor bu de'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:206a-0: las kyi phyag rgya las legs @206a * //
T02TD2510.2E:206a-2: / ces bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya thams cad ni las kyi phyag rgya zhes bshad de snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:206a-3: de'i legs pa ni dbang bskur ba la sogs pa nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi gzugs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi khams thams cad bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi las byed pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:206a-4: las kyi phyag rgya las legs byed //
T02TD2510.2E:206a-6: byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di //
T02TD2510.2E:206a-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2510.2E:206a-9: snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas nor bu'i rigs kyi rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:206a-10: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:206a-11: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la yi ge tram las nor bu chen po rnam par bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:206a-12: de'i dbus su bzlas pa'i yi ge rnam par bkod nas /
T02TD2510.2E:206a-13: de nyid brjod cing lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:206a-14: rdo rje nor bu'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:206a-15: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje dang /
T02TD2510.2E:206a-18: sna tshogs rdo rje de rnams la /
T02TD2510.2E:206a-19: de rnams kyi rig pa'i yi ge bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di bshad pa'i rgyud las bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:206a-20: kha cig ni de ltar gyur na nor bu'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi rgyud las kyang 'gal bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.2E:206a-21: gang gi phyir thams cad kyi rdo rje'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje snying gar bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba des ni 'dir ni nor bu chen por bsgoms nas rdo rje nor bu'i rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya ba dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
T02TD2510.2E:206a-25: 'di ni rigs pa'i khyad par gzhan sgrub pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:206a-26: gal te de ltar khas mi len na rtsa ba'i rgyud dang chos nyid la sogs pa'i rgyud dang 'gal bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.2E:206a-27: de la dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.2E:206a-29: phyag rgya chen po rnams so sor sgrub par bshad pas /
T02TD2510.2E:206b-0: las legs byed pa'i rdo rje ni rdo rje sna tshogs pa bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pas 'dir chos nyid @206b kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni snying gar zla ba rdo rje bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid can du 'di 'dod pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:206b-1: gang gi phyir sgrub pa byed pa'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:206b-2: rgyud phyi ma la sgrub pa rnam pa du ma gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:206b-3: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:206b-4: da ni mtshan ma thob pa rnams kyis sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa skyes par gyur nas /
T02TD2510.2E:206b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i cha lugs kyis de'i brtul zhugs spyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:206b-6: dbang du byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:206b-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad rjes su mnyes pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:206b-8: dbang du byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:206b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02TD2510.2E:206b-10: ji skad bshad pa de dag gi sngon du bsnyen pas mngon bar shes par bskyed pa la chags pa med ba de la rjes su chags pa ni brtul zhugs so //
T02TD2510.2E:206b-11: de'i dngos grub ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:206b-12: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:206b-13: nyid kyi sangs rgyas byang chub phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:206b-14: sems can don rnams rab byed cing //
T02TD2510.2E:206b-15: zhes bya ba ni mngon par shes pa lnga thob nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sems can gyi don ci nus pa byed pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:206b-16: rang bzhin gyi nus pas stobs ston par byed pa la sogs pa byed cing /
T02TD2510.2E:206b-17: sems can gyi don ni phan pa dang bde ba dam pa 'grub pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:206b-18: sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba mngon bu byas la thun bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa bsgom pa ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:206b-19: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa pos sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su mnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:207a-1: 'byor pas sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed la /
T02TD2510.2E:207a-2: zla ba gcig rab tu byung nas bslab pa thams cad kyi sdom pa yang dag par bsrungs la /
T02TD2510.2E:207a-3: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i cha lugs 'dzin pas ting nge 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:207a-4: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa pos rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor phyi dang nang gi mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:207a-5: nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:207a-6: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang //
T02TD2510.2E:207a-7: kun gyi gzi brjid can nyid do //
T02TD2510.2E:207a-8: ji bzhin pa ni 'dul ba nyid //
T02TD2510.2E:207a-9: las kyi sems dpa'i dngos grub byed //
T02TD2510.2E:207a-10: ces bshad pa gang yin pa de rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:207a-11: ji skad du bshad pa'i bsams pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:207a-12: de lta bu zla ba gcig gi sbyor bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro ;
T02TD2510.2E:207a-13: / ji ltar yul dang ldan gyur nas //
T02TD2510.2E:207a-14: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams la sangs rgyas kyi padma la sogs pa thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i yul des yul dang ldan par byas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:207a-15: ji lta bu'i yul dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te /
T02TD2510.2E:207a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' nas brtsams te rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i bdag nyid bsgom zhing bsgrub par bya ste badzra satva su ra ta stvam zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2510.2E:207a-17: badzra a'a be sha su ra ta stvam zhes bya ba'i bar du zlos shing /
T02TD2510.2E:207a-18: de kho na nyid bskul ba nyid 'dis myur du mnyes par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rang bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:207a-20: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed de /
T02TD2510.2E:207a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan dang /
T02TD2510.2E:207a-24: dpung rgyan la sogs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyan gyis bdag nyid brgyan par byas la rdo rje sems dpa'i cha lugs su bdag nyid bskyed la /
T02TD2510.2E:207a-25: mchod pa thams cad kyis ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:207a-26: rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor zla ba phyed du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:207b-0: phyis gnang ba mnos la ji @207b skad bshad pa'i de kho na nyid kyis bskul bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:207b-1: de ltar na zla ba phyed kyi sbyor bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:207b-2: sangs rgyas bka' ni bsrung ba dang //
T02TD2510.2E:207b-3: zhes bya ba ni ji skad bshad pa'i gnang ba de ltar byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:207b-4: ma rungs pa rnams la mngon spyod byas shing bsad pas dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i las kyi lam 'jug pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:207b-5: gang gis gsod par byed ce na /
T02TD2510.2E:207b-6: khros pa yi ni zhes bya ba smos te rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i byed pa por 'gyur ba'i khro bos ma rungs pa'i sems can rnams sbyong zhing bsad par byas par gyur pas rdo rje'i rigs su mnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:207b-8: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas mngon par shes pa bskyed de /
T02TD2510.2E:207b-9: khros par gyur pa'i rnal 'byor chen po dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:207b-10: rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis nam mkha'i khams kun du bkang la de nas de rnams phyag bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:207b-11: phyag na rdo rje mchod nas mgo bsgyur ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:207b-13: gos med pa'am gos dang bcas pas 'jig rten pa thams cad la khros te khro bo'i tshig brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:207b-14: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas gar byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:207b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid kyis bris te /
T02TD2510.2E:207b-16: mtshams bcing ba la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:207b-17: srod kyi dus su khrus byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:207b-18: dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i cha lugs kyis gdu bu dang /
T02TD2510.2E:207b-21: sangs rgyas kyi phreng bas bdag nyid brgyan par byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:207b-22: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khang par ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:207b-23: bsgrubs la mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:207b-24: dkyil 'khor pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
T02TD2510.2E:207b-25: gdug pa'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yis rnam par sbyangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:207b-26: thugs rje chen po'i khro bos bsad pa de lta bu zla ba phyed tsam gyi sbyor bas rdo rje'i rigs mnyes par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:207b-27: chags pa'ang kun du bltas pa dang //
T02TD2510.2E:207b-28: zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi padma'i rigs kyi lta bas so sor blta ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:207b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa dang padma'i rigs kyis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:208a-1: can gyi khams rnams padma'i rigs su byed pa 'di ni 'dir byas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:208a-2: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bas sdud pa'i mtshan nyid can 'di bsgom pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:208a-3: snying rjes zhes bya ba ni snying brtse ba nyid kyis ni snying rje ste /
T02TD2510.2E:208a-4: padma'i rigs de nyid kyis sems can gyi khams thams cad padma'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du bskyed cing bsgoms te dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bsal nas /
T02TD2510.2E:208a-5: bcing ba la sogs pa dang bral bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:208a-7: chos smra ngad zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes brjod pa'i ngang tshul gyis chos smra'o //
T02TD2510.2E:208a-8: mi 'jigs kun la sbyin byed rnams //
T02TD2510.2E:208a-9: zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa'i sems can kun la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa bstan pas dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'jigs bsel ba 'di ni mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:208a-10: sngags kyi dngos grub kyi stobs kyis gsod pa dang 'ching ba la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa sel ba 'di ni padma'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas sangs rgyas mnyes par byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:208a-12: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:208a-13: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed nas /
T02TD2510.2E:208a-15: padma'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la yi ge hri dang /
T02TD2510.2E:208a-16: de'i steng du h'um bkod la /
T02TD2510.2E:208a-17: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2510.2E:208a-18: de nas rang gi sngags brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:208a-19: byang chub sems kyi yi ge h'um dang /
T02TD2510.2E:208a-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yi ge hri rnam par bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:208a-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin rang gi lha'i gzugs sam /
T02TD2510.2E:208a-23: rigs kyi rang bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:208a-24: de nas dgongs ka'i dus nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:208a-25: stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:208a-26: padma'i rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i cod pan la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis bdag nyid brgyan par byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:208a-27: chags pa kun du lta ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:208a-28: byams pa dang snying rje chos smra ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:208b-0: sems @208b can kun la mi 'jigs pa sbyin par byed pa rnams rjes su spyad la bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:208b-1: de lta bu'i sbyor ba 'dis zhag bdun ni padma'i rigs rjes su mnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:208b-2: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas //
T02TD2510.2E:208b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbang bskur ba rab tu sbyin pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:208b-4: nam mkha' thams cad mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:208b-5: phul du byung ba'i sbyin pa ni rab tu sbyin pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:208b-6: nor bu'i rigs kyi rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid du bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:208b-7: nor bu'i rigs kyi ngo bo'i nor bu bsdus pas sbyin pa bsags pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:208b-8: thams cad la dbang bskur ba la sogs pa byin pas sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i rgyu mtshan rjes su sgrub pa yin pa de'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:208b-9: de yang sangs rgyas don du sbyor //
T02TD2510.2E:208b-12: snga ma bzhin du nor bu'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas nor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa bskyed de /
T02TD2510.2E:208b-13: nor bu'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la de bzhin gshegs pa dang nor bu'i rigs kyis nam mkha'i khams gang bar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:208b-14: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:208b-15: nor bu'i rigs kyi rdo rje'i nor bu'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba thams cad gzugs brnyan tsam du nges par bsgom ste /
T02TD2510.2E:208b-16: phyi rol gyi mchod pa'am yid kyis mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:208b-17: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po mdun du bzhag la /
T02TD2510.2E:208b-18: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi rgyal po'i bdag po nam mkha'i snying po ni bdag yin no zhes rgyal por bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:208b-19: rim pa 'di nyid kyis zhag brgyad bzlas pa de lta bus nor bu'i rigs rjes su mnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:208b-20: nor bu'i rigs dang mthun pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis bdag nyid brgyan par byas nas cho ga thams cad rjes su sbyang par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:208b-21: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad rjes su mnyes par byed pa bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:208b-22: da ni de dag dbang du byed pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:208b-23: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te de la dbang du byed pa ni rang nyid dang /
T02TD2510.2E:208b-24: nor dang bcas pa dbang du byed pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:209a-1: chags pas mngon par byed pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:209a-2: dga' ba skyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:209a-3: 'dod chags la ni brnyas mi bya //
T02TD2510.2E:209a-4: zhes bya ba ni de la 'dod chags ni chos bdag med pa'i chags pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:209a-5: sems can smin cing grol bar byed pa'i chags pa ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de /
T02TD2510.2E:209a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ngo bo rdo rje sems dpa' de la brnyas par mi bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:209a-7: sangs rgyas byang chub don du gnyer bas bsgom par bya zhing rgyun mi 'chad par mngon du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:209a-8: ci'i phyir brnyas par mi bya zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:209a-9: gang gi phyir chos bdag med pa'i chags pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dri ma dang bral bas sems can smin cing grol bar byed pa'i chags pas mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam las slong bar byed pa de nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:209a-10: de ltar rnam par dag pa de sbyin pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:209a-11: 'di ltar rnam par dag pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa la smad par mi bya ba de bzhin du bde ba sbyin pa la yang yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:209a-12: gang gi phyir yon tan de dang ldan pas mngon du byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa 'di ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba skyed par byed pas na 'di bde ba sbyin pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:209a-13: sems can kun gyi don du sbyong //
T02TD2510.2E:209a-14: zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i bsgom pa ni sems can thams cad kyi don to //
T02TD2510.2E:209a-16: 'di ni sangs rgyas dbang du byed //
T02TD2510.2E:209a-17: ces bya ba ni 'dir 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid bsgoms pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes dag sems can thams cad kyi don du bsgom pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas dbang du byed pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:209a-18: sbyor ba des sangs rgyas rang dbang du byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:209a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:209a-21: rjes su chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te /
T02TD2510.2E:209a-22: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan tsam gyi sbyor bas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:209a-23: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi bdag nyid du bskyed par bya'o //
