T02TD2510.2E:260a-10: de ltar rdo rje snying por mnyam bzhag la /
T02TD2510.2E:260a-11: bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud par byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:260a-12: phyis las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:260a-13: mchog tu phyag 'tshal bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:260a-14: de ltar byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:260a-15: dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:260a-17: nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:260a-18: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:260a-19: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i rgyud gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:260a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rigs rnams so //
T02TD2510.2E:260a-21: las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi rgyud ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:260a-23: 'dod la sogs pa'i bde ba kun //
T02TD2510.2E:260a-24: rtag tu bdag ni snying la gnas //
T02TD2510.2E:260a-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bsgoms pa des 'grub pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:260b-0: las @260b kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya mngon sum du byed pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:260b-1: de'i ston par byed pa'i rgyud de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:260b-2: 'dod la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni de la 'dod pa ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi mtshan nyid kyi rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:260b-3: de nyid dang por byas pa'i 'dod pa la sogs pa gang yin pa ni rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:260b-5: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ni 'dod pa yin zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:260b-6: de nyid bde ba kun te /
T02TD2510.2E:260b-7: rtag tu bdag gi snying la gnas //
T02TD2510.2E:260b-8: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad sku dang /
T02TD2510.2E:260b-9: gsung dang thugs rdo rjes rtag tu bzhugs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la 'khor ba ji srid kyi bar du bzhugs pa ni de nyid kyi snying la gnas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:260b-10: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:260b-11: sems can gyi don gyi snying po ni sems can gyi don te /
T02TD2510.2E:260b-12: nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i theg par mos pa'i sems can rnams gdul ba'i phyir nyan thos dang /
T02TD2510.2E:260b-13: rang rgyal ba'i theg pa ston pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:260b-14: sems can gyi don byed pa zhes gang yin pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:260b-15: de la 'dir do mtshar ba ci zhig yod ce na /
T02TD2510.2E:260b-16: skyo bar gyur pas gang 'dod smad //
T02TD2510.2E:260b-18: byang chub kyi sems chen po la sogs pa mngar zin yang sbas nas byang chub kyi sems chen po la sogs pa chags pa dang bral ba mi mnga' ba'i ngo bo la yongs su brtags nas /
T02TD2510.2E:260b-19: nyan thos dang rang rgyal gyi rigs can ni sems can gyi khams la nyan thos dang /
T02TD2510.2E:260b-20: rang rgyal ba'i lam gyi rang bzhin chags pa dang bral bar ston pa de ni ngo mtshar gang yin 'di ni zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems la rtog pa ston pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:260b-21: ni zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir gyi don te las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig ni las kyi dam tshig ste /
T02TD2510.2E:260b-22: mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:260b-23: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:261a-0: gang gi phyir byang chub sems la sogs pa'i rang gi rang bzhin 'di ni las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya sgrub par byed pa las mi 'da' ba yin pa de'i phyir 'di'i ngo @261a * //
T02TD2510.2E:261a-2: bsgom par bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:261a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin du zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:261a-4: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rnal 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T02TD2510.2E:261a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de 'dir bsgoms pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:261a-6: bsgoms nas sangs rgyas mchod pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:261a-7: zhes bya ba ni las kyi dam tshig de bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas mchod pa ni rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:261a-8: dngos grub dam tshig thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:261a-9: zhes bya ba ni mchod pa 'dis sangs rgyas la mchod na las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:261a-10: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:261a-11: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:261a-12: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:261a-13: phyis las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:261a-14: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyis snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:261a-15: yang de nyid kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:261a-16: rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje la rang gi rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bkod nas /
T02TD2510.2E:261a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje snying gar rnam par bsams te bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:261a-18: kun du bzang po bdag yin te //
T02TD2510.2E:261a-19: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2510.2E:261a-20: de nyid 'dod pa ni mngon par 'dod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:261a-21: sems can kun la bde sbyin pa //
T02TD2510.2E:261a-22: zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi kun du bzang po 'dod pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba de bskyed pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:261a-23: sems can kun la bde sbyin ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:261a-24: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02TD2510.2E:261a-25: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa de dag ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T02TD2510.2E:261b-0: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgoms pa de la rab tu gnas @261b pa na /
T02TD2510.2E:261b-1: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gnas so //
T02TD2510.2E:261b-2: mchod na dngos grub thob 'gyur zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2510.2E:261b-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
T02TD2510.2E:261b-4: kun du bzang po 'dod pa'i bdag //
T02TD2510.2E:261b-5: sems can kun la bde ba sogs //
T02TD2510.2E:261b-6: zhes bya ba bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rtogs pa'i mchod pas mchod na /
T02TD2510.2E:261b-7: las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:261b-9: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:261b-10: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de //
T02TD2510.2E:261b-11: phyis las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:261b-12: ji lta ba bzhin du las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2510.2E:261b-13: kun du bzang po'i mchod pa'i bdag //
T02TD2510.2E:261b-14: sems can kun la bde stsol ba //
T02TD2510.2E:261b-15: zhes bsgoms na sems can gyi khams la byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa bskyed cing bsgrubs te /
T02TD2510.2E:261b-16: rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje la rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bkod la de nyid brjod cing bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:261b-17: kun du bzang po zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:261b-18: kun du bzang po de nyid khro bo'o//
T02TD2510.2E:261b-19: ci'i phyir kun du bzang po'i rang bzhin khro bo yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:261b-21: sems can kun la phan byed pa //
T02TD2510.2E:261b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:261b-23: las dang rnam par smin pa bde ba bskyed pa ni sems can kun la bde bas phan pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:261b-24: phan pa ni sems can kun la phan 'dogs par byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:261b-25: rdo rje h'um mdzad rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD2510.2E:261b-26: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgom pa ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor ro //
T02TD2510.2E:261b-27: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor gyi rnal 'byor des mchod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:261b-28: sems can kun la phan byed pa //
T02TD2510.2E:261b-29: kun bzang khro bo bdag yin te //
T02TD2510.2E:261b-30: zhes bsgoms pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:262a-0: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par @262a * //
T02TD2510.2E:262a-3: snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi khro bo'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:262a-4: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:262a-5: phyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:262a-6: snying ga'i rdo rje la rang gi rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:262a-7: sems can gyi khams thams cad khro bos bcom nas rdo rje rigs kyi rang bzhin du rnam par bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:262a-8: sems can kun la phan byed pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:262a-9: kun bzang khro bo bdag yin te //
T02TD2510.2E:262a-10: zhes nga rgyal bskyed de bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:262a-11: kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te //
T02TD2510.2E:262a-12: zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni 'dod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:262a-13: 'gro ba 'dul ba la sogs pa nas padma 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i bde ba gang yin pa de ni bde ba thams cad do //
T02TD2510.2E:262a-14: de ster bar byed pas na bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:262a-15: rnal 'byor pas bdag nyid 'gro ba 'dul ba'i skur gnas pas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i skur gnas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:262a-16: padma'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:262a-17: mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:262a-18: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'dis /
T02TD2510.2E:262a-19: bde ba thim nas rab sbyin pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:262a-20: kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te //
T02TD2510.2E:262a-21: zhes bya ba bsgom pa'i mchod pas mchod nas padma'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:262a-23: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:262a-24: cho ga thams cad rjes su sbyang la phyis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:262a-25: snying ga'i rdo rje padma la bzlas pa'i yi ge rnam par bkod nas /
T02TD2510.2E:262b-0: thams cad du padma'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor spros pas sems @262b can gyi khams thams cad padma'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du bskyed de /
T02TD2510.2E:262b-1: bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:262b-2: kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te //
T02TD2510.2E:262b-3: zhes nga rgyal bskyed de bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:262b-4: kun bzang rgyal po bdag yin te //
T02TD2510.2E:262b-5: zhes bya ba ni nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi gzugs kyi khams gsum pa thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyal srid thob pas na rgyal po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:262b-6: sems can kun la don chen sbyin //
T02TD2510.2E:262b-7: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:262b-8: sems can thams cad nor bu'i rigs kyis dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:262b-9: nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi gzugs su ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:262b-10: don kun grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:262b-11: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i lha rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgom pa ni don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs kyis so //
T02TD2510.2E:262b-12: mchod pa dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:262b-13: zhes bya ba ni sems can kun la don chen sbyin [?] //
T02TD2510.2E:262b-14: kun bzang rgyal po bdag yin te //
T02TD2510.2E:262b-15: zhes bya ba ni don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs su de bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.2E:262b-16: mchod pas mchod na nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:262b-18: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:262b-19: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:262b-20: phyis nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:262b-21: snying ga'i rdo rje rin po che la rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:262b-22: de nyid zlos shing nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du spros pas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:262b-23: sems can gyi khams dbang bskur bas nor bu'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du bskyed par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:262b-24: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:263a-0: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams @263a * //
T02TD2510.2E:263a-1: cad kyi las kyi chos kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:263a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi las ni las kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2510.2E:263a-3: de la chos ni bsrung ba la sogs pa bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:263a-4: de'i dam pa'i dngos grub ni las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya rnams mngon sum du byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:263a-5: de ston par byed pa na rgyud de /
T02TD2510.2E:263a-6: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa'o /
T02TD2510.2E:263a-7: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo mdud nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:263a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:263a-9: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:263a-10: rang gi lha'i ljags la las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya rnam par bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:263a-11: g-yas pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyi rtse mos snying ga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:263a-19: dbang bskur ba'i gnas su go cha bcings pa'i tshul gyis spyi gtsug tu bkod la /
T02TD2510.2E:263a-20: rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi yi ge bskyed la /
T02TD2510.2E:263a-21: de nas rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje la chos kyi yi ge rnam par bsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:263a-22: de nyid brjod cing bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:263a-23: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi chos bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:263a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:263a-25: rtsig pa la ni ldan 'dra ba //
T02TD2510.2E:263a-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi bsgrub bya'i rig pa'i lha mo gcer bu'i gzugs kyis sa la bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:263a-27: ri mo bris nas mtshan bsgreng ste /
T02TD2510.2E:263a-28: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi mtshan mas bud med bsams pa gang yin pa la mtshan ma bsgrengs te gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:263a-29: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa'i lha mo gang yin ba chung ma'i gzugs su bsam zhing bsgoms na rang gi mchan ma bsgrang ste /
T02TD2510.2E:263b-0: bud med gcer bu gzugs brnyan rtsig @263b pa la bris la de'i bha gar zhugs par bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:263b-1: sen mo btsugs na sgrub pa po de'i 'di chung mar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:263b-2: de bas na de 'dir dbang du byed par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:263b-4: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:263b-5: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:263b-6: phyis las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi chos kyi phyag rgya lce la rnam par bkod de /
T02TD2510.2E:263b-7: rang gi rig pa dang lha mo'i chos kyi phyag rgyas rtsig pa la gzugs brnyan bris te sbrul pa bsdu ba la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:263b-8: de la mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:263b-10: nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas chos kyi phyag rgyar brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:263b-11: de dang lhan cig tu mnyam par sbyor bas ji srid mngon sum mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:263b-12: de nas mtshan thog thag dang lhan cig tu mtshan ma bsgreng bar byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:263b-13: mnyam par sbyor ba byas la chos kyi phyag rgya'i yi ge ho bzla par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:263b-14: de nas mngon sum du song nas sgrub pa po dang lhan cig mnyam par sbyor zhing sgrub pa po'i chung mar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:263b-15: sbyor ba 'dis gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa sgrub pa de don du gnyer bar byed pa nas la gnod sbyin gyi gdong bris la zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:263b-16: ras sam sbang leb bam rtsig pa la rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa nas khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:263b-17: gnod sbyin gyi gdong gi tshad tsam du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:263b-18: mdzub mo'i sen mos btsugs na yang //
T02TD2510.2E:263b-19: zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi gdong de la g-yon pa'i sdigs mdzub bam g-yas pa'i sdigs mdzub kyi sen mo btsugs nas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:263b-25: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa'i lha mo rnams 'dren par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:263b-26: de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:264a-0: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las @264a * //
T02TD2510.2E:264a-1: bshad pa'i rang gi khro bo'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:264a-2: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:264a-3: phyis las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya lce la rnam par bsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:264a-4: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i nga rgyal bskyed de /
T02TD2510.2E:264a-5: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pas rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa rang gi lha mo'i gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du bris te /
T02TD2510.2E:264a-6: sbrul pa bsdu ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:264a-7: mchod pa thams cad kyis rang gi khro bo la yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2510.2E:264a-9: ji srid du mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:264a-10: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi khro bo'i las kyi rnal 'byor byas la phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:264a-11: yang byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:264a-12: bsdu ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:264a-13: gnod sbyin gyi gdong de'i mig gi phyogs su mdzub mo'i sen mo btsugs te /
T02TD2510.2E:264a-14: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi khro bo'i yi ge dza: dang /
T02TD2510.2E:264a-15: chos kyi phyag rgya brjod cing ji srid du rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:264a-16: gnod sbyin mo 'gugs pa de srid kyi bar du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:264a-17: de nas sgrub pa po'i chung mar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:264a-18: chos kyi phyag rgya brjod cing che ge mo /
T02TD2510.2E:264a-19: a'a karsha dza: zhes bya bas gnod sbyin gyi gdong la rab tu sbyar la /
T02TD2510.2E:264a-21: lag pa gnyis su padmo blangs //
T02TD2510.2E:264a-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.2E:264a-23: ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje padma g-yon bsnyems pas blangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:264a-24: lag pa g-yas pa snying gar de'i padma kha 'byed par byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:264a-25: ji ltar padma dmar ba yang //
T02TD2510.2E:264a-26: tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos bzhin //
T02TD2510.2E:264a-27: thams cad rnam dag bsgoms pas na //
T02TD2510.2E:264a-28: de bzhin sdig pas gos mi 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:264a-29: zhes bya ba la bltas nas kyang ni 'dod chags dgag par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:264a-30: lta ba gang yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:264a-31: rdo rje lta bas zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:264b-0: rdo rje lta ba'i mtshan nyid ni bshad @264b zin to //
T02TD2510.2E:264b-1: des bud med rnams dang sbyor zhing chags par byed na de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:264b-2: padma'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnal 'byor pas padma'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rig pa'i lha mo'i bud med la bltas na 'dod chags rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:264b-3: padma'i rig pa'i lha mo'i bud med kyi gzugs la chags shing mngon par dga' bas de la mngon du phyogs pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsgrub pa'i bye brag go //
T02TD2510.2E:264b-5: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor snga ma bzhin du byas la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:264b-6: phyis padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i chos kyi phyag rgya lce la rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:264b-7: rang gi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i lha mo'i rig pa'i de nyid brjod cing sbrul la /
T02TD2510.2E:264b-8: bsdu ba la sogs pa byas nas mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2510.2E:264b-10: phyag na gnas pa'i gsang ba'i padma la bltas na 'dod chags rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:264b-11: rdo rje lta bus bud med la //
T02TD2510.2E:264b-12: bltas na yang ni dga' bar 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:264b-13: zhes bya bas las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i chos kyi phyag rgya yi ge ho bzlas pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:264b-14: rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gnas //
T02TD2510.2E:264b-15: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rang gi lha'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:264b-16: lag pa gnyis kyis nor bu bzung //
T02TD2510.2E:264b-17: zhes bya ba ni mig gnyis kyi lta ba dang ldan pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa bzung la /
T02TD2510.2E:264b-18: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rin chen h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas bud med kun la 'dud byed do zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:264b-20: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:264b-21: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:264b-22: phyis las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i nor bu'i rigs kyi rang gi lha'i chos kyi phyag rgya lce la bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:265a-0: de nyid brjod cing don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa rang gi sems dpa' chen po nyid du nges par byas nas las kyi dkyil 'khor las @265a * //
T02TD2510.2E:265a-1: bshad pa'i rang gi rig pa'i lha mo mdun du sprul la /
T02TD2510.2E:265a-2: bsdu ba la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:265a-3: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2510.2E:265a-5: yang rang gi lha'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i snying ga'i rdo rje rin po che la rnam par bkod de /
T02TD2510.2E:265a-6: de nyid brjod cing ji srid du mtshan ma thob par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:265a-7: de nas mtshan thog thag bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:265a-8: lan gcig lan gnyis lan gsum mam /
T02TD2510.2E:265a-12: lan bdun gyi bar du bsgrubs kyang ma grub na rin chen h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lor bshad pa'i yi ge h'um gi sngags des de la 'dud byas na de ltar 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:265a-13: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:265a-14: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi las kyi dngos po'i dngos grub kyi rgyud gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:265a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la rigs kyang yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs so //
T02TD2510.2E:265a-16: de'i las ni las kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2510.2E:265a-17: de'i dgos pa ni las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de grub pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:265a-18: de ston par byed pa ni rgyud de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs shing bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:265a-19: mchod pa'i las kyi cho ga sbyar //
T02TD2510.2E:265a-20: zhes bya ba ni las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i las kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya rnam pa bcu drug byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:265a-21: gang dang gang gis dgos bsams pa //
T02TD2510.2E:265a-22: zhes bya ba ni las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub gang yin pa de yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:265a-23: de dang de ni gsol btab ste //
T02TD2510.2E:265a-24: mkhas bas phyag rgya bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:265a-25: zhes bya ba ni de dang de'i las kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid kyi dgos pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:265b-0: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar sprul pa @265b dang mtshungs pa gang yin pa'i bden pa de dang /
T02TD2510.2E:265b-1: bden pa des dgos pa 'di dag grub par gyur ci gces gsol ba btab nas /
T02TD2510.2E:265b-2: las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:265b-3: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:265b-4: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:265b-5: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:265b-6: phyis las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:265b-7: snying ga'i rdo rje la rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bsams nas /
T02TD2510.2E:265b-8: de nyid brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid du rnam par bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:265b-9: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i lha mo bcu drug sbrul la /
T02TD2510.2E:265b-10: las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:265b-12: snga ma bzhin du gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:265b-13: de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:265b-14: rang gi rig pa bzlas shing bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:265b-15: gsang ba'i mchod pa cho ga sbyar //
T02TD2510.2E:265b-16: zhes bya ba ni las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sgeg mo la sogs pa las kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bzhis mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:265b-17: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD2510.2E:265b-18: zhes bya ba ni las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:265b-19: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi las kyi phyag rgya bsgom pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2510.2E:265b-20: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dgos pa gang yin smras pa de /
T02TD2510.2E:265b-21: myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:265b-22: zhes bya bas las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i las kyi dngos grub kyi dgos pa rnam pa de lta bu che ge mo'i las kyi phyag rgya'i dgos pa grub par gyur cig ces rnal 'byor pas brjod pa gang yin pa de nyid dgos pa'i dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:265b-24: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:265b-25: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:265b-26: phyis las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:265b-27: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa bzhis rang gi snying ga'i sems dpa'i rdo rje las sbrul la /
T02TD2510.2E:266a-0: de'i las kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bzhis bdag nyid yang dag par @266a * //
T02TD2510.2E:266a-1: mchod la phyag bzhi byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:266a-2: mngon par 'dod pa'i las kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub don du gnyer ba nyid kyis slar yang las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:266a-3: rang gi rig pa zlos shing bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:266a-4: rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod chen byas //
T02TD2510.2E:266a-5: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod chen te zhes byas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:266a-6: ting nge 'dzin gang gis byed ce na /
T02TD2510.2E:266a-7: khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:266a-8: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba ni khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2510.2E:266a-9: mkhas pas cung zad gang bsams pa //
T02TD2510.2E:266a-10: zhes bya ba ni las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid dgos pa cung zad bsams pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:266a-11: thams cad myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:266a-12: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:266a-13: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:266a-14: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:266a-15: phyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:266a-16: rang gi snying ga las sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi sprul la /
T02TD2510.2E:266a-17: de'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bzhis bdag nyid yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2510.2E:266a-19: yang snying ga'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i dbus su rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:266a-20: dngos grub don du gnyer bas de nyid zlos shing bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:266a-21: 'gro ba 'dul ba la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas sems can thams cad kyi don dang sangs rgyas mchod pa'i yid kyis mchod pa ma lus par byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:266a-24: padma'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i las kyi phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor pas 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin des bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:266b-0: @266b yid kyis mchod pa byas nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:266b-1: mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa //
T02TD2510.2E:266b-2: de yis dngos grub thams cad 'thob //
T02TD2510.2E:266b-3: ces bya ba ni padma'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i las kyi phyag rgya dngos grub dgos pa gang bsams pa des /
T02TD2510.2E:266b-4: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:266b-5: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:266b-6: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gis 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor byas la snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:266b-7: phyis las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:266b-8: padma'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i lha mo rnams rang gi snying ga'i padma la sprul la /
T02TD2510.2E:266b-9: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad la mchod pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:266b-10: phyis sgeg mo la sogs pa rnam pa bzhis mchod la ;
T02TD2510.2E:266b-12: yang las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:266b-13: snying ga'i rdo rje padma la rang gi rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bkod nas /
T02TD2510.2E:266b-14: de nyid brjod cing bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:266b-15: bdug pa la sogs mchod byas na /
T02TD2510.2E:266b-16: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i bdug pa la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bzhas bdag nyid mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:266b-17: rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD2510.2E:266b-18: zhes bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i las kyi phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor ni rdo rje snying po'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2510.2E:266b-19: rdo rje snying po'i ting nge 'dzin des //
T02TD2510.2E:266b-20: nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid bsam zhing /
T02TD2510.2E:266b-21: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub gang yin pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:266b-23: don thams cad grub pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:266b-24: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rdo rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:267a-0: phyis nor bu'i rigs kyi rang gi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i las kyi phyag rgya @267a * //
T02TD2510.2E:267a-2: rin chen bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i rnam pa bzhi snying ga'i rdo rje rin po che las rnam par sprul la /
T02TD2510.2E:267a-3: bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2510.2E:267a-5: yang nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:267a-6: snying ga'i rdo rje rin po che la rang gi rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bkod de /
T02TD2510.2E:267a-7: de nyid zlos shing bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:267a-8: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:267a-9: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:267a-10: yang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:267a-11: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud gsungs pa /
T02TD2510.2E:267a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rigs rnams kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:267a-13: de bsgom pa ni yang dang yang mngon du byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:267a-14: de'i dngos grub phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:267a-15: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud de /
T02TD2510.2E:267a-16: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:267a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:267a-18: rnal 'byor ni bsgom par byas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:267a-19: de'i dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po mngon du byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:267a-20: rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:267a-21: rdo rje phra mo bsgoms pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:267a-22: de sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis zla ba gsum bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:267a-23: phyis sems so sor rtog pa la sogs pa'i rigs kyis ya tha sarba ta th'a ga ta ta stha aa ham /
T02TD2510.2E:267a-24: zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:267a-26: zhes bya ba ni sems rnam par g-yeng ba med pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:267a-27: dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:267a-28: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:267a-30: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:267a-32: sangs rgyas phyag rgya rab bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:267b-0: sems dpa' @267b zhes grags kun bdag nyid //
T02TD2510.2E:267b-1: ces bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:267b-2: zhes kyi sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
T02TD2510.2E:267b-3: gang gi phyir rdo rje sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2510.2E:267b-4: sems can thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjes su song ba yin pa de'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:267b-5: grags pa'i sgra ni lkog tu ma gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:267b-6: kun zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi khams dang sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin ni //
T02TD2510.2E:267b-7: bdag gi lus la gnas pa ste //
T02TD2510.2E:267b-8: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyang bdag nyid kyis de'i bdag nyid du rab tu zhugs pa'i sbyor bas yang dag par gnas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:267b-10: sems dpa' bdag ces byin brlabs pas //
T02TD2510.2E:267b-11: zhes bya ba ni mngon du byas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:267b-12: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:267b-14: rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid du bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pas dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:267b-16: snga ma bzhin mnyam pa'i thal mo dang /
T02TD2510.2E:267b-17: rdo rje thal mo dang rdo rje bsdams pa bcings pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:267b-18: rdo rje bsdams pa dral ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:267b-19: de nas dbab pa bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:267b-20: rdo rje khu tshur gyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa dang sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya bcings pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:267b-21: rang gi snying ga'i rdo rje la rang gi lha'i snying po yid kyis bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:267b-22: de nyid brjod cing chos bdag med par bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.2E:267b-23: de nas rang gi lha'i snying po de nyid dang dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug las snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:267b-24: de nas de'i steng du snying po de nyid dang /
T02TD2510.2E:267b-25: yi ge ka la sogs pa dang bcas pa la snga ma bzhin du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa bsam mo //
T02TD2510.2E:267b-26: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de nyid rang gi lha'i snying po dang bcas pa la rdo rje rtse lnga pa nyid rang gi lha'i mtshan ma'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:267b-27: de nas rang gi lha'i mtshan ma'i dbus su rang gi lha'i snying po rnam par bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:267b-28: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya'i nga rgyal ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:267b-29: de nyid badzra satva aa ham zhes brjod pas rdo re sems dpa'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:268a-1: bsnyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor zhing /
T02TD2510.2E:268a-2: yang badzra satva aa ham zhes bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:268a-3: de nas de nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i lha'i ngo bor bdag nyid snga ma bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:268a-4: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa'i bsgoms pa ni sngar de kho na nyid ston pa'i rgyud du bshad zin to //
T02TD2510.2E:268a-5: sems dpa' ji bzhin rgya de bzhin //
T02TD2510.2E:268a-6: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje sems dpar gyur pa de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:268a-7: ji ltar phyag rgya de bzhin bdag //
T02TD2510.2E:268a-8: ces bya ba ni ji ltar rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa dang rdo rje 'bar ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du bdag yin zhes gzugs dang tha mi dad par nga rgyal bskyed cing bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:268a-9: bsgom pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:268a-10: rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:268a-11: de'i cho ga 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:268a-12: snga ma bzhin du sdig pa dral ba'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:268a-13: snying ga'i rdo rje 'bar ba la rang gi khro bo'i lha'i snying po rnam par bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:268a-14: de nyid brjod cing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:268a-15: snga ma bzhin du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rim pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rang gi lha'i mtshan ma bskyod la /
T02TD2510.2E:268a-16: de'i dbus sus nying po bkod nas /
T02TD2510.2E:268a-17: sems dpa' ji bzhin rgya de bzhin //
T02TD2510.2E:268a-18: phyag rgya ji bzhin de bzhin bdag / ces bya bas phyag rgya dang lhan cig tu tha mi dad pa'i bdag nyid du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.2E:268a-19: de'i rigs thams cad phyag rgya de las sprul la /
T02TD2510.2E:268a-20: gdug pa thams cad btul nas de thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i gzugs de las bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:268a-21: chos kyi phyag rgya ni padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:268a-22: de'i tshul ni rang gi lha'i mtshan ma'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:268a-24: rdo rje phra mo bsgom byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:268a-26: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje phra mo zla ba gsum bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:268a-27: phyis chos kyi phyag rgya'i spyor pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:268a-28: gang gi phyag rgya de dag kun //
T02TD2510.2E:268a-29: sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD2510.2E:268b-0: zhes bya ba ni snying po'i phyag rgya'i sngags kyi rig pa @268b thams cad kyis rang gi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:268b-2: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsgoms la snying ga'i phyag rgya la sngags kyi rig pa bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:268b-3: sangs rgyas kun la dbang bskur dang //
T02TD2510.2E:268b-5: rin po che'i cod pan gyis //
T02TD2510.2E:268b-6: sangs rgyas kun la dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:268b-10: rin po che sna bdun po de dag nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:268b-11: dam tshig gi dngos grub rnams ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub bo //
T02TD2510.2E:268b-12: rdo re las rnams 'grub par byed //
T02TD2510.2E:268b-13: ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kun la dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:268b-14: mchod pa'i dam tshig gi las rnams tha mi dad par bsgrubs pas /
T02TD2510.2E:268b-15: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i bdag yin no zhes nges par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:268b-16: de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi lha mo'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:268b-18: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:268b-19: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du lha'i phyag rgya'i mtshan ma rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:268b-20: phyag rgya'i dbus su bzlas pa'i yi ge bkod nas snying po brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:268b-21: bdag gi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:268b-22: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya de las nor bu'i rigs thams cad sprul te /
T02TD2510.2E:268b-23: des de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa sems can gyi khams thams cad dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te /
T02TD2510.2E:268b-24: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod dang /
T02TD2510.2E:268b-25: nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:268b-26: phyag rgya de la gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:268b-27: de nas phyag rgya'i gzugs de sems dpar byin gyis brlabs ba'i sbyor bas rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:268b-28: gang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs su yang bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni de kho na nyid ma yin pa la mos pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i rim pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:268b-29: gang zhig shin tu de kho na nyid la mos pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:269a-2: sems dpa' byin gyis brlab pa'i sbyor ba tsam sngon du byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:269a-3: rang gi lha'i nga rgyal bskyed cing bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-4: de la de kho na nyid la mos pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:269a-5: gang gi tshe las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor bas rang la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa nas brtsam par bya ba'i tshogs thams cad thun bzhi'i sbyor bas nyin re zhing mtshan ma thob par 'gyur ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:269a-6: skye ba gzhan las goms pa'i mthus skyes bu'am 'ga' zhig dge ba'i bshes gnyen las thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa gdams ngag bsgoms nas /
T02TD2510.2E:269a-7: thog ma brtsams pa nas bzung nas rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid du mtshan ma nye bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-8: de dag gi stobs kyis phyag rgya bcings pa la sogs pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa med par bsgoms pas 'gyur ba 'di ni de kho na nyid la goms pa'i rnal 'byor pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:269a-9: dang por lhag par mos pa tsam gyis ni ma yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-11: de nyid dman pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-12: lha la dmigs par 'gyur bas na //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-13: lugs ma la sogs dag pa la //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-14: gzugs brnyan rnal 'byor nye bar bskyed //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-15: sku'am ras ris mchod rten rnams //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-16: shin tu mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-17: mngon sum du ni mthong ba na //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-18: de ni rdzogs pa yin par bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-19: dkar dang ser po'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-21: ngo mtshar bar ni 'gyur ba de //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-22: blo ldan gyis ni mkha' la mthong //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-23: blo ldan kha dog sna tshogs des //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-24: gang gis yid ni mtshon par bya//
T02TD2510.2E:269a-25: dkar po dge bar shes par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-26: mi shes pa la nag por snang //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-27: chags can shin tu dman par bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-28: shin tu dga' la de bzhin ser //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-29: sprin gyis non pa lta bu ni //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-30: mkhas pas rmongs par shes par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-31: bdag nyid yongs su ngag pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-33: / sems ni brtan par shes par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-34: de ltar mtshan ma nyid rnams ni //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-35: sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i bde mchog gi //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-36: rdo rje rin chen chu skyes dang //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-37: sna tshogs lcags kyu nyi ma dang //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-38: ral gri go cha mda' gzhu dang //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-39: rin chen rgyal mtshan rnams kyis brgyan //
T02TD2510.2E:269a-40: 'khor lo mche ba de bzhin mgu //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-0: @269b bzhad pas gsungs pa khu tshur bcangs //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-1: sgeg mo de bzhin phreng ba mo //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-2: glu ma dang ni gar ma bdag / me tog bdug pa mar me dang //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-3: de bzhin dri chab la sogs tshogs //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-4: me tog kun dga' dri gtsang khang //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-5: dge slong de bzhin dge slong ma //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-6: dngos grub drang srong gnyen rnams dang //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-7: rgyal rigs skye bos bsngags pa dang //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-8: bu mo gzhon nus brgyan pa dang //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-9: chu bo rgya mtsho ne'u sing dang //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-10: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-11: rol mo sna tshogs brdung ba dang //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-12: shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-13: shes pa'i sgra ni dri ma med //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-14: nyi zla'i dbyibs dang 'dra ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-16: nam mkha'i glog ni sna tshogs mtshungs //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-17: rnal 'byor pa la rtag tu skye //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-18: de dag thams cad rnam spangs pas //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-19: mtshan ma med cing 'grib pa med //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-20: rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs nas //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-21: rnal 'byor rtog pa med la gnas //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-22: de nas rnal 'byor pa de la //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-23: dga' ba rnam pa lnga bskyed de //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-24: skad cig thang cig rgyun dag la //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-25: de bzhin mthar thug 'gyur ba dang //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-26: chos rnams thams cad nges pas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-27: sangs rgyas kun zhes rab tu grags //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-28: de la skad cig ma'i dga' ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-29: gang tshe skad cig re re sems //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-30: dmigs pa la ni gnas pa na //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-31: g-yeng ba 'gog ba med pas na //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-32: de phyir skad cig ces grags so //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-33: de la thang cig ces bya ba'i bar du dga' ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-34: gang tshe sbrang ma'i kha dag nas //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-35: sbrang rtsi 'byung ba myangs pa yis //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-36: rkang pa spyi bo'i mthar thug pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-37: lus la khyab par mnyam gzhag par //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-38: bkres dang nang 'byung bsal nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-39: de bzhin lus ni las rung dang //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-40: sems ni dmigs pa la chags nas //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-41: rtag tu brtan par gnas par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-42: de la rgyun du dga' ba ni //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-43: dga' bas mchi ma 'byung ba dag //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-45: mgu ba yi ni ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-46: de ni rgyun zhes bya bar bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-47: de nas mthar thug pa'i dga' ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:269b-48: gang tshe dmigs pa la chags pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-50: de tshe dga' ba'i khyad par ni //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-51: don gzhan nye bar skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-52: gang tshe lus la skyes pa'i rlung //
T02TD2510.2E:269b-53: lhag par rab tu zhugs gyur na //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-2: g-yeng ba skye bar mi 'gyur ba //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-3: de tshe rnal 'byor sems rig pas //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-4: srang mda'i tshul du sbyang bar bya //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-5: dge ba srung ba'i tshul du ni //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-6: ji lta ba bzhin nges par sbyar //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-7: de la chos thams cad du nges pa'i dga' ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:270a-8: sos ka'i tsha bas gdungs pa yi //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-9: ji ltar lam du 'jug pa'i mi //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-10: gangs kyi chu ni len pa'i tshe //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-11: tsha ba'i dus kyis sdug bsngal te //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-12: gang zhig 'gog par byed pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-14: dga' zhing bde ba'i khyad par ni //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-15: yang dang yang du 'phel bar gzhag / rnam pa thams cad des pa na //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-16: chos rnams bla na med pa 'thob //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-17: lus ni shin tu spangs pa dang //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-18: nyon mongs gsum ni rnam dag pas //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-19: sam gtan dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-20: gzugs rnams kyang ni bsags pa dang //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-21: sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-22: mngon shes rnams ni 'byung ba dang //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-23: 'dod chags la sogs nyes pa che //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-25: dang po'i spyod pa la zhugs pas //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-26: 'grub 'gyur 'di ni the cho ma med / nyon mongs dgra rnams zhi phyir dang //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-28: rang lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas nas //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-29: de nas sbyin sreg brtsam par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-30: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-31: bdag nyid rtag tu bsam par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-32: de yi lus kyi snying ga las //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-35: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba dang //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-36: stong gsum rdul dang mtshungs pa yi ;
T02TD2510.2E:270a-37: / kha dog dkar po la sogs pa //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-38: bsdus nas lus la gzhug par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-39: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ces su bshad //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-40: rgyas pa'i cho ga sems can rnams //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-41: mgu ba'i gzugs su bsam par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-42: shin tu nyon mongs zhi ba'i phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-43: khro bo'i gzugs kyi khyad par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-44: rjes su chags pa bud med ni //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-45: sna tshogs gzugs can bsam par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-46: las dang po pa'i sbyin sreg 'di //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-47: gtso bos sngar ni bstan pa yin //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-48: de ltar brtan par byas nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:270a-51: de nyid bsams pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-0: lha la dmigs par @270b 'gyur ba na //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-1: rnal 'byor rang gi dam tshig bdag / dam pa'i yi ge 'grub par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-2: lugs ma la sogs gzugs brnyan la //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-4: byang chub sems la rab brtson pas //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-6: byang chub sems kyi rdo rje 'di //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid de //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-8: de phyir rnal 'byor kun bdag gis //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-9: sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-10: bdag nyid sangs rgyas kun dang ni //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-11: gzi can kun du nges 'gyur bas //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-12: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-13: de phyir bdag nyid bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-14: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-15: gzi can thams cad nyid dang ni //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-16: rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-18: zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2510.2E:270b-21: // /'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i 'grel pa de kho na nyid snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-22: de ltar mchog tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir rgyud phyi ma bshad nas //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-23: da ni bsgoms pas 'jigs shing skrag pa'i bya ba la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:270b-24: rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-25: 'dir yang rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud kyi ma'i phyi mar ni rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba tsam gyis rang gi rigs las mthong ba'i snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:270b-28: rig sngags bsgrub pa ni phyag rgya chen pos 'jigs shing skrag pa bsod nams chung ba'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:270b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang bar mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-30: rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi sgra ni snying po zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:270b-31: rang gi rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi sgra ni phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:271a-0: rang gi rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i dngos @271a * //
T02TD2510.2E:271a-1: grub thams cad kyi sgra ni sngags so //
T02TD2510.2E:271a-2: rang gi rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i dngos grub thams cad kyi sgra ni rigs pa yin zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan to //
T02TD2510.2E:271a-3: de la dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba'i dus nges pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:271a-6: phyi'i mchod pa rnam pa lnga la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:271a-8: skyil mo krung la sogs pa'i nges pa ni yo byad de /
T02TD2510.2E:271a-9: de la mngon par zhen pa rnams kyi don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:271a-10: de nas shes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:271a-11: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni skabs su bab pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:271a-12: lta ba ngan pa la sogs pa'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i skabs su bab pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:271a-13: de la lta ba ngan pa ni bya ba tsam gyis kun la smad pa zab mo'i chos la mi mos pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:271a-14: chags bral ni gsang ba bsgom pa rab tu spong bar byed pa de lta bur gyur pa de dag rgyud phyi ma las bshad pa'i gsang ba 'di ni mi rigs te /
T02TD2510.2E:271a-15: lhag par mos pa'i don mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:271a-16: de dag sems can kun la phan don du ni de bzhin du bde ba'i 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:271a-17: de bzhin cho ga bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:271a-18: ji ltar mchog tu gyur pa'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:271a-19: mchog tu gyur pa'i sems can dang mthun pa'i cho ga bya ba bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:271a-20: de nas yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:271a-21: las dang po pa'i sems can dang rjes su mthun pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:271a-22: de nas yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:271a-23: phyag na rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:271a-24: yang gi sgra ni rgyud phyi ma la ltos pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:271a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2510.2E:271a-26: rigs ni ji skad du bshad pa'i rigs rnams so //
T02TD2510.2E:271a-27: yo byad ni dkyil 'khor chen por bstan pa'i mchod pa la sogs pa de dag sgrub par byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:271a-28: de'i cho ga rgyas pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:271a-29: 'di gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:271a-30: de la zhes bya ba'i sgra ni ngag nye bar dgod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:271b-0: 'di @271b zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i blo la gnas pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:271b-1: dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i mchod pa la sogs pa'i yo byad do //
T02TD2510.2E:271b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs te /
T02TD2510.2E:271b-3: de dag gi yo byad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:271b-4: cho ga thams cad rgyas par gyur ba ni bstan pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:271b-5: de nas zhes bya ba ni dmigs kyis dgar ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:271b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs kyi snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:271b-9: rigs rnams kyi nang nas re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de'i rigs kyi snying po'i yo byad 'byung ba yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:271b-10: dkyil 'khor chen po mthong nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po sngar bshad pa'i cho ga mthong nas bdug pa dan me tog dang /
T02TD2510.2E:271b-12: dri'i phyag rgya rnams kyis mchod par bya ste zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi gang las byung bas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:271b-13: rdo rje bzlas pas brtsam par bya'o zhes shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:271b-14: ji ltar 'dug ste zhas bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zlos pa pos byang chub kyi snying po la sogs par 'dug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:271b-15: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni kun dga' rab la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:271b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyud las bshad pas so //
T02TD2510.2E:271b-18: de la ji skad bstan pa'i gnas su gnas pa ni ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:271b-19: dus ji tsam zhig tu gnas she na /
T02TD2510.2E:271b-20: zla ba bzhir zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:271b-21: zla ba bzhir gnas ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug cing /
T02TD2510.2E:271b-23: dus bzhir bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa bya'o zhes bya ba ni snga dro dang /
T02TD2510.2E:271b-26: mtshan phyed kyi dus su bdug pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzhis bdag nyid dang /
T02TD2510.2E:271b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:271b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa phyis 'chad par 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod par bya'o//
T02TD2510.2E:272a-0: @272a * // rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i zlos pa pos ni sngar bshad pa'i /
T02TD2510.2E:272a-1: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02TD2510.2E:272a-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:272a-3: phyag bzhis phyag bya ba'i tshul gyis phyag byas la lus 'bul ba'i mchod pa yang bya'o zhes bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:272a-4: de ltar phyag rnam pa bzhi byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:272a-5: bzlas pa'i phreng ba blangs te 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang bral bas ji lta ba bzhin du bzlas na myur du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2510.2E:272a-6: de nas sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:272a-7: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu drug ni 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad do //
T02TD2510.2E:272a-8: kha zas kun dang zhes bya ba ni nya sha dang /
T02TD2510.2E:272a-13: log srid kyi lha bshos dang /
T02TD2510.2E:272a-14: dkon mchog gsum gyi bshos gtsang spangs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:272a-15: kha na ma tho ba med pa ni bza' ba thams cad do //
T02TD2510.2E:272a-16: de bzhin du 'dod pa kun la nye bar sbyong kyang gang la yong kha na ma tho ba'i nyes par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:272a-17: rang gi lha nas brtsams nas sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:272a-18: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa bcu drug gis mchod la bsgom pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:272a-19: kun la nye bar longs spyod cing ngo //
T02TD2510.2E:272a-20: snying po'i don du zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:272a-21: badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i snying po'i don 'di la lhag par mos pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:272a-22: bdag nyid dang sangs rgyas kyi mdun du tshig tsam gyis kyang bsgoms la zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid dam rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa de mdun du bsgoms pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:272a-23: rang nyid de bzhin gshegs par bsgoms nas bzlas na myur bar dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:272a-24: gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sems rtse gcig par mi nus pa de ni tshig tsam gyis kyang bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs par bsgoms pa'am mdun du byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:272a-25: ci dgar byed cing zhes bya ba ni stan mi 'dra ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:272a-29: sgregs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:272a-30: nyes par mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:272b-0: rdo rje'i tshig gis len @272b brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:272b-1: myur du dngos grub tu 'gyur zhes bya ba ni brgya rtsa brgyad ni brgya las brgyad lhag pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:272b-3: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas nas ;
T02TD2510.2E:272b-4: de bzhin du bdug pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnam pa bzhis bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:272b-5: gzhal yas khang dang gdan ji lta ba bzhin du sprul la /
T02TD2510.2E:272b-6: rang gi gdan la snga ma bzhin du phyag rgya chen pos 'dug ste /
T02TD2510.2E:272b-7: rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du yongs su brtags nas rnal 'byor gyi gnas la badzra dh'a tu zhes brjod cing sprul la /
T02TD2510.2E:272b-8: bsdu ba la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la phyi'i mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:272b-9: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i rnam pa brgyad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:272b-10: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dag cing bde ba ma la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa bcu drug gis yang dag par mchod la phyag bzhi byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:272b-11: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis chos gos 'dzin pa'i tshul can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje blangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:272b-12: lag pa g-yas pas bgrang phreng snying gar bzung nas bzlas pa'i don gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid du bsgoms nas brgya rtsa brgyad dam stong rtsa brgyad zlos shing de bzhin gshegs pa mdun du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:272b-13: cho ga 'di ni de'i gzugs brnyan la gus pas gsol ba 'debs par 'jug pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:272b-14: lta ba'am thun bzhi ru bzlas na ring po mi thogs zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:272b-15: lhag ma ni phyis 'chad par 'gyur bas shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:272b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:272b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams ni rang nyid kyi g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis dang po'i rdo rje blangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:272b-18: lag pa g-yas pas bgrang phreng bgrang zhing bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:272b-20: 'di ltar de'i rnal 'byor pas sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhis bdag nyid mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:272b-21: de ltar zla ba bzhi bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:273a-0: mtshan thog thag bsgrubs na de'i rjes la las kyi dngos grub 'grub bar @273a * //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-2: de la de'i las ni 'di yin te //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-3: sangs rgyas rjes su dran 'grub na //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-4: sangs rgyas nyid du myur du 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-5: sems dpa'i rdo rje ma grub na //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-6: phyag rgya kun gyi bdag por 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-7: rdo rje rin chen ma'i phyag rgyas //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-8: de'i ni rdo rje kun dbang 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-9: chos kyi rdo rje ma grub na //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-11: las kyi rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-12: rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-13: sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings pa yis //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-15: rdo rje 'dren pa'i cho ga yis //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-17: rdo rje 'dod pa'i phyag rgya yis //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-18: sangs rgyas thams cad rjes mnyes byed //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-19: rdo rje legs pa'i cho ga yis //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-20: sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-21: rin chen phyag rgya'i cho ga yis //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-22: sangs rgyas dbang bskur sbyin par byed //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-23: rdo rje gzi brjid cho ga yis //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-24: rdo rje gzi brjid myur du 'grub //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-25: rdo rje dpal 'dzin bsten pas na //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-26: re ba rnams ni yongs su skong //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-27: rdo rje bzhad pa'i cho ga yis //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-28: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par bzhad //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-29: rdo rje chos kyi cho ga yis //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-31: rdo rje rnon po'i cho ga yis //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-32: sangs rgyas kun gyi shes rab mchog / rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin bsten nas //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-33: chos kyi khor lo bskor bar 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-34: rdo rje gsungs pa'i cho ga yis //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-35: sangs rgyas gsung gi dngos grub thob //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-36: rdo rje las mchog bsgrubs pas na //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-37: rdo rje'i las su myur du 'grub //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-38: rdo rje go cha bskon pas na //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-39: rdo rje sku ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-40: rdo rje gnod sbyin bsgrubs pas na //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-41: rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-42: rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas na //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-44: rdo rje 'dzin ma bsgrubs pas na//
T02TD2510.2E:273a-45: rdo rje chen mo'i dga' ba thob //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-46: rdo rje phreng ba bcings pas na //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-47: sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-48: rdo rje glu yi cho ga yis //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-49: rdo rje glu ni len par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-50: rdo rje gar ni spyar ba yis //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-51: sangs rgyas kun gyis de mchod do //
T02TD2510.2E:273a-52: rdo rje bdug pa'i cho ga yis //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-0: 'gro ba thams cad @273b tshim par byed //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-1: rdo rje me tog sbyor byed pas //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-2: des ni 'gro ba dbang du byed //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-3: rdo rje snang ba phyag rgya ches //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-4: rab mchog mig ni sbyin par byed //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-5: rdo rje dri yi cho ga yis //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-6: sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-7: rdo rje lcags kyus drangs pas na //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-9: rdo rje zhags pa'i cho ga yis //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-11: rdo rje lcags sgrog sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-13: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i cho ga yis //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-15: slar yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i las kyi khyad par du 'gyur ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:273b-16: lan cig bzlas na bdag nyid bsrung bar 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-17: lan gnyis bzlas pas gzhan bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-18: lan gsum bzlas pas 'gro ba thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-19: lan bzhi bzlas pas grong khyer bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-20: lan lnga bzlas pas rgyal srid bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-21: lan drug bzlas pas gling bzhir bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-22: lan bdun bzlas pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi mthar thug pa'i sems can srung bar byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-23: thog mar brjod pa'i bsrung ba'i rig pa ni //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-24: gro ga la rig pa'i yi ge bris nas /
T02TD2510.2E:273b-25: badzra satva phat ces lan gnyis brjod pas rig pa gcad par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:273b-27: srung skud blangs la rig pas bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-28: aom badzra satva zhes lan gsum brjod pa'i rig pas rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-29: lan bzhi brjod pas ga phur dang /
T02TD2510.2E:273b-31: aa ka ru rnams kyi bdug pa phul nas /
T02TD2510.2E:273b-32: mgo la me tog gi phreng ba btags te /
T02TD2510.2E:273b-33: dpral bar tsandan gyis thig le byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:273b-34: chos thams cad rmi lam dang mtshungs pa'i bden pa 'dis rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la rmi lam ston cig ces byas na /
T02TD2510.2E:273b-36: mi dge ba'i rmi lam thams cad ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:273b-37: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po shes par 'dod na /
T02TD2510.2E:274a-1: 'das thang cig bsgoms la snying po lan lnga bzlas na mtshan ma dgos pa ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-2: stong phrag brgya bzlas na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-3: yar ngo'i tshes brgyad la dkyil 'khor bris te /
T02TD2510.2E:274a-4: zhag gsum smyung ba byas ba'am ;
T02TD2510.2E:274a-5: 'o ma dang bu ram zos nas der zhugs te /
T02TD2510.2E:274a-6: stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-7: de nas bsam gtan de the tshom med par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-8: nad pa'i steng du yi ge ba las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dkar po rnam par bsams na dug zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-9: lte ba'i steng du yi ge dza las rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ser po bsams bas dug rengs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-10: rin po che'i rgya gram gyi steng du rin po che dmar ser gyi dkyil 'khor dang yi ge dza ser po bsams pas gzhan gyi dug the tshom med par rengs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-13: / yi ge ba las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dkar po bsams na mkhris pa'i rims sel bar byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-14: tsha ba'i rims sel bar byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-15: khar bsgoms na mngag gzhug byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-16: rin po che thams cad kyi steng du bsgoms na mngag gzhug byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-17: yan lag nyams pa la bsgoms na yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-18: me'i steng du bsgoms na me'i tsha ba zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-19: zhi ba'i las thams cad sgrub par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-20: yi ge dzas rgyas pa'i las thams cad skyed par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-21: dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dbral ba'i phyogs su bsams na don chen po bya bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-22: me lha'i steng du bsgoms na nor bu'i phung po skyed par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-23: bdag gi lus la bsgoms na rgyas pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-24: yi ge las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar po bsams na 'bebs par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-25: sna tshogs rdo rje bsams na sdud par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-26: skyes pa dang bud med kyi snying gar padma dmar po'i steng du padma bsgoms na dbang du byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-27: lha'i snying po gang dang gang bsams pa de dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:274a-28: gdong la bsams na chags shing skal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-0: las thams cad byed @274b bas yi ge sa las dkyil 'khor las thams cad dang rjes su mthun par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-1: nad pa'i snying gar bsams na srung bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-2: bsams pa shes pa'i cho gas bsgrub par bya ba'i yid kyi las thams cad sgrub par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-3: yi ge tas mnyes par byed do ;
T02TD2510.2E:274b-4: / rdo rje dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgrubs na srung bar byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-5: dbyig par byas nas bsgoms na snun par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-6: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ljang gur bsgoms na srung bar byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-7: thal mo'i sgras dug gis brgyal ba las sad par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-8: yi ge ta kha dog lnga pa rtag tu bsgoms na las thams cad byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-9: yi ge bas 'ching bar byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-10: yi ge dzas 'gugs par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-11: yi ge mas 'bebs par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-12: yi ge tas snun par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-13: de thams cad tshar gcod par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-14: gdug pa thams cad yi ge aa'i lcags kyus 'gugs par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-15: rdo rje bsgoms na gsal bar byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-16: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis ni mgu bar byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-17: las kyi dkyil 'khor gyis ni sdud par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-18: yi ge aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams na dug zhi bar byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-19: badzra satva aa: zhes bya bas rtog pa thams cad kyi bye brag las sbyor ba dang las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-20: de ltar bzlas ba'i cha gas bsgrub pa bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:274b-21: da ni ras ris bsgrub pa'i bla na med pa'i dngos grub ni /
T02TD2510.2E:274b-22: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:274b-23: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:274b-24: zla ba bzhi'i bar du sngar bshad pa bzhin du bsnyen pa byas pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-25: de'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i bla na med pa'i dngos grub ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2510.2E:274b-26: de 'dod pa ni gal te rnal 'byor pa 'dod na ji skad bshad ba'i ras la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas don yod par grub pa'i bar bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:275a-0: de'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs dang ji ltar 'dod pa'i kha dog dang rgyan dang rdo rje sems dpa' la @275a * //
T02TD2510.2E:275a-1: sogs pa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
T02TD2510.2E:275a-2: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnam pa brgyad bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:275a-4: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis sngon du bsnyen pa zla ba bzhi byas la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor ba'am /
T02TD2510.2E:275a-5: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:275a-6: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas rang gi lhar bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:275a-7: de'i rjes la ras ma nyams pa la /
T02TD2510.2E:275a-8: de bzhin gshags pa zlos shing srog chags kyi yan lag rnams bsal nas /
T02TD2510.2E:275a-9: rdo rje'i thig zlum por btab pa'i dbus kyi zur bzhi'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dkar po zangs ma ga bur dang bsres la bsnyen gnas dang ldan pa dam tshig shes pa'i ri mo mkhan gyis badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:275a-10: de'i 'og gi cha la mi bskyod pa'i gnas su rdo rje sems dpa'/
T02TD2510.2E:275a-11: g-yas logs su rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rdo rje rin chen /
T02TD2510.2E:275a-12: steng du 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su rdo rje chos /
T02TD2510.2E:275a-13: g-yas phyogs su don yod grub pa'i gnas su rdo rje las /
T02TD2510.2E:275a-14: mtshams kyi cha rnams su sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha mo brgyad rang gi snying po bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:275a-15: rnam par snang mdzad kyi ras ris kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:275a-16: ras de nyid kyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa bris ba'i tshe mi bskyod pa'i gnas su rdo rje sems dpa' //
T02TD2510.2E:275a-17: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rdo rje rgyal po /
T02TD2510.2E:275a-18: do nyod grub pa'i gnas su rdo rje chags pa /
T02TD2510.2E:275a-19: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su rdo rje legs pa /
T02TD2510.2E:275a-20: mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyang snga ma bzhin du bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:275a-21: dbus su bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan 'dri ba'i tshe mi bskyod pa'i gnas su rdo rje rin chen /
T02TD2510.2E:275a-22: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas gzi brjid /
T02TD2510.2E:275a-23: don yod grub pa'i gnas su dpal /
T02TD2510.2E:275a-24: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su rdo rje bzhad pa bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:275a-25: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2510.2E:275a-26: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ras ris kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:275a-27: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa dbus su bri ba de'i tshe mi bskyod pa'i gnas su rdo rje chos /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-0: @275b rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rdo rje rnon po //
T02TD2510.2E:275b-1: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su rdo rje rgyu /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-2: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su rdo rje gsung ba bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-3: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-4: 'od dpag tu med pa'i ras ris kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:275b-5: dbus su bcom lnga 'das don yod grub pa 'bri ba de'i tshe mi bskyod pa'i gnas su rdo rje las /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-6: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rdo rje bsrung ba /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-7: don yod grub pa'i gnas su rdo rje gnod sbyin /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-8: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su rdo rje khu tshur rang gi snying pos bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-9: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-10: don yod par grub pa'i ras ris kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:275b-11: ras gang la ri mo 'dri ba de'i tshe 'bru dang /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-13: sman thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba'i bum pa gcig dang /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-14: zur bzhir bum pa bzhi gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:275b-15: de'i steng du bla re bres pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-16: de'i 'og tu gdugs dkar po la gtsug tor dkar mo bzlas pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-17: de nas rtsi mar gyi mar ser dang /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-18: spos kyi snod rnam pa bzhi bzhag nas rgyun mi 'chad par dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:275b-19: de nas tsandan dkar po'i chu yis mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-20: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi sbyor ba byas pa'i ras ris de la bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:275b-21: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rdo rje snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-22: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i snying pos de rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:275b-23: rdo rje dbyings kyi khang bu brtsegs pa de'i steng du gdugs dkar po bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:275b-24: de ltar ras la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bzhin du bris nas /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-25: de nas ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-26: 'dzab kyi tshul ji lta ba bzhin du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:275b-27: snga ma bzhin du rang la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-28: khang bu brtsegs pa'i gnas de rdzogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-29: ras la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po sprul la /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-30: bsdu ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:275b-31: phyi'i mchod pa rnam pa lnga la sogs pa'i mchod pa rgya che ba'i khyad par rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2510.2E:276a-1: la sogs pa mchod pa brgyad kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2510.2E:276a-2: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu drug gis yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2510.2E:276a-4: sngar bshad pa'i bzlas ba bzhir thun bzhi'i sbyor bas bzlas te /
T02TD2510.2E:276a-5: mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:276a-6: de nas nam langs pa dang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa'am /
T02TD2510.2E:276a-7: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub rnams ji ltar bri ba bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:276a-8: de ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:276a-9: da ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dngos grub ni de nas phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:276a-10: de la phyag rgya ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rig pa brjod pa rnams so //
T02TD2510.2E:276a-11: de la bsgrub par 'dod pa ni thog mar snga ma bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:276a-12: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i gzungs zlos shing snga ma bzhin du zla ba bzhi bsnyen pa byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:276a-13: ras la de bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:276a-14: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:276a-15: rdo rje sems dpa' bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:276a-16: thun bzhi'i sbyor bas stong phrag brgya bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:276a-17: de nas mtshan thog thag rdo rje sems dpa' bcings shing bzlas la /
T02TD2510.2E:276a-18: skyon phyag rgya bar bar du dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:276a-19: de nas phyag rgya bcings na 'bar ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi rtags 'byung ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:276a-20: de nas phyag rgya bcings bzhin du //
T02TD2510.2E:276a-21: zhes bya ba 'bras bu gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:276a-22: de ltar gzungs kyi dngos grub bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:276a-23: chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub ni /
T02TD2510.2E:276a-24: de nas ting nge 'dzin bsgrub par 'dod na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:276a-25: de nas bya ba'i sgra ni skabs su babs pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:276a-26: chos kyi dkyil 'khor la dngos grub kyi gnas skabs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:276b-0: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs @276b pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ni ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2510.2E:276b-1: ting nge 'dzin de yang rnam pa sum cu rtsa bdun no //
T02TD2510.2E:276b-2: de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gang la dga' ba zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:276b-3: gal te dga' zhig de bsgrub par 'dod na rdo rje phra mo nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:276b-4: rdo rje phra mo bsgom par bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang la dga' ba de la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:276b-5: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa gang bsgom par 'dod pas snying po rnal 'byor goms par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:276b-6: snga ma bzhin du bzlas pa'i sbyor bas nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i rang gi snying po brjod cing rab tu sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:276b-7: bdag nyid dam mdun du rang gi lha'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:276b-8: zla ba bzhir bsnyen pa byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:276b-9: de nas snga ma bzhin du ras la bris te /
T02TD2510.2E:276b-10: cho ga thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su spyad la /
