T02TD2510.2E:276b-11: ras ris kyi mdun du zla ba bzhir rang gi ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:276b-12: de nas mthar mtshan thog thag bsgoms na /
T02TD2510.2E:276b-13: tho rangs bka' dam tshig gi ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:276b-14: de ltar chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:276b-15: da ni las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'o /
T02TD2510.2E:276b-16: de nas las bsgrub par 'dod na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:276b-17: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa rnams bsgrub pa ni las bsgrub par 'dod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:276b-18: de bzhin du bzlas shing zla ba gcig gi bar du bsgrubs na zhes bya ba ni las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rig pa rnams kyi phyir rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:276b-19: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:276b-20: thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba bzhir snga ma bzhin du bzlas pa byas nas bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:276b-21: de nas snga ma bzhin du ras la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:276b-22: ras ris kyi rang gi rig pa'i mdun du stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:276b-23: zla ba'i mthar mtshan thog thag bzlas pa byas na las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:276b-24: lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rang gi rig pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs la /
T02TD2510.2E:276b-25: lan cig bzlas pa byas nas bdag nyid la sogs pas bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:277a-0: @277a * // grong khyer rnams go cha bcings pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:277a-1: go cha bcings pa'i tshul gyis rang ngam gzhan bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:277a-8: dra ba rnams ni sogs pa byugs shing dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:277a-9: khyad par ji lta bu dbab par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:277a-10: tsandan dri zhim pas zhes bya bas tsandan ni dkar po'am shri khanda ni tsandan dri zhim pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:277a-11: des byugs nas rang gi rig pa mngon par bzlas la /
T02TD2510.2E:277a-12: rig pa'i lha'i gzugs su brtags la /
T02TD2510.2E:277a-13: rdo rje la sogs pa byugs shing dbab par bya'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:277a-14: / khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:277a-15: gzung du yod pa dang gzung du med pa'i rdo rje dang lcags kyu la sogs pa zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2510.2E:277a-16: gzung du yod pa ni lag pas gzung du yod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:277a-17: gzung du med pa ni yid kyis dmigs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:277a-18: lan cig brjod pas zhes bya ba ni rang gi rig pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:277a-19: sgyu ma'i las kyang byed de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du rig pa bzlas na /
T02TD2510.2E:277a-20: rma bya'i mjug sgro'i nang du rdo rje rtse lnga pa bcug ste bcings nas /
T02TD2510.2E:277a-21: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgyas mnan la /
T02TD2510.2E:277a-22: ras ris kyi mdun du bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:277a-23: ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs la rig pa bzlas te /
T02TD2510.2E:277a-24: ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya 'bebs par 'gyur ba de srid kyi bar du bya'o /
T02TD2510.2E:277a-25: de nas mjug sgro 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:277a-26: de nas rma bya'i mjug ma bsgrub pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:277a-27: gzugs sna tshogs la snang bar 'gyur te zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:277a-29: de nas dbang du byed par 'dod na zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du rang gi rig pa bsgrubs na /
T02TD2510.2E:277a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rang gi rig pa'i thams cad dbang du byed par 'dod na /
T02TD2510.2E:277a-31: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje sems ma bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:277a-32: ji lta ba bzhin du rig pa zlos shing bsgrubs na ji srid du sems dpa' rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur ba de srid kyi bar du'o //
T02TD2510.2E:277a-33: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa la dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:277b-0: ci ste 'jig rten dang @277b 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub 'grub par 'dod na yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.2E:277b-1: snga ma bzhin du rig pa zlos shing bsgrubs na phyis rang gi rig pa'i ras ris kyi mdun du thun bzhir zla ba gcig stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:277b-2: de nas mthar rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:277b-3: mthar mtshan thog thag bzlas pa byas pas rdo rje 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:277b-4: de phyin chang ces bya ba ni de brtson na phyag rgya 'ching ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs te /
T02TD2510.2E:277b-5: rig pa brjod na 'jig rten gyi dngos grub kyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub gang yang rung ba cig 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:277b-6: de la 'jig rten gyi dngos grub ni rkang mgyogs te /
T02TD2510.2E:277b-7: mi snang ba dang nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:277b-12: sa'i dbang phyug nyid la sogs pa'i gzugs so ;
T02TD2510.2E:277b-13: / rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub ni rdo rje dang /
T02TD2510.2E:277b-16: las 'dzin pa dang tha dad pa de lta bur gyur pa'i dngos grub ni de'i nang nas /
T02TD2510.2E:277b-17: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa gang yang rung ba cig 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:277b-18: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas pa bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:277b-19: da ni rdo rje rigs kyi de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:277b-20: de nas zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2510.2E:277b-21: de la zhes bya ba ni ngag nye bar dgod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:277b-22: dang po ni thog ma nyid du'o //
T02TD2510.2E:277b-23: bsnyen pa bya ba ni ji ltar zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:277b-24: de ltar zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:277b-25: ji ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i bzlas pa'i cho ga mthong ba de bzhin du 'dir yang shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:277b-26: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni langs pa'am 'dug pa'i yi ge 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:277b-27: de nas phyag rgya bcings pa de med kyang mtshan thog thag bzlas nas de phyin chad sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang chad pas bcad nus par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:277b-29: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:278a-0: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams @278a * //
T02TD2510.2E:278a-2: bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du mdun du bzhugs su gsol la /
T02TD2510.2E:278a-3: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la phyag bzhi bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:278a-4: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis khro bo'i rdo rje blangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:278a-5: lag pa g-yas pas bzlas pa'i phreng ba rang nyid kyi snying gar bzung nas /
T02TD2510.2E:278a-6: bzlas pa'i don gyi bdag nyid dam mdun du bcom ldan 'das bsgoms te khri bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:278a-7: nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor ba yi ge 'bum gyi bzlas pa rdzogs kyi bar du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:278a-8: de nas mtshan thog thag bzlas te /
T02TD2510.2E:278a-9: de phyin chad h'um zhes bya bas ri bo yang 'gegs par byed do ;
T02TD2510.2E:278a-10: / chu bo yang skems par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:278a-11: brdeg cing 'bar bar byed pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:278a-12: bya rnams kyang lhung bar byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:278a-13: bsdams pas gsod par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:278a-14: sor mos sprin rnams 'jig par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:278a-16: klu rnams rengs par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:278a-17: skyes pa dang bud med rnams rengs par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:278a-18: byis pa rnams rengs par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:278a-19: thog 'phen pa zlog par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:278a-21: sdigs mdzub tsam gyis 'gro ba rengs pa dang glang po che gsod par byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:278a-22: dug gis brgyal ba las slong bar byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:278a-23: de lta bu la sogs pas sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:278a-25: 'on te bsgrub par 'dod na yang zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2510.2E:278a-26: 'jig rten gsum gyi dngos grub gal te bsgrub par 'dod na sngar bshad pa'i cho gas yi ge 'bru 'bum rnal 'byor pas bzlas la /
T02TD2510.2E:278a-27: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa rang gi khro bo'i sngags ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas ras la ri mo bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:278a-29: spu dang srog chags kyi yan lag rnams ras bal la rnam par bsal te /
T02TD2510.2E:278a-30: ras la rdo rje ri mo gru bzhir bris nas bsnyen gnas dang ldan pa'i ri mo mkhan gyis dkyil 'khor du zhugs pas /
T02TD2510.2E:278a-31: tshon gzhan dang ma 'dres par snod rangs par bzhag la yi ge 'bum bzlas te /
T02TD2510.2E:278a-32: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad ras kyi dbus su bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:278a-33: mi bskyod pa'i gnas su khro bo rdo rje sems dpa'/
T02TD2510.2E:278a-34: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su khro bo rgyal po /
T02TD2510.2E:278a-35: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su khro bo rdo rje legs /
T02TD2510.2E:278b-0: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas @278b su khro bo rdo rje chags pa /
T02TD2510.2E:278b-1: mtshams rnams su sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:278b-2: dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:278b-3: ras kyi dbus su rin chen h'um mdzad bri ba de'i tshe mi bskyod pa'i gnas su khro bo rdo rje /
T02TD2510.2E:278b-4: khro gnyer rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su khro bo rdo rje nyi ma /
T02TD2510.2E:278b-5: don yod grub pa'i gnas su khro bo rdo rje dpal /
T02TD2510.2E:278b-6: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su khro bo rdo rje bzhad pa bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:278b-7: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2510.2E:278b-8: rin chen h'um mdzad kyi ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:278b-9: dbus su chos kyi h'um mdzad 'dri ba'i tshe mi bskyod pa'i gnas su khro bo rdo rje chos /
T02TD2510.2E:278b-10: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su khro bo rdo rje rnon po /
T02TD2510.2E:278b-11: don yod grub pa'i gnas su khro bo rdo rje rgyu /
T02TD2510.2E:278b-12: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su khro bo rdo rje gsungs la /
T02TD2510.2E:278b-13: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2510.2E:278b-14: chos kyi h'um mdzad kyi ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:278b-15: las kyi h'um mdzad kyi dbus su chos kyi h'um mdzad 'dri ba de'i tshe mchod pa'i mthar thug pa'i cho gas mi bskyod pa'i gnas su khro bo rdo rje las /
T02TD2510.2E:278b-16: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su khro bo rdo rje bsrung ba /
T02TD2510.2E:278b-17: don yod grub pa'i gnas su khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin /
T02TD2510.2E:278b-18: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su khro bo rdo rje khu tshur /
T02TD2510.2E:278b-19: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:278b-20: las kyi h'um mdzad kyi ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:278b-21: de la rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rigs pas sam /
T02TD2510.2E:278b-22: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sngags kyis ras la bris la las rnams kyi cho ga lhag ma yang gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:278b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ras la bris pa'i cho ga ltar ni ma smos su zin yang snga ma bzhin du gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:278b-24: de ltar mchod pa byas nas zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du ras la bris la rang byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa'i chog byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:278b-25: snga ma bzhin du khang bu brtsegs pa gdan dang bcas pa sprul la /
T02TD2510.2E:278b-26: phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa rnams kyis rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa bskyed la /
T02TD2510.2E:279a-0: de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i snying pos h'um gis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs @279a * //
T02TD2510.2E:279a-1: pa rang gi gnas su bzhugs su gsol ba la bsdu ba la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:279a-2: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod nas /
T02TD2510.2E:279a-3: sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:279a-4: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya rnam pa bcu drug gis mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:279a-5: de bzhin du mchod pa byas nas zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin par shes par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:279a-6: zla ba gcig 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:279a-7: sgeg mo la sogs pas mchod pa rnam pa brgyad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:279a-8: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu drug bsgom pa ni 'dod pa kun la longs spyod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:279a-9: ci dga' ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2510.2E:279a-10: brgya stong du ma bzlas pa zhes bya ba stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:279a-11: stong rtsa brgyad pa de ni brgya stong du bzlas so //
T02TD2510.2E:279a-12: dus bzhir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2510.2E:279a-13: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:279a-14: mchod pa'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:279a-16: nyin re zhing thun bzhi ru stong bzlas shing zla ba gcig gi mthar thug pa de srid kyi bar du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:279a-17: de mthar zla ba nya la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:279a-18: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:279a-19: ji srid du rang gi khro bo'i sngags zlos shing phyag rgya bcings pa de la h'um zhes bya ba'i sgra byung gi bar du bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:279a-21: de ltar 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:279a-22: da ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho ga dngos grub pa'i yo byad kyi cho ga ni /
T02TD2510.2E:279a-23: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:279a-24: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni skabs su bab pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:279a-25: phyag rgya ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i gzungs rnams so //
T02TD2510.2E:279a-26: de bsgrub pa ni phyag rgya bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:279a-27: de la gal te 'ga' zhig bzlas pa'i phyag rgya rnams bsgrub par 'dod na yang de nas des ji lta ba bzhin du bzlas pa byas la zhes bya ba ni de bzlas pa'i cho gas /
T02TD2510.2E:279a-28: rang gi gzungs kyi rig pa'i yi ge 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:279b-0: @279b de nas rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pas gzungs kyi rig pa'i ras kyi mdun du snga ma bzhin du stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la thun bzhi'i sbyor ba byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:279b-1: ji srid du zla ba gcig gi mthar thug pa'i bar du byas la mthar zla ba nya la /
T02TD2510.2E:279b-2: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:279b-3: gzungs kyi rig pa mtshan thog thag bzlas na de lta bu des phyag rgya byas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:279b-4: de nas gzungs thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:279b-5: de ltar rdo rje rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:279b-6: da ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:279b-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:279b-8: de nas zhes bya ba la gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:279b-9: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:279b-10: sngon du bsnyen pa nyid kyi rjes thogs la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:279b-11: rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nas brtsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:279b-12: bsgom zhing zhes bya ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad nas brtsams nas ji srid du rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i khro bo rnams kyi nang nas /
T02TD2510.2E:279b-13: khro bo gang yang rung ba mngon par 'dod pa de ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:279b-15: de bzhin du bzlas pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:279b-16: snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:279b-17: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:279b-18: phyis chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i chos kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:279b-19: de'i rjes la g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:279b-20: lag pa g-yas pas bzlas pa'i phreng ba bzung nas snga ma bzhin du chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi rig pa'i yi ge 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:279b-21: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du ras la bris te /
T02TD2510.2E:279b-22: zla ba gcig thun bzhi'i sbyor bas rang gi ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:279b-23: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:279b-24: de nas zla ba nya la ting nge 'dzin nyid kyis mtshan thog thag bzlas pa byas na mngon par shes pa lnga skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:279b-25: de ltar chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad kyi cho ga bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:280a-1: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i yo byad kyi cho ga ni /
T02TD2510.2E:280a-2: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:280a-3: snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:280a-4: snga ma bzhin du bsdu ba la sogs pa phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:280a-5: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis khro bo'i rdo rje blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:280a-6: lag pa g-yas pas snga ma bzhin du bzlas pa'i phreng ba bzung la sngar bshad pa'i cho ga las bshad pa'i yi ge 'bum bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:280a-7: de nas sngar bshad pa'i ras ris kyi mdun du rdo rje'i tshig gis rang gi rig pa stong rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:280a-8: nyin re bzhin du thun bzhi sbyor ba byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:280a-9: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas pa byas nas las thams cad la rig pa'i yi ge lan cig brjod pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:280a-10: de ltar rdo rje rigs kyi yo byad kyi rgyud bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:280a-11: da ni padma'i rigs kyi yo byad ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:280a-12: de nas dang po 'bum bzlas pa byas nas zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:280a-13: bsdu ba la sogs pa'i phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:280a-14: g-yon pa'i padma'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje padma blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:280a-15: lag pa g-yas pas bzlas pa'i phreng pa bzung nas /
T02TD2510.2E:280a-16: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:280a-17: de nas padma'i dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa'i thig btab la /
T02TD2510.2E:280a-18: ras kyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba /
T02TD2510.2E:280a-19: mi bskyod pa'i gnas su sangs rgyas padma /
T02TD2510.2E:280a-20: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su padma'i rgyal po /
T02TD2510.2E:280a-21: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su padma'i chags pa /
T02TD2510.2E:280a-22: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su padma'i legs pa /
T02TD2510.2E:280a-23: mtshams kyi char padma'i sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa'i lha mo rnam pa brgyad sngar bshad pa'i cho gas bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:280a-24: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:280b-0: ras kyi dbus su thur tshugs sangs rgyas bri ba de nyid kyi tshe mi bskyod pa'i @280b gnas su padma'i khro gnyer /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-1: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su padma'i nyi ma /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-2: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su padma'i dpal /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-3: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su padma'i bzhad pa /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-4: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-5: ting nge 'dzin gtsug phud sangs rgyas kyi ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:280b-6: ting nge 'dzin padma'i dbus su 'dri ba'i tshe mi bskyod pa'i gnas su padma sgrol ma /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-7: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su padma rnon po /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-8: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su padma rgyu /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-9: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su padma'i gzungs bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-10: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin du byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-11: ting nge 'dzin padma'i ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:280b-12: dbus su bcom ldan 'das padma nges pa'i dbang phyug 'dri ba'i tshe mi bskyod pa'i gnas su padma gar gyi dbang phyug rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su padma bsrung ba /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-13: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su padma gnod sbyin /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-14: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su padma'i khu tshur bris la lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-15: padma nges pa'i dbang phyug gi ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:280b-16: de ltar ras la bris nas snga ma bzhin du rang la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-17: bsdu ba la sogs pa cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-18: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-19: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa brgyad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-20: padma'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu drug gis ras ris kyi bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la yang dag par mchod la phyag bzhi byas te /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-21: zla ba gcig nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:280b-22: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:280b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba byon nas ci 'dod pa'i mchog gi skabs 'byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:280b-24: de ltar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i yo byad kyi cho ga bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-25: da ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i yo byad kyi cho ga ni /
T02TD2510.2E:280b-26: ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang //
T02TD2510.2E:280b-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:280b-28: snga ma bzhin 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:281a-0: @281a * // phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:281a-1: g-yon pa'i padma'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje padma blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:281a-2: g-yas pas bgrang phreng snying gar bzung nas /
T02TD2510.2E:281a-3: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rig pa 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:281a-4: de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i ras ris la phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:281a-5: rdo rje chos ma bcings te rig pa stong rtsa brgyad du brjod cing nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig snga ma bzhin du bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:281a-6: de nas zla ba nya la mthar mtshan thog thag chos kyi rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:281a-7: bzlas pa byas la nam langs pa na phyag rgya'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:281a-8: de nas phyag rgya bcings la ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba 'dul bar byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:281a-9: de ltar 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i yo byad kyi cho ga bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:281a-10: da ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod na yang zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:281a-11: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i rang gi lha'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:281a-12: g-yon pa'i padma'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje padma blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:281a-13: lag pa g-yas pas bgrang phreng bzung nas /
T02TD2510.2E:281a-14: snga ma bzhin du chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i sngags 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:281a-15: de nas ji skad bshad pa'i ras ris kyi mdun du chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:281a-16: nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i sngags zla ba gcig bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:281a-17: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas pa bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:281a-18: nam langs pa dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon du byed par 'gyur ro zhes rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:281a-19: de ltar chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i sngags dngos grub bsgrub pa'i yo byad kyi cho ga bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:281a-20: da ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:281a-21: ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na yang zhes bya ba gsungs so//
T02TD2510.2E:281b-0: @281b de bzhin du bzlas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
T02TD2510.2E:281b-1: snga ma bzhin du 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:281b-2: phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi rig pa sngar bshad pa'i cho ga stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:281b-3: de nas ras ris kyi mdun du chos kyi rdo rje ma bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:281b-4: thun bzhi'i sbyor bas sbyor bas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la zla ba gcig tu bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:281b-5: mthar mtshan thog thag bzlas la de'i rjes la nam langs pa na las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:281b-6: de ltar padma'i rigs kyi yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:281b-7: da ni nor bu'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:281b-8: de la dang po kho nar zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga bsdu ba la sogs pa'i rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:281b-9: g-yon pa'i rin po che'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje rin po che blangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:281b-10: lag pa g-yas pas bzlas pa'i bgrang phreng snying gar bzung ste /
T02TD2510.2E:281b-11: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i sngags snga ma bzhin du 'bu ma bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:281b-12: de nas rin po che zur bzhi pa'i thig btab la /
T02TD2510.2E:281b-13: ras ris kyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa /
T02TD2510.2E:281b-14: mi bskyod pa'i gnas su nor bu'i mtshan ma /
T02TD2510.2E:281b-15: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rin chen rgyal po /
T02TD2510.2E:281b-16: don yod grub pa'i gnas su rin chen chags pa /
T02TD2510.2E:281b-17: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su rin chen legs pa /
T02TD2510.2E:281b-18: mtshams kyi cha rnams su sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad sngar bshad pa'i cho gas bri bar bya'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:281b-19: / don thams cad grub pa'i ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:281b-20: ras kyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das rin chen lta ba bri ba de'i tshe mi bskyod pa'i gnas su rin chen phreng ba /
T02TD2510.2E:281b-21: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rin chen nyi ma /
T02TD2510.2E:281b-22: don yod grub pa'i gnas su rin chen dpal /
T02TD2510.2E:282a-1: med pa'i gnas su rin chen bzhad pa bris la lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:282a-2: rin chen lta ba'i ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:282a-3: bcom ldan 'das rin chen padma dbus su 'dri ba de'i tshe /
T02TD2510.2E:282a-4: mi bskyod pa'i gnas su gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po /
T02TD2510.2E:282a-5: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rin chen rnon po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:282a-6: don yod grub pa'i gnas su rin chen 'khor lo /
T02TD2510.2E:282a-7: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su nor bu gsung pa bris la /
T02TD2510.2E:282a-8: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin te rin chen padma'i ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:282a-9: dbus su bcom ldan 'das rin chen char 'bebs 'dri ba'i tshe mi bskyod pa'i gnas su nor bu mchod pa /
T02TD2510.2E:282a-10: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su nor bu bsrung ba /
T02TD2510.2E:282a-11: don yod grub pa'i gnas su nor bu gnod sbyin /
T02TD2510.2E:282a-12: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su nor bu khu tshur bris la lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD2510.2E:282a-13: rin chen char 'bebs kyi ras kyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2510.2E:282a-14: de ltar ras ris bris nas de nas bsdu ba la sogs pa'i cho ga byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:282a-15: ras ris bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:282a-16: rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:282a-17: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig ma bcu drug gis yang dag par mchod la phyag bzhi byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:282a-18: nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor gyis stong rtsa brgyad zla ba gcig bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:282a-19: de nas bzla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas la /
T02TD2510.2E:282a-20: nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po byon nas dbang bskur ba byin par mdzad do //
T02TD2510.2E:282a-21: dbang bskur ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der rig 'dzin gyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:282a-22: de ltar don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dngos grub kyi yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:282a-23: da ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:282a-24: ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang //
T02TD2510.2E:282a-26: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.2E:282b-0: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po @282b las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:282b-1: phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje rin po che blangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:282b-2: lag pa g-yas pas bzlas pa'i phreng ba snying gar bzung ste /
T02TD2510.2E:282b-3: nor bu'i rigs su bshad pa'i gzungs kyi rig pa snga ma bzhin du 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:282b-4: de nas bshad ma thag pa'i ras la bsdu ba la sogs pa'i cho ga byas la mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:282b-5: rin chen sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02TD2510.2E:282b-6: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu drug gi phyag rgya rnams kyis mchod la phyag bzhi bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:282b-7: de nas rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:282b-8: rang gi gzungs kyi rig pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas shing /
T02TD2510.2E:282b-9: nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig gi bar du bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:282b-10: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas pas de'i rjes la gang bsam pa thams cad kyi las byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:282b-11: de ltar nor bu'i rigs kyi gzungs bsgrub pa'i yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:282b-12: da ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni ;
T02TD2510.2E:282b-13: ci ste nor bu'i ye shes bsgrub par 'dod na yang //
T02TD2510.2E:282b-15: nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sngags kyi dngos grub ni nor bu ye shes so //
T02TD2510.2E:282b-16: gal te bsgrub par 'dod na yang sgrub pa po des de bzhin du rdo rje rin po che las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin ji lta bar rim bzhin du bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:282b-17: padma'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa po rnal 'byor pas snga ma bzhin du 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs ka'i rdo rje rin po che las 'byung ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:282b-18: ting nge 'dzin ni don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa'i nor bu rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs kyis go rims ji lta ba bzhin du pa ni yang nas yang du mngon du byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:282b-19: ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:282b-20: dngos po med pa'i nam mkha' las //
T02TD2510.2E:283a-1: ji ltar rin po che 'byung zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:283a-2: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las so //
T02TD2510.2E:283a-3: nam mkha' de yang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:283a-4: de bas na dngos po med pa'i nam mkha' rtog pa thams cad spangs pa las rin po che ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur /
T02TD2510.2E:283a-6: rnam par rtog pa las 'byung ba med par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:283a-7: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes de yang bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs shing /
T02TD2510.2E:283a-8: shin tu rnam par rtog pa med pa de'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:283a-9: rdo rje rin po che de las skyes pa don dam par yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan to //
T02TD2510.2E:283a-10: rin po che las byang chub sems dpa'i sku ji ltar 'byung zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:283a-11: gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir na rin po che'i rgyu las byung ba'i don thams cad grub pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sku ji ltar 'byung zhing skye ba yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:283a-12: mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:283a-13: rdo rje rin po che ni don dam par ma skyes shing de yang med pa'i phyir de'i rigs kyang don dam par ma skyes pa de'i phyir nor bu'i rigs rnams sgyu ma dang mtshungs par bsgom zhing bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:283a-14: ji lta ba'i rim pa bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don bshad pa ni 'di nyid kyis ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:283a-15: ting nge 'dzin 'di'i dus bzhir bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:283a-16: ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni phyag bzhi byas la stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to ;
T02TD2510.2E:283a-17: / gong du smos pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:283a-18: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:283a-19: stong phrag brgya bzlas pa byas pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02TD2510.2E:283a-20: mdun gyi ras ris la snga ma bzhin du zla ba gcig tsam bzlas pa byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:283a-21: de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:283a-22: de nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dbang bskur par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:283a-24: don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:283b-0: phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i @283b cho ga rjes su spyad de /
T02TD2510.2E:283b-1: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas /
T02TD2510.2E:283b-2: de'i sngags brjod cing 'di ltar bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:283b-3: dngos po med pa'i nam mkha' las rin po che ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur /
T02TD2510.2E:283b-4: rin po che las byang chub sems dpa'i sku ji ltar 'byung zhes de ltar bsgoms nas /
T02TD2510.2E:283b-5: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i sngags stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:283b-6: de nas ras ris kyi mdun du sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rang gi lha'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.2E:283b-7: nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:283b-8: de nas zla ba nya la mthar mtshan thog thag bzlas na nam langs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:283b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas /
T02TD2510.2E:283b-10: ci dga' ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so ;
T02TD2510.2E:283b-11: / de ltar nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:283b-12: da ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa ni de nas las kyi bsgrub pa bshad de zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:283b-13: de bzhin du bzlas la zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du nor bu'i rigs su bshad pa'i phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa kho na rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:283b-14: g-yon pa'i rin po che'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje rin po che blangs la /
T02TD2510.2E:283b-15: lag pa g-yas pas bzlas pa'i phreng ba snying gar bzung la /
T02TD2510.2E:283b-16: nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i rig pa 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:283b-17: de nas ras ris kyi mdun du phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:283b-18: thun bzhi'i sbyor bas nyin re zhing stong rtsa brgyad zla ba gcig bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:283b-20: zla ba nya la mthar mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:283b-21: de nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.2E:283b-22: de'i rjes la rig pa rnams lan cig brjod pas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:284a-1: gshegs pa la sogs pa rigs thams cad kyi yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:284a-2: da ni snying po thams cad bsgrub par 'dod na yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
T02TD2510.2E:284a-3: rigs thams cad kyi zlos pa pos zhes pa'i sgra brjod la /
T02TD2510.2E:284a-7: rig pa bzlas par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:284a-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du 'gyur ba'i yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:284a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs rnams kyi thun mong ni spyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:284a-10: yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni shis pa'i sgra la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2510.2E:284a-11: grub par gyur cig ces brjod la /
T02TD2510.2E:284a-12: snying po ci dgar zlos shing zhes bya ba ni snying po ni sems so //
T02TD2510.2E:284a-13: de ci dga' ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:284a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni yang snying po bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur cig ces brjod la /
T02TD2510.2E:284a-15: snying po ci dgar zlos shing bsgrub pa'i cho ga bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:284a-16: 'di skad du ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:284a-17: rigs su yang dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod na /
T02TD2510.2E:284a-18: phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:284a-19: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2510.2E:284a-20: byang chub sems dpa' nyid du gyur nas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i las kyi tshim zhing snying po 'dod pas da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:284a-21: de nas rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i sngags bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:284a-22: de ltar spyi'i snying po'i yo byad bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:284a-23: rigs thams cad kyi thun mong ba nyid kyi phyag rgya'i yo byad gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:284a-24: de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i yo byad cho ga ste zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:284a-26: snga ma bzhin du rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga dang /
T02TD2510.2E:284a-27: phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:284b-0: rang gi rigs kyi @284b gzungs kyi phyag rgya bcing ste 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:284b-1: phyag rgya thams cad bdag la dga' bar gyur cig ces smras la /
T02TD2510.2E:284b-2: de nas rang gi rigs kyi gzungs kyi rig pa bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:284b-3: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:284b-4: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i yo byad gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:284b-5: spros pa med pa'i tshig grub par gyur cig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:284b-6: rang gi rigs kyi de la spros pa ni rnam par rtog pa las byung bas na spros pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:284b-7: ngag gi rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa med ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:284b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par rtog par sems rtse gcig pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:284b-10: rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la ;
T02TD2510.2E:284b-11: snga ma bzhin du phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:284b-12: rang gi rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor la bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:284b-13: spros pa med pa'i tshig 'grub par gyur cig ces brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:284b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bdag la bskyed par gyur cig ces smras la /
T02TD2510.2E:284b-15: de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor las smras pa'i rang gi lha'i sngags sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:284b-16: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sngags kyi spyi'i yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:284b-17: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa la rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rigs gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:284b-18: de la 'di ni rig pa'i yo byad kyi cho ga ste zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:284b-19: de la ma rig pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid ni mngon par zhen pa des mdongs par 'gyur ba'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:284b-20: / kye ma zhes bya ba ni snying brtse ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:284b-21: khams gsum pa ni gnas pa'i sems can de dag blo la bzhag nas /
T02TD2510.2E:284b-22: kye ma sems can 'di dag ces bya ba smos so //
T02TD2510.2E:285a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang de yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis @285a * //
T02TD2510.2E:285a-1: 'od gsal ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:285a-2: de ni rigs pa thugs su chud cing sdom par gyur to zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:285a-3: de la rig pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i rang bzhin de las 'byung ba'i rig pas dkyil 'khor yang dag par thugs su chud cing mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:285a-4: de sngo par gyur pa ni mngon sum du byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:285a-5: de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:285a-6: snga ma bzhin du rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:285a-7: phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:285a-8: thugs rje chen po dang byams pa'i spyad kyis sems can gyi khams thams cad la gzigs nas /
T02TD2510.2E:285a-9: sems can mgon med pa 'di dag thams cad ma rig pas mdongs par gyur pa'i khams gsum zo chun gyi rgyun ma lta bur 'khor ba des ji lta ba bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba de bzhin du rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku'i lam gyi rig pa khong du chud cing sdom par 'gyur ba ma mthong ba rnams la bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa khong du chud cing sdom par gyur par bya'o zhes bsams nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:285a-10: sems can 'di dag thams cad ma rig pas mdongs par 'gyur pa la /
T02TD2510.2E:285a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa thugs su chud cing sdom par 'gyur ba la bya'o zhes smras la /
T02TD2510.2E:285a-12: de nas rang gi rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rang gi snying pos lha mo'i tshogs rnams sprul la /
T02TD2510.2E:285a-13: sems can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du bskyed la /
T02TD2510.2E:285a-14: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rig pa bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:285a-15: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:285a-18: rig pa thams cad kyi spyi'i yo byad kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:285a-19: da ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sgra brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:285b-0: @285b de'i don gyis bdag nyid rang gi lha'i skur bsgom pa'am mdun du bsgoms la snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:285b-3: rig pa bzlas par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:285b-4: de nas zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:285b-7: rig pa rnams kyi thun mong du rdo rje bzlas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:285b-8: rgyas par gsungs pa ni ci dga' ba nyid du zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:285b-9: sbrid pa dang skyigs bu dang sgregs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:285b-10: skyil krung tha dad ci dga' ba nyid du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:285b-11: sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:285b-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02TD2510.2E:285b-13: bzlas pa'i don du bsgrub par bya ba de ni bdag gam zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa de zlos shing /
T02TD2510.2E:285b-17: rig pa rnams rang nyid zlos shing /
T02TD2510.2E:285b-18: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.2E:285b-19: badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba'i don la sogs pas bzlas pa'i don shas nas bsgrubs la mngon par bya ba 'am /
T02TD2510.2E:285b-20: mdun du bsgom par bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:285b-21: de ltar byas na cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:285b-27: rig sngags rnams kyis bsgrub pa'i bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:285b-28: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi thun mong gi bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas bar bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:285b-29: de ni zlos pa po rnams spro ba bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bzlas brjod kyi 'bras bu brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:285b-30: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi thun mong gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas par gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:285b-31: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2510.2E:285b-32: gang na gter yod pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:285b-33: phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:285b-34: rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma las bshad pa'i tshul gyis zla ba bzhir sngon du bsnyen pa byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:286a-1: thag bzlas pa byas nas rdo rje gter la sogs pa'i sbyor bas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:286a-2: shing skyes de lta bur mthong na de na gter yod par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:286a-3: gter dang gter gyi lha dang zhing skyod dang phyogs skyong rnams bcings la gnas der song ste /
T02TD2510.2E:286a-4: bdag nyid gnas der bcas pa bsrung bar byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:286a-5: ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi lha de la phyi'i mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2510.2E:286a-6: phyag bzhi byas nas rdo rje lcags sgrog gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:286a-7: rdo rje gter yod pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bsgrub pa'i snying po brjod cing gter gyi gnas der rdo rje lta bas bltas la /
T02TD2510.2E:286a-8: rdo rje 'bar ba lta bu mthong na de na gter yod par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:286a-9: de nas langs la blang bar bya ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:286a-10: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:286a-11: rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:286a-12: yang rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:286a-13: phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:286a-14: rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod na chu'i steng nas phar 'gro ba la sogs pa yid kyis byas pas /
T02TD2510.2E:286a-15: de ltar na rdo rje dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:286a-16: de la rdo rje chu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba bzhir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yo byad cho ga bzhin du bzlas la /
T02TD2510.2E:286a-17: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ras ris kyi mdun du yang zla ba bzhi snga ma bzhin du bya'o /
T02TD2510.2E:286a-18: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bsgoms nas de'i rjes la 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:286a-19: badzra siddhi zhes lan gsum brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:286a-20: badzra dzva la zhes kyang brjod la chu'i steng du 'chags pa la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:286a-21: ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:286a-23: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:286a-24: phyag rgya bsgrubs na zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:286a-25: rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:286b-0: badzra bi dha ra zhes de skad du @286b lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:286b-1: de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub kyi snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yo byad kyi cho gas zla ba bzhir bzlas pa byas la de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ras ris kyi mdun du slar yang zla ba bzhir snga ma bzhin du bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:286b-2: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas na de'i rjes la rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:286b-4: de ni dngos grub chen po bsgrub pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:286b-5: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:286b-6: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:286b-7: phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:286b-8: badzra satva zhes bya ba la sogs pa rang gi lha'i phyag rgya'i snying po lan gsum brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:286b-9: badzra badzra zhes kyang brjod la thams cad rdo rje la sogs pa'i gzugs su ting nge 'dzin gyi bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2510.2E:286b-10: badzra badzra zhes brjod cing dngos grub sgrub pa'i snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:286b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yo byad kyi cho gas zla ba bzhir bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:286b-12: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ras ris kyi mdun du yang zla ba bzhir zlos shing /
T02TD2510.2E:286b-13: de'i rjes la zla ba nyal mtshan thog thag bzlas na nam langs pa dang sems can phyag rgya'i gzugs su 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:286b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:286b-16: da ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:286b-17: de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub ste zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:286b-18: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:286b-19: phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:286b-20: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi sngags kyi yi ge 'bum bzlas la /
T02TD2510.2E:286b-21: de nas dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs brnyan bzo bo mkhas pas byed du bcug la /
T02TD2510.2E:286b-22: de'i lto bar sngags de bcug ste /
T02TD2510.2E:287a-1: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:287a-2: de nas 'dod pa'i rgyal bos lha chen ji lta ba bzhin du bkug ste /
T02TD2510.2E:287a-3: khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang gzugs brnyan la ji lta ba bzhin du dgug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:287a-7: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2510.2E:287a-8: ras ris kyi mdun du thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du stong rtsa brgyad zlos shing /
T02TD2510.2E:287a-9: rkang pa g-yon pas mnan par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:287a-10: de nas ji srid du zla ba nya la gzugs brnyan de skad 'byin par 'gyur ba de srid kyi bar du bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:287a-12: phyag rgya bsgrub pa na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.2E:287a-13: snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:287a-14: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyod de /
T02TD2510.2E:287a-15: rdo rje dbyings las bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
T02TD2510.2E:287a-16: snga ma bzhin du yi ge 'bru 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:287a-17: de nas ras ris kyi mdun du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:287a-18: nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas /
T02TD2510.2E:287a-19: stong rtsa brgyad zlos shing zla ba gcig gi bar du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:287a-20: de'i rjes la zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur te //
T02TD2510.2E:287a-21: de nas grub pa dang dbang bzhir gyur te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2510.2E:287a-22: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.2E:287a-23: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:287a-25: de nas ras ris kyi mdun du sgeg mo la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la thun bzhi'i sbyor bas /
T02TD2510.2E:287a-26: ji srid du rtag tu mchod pa zla ba gcig gam gsum gyi bar du byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:287a-27: de nas mtshan thog thag mchod na bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:287a-29: 'di ni dngos grub dam pa ste //
T02TD2510.2E:287a-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.2E:287a-31: snga ma bzhin du rang la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:287b-1: de nas ras ris kyi mdun du stong rtsa brgyad zlos shing /
T02TD2510.2E:287b-2: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:287b-3: thun bzhi'i sbyor bas snga ma bzhin du zla ba gcig bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:287b-4: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag byas na /
T02TD2510.2E:287b-6: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:287b-7: de ltar rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:287b-8: da ni padma'i rigs kyi de la 'di dag ni padma'i dngos grub ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:287b-9: snga ma bzhin du 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:287b-10: phyag bzhi pa'i mthar thug pa'i rjes su spyad nas nang gi sngags snga ma bzhin du stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:287b-11: de nas ras ris kyi mdun du rang gi lha'i ting nge 'dzin gyis g-yon pa'i bsnyems pa dang bcas pas padma blangs la lag pa g-yas pas padma bzung la /
T02TD2510.2E:287b-12: padma 'byed cing padma rab tu dmar ba bsgoms nas nyin re bzhin thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:287b-13: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:287b-14: sems can mnyes par byed nus par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:287b-15: snga ma bzhin du dbang byed pas padma 'dod pa bsgoms shing zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bsgoms na /
T02TD2510.2E:287b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa sems can gyi khams thams cad bdag nyid kyis nor dang bcas pa dbang du byed par 'gyur ro ;
T02TD2510.2E:287b-18: / byams pas bsgoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:287b-19: sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs pa dang bsgrub pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:287b-20: de nas mtshan thog thag bzlas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:287b-22: thams cad bsrung ba nus par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:287b-23: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la ;
T02TD2510.2E:287b-24: padma'i 'dab ma 'byed pa'i tshul gyis bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:287b-25: ras ris kyi mdun du mtshan thog thag bzlas na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:287b-26: de ltar padma'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:288a-1: rigs kyi rnal 'byor de la 'di dag ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub rnams te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:288a-2: de la zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2510.2E:288a-3: snga ma bzhin du don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:288a-4: phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba ste /
T02TD2510.2E:288a-5: rang rang gis bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:288a-6: de nas thun bzhi'i sbyor bas bzlas pa 'bum byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:288a-7: ras ris kyi mdun du yang zla ba gcig bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:288a-8: zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas na dbang bskur ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:288a-9: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad spyad nas thun bzhi'i sbyor bas mar me'i snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas bzlas pa 'bum bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:288a-10: de nas ras ris kyi mdun du snga ma bzhin du thun bzhi'i sbyor bas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
T02TD2510.2E:288a-11: ji srid du zla ba gcig brtsam pa de srid kyi bar du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:288a-12: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas pas nam langs pa dang rin chen nyi ma dang gzi brjid mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:288a-13: snga ma bzhin du phyag bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2510.2E:288a-14: thun bzhir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyi rol gyi mchod pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:288a-15: nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i mchod pa bcu drug gis nam mkha'i khams bkang la /
T02TD2510.2E:288a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:288a-17: sems can gyi khams thams cad la de rnams kyi nor bu'i rigs kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par tshim par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:288a-18: nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas ji srid 'bum yongs su rdzogs pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:288a-19: de nas ras ris kyi mdun du snga ma bzhin du zla ba gcig bzlas la /
T02TD2510.2E:288a-20: mthar mtshan thog thag bzlas na bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:288a-21: snga ma bzhin du phyag bzhi bya ba'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:288a-22: rdo rje rin po che blangs te /
T02TD2510.2E:288a-23: rang gi lha'i sbyor bas 'bum bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:288a-24: de nas ras ris kyi mdun du snga ma bzhin zla ba gcig tsam byas la /
T02TD2510.2E:288b-0: mthar @288b mtshan thog thag bzlas na tho rangs kha rdo rje snying po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:288b-1: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:288b-2: da ni thabs med par snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:288b-5: rig pa rnams bsgrub par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:288b-6: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thabs kyi rgyud gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:288b-7: rtog pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na rtog pa thams cad ces rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2510.2E:288b-8: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni de dag gi thabs te /
T02TD2510.2E:288b-9: mngon sum du byed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:288b-10: de'i dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa mngon sum du byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:288b-11: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud de bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:288b-13: zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang dang gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi khams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de dang de 'dra ba'i don grub pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:288b-16: de'i dngos grub thob pa'i thabs so //
T02TD2510.2E:288b-18: de yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste //
T02TD2510.2E:288b-20: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:288b-21: de'i dngos grub chen po kun gyi rgyur gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:288b-22: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dngos grub kyi thabs bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:288b-23: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub kyi thabs ni /
T02TD2510.2E:288b-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te ;
T02TD2510.2E:288b-26: de la gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor la chags pa dang bral ba ni sems phyir phyogs pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:288b-28: rang sangs rgyas la mos pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:288b-29: theg pa chen po la mos pa mdo sde spyod pa la sogs pa 'jig rten no //
T02TD2510.2E:289a-0: de ltar gyur ba'i 'jig rten chags pa dang bral ba de ni 'dul @289a * //
T02TD2510.2E:289a-2: / nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i lam bsgom pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:289a-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnams kyang de'i mngon par 'dod pa'i don 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:289a-4: gzungs kyis 'dul ba'i 'jig rten rnams gzungs rnams la chags shing 'dod pa de las skyes pa'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub ni chags pa las skyes pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:289a-5: chags pa las skyes pa'i dngos grub de'i thabs gang yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:289a-6: de yi thabs ni bsgom pa de //
T02TD2510.2E:289a-8: gzungs kyi dngos grub thob pa ni gzungs sgom pa po zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:289a-9: de ltar gzungs kyi dngos grub kyi thabs bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:289a-10: da ni rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub kyi thabs gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:289a-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:289a-13: 'jig rten gsum na spyod pa'i sems can gyi khams 'di dag bden pa las nyams pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:289a-14: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa de lta bur gyur pa las dngos por 'dzin pa'i mngon par zhen pa'i 'jig rten sngags kyi dngos grub kyi mi 'dod do //
T02TD2510.2E:289a-15: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba'i bden pas bsgom pa ni rig pas 'dod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:289a-17: spros pa med pa'i thabs kyis ni //
T02TD2510.2E:289a-18: dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:289a-20: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi thabs ni gnyis su med pa bsgom pas thob pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:289a-21: de ltar rigs thams cad kyi sngags kyi dngos grub kyi thabs bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:289a-22: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub kyi thabs ni /
T02TD2510.2E:289a-23: ma rig mngon chags 'di la ni //
T02TD2510.2E:289a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:289a-25: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni ma rig pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:289a-26: de la mngon par zhen pa ni 'jig rten pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:289a-27: rig pa'i dngos grub yod min te //
T02TD2510.2E:289a-28: zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mngon par zhe pa ni 'jig rten pa de la chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis so //
T02TD2510.2E:289b-0: gsang ba'i zhes bya ba rtog pa ma skyes pa'i phyir @289b zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:289b-1: de yi thabs ni rgya che las //
T02TD2510.2E:289b-2: dngos grub kyi ni mchog thob bo //
T02TD2510.2E:289b-3: zhes bya ba ni de la chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba khong du chud par 'gyur bas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba bsgom pa'i thabs ni rgya che ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go ;
T02TD2510.2E:289b-4: / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa thams cad thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:289b-8: rig pa rnams kyi bsod nams med pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:289b-9: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:289b-10: rtog pa thams cad ni ji skad bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:289b-11: bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:289b-14: rig pa rnams mngon du byed ces bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:289b-15: mchod pa rnam bzhi byas nas ni //
T02TD2510.2E:289b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.2E:289b-17: rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnal 'byor pas rang la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas mchod pa chen po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:289b-21: mchod pa rnam pa bzhi ste rang gi rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa bcu drug gis mchod pa byas na bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:289b-24: sems rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:289b-26: bsod nams med kyang sangs rgyas mchod //
T02TD2510.2E:289b-29: sangs rgyas rnams kyi mchod pa ni sangs rgyas mchod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:289b-30: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa bcu drug gi phyag rgyas mchod na skye ba gzhan du bsod nams bsags pa med kyang /
T02TD2510.2E:289b-31: rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:289b-32: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:289b-33: bdag ni bsod nams med pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:289b-34: zhes bdag nyid la brnyas shing smad par mi bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:289b-35: phyag rgya bcu drug po rnams kyis bsod nams thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:290a-1: ltar rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thob pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:290a-2: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad ba'i dngos grub thob pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:290a-3: de la 'di'i phyag rgya'i bsod nams kyi rgyud de zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:290a-4: gsang ba bsrungs nas zhes bya ba ni yongs su bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:290a-6: dam tshig ces bya ba ni sku dang /
T02TD2510.2E:290a-8: thugs rdo rje gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa rnams so //
T02TD2510.2E:290a-9: de nyid 'chad pa ni gsang ba zhes bya ba bris pa'i phyag rgya'i gzugs can mchod par 'os pa'i rig pa'i lha mo'i gzungs 'di dag ni gsang ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:290a-10: bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gzungs kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa na sku dang ;
T02TD2510.2E:290a-12: thugs rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:290a-14: bsod nams med kyang myur bar ni //
T02TD2510.2E:290a-19: yid rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams skye ba gzhan du bsags pa med kyang gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams myur du 'grub par 'gyur bas bstan par mi bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:290a-20: de ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:290a-21: gzungs kyi sgrub pa pos slob dpon gyis bshad pa gzhan la bstan par mi bya zhing bdag gzungs bsgrubs pa yin no zhes kyang smra bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:290a-22: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi gzungs kyi dngos grub kyi bsod nams kyi rgyud bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:290a-23: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:290a-24: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngags kyi dngos grub kyi bsod nams kyi rgyud gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:290a-25: sangs rgyas mtshan la sogs brjod na //
T02TD2510.2E:290a-26: zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i mdo sde las bshad pa'i /
T02TD2510.2E:290a-27: bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:290a-28: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:290b-1: chos sbyin pas na dngos grub thob //
T02TD2510.2E:290b-3: sems can rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa ston pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:290b-4: de ltar sngags kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:290b-5: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub ni de la 'di ni rig pa'i bsod nams kyi rgyud gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:290b-6: bsod nams nga ni sbyin pa'i mchog //
T02TD2510.2E:290b-7: ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi rig pas sgrub pa pos chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar bsgoms pas chos kyi mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pa yongs su spang bar bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:290b-9: chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pa spang bar bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:290b-10: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs na //
T02TD2510.2E:290b-11: zhes bya ba gsungs pa 'di ni phyi'i dngos po me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa ci 'byor bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang sems can rnams la sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:290b-13: sangs rgyas sems can rnams la sbyin /
T02TD2510.2E:290b-14: nyin zhag don med mi bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:290b-16: de'i nang na sbyin pa mchog yin no ;
T02TD2510.2E:290b-20: byin na bsod nams thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:290b-22: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:290b-23: des sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:290b-24: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs na //
T02TD2510.2E:290b-25: myur du sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:290b-27: de ltar de bzhin shes sa pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud gsungs nas /
T02TD2510.2E:290b-28: da ni gdul bya de rnams de nyid la shes rab med na snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:290b-31: rig par 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:290b-32: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas rtog pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:291a-0: rtog pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub @291a * //
T02TD2510.2E:291a-2: sngags kyi yi ge rnams skye ba med par zhugs pas na yi ge aa las rab tu 'jug pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:291a-3: des na yi ge thams cad rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD2510.2E:291a-4: sngags kyi yi ge rnams gcig tu 'gyur ba zhes bya ba rnam par thar pa'i sgo /
T02TD2510.2E:291a-5: rang gi kha nas gzhan zhal du //
T02TD2510.2E:291a-6: zhes bya ba ni rang gi kha nas gzhan gyi zhal du 'jug bar bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:291a-7: de ltar rang gi kha nas gzhan gyi zhal du bsgoms na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:291a-9: rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i snying po zlos shing /
T02TD2510.2E:291a-10: chos thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'o zhes pa bsgoms te /
T02TD2510.2E:291a-11: bdag nyid lha'i sku gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:291a-12: mdun du yang lha'i gzugs bzhag la /
T02TD2510.2E:291a-13: de yang gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs par bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:291a-14: dngos po la ma zhen par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:291a-15: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi gzungs kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub ni shes rab des 'bigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:291a-16: nges par 'bigs pa ni nges 'bigs so ;
T02TD2510.2E:291a-17: / chos thams cad bdag med pa'i ye shes kyi lam gyi yi ge aa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:291a-18: nges par 'bigs pas na nges 'bigs te shes rab bo //
T02TD2510.2E:291a-19: 'jig rten gsum na spyod pa'i bag chags dang bcas ba'i nyon mongs pa spangs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes so zhes bya ba ni bshad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:291a-20: ting nge 'dzin zhes grags pa ste //
T02TD2510.2E:291a-21: zhes bya ba ni nges par 'bigs pa'i shes rab la ting nge 'dzin zhes bshad de /
T02TD2510.2E:291a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa de la rnam par g-yeng ba mi mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:291a-23: de nas phyag rgya myur 'grub par //
T02TD2510.2E:291a-24: zhes bya ba ni des de lta bu'i ngo bo la nges par 'bigs pa'i shes rab kyi skal ba dang ldan pa la phyag rgya'i gzungs thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02TD2510.2E:291b-0: sgrub pa po'i rgyud la mngon @291b sum du 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:291b-1: gang gi phyir rnal 'byor pa des de ltar bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:291b-2: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rigs thams cad kyi gzungs kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:291b-3: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sngags kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:291b-4: de la 'di ni sngags kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:291b-5: shes rab sgra yi rjes 'brangs la //
T02TD2510.2E:291b-6: zhes bya ba ni chos dang don dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:291b-7: de nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni ting nge 'dzin to //
T02TD2510.2E:291b-9: tshig ni rab tu spros pas na //
T02TD2510.2E:291b-11: ngag gi rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa ste /
T02TD2510.2E:291b-12: rnam par rtog pa'i chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:291b-13: des na dngos po'i khyad par de lta bu dang /
T02TD2510.2E:291b-14: ngag gi rnam par rtog pa la dngos por mngon par zhen pa med pas /
T02TD2510.2E:291b-15: shes rab sgra yi rjes 'brangs la //
T02TD2510.2E:291b-16: ting nge 'dzin zhes rab tu grags //
T02TD2510.2E:291b-17: de bsgom par ni myur bar yang //
T02TD2510.2E:291b-18: sngags kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:291b-20: de nas shes rab sgra'i rjes su 'brang ba bsgoms pa des de ltar chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:291b-21: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rigs rnams kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:291b-22: de la 'di ni rig pa'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:291b-23: rig pa ni rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa'i lha'i gzugs so //
T02TD2510.2E:291b-24: sngags ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa dang las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa'i sngags de rig pa dang sngags de gnyis la khyad par du ma de dag la yod pa ma yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:291b-25: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:291b-26: shes rab bsgoms na myur bar ni //
T02TD2510.2E:291b-27: nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:292a-0: @292a * // de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o zhes chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid du shes rab kyis rnam par dpyad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:292a-1: yang nas yang du mngon du byas nas rnal 'byor pa las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi rig pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:292a-2: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:292a-3: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad rtog pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni /
T02TD2510.2E:292a-4: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas snying po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:292a-7: rig pa rnams kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:292a-8: tshogs med par ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:292a-9: rtog pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bstan zhing mngon sum du byed do zhes bya ba'i don te /
T02TD2510.2E:292a-10: mchod pa thams cad rab byas na //
T02TD2510.2E:292a-11: zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi mchod pa lnga la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:292a-12: sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:292a-13: las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa bcu drug la sogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyis rab tu sems rtse gcig pas byas na bzlas pa dang bcas pas tshogs rnams 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:292a-15: dag pa ni chos rnams kyi zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:292a-16: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rin chen 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams thabs dang /
T02TD2510.2E:292a-17: shes rab yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsgrub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don do ;
T02TD2510.2E:292a-18: / de bas na rnal 'byor pas tshogs ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:292a-19: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:292b-0: da ni de @292b bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi gzungs kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i tshogs gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:292b-1: de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:292b-2: dkyil 'khor mang po zhugs pa dang //
T02TD2510.2E:292b-3: zhes bya ba ni mang bo de rnams su zhugs pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mang por bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:292b-6: de nyid dam tshig ces grags pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:292b-8: dkyil 'khor mang po bris pa'i phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:292b-9: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor yang yin la mang bo yang yin pas na dkyil 'khor mang po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:292b-10: de dag brtags shing bris pa'i phyir tshogs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:292b-11: de ltar gyur bas na cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:292b-12: tshogs ni rdzogs par bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD2510.2E:292b-13: tshogs thams cad rdzogs pas na phyag rgya rnams kyi dngos grub chen po sangs rgyas nyid dang /
T02TD2510.2E:292b-14: byang chub sems dpa' nyid thob pa'i rgyu rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:292b-15: da ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rigs thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa'i tshul du zhes bya ba gsungs pa ni sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2510.2E:292b-16: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:292b-18: 'phags pa nyan thos yang dag par song ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:292b-19: yang dag par zhugs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:292b-20: sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du lus dang ngag dang /
T02TD2510.2E:292b-21: yid las byung ba'i bsod nams gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid do zhes ngag tu brjod cing rjes su yi rang ba de dang por byas pa'i lhag ma ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba 'debs pa yin pas rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa'i sgra brjod do //
T02TD2510.2E:292b-22: de'i tshul ni de bzhin du brjod do //
T02TD2510.2E:292b-23: de bzhin du dam pa'i chos bklag pa dang zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa zab mo'i mdo sde 'don pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:292b-24: da ni las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad la rig pa'i tshogs kyi dngos grub gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:292b-25: ma rig rab tu spangs pa dang //
T02TD2510.2E:293a-2: dngos por 'dzin pa'i mngon par zhen pa ni ma rig pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:293a-3: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de bsgoms pas shin tu phul du byung bas nges par gsal ba ni rab tu spangs pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:293a-4: de'i dngos po ni de kho na nyid de /
T02TD2510.2E:293a-5: de gang las yan zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:293a-6: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin tshul las //
T02TD2510.2E:293a-8: shes rab kyi stobs kyis len pa po dang gtong ba po dang /
T02TD2510.2E:293a-9: gtang bar bya ba mi dmigs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:293a-10: mngon sum du byed pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:293a-11: chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pa spangs pas de nyid kyi tshul ni thob pa'i thabs so //
T02TD2510.2E:293a-12: de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul las /
T02TD2510.2E:293a-13: tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs nas kyang //
T02TD2510.2E:293a-14: zhes bya ba ni las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i rig pa rnams bzlas pas dngos grub thob po zhes bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:293a-15: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad nas /
T02TD2510.2E:293a-16: da ni de rnams kyi mtshan ma 'byung ba med na /
T02TD2510.2E:293a-17: ye shes kyi dngos grub tu mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:293a-18: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma 'byung ba ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud gsungs pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:293a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs rnams dang /
T02TD2510.2E:293a-23: sna tshogs rdo rje la sogs pa de dag ye shes gang las 'byung ba de ni rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma 'byung ba'i ye shes so //
T02TD2510.2E:293a-24: de'i dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa mngon sum du byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:293a-25: de ji ltar rdo rje 'byung zhe na zhes bya ba ni ye shes gang gis rdo rje la sogs pa bskyed pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:293a-26: de nyid bcom ldan sems dpa' ste //
T02TD2510.2E:293a-27: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:293a-28: bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po'i byang chub chen po'i sems de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la bzhugs so zhes bya ba gang yin pa sngar bshad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:293a-29: de nyid rdo rje las skyes pas na rgyu yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:293b-0: de ltar 'gyur @293b ba gang yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:293b-1: thams cad sems zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:293b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa nas //
T02TD2510.2E:293b-3: sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:293b-5: nyid bdag ces bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:293b-6: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gzhan gyi dbang med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:293b-7: ci'i phyir gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gzhan gyi dbang med pa yin zhe na gang gi phyir /
