T02TD2510.2E:310b-3: sems so sor rtog pa bsgom pa'i phyir /
T02TD2510.2E:310b-4: byang chub sems zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:310b-5: aom bodhi tsitta autp'a da ya mi zhes bya ba byang chub kyi sems bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:310b-6: brtan par bya zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:310b-7: aom tishtha badzra zhes bya ba de kho na nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems brtan par byed pa'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:310b-8: / sems dpa'i rdo rje brtan byas nas //
T02TD2510.2E:310b-10: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje'i bdag nyid brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:310b-11: sangs rgyas su ni bdag sgoms shig / ces bya ba ni rdo rjer 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin gyi sems te /
T02TD2510.2E:310b-12: aom ya tha sarbba ta th'a ga ta sta tha aa ham zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2510.2E:310b-13: sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:310b-14: de dag gis de lta bu lags zhes smras nas dang ngo //
T02TD2510.2E:310b-15: de ltar byas pa nyid da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu byed par khyed kyis nus par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:310b-16: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsgom pa kho nas mngon par byang chub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:310b-17: yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02TD2510.2E:310b-18: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD2510.2E:310b-19: de nas ni skabs su babs pa'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:310b-20: / de ltar lha'i bdag po rnams la /
T02TD2510.2E:310b-21: sangs rgyas pa'i gdams ngag bstan nas /
T02TD2510.2E:310b-22: 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir rang gi bsgom pa'i mthus bdud pham par byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:310b-23: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so ;
T02TD2510.2E:310b-24: / de ltar bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rang gi snying gar zla ba rdo rje'i gzugs la /
T02TD2510.2E:310b-25: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02TD2510.2E:310b-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstod pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:311a-0: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni snying po'i rang @311a * //
T02TD2510.2E:311a-1: bzhin khyod yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:311a-2: sems dpa' che zhes bya ba ni spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:311a-3: theg pa che zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:311a-4: bdag nyid che zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid chen po 'di la mnga' bas na bdag nyid che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:311a-5: snang ba che zhes bya ba ni spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:311a-6: mgon po che zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i ngo bos sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mgon pos mdzad pas na mgon po che'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:311a-8: rdo rje rgyal po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rgyal po snying po'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:311a-9: rdo rje che zhes bya ba ni rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:311a-10: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni thugs ka'i sems dpa'i rdo rje'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:311a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:311a-12: sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:311a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dren pa'i las kyis thams cad du khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:311a-14: brtson 'grus che zhes bya ba ni bsdu pa'i dngos po bzhi dang bcas pa'i las thams cad khyab pa'i phyir brtson 'grus che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:311a-15: thabs chen po zhes bya ba ni gzhal du med pa 'gugs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir thabs chen po ste mtshan bdun no //
T02TD2510.2E:311a-16: rdo rje 'dod pa 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje chags pa'i snying po'i sgo nas so ;
T02TD2510.2E:311a-17: / dag pa che zhes bya ba ni chos bdag med pa'i chags pa'i ngo bos bag chags dang bcas pa nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir dag pa che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:311a-18: kun gyi bde pa zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir kun gyi bde ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:311a-19: bde ba che zhes bya ba ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i dpyad pa dang bral bas bde pa chen po'i rnam par thar pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:311a-20: bde mchog ces bya ba ni bde pa chen po'i ngo bos thams cad mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:311a-21: thog ma dang tha ma med pa zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2510.2E:311b-0: bzhad chen zhes bya ba ni @311b bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'o zhes gsungs pas na mtshan bdun no //
T02TD2510.2E:311b-1: rdo rje legs pa zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:311b-2: dgyes pa che zhes bya ba ni spro pa dang bsdu pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:311b-3: legs zhes bya ba ni legs par byed pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2510.2E:311b-4: rab dgyes pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:311b-5: sems can rnams yid bde pa bskyed par mdzad pa'i phyir rab dgyes pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:311b-6: mnyes pa che zhes bya ba ni yid bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis thams cad du khyab pa'i phyir mnyes pa che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:311b-7: dgyes pa che zhes bya ba ni yid bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis thams cad du khyab pa'i phyir mnyes pa che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:311b-8: dgyes pa che zhes bya ba ni yid bde ba bskyed pas thams cad khyab pa'i phyir dgyes pa che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:311b-9: rab dgyes khyod ces bya ba ni sems can rnams la rab tu dgyes pa shin tu bskyed pa'i phyir na rab dgyes khyod de mtshan bdun yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:311b-10: rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:311b-11: rgyal po che zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid thob pas na rgyal po che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:311b-12: dbang bskur bzang po zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba bzang po 'di la mnga' bas na dbang bskur bzang po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:311b-13: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i chus khams gsum pa na spyod pa'i bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khrung par byed ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD2510.2E:311b-14: bdag po zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i rigs kyi rang bzhin gyis sbyin pa'i bdag po ni sbyin bdag chen po ste /
T02TD2510.2E:311b-15: 'khor los sgyur pa chen po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:311b-16: rin chen thams cad ces bya ba ni nor bu'i rigs thams cad kyi rin po che'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir rin chen thams cad do //
T02TD2510.2E:311b-17: mdzes pa che zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i rigs kyi rang bzhin gyis sems can thams cad la mdzes pa chen por byed pas na mdzes pa che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:312a-0: rnam rgyan khyod ces bya ba ni rin po che'i cod pan la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis sems can thams cad rnam par brgyan par byed pa'i phyir na rnam brgyan de mtshan bdun @312a * //
T02TD2510.2E:312a-2: / rdo rje gzi brjid che zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:312a-3: gzi brjid che zhes bya ba ni spro pa dang bsdu pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:312a-4: 'od che zhes bya ba ni 'od kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab pas na 'od che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:312a-5: lham me chen po ste zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad gsal ba 'di la mnga' bas na lham me chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:312a-6: rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2510.2E:312a-7: 'bar pa chen po 'di la mnga' pas na 'bar pa che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:312a-8: sangs rgyas 'od ces bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi 'od kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir te mtshan bdun yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:312a-9: rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:312a-10: rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba ni spro pa dang bsdu pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:312a-11: rgyal mtshan che zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi rgyal mtshan chen po yin pa'i phyir rgyal mtshan che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:312a-12: nor rab gtong zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan btsugs nas rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa'i nor ster pas na nor rab gtong ngo //
T02TD2510.2E:312a-13: nam mkha'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las byung bas na nam mkha' rgyal mtshan no //
T02TD2510.2E:312a-14: yu ba che zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mchod sdong chen po ni yu ba che ste /
T02TD2510.2E:312a-15: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dpal gyi sku'o//
T02TD2510.2E:312a-16: gtong ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyis don thams cad gtong bas na gtong ba'i rgyal mtshan te mtshan bdun no //
T02TD2510.2E:312a-17: rdo rje bzhad pa zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:312a-18: bzhad pa che zhes bya ba ni spro pa dang bsdu pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:312a-19: dgyes pa che zhes bya ba ni yid bde ba dpag tu med pa'i rgyur gyur pas na dgyes pa che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:312a-20: rab dgyes che zhes bya ba ni yid bde ba skyed par byed pas rab dgyes ma'o //
T02TD2510.2E:312b-0: dgyes pa'i shugs zhes bya ba ni rtog pa med pa dga' ba'i rgyun @312b 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir dgyes pa'i shugs so //
T02TD2510.2E:312b-1: rol zhing dgyes zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems la dga' zhing mgu bas na rol zhing dgyes so //
T02TD2510.2E:312b-2: chos dgyes khyod ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos stobs dang /
T02TD2510.2E:312b-3: mi 'jigs pa'i yul la chos kyis mgu bas na chos kyis dgyes pa ste mtshan bdun yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:312b-4: rdo rje chos zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:312b-5: chos che ba zhes bya ba ni spro pa dang bsdu pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:312b-6: thams cad chos zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir thams cad chos so //
T02TD2510.2E:312b-7: rab sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis sems can gyi khams shin tu sbyong pas na spyong ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:312b-8: sangs rgyas chos zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams chos te /
T02TD2510.2E:312b-9: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bos so //
T02TD2510.2E:312b-10: chos rab mchog ces bya ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad las phul du byung pa yin pas na chos rab mchog go //
T02TD2510.2E:312b-11: 'dod chos zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i 'dod pa de'i chos ni padma'i rigs te mtshan bdun no //
T02TD2510.2E:312b-12: rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:312b-13: ral gri zhes bya ba ni spro pa dang bsdu pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:312b-14: shes rab ye shes zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad bdag med par nges pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir na shes rab ye shes so //
T02TD2510.2E:312b-15: blo gros che zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi ye shes chen pos thams cad du song pa'i phyir blo gros che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:312b-16: sdig gcod ces bya ba ni shes rab ye shes kyis sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba gcod par mdzad pas na sdig gcod do //
T02TD2510.2E:312b-17: ral gri chen po zhes bya ba ni shes rab ye shes kyi ral gris thams cad du song pa'i phyir ral gri che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:313a-0: sangs rgyas mtshon khyod ces bya ba ni shes rab ye shes kyi ral gri chen po'i ngo bo de yang @313a * //
T02TD2510.2E:313a-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshon cha yin pas na sangs rgyas mtshon cha ste mtshan bdun yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:313a-2: rdo rje rgyu zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:313a-3: 'khor lo che zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas spro pa dang bsdu pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:313a-4: sangs rgyas 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i ngo bo de sangs rgyas rnams kyi yin pas na sangs rgyas 'khor lo'o //
T02TD2510.2E:313a-5: gter chen po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bos zad mi shes pa'i phyir na gter chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:313a-6: dkyil 'khor kun zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi ngo bo yin pas na dkyil 'khor kun no //
T02TD2510.2E:313a-7: chos kyi mchog ces bya ba ni mdo sde thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul las dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bos mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir chos kyi mchog go //
T02TD2510.2E:313a-8: chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs kyi gdul bya'i skye bo'i rgyud la 'pho bar byed pas na chos kyi 'khor lo ste mtshan bdun yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:313a-9: rdo rje gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:313a-10: gsung ba che zhes bya ba ni spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:313a-11: spros med ces bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi dag gi rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i ye shes kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir na spros pa med do //
T02TD2510.2E:313a-12: yi ge chen po zhes bya ba ni spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo gsungs pa'i phyir na ye shes chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:313a-13: yi ge med ces bya ba ni spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bos aa la sogs pa'i ye shes rnams spangs pa'i phyir yi ge med pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:313a-14: bzlas pa che zhes bya ba ni lce'i phyag rgyas nam mkha' thams cad khyab pa'i phyir bzlas pa che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:313a-15: sangs rgyas gsung zhes bya ba ni lce'i phyag rgya de yang sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yin pas na sangs rgyas gsung ste /
T02TD2510.2E:313a-17: rdo rje las zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:313b-0: las rab mchog ces bya ba ni dge ba rnams kyi las yin @313b pas na rab ste /
T02TD2510.2E:313b-1: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:313b-2: sems can gyi don byed pa'i mtshan nyid de ni mchog yin pas na las mchog go //
T02TD2510.2E:313b-3: las chen zhes bya ba ni spro pa dang bsdu pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:313b-4: las rab byed pa ste zhes bya ba ni ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dge pa'i las byed pas na las rab byed do //
T02TD2510.2E:313b-5: gsang pa'i mchod pa zhes bya ba ni rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bsgrub pa'i rang gi mchod pa yin pa'i phyir gsang pa'i mchod pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:313b-6: mchod pa che zhes bya ba ni ;
T02TD2510.2E:313b-7: rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi las thams cad du khyab pa'i phyir na mchod pa che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:313b-8: sangs rgyas mchod pa zhes bya ba ni rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi mchod pa'i las kyi ngo bo de yangs sangs rgyas rnams kyi yin pa de bas sangs rgyas mchod khyod ces bya ba ste mtshan bdun yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:313b-9: rdo rje srung ba zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:313b-10: go cha che zhes bya ba ni go cha'i phyag rgyas spro pa dang bsdu pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:313b-11: go cha mchog ces bya ba ni dbye ba mi phyed pa'i go cha'i ngo bo ni go cha'i phyag rgya rnams las mchog tu gyur pas na go cha mchog ces bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:313b-12: brtan pa che zhes bya ba ni brtan pa yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na yongs su sbyong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ngo bos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir na brtan pa che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:313b-13: srung ba che zhes bya ba ni yongs su sbyong pa'i brtson 'grus kyi ngo bos thams cad du khyab pa'i phyir na bsrung ba che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:313b-14: bdud chen po zhes bya ba ni yongs su sbyong pa'i brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyis phyir phyogs pas bsad bas na bdud chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:313b-15: sangs rgyas brtson 'grus zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa de'i yang bdud chen po'i ngo bor gyur pas na sangs rgyas brtson 'grus te /
T02TD2510.2E:314a-1: gnod sbyin zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:314a-2: khro bo che zhes bya ba ni spro ba dang /
T02TD2510.2E:314a-4: ma rungs pa'i bdud skrag par byed pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2510.2E:314a-5: ma rungs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:314a-6: ston pa'i phyir na ma rungs pa thams cad do //
T02TD2510.2E:314a-7: skrag byed pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pas sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs zlog par byed pa'i phyir skrag byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:314a-8: sangs rgyas kun zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir na sangs rgyas kun no //
T02TD2510.2E:314a-9: thabs chen po zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal pa yin no zhes so sor rtog pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bdud bzhi 'joms par byed pas na thabs chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:314a-10: mchog ces bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i so sor rtog pa'i brtson 'grus ni gzhan la mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir na mchog go //
T02TD2510.2E:314a-11: gnod sbyin zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal pa'i so sor rtog pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bdud bzhi za bas gnod sbyin te mtshan bdun no //
T02TD2510.2E:314a-12: rdo rje mtshams sbyor zhes bya ba ni snying po'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2510.2E:314a-13: phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni 'do gsal bsgrubs pa'i brtson 'grus kyis mngon sum du byas pa'i ngo bos sems can rnams la rgyas 'debs pas na phyag rgya che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:314a-14: dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs nyid kyis thams cad du khyab pa'i phyir dam tshig che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:314a-15: bcing ba che zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya rnams dam tshig chen po'i ngo bo gcig tu byed pas na 'ching ba che'o //
T02TD2510.2E:314a-16: khu tshur chen po zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i ngo bos thams cad du khyab pa'i phyir khu tshur chen po'o //
T02TD2510.2E:314a-17: phyag rgya mchog ces bya ba ni dge pa'i phyag rgya ni bzang po'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2510.2E:314a-18: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sku dang /
T02TD2510.2E:314b-1: rdo rje khu tshur gyi ngo bos de rnams la khyad par du gyur pas na mchog go //
T02TD2510.2E:314b-2: rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur pa'i sgo nas te mtshan bdun yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:314b-3: de bzhin gshegs pas phyag bya zhing //
T02TD2510.2E:314b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD2510.2E:314b-5: brjod de mchod de bsti stang bya //
T02TD2510.2E:314b-6: zhes bya ba ni bsti stang du bya ba bzang po 'di la mnga' bas na bsti stang bya ba'o //
T02TD2510.2E:314b-7: 'dir bsti stang du bya ba ni shin tu gus shing bsti stang byas ba de dag phul du byung bar gnas pa'i phyir mchod de bsti stang du bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:314b-10: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sprul pa thams cad bsdu pa mdzad nas ri rab kyi rtse mo yongs su btang nas /
T02TD2510.2E:314b-11: 'og min gyi gnas su longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnam par snang mdzad dang lhan cig tu gyur par bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:314b-12: slob dpon gyis de nas dga' ldan gyi gnas su dam pa tog dkar po sprul nas chos ston par mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:314b-13: de nas sh'akya'i rigs su dga' ldan na spyod pa'i lha'i bu shi 'phos nas sh'akya'i rigs su skyes par mdzad nas //
T02TD2510.2E:314b-14: dka' pa spyod pa'i mthar thug pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:314b-15: don thams cad grub pa'i spyod pa btang nas byang chub chen po'i drung du gshegs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:314b-16: shis pa la sogs pa'i rtsva'i gdan blangs nas /
T02TD2510.2E:314b-17: ae ma'o sems can bstan pa yi //
T02TD2510.2E:314b-18: sems can don ni bdag don mchog //
T02TD2510.2E:314b-19: gang phyir 'dul dbang bstan pa rnams //
T02TD2510.2E:314b-20: mu stegs lta la gnas par mdzad //
T02TD2510.2E:314b-22: lta pa ngan pas ldongs pa rnams //
T02TD2510.2E:314b-23: ye shes snang bas dag bya'i phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:314b-24: sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:314b-25: de nas 'dod pa'i lha rnams la //
T02TD2510.2E:314b-27: kye dge sbyong gi byang chub kyi phyir 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal drag cing mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal rnams kyis dga' ba skyed par mdzad dam zhes gsol nas bdag nyid la bskul bar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:315a-2: steng du bzhugs nas lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02TD2510.2E:315a-3: grogs po rnams kho bos byang chub thob par sgrubs shig yang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis snying po byang chub ga na ba der song nas /
T02TD2510.2E:315a-4: zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD2510.2E:315a-5: bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te /
T02TD2510.2E:315a-6: rang gi gdan 'di las bzhengs la lha rdzas kyi gdan la bzhugs te /
T02TD2510.2E:315a-7: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mdzad du gsol zhes smra bar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:315a-8: de nas de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02TD2510.2E:315a-9: grogs po rnams kho bos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub smin par sgrubs shig /
T02TD2510.2E:315a-10: de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD2510.2E:315a-11: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub stsol bar mi nus so //
T02TD2510.2E:315a-12: ci ste bdag cag gis nus par mi 'gyur na /
T02TD2510.2E:315a-13: da lta bdag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes smra bar bsam par bya'o ;
T02TD2510.2E:315a-14: / de nas de dag gi don de nyid gsal bar mdzad pa ni /
T02TD2510.2E:315a-15: de ni gzugs min gzugs med min //
T02TD2510.2E:315a-16: bden min brdzun min gtsang ba yis //
T02TD2510.2E:315a-17: sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di //
T02TD2510.2E:315a-18: rtogs na rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD2510.2E:315a-19: de nas lha'i bdag po rnams kyis byang chub pa'i don mngon su du byas par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:315a-20: rtsva'i gdan de las bzhengs te grogs po rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di lta bu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir sgrubs shig / de dag gi gsol pa /
T02TD2510.2E:315a-21: bcom ldan 'das de skad ces bka' stsal pa de bsam par rngo mi thogs lags so //
T02TD2510.2E:315a-22: de yang gdan de nyid las bzhugs pa bzhin du tshigs su bcad pas mngon par byang chub pa lnga bsgoms pa'i gdams ngag de dag rab tu bstan te /
T02TD2510.2E:315a-23: yid kyis rab tu brtags pas na //
T02TD2510.2E:315b-0: byang chub sems @315b ni brtan par byas //
T02TD2510.2E:315b-1: sems dpa' rdo rje brtan byas la //
T02TD2510.2E:315b-2: sangs rgyas su ni bdag bsgoms shing //
T02TD2510.2E:315b-3: de nas de dag gis de lta bu legs so zhes khas blangs nas dong bar bsam mo //
T02TD2510.2E:315b-4: mtshan mo de nyid kyi tho rangs bdud pham par byas nas /
T02TD2510.2E:315b-5: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdag nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:315b-6: snying ga na gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la /
T02TD2510.2E:315b-7: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02TD2510.2E:315b-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad ba 'dis bstod par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2510.2E:315b-9: de nas phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:315b-10: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka na gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:315b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus ste zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:315b-12: 'og min gyi gnas na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang gsung gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no //
T02TD2510.2E:315b-13: lag gnyis legs par byed pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2510.2E:315b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2510.2E:315b-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pas legs so zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:315b-16: de'i don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:315b-17: de la mi rnams kyis mngon par byang chub pa ni 'di ltar rnam par bsams te /
T02TD2510.2E:315b-18: rnal 'byor pa sprul pa'i skus mi rnams kyi sh'akya thub pa'i shugs kyis rab tu zhugs pa yin la /
T02TD2510.2E:315b-19: 'og min du rnam par snang mdzad dang bdag nyid lhan cig tha mi dad par bsams nas snying ga ga gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod nas /
T02TD2510.2E:315b-20: yang legs so zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2510.2E:315b-21: rdo rje theg pa bla na med //
T02TD2510.2E:315b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
T02TD2510.2E:315b-23: theg pa chen po mngon 'dul ba'i //
T02TD2510.2E:315b-24: mdo sde legs par bshad pas na //
T02TD2510.2E:315b-25: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so //
T02TD2510.2E:316a-2: rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so //
T02TD2510.2E:316a-3: rdo rje las ni khyod legs so //
T02TD2510.2E:316a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pa dgyes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2510.2E:316a-6: rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsug tor dang //
T02TD2510.2E:316a-9: rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya rnams kyis bdag nyid yang dag par bsrungs la /
T02TD2510.2E:316a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02TD2510.2E:316a-11: zhes yang dang yang du brjod cing ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dge ba'i phyogs byed cing gnas par byed pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:316a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:316a-13: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dag thams cad dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur to zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas ;
T02TD2510.2E:316a-14: rdo rje theg pa bla na med //
T02TD2510.2E:316a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
T02TD2510.2E:316a-16: theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa //
T02TD2510.2E:316a-19: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo gang yin pa de sdud pa po bdag gis 'og min lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs te bka' stsal zhing /
T02TD2510.2E:316a-20: gsungs pa de las mngon sum du //
T02TD2510.2E:316a-21: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa de ni 'di yin no zhes bdag nyid kyis khas blangs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:316a-22: byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po la sogs pa rnams kyis sdud pa po yongs su rdzogs pa'i dus su lcang lo can gyi pho brang na gnas pa'i sdud par byed pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug phyag na rdo rje sa gsungs pa mthar rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par bstod do //
T02TD2510.2E:316a-23: de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis /
T02TD2510.2E:316b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa theg pa chen po'i mdo gsungs pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems @316b dpa' dang bcas pa rnams rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par bstod do //
T02TD2510.2E:316b-2: rang gi thugs ka na zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:316b-3: rang gi thugs la zhugs pas na rang gi thugs ka na gnas pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:316b-4: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2510.2E:316b-5: byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa bzhugs pa gang yin pa de ni /
T02TD2510.2E:316b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam par bzhugs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad dgyes shing mnyes nas gsungs pa la mngon par dgyes par gyur to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2510.2E:316b-8: gang gis gsungs pa yin zhe na /
T02TD2510.2E:316b-9: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba smos te /
T02TD2510.2E:316b-10: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ni /
T02TD2510.2E:316b-11: 'khor los sgyur ba bzhi'i rang bzhin du ston pa gang yin pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:316b-12: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'og min gyi gnas su mngon par byang chub pa mngon sum du mdzad pa'i rjes thogs nyid la gsungs pa 'di dang /
T02TD2510.2E:316b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' ri rab kyi rtse mo na bzhugs nas 'di rgya che bar gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:316b-14: de'i don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02TD2510.2E:316b-15: 'di ltar ri rab kyi steng du 'khor los sgyur ba bzhi'i rang bzhin gyis /
T02TD2510.2E:316b-16: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de kho na nyid bsdus pa gsungs pa dang /
T02TD2510.2E:316b-17: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'og min gyi gnas su mngon par byang chub pa mngon sum du rjes thogs nyid la /
T02TD2510.2E:316b-18: byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po la sogs pa thog mar gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2510.2E:316b-19: mngon par dgyes zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2510.2E:316b-20: mngon par dga' ba'i gyur pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02TD2510.2E:316b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'i 'grel pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:316b-23: chos bdag med pa'i chags pa yis //
T02TD2510.2E:316b-24: skye dgu chags pas bsgos pa yis//
T02TD2510.2E:317a-0: @317a * // de bzhin gshegs rigs sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-1: phyogs rnams kun du yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-2: thugs rje chen po las byung ba'i //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-3: gdug cing ma rungs 'dul mdzad pa //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-4: rdo rje rigs chen sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-5: zhe sdang mtshan ma rab zhi zhing //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-6: med pa'i lta ba ches rmongs pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-7: khams gsum 'dam gyi nyes pa las //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-8: padma chen po'i rigs dag pa //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-9: kun du dga' bas rnam par bzhugs //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-10: ser sna'i dri ma 'jig byed cing //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-11: sems can bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-12: nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi lha //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-13: nam mkha' bzhin du yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-14: thams cad gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-15: skye ba med cing gnas med pas //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-16: sgyu ma sogs bzhin rnam rig pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-17: byang chub snying po rab bsgrub phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-18: snying rjes khyab pa'i sems kyis ni ;
T02TD2510.2E:317a-19: / blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yis //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-20: nam mkha'i mthar thug grags pa yis //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-21: de nyid bsdus rgyud 'di gsungs so //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-23: aom dza ya na gtsug nor bu /
T02TD2510.2E:317a-24: 'jig rten gsum po dga' byed pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-25: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gnas ba //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-26: dpal ldan gtsug lag khang chen du //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-27: rgyud kyi 'grel pa de nyid ni /
T02TD2510.2E:317a-28: snang byed dge ba 'di bshad pas //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-29: bdag gis bsod nams gang bsags pa //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-30: byang chub sems kyi 'bras bskyed nas //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-31: de yis 'jig rten ma lus pa'i //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-32: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun dga' che //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-33: snying po bsam gyis mi khyab gtso //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-34: rdo rje 'dzin chen rgyal gyur cig /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i theg pa chen po'i mdo'i bshad pa de kho na nyid snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
T02TD2510.2E:317a-36: // / grangs la rmongs pa gzhig pa'i phyir //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-37: gzhung 'di'i grangs kyi tshad dag ni //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-38: stong phrag dag ni bco brgyad du //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-39: 'gro la phan pa bskyed phyir byas //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-40: slob dpon kun dga' snying po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2510.2E:317a-41: rgya gar gyi mkhas pa pandi ta chen po thugs rje chen po dang zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
